description: Cusumano's fresh Insolia delivers a steady, neutral nose with distant aromas of honey, Golden Delicious apple and dried grass. It's a lean, simple wine at a competitive price.
title: Cusumano 2010 Insolia (Sicilia)
description2: Cusumano's fresh Insolia delivers a steady, neutral nose with distant aromas of honey, Golden Delicious apple and dried grass. It's a lean, simple wine at a competitive price. Insolia Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Cusumano

description: Opens with peachy, citric and saline aromas. Feels moderately fresh, but seems as though it's starting to mature as it's fleshy and pithy. Flavors of nectarine, orange and bitter pith are good but lack that ethereal quality that can make Albariño special. Drink now.
title: Lusco 2010 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
description2: Opens with peachy, citric and saline aromas. Feels moderately fresh, but seems as though it's starting to mature as it's fleshy and pithy. Flavors of nectarine, orange and bitter pith are good but lack that ethereal quality that can make Albariño special. Drink now. Albariño Spain Galicia Rías Baixas Lusco

description: There are solid Cabernet flavors of blackberries and black currants in this dry, tannic wine. It's rough and astringent in the mouth, without much charm, but a rich steak, maybe topped with a gorgonzola sauce, will make it shine.
title: Markham 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: There are solid Cabernet flavors of blackberries and black currants in this dry, tannic wine. It's rough and astringent in the mouth, without much charm, but a rich steak, maybe topped with a gorgonzola sauce, will make it shine. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Markham

description: Whoa... need... water. Michael David's Earthquake is all about impact, no bones about it. And this one won't disappoint people who like their wine like finely aged Scotch, high in alcohol. For them, its bold smoky chocolate, savory bacon on toast notes will be delightful.
title: Michael David 2009 Earthquake Petite Sirah (Lodi)
description2: Whoa... need... water. Michael David's Earthquake is all about impact, no bones about it. And this one won't disappoint people who like their wine like finely aged Scotch, high in alcohol. For them, its bold smoky chocolate, savory bacon on toast notes will be delightful. Petite Sirah US California Lodi Michael David

description: Lots of zippy acidity in this Chardonnay. Lots of sweetness, too. Tastes like lemon and pineapple pie filling, with heat from the alcohol.
title: La Merika 2010 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Lots of zippy acidity in this Chardonnay. Lots of sweetness, too. Tastes like lemon and pineapple pie filling, with heat from the alcohol. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley La Merika

description: Haermosa is made with organically-farmed fruit. It shows milky notes of peach yogurt and white chocolate. But it also shows zesty crispness on the close despite the thickness and fullness of the wine's overall texture.
title: Masseria del Feudo Grottarossa 2009 Haermosa Chardonnay (Sicilia)
description2: Haermosa is made with organically-farmed fruit. It shows milky notes of peach yogurt and white chocolate. But it also shows zesty crispness on the close despite the thickness and fullness of the wine's overall texture. Chardonnay Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Masseria del Feudo Grottarossa

description: Gritty and rustic, with blackberry, prune and spice flavors. It's a dry, tannic wine, for drinking with simple foods, like burritos.
title: Napa Family Vineyards 2010 Merlot (Napa Valley)
description2: Gritty and rustic, with blackberry, prune and spice flavors. It's a dry, tannic wine, for drinking with simple foods, like burritos. Merlot US California Napa Valley Napa Family Vineyards

description: Rugged and astringent in texture, with jammy blackberry and spice flavors.
title: Petroni 2007 Estate Grown Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
description2: Rugged and astringent in texture, with jammy blackberry and spice flavors. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Sonoma Valley Petroni

description: There's a minty, ammonia streak of greenness that can charitably be described as gooseberry in this dry Sauvignon Blanc. Oak brings sweet vanilla richness, but the wine is still pretty eccentric.
title: Petroni 2010 Estate Grown Sauvignon Blanc (Sonoma Valley)
description2: There's a minty, ammonia streak of greenness that can charitably be described as gooseberry in this dry Sauvignon Blanc. Oak brings sweet vanilla richness, but the wine is still pretty eccentric. Sauvignon Blanc US California Sonoma Valley Petroni

description: This simple Sicilian red delivers bright berry fruit, blue flower and white almond skin. It shows almost Pinot Noir-like aromas and the power and gritty mouthfeel usually associated with Nero d'Avola.
title: Resonata 2010 Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
description2: This simple Sicilian red delivers bright berry fruit, blue flower and white almond skin. It shows almost Pinot Noir-like aromas and the power and gritty mouthfeel usually associated with Nero d'Avola. Nero d'Avola Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Resonata

description: On the plus side, the wine is exotic and different, with blueberry, herbal notes, juniper and roasted aromas. But in the mouth, it's lean to the point of being thin, with sharp acidity and tight red plum, pie cherry and herbal flavors. Short on the finish, with tang and scour.
title: Bodegas Peñafiel 2006 Miros de Ribera Crianza  (Ribera del Duero)
address: Ribera del Duero, Northern Spain, Spain
description2: On the plus side, the wine is exotic and different, with blueberry, herbal notes, juniper and roasted aromas. But in the mouth, it's lean to the point of being thin, with sharp acidity and tight red plum, pie cherry and herbal flavors. Short on the finish, with tang and scour. Tempranillo Spain Northern Spain Ribera del Duero Bodegas Peñafiel

description: Stunning aromatically, with a veil of smoke and petrol that lingers over fresh, clean Honeycrisp apple aromas. Semidry in style, with a simple, slightly sugary attack, it finishes with just a tinge of green pepper in the backdrop.
title: Brotherhood 2010 Riesling (New York)
description2: Stunning aromatically, with a veil of smoke and petrol that lingers over fresh, clean Honeycrisp apple aromas. Semidry in style, with a simple, slightly sugary attack, it finishes with just a tinge of green pepper in the backdrop. Riesling US New York New York Brotherhood

description: Terrale Oro is a perfect pasta or pizza wine to drink on nights at home with family and friends. It delivers bright red fruit, blackberry and almond paste.
title: Calatrasi 2010 Terrale Oro Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
description2: Terrale Oro is a perfect pasta or pizza wine to drink on nights at home with family and friends. It delivers bright red fruit, blackberry and almond paste. Nero d'Avola Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Calatrasi

description: This is a tart, lean, somewhat ungenerous Pinot Noir, but one that still manages to deliver an attractive, creative tension between its earthy, composty aromas and bright cranberry fruit.
title: Dashwood 2009 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
description2: This is a tart, lean, somewhat ungenerous Pinot Noir, but one that still manages to deliver an attractive, creative tension between its earthy, composty aromas and bright cranberry fruit. Pinot Noir New Zealand Marlborough  Dashwood

description: Much of the fruit for this wine came from Alexander Valley and it represents the appellation well, combining the ability to be juicy and approachable with powerful tannins and the potential to age. Cassis, raspberry and black pepper are standout characteristics, and the wine is big, but balanced.
title: Ghost Waltz 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
description2: Much of the fruit for this wine came from Alexander Valley and it represents the appellation well, combining the ability to be juicy and approachable with powerful tannins and the potential to age. Cassis, raspberry and black pepper are standout characteristics, and the wine is big, but balanced. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Sonoma County Ghost Waltz

description: Made with 95% Schiava and 5% Lagrein, this sleek red opens with aromas of red currant and crushed violet. The vibrant palate delivers sour cherry, mandarin orange and almond alongside silky tannins and fresh acidity. This is all about easy-drinking pleasure so enjoy soon.
title: Griesbauerhof 2013 St. Magdalener Classico Red (Alto Adige)
description2: Made with 95% Schiava and 5% Lagrein, this sleek red opens with aromas of red currant and crushed violet. The vibrant palate delivers sour cherry, mandarin orange and almond alongside silky tannins and fresh acidity. This is all about easy-drinking pleasure so enjoy soon. Red Blend Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Griesbauerhof

description: Layers of rich white peach and pink grapefruit sweeten this delightfully piercing spätlase. It's dainty in mouthfeel, but sumptuously ripe, balanced by a bracing strike of acidity.
title: Gustav Adolf Schmitt 2012 Niersteiner Auflangen Spätlese Riesling (Rheinhessen)
description2: Layers of rich white peach and pink grapefruit sweeten this delightfully piercing spätlase. It's dainty in mouthfeel, but sumptuously ripe, balanced by a bracing strike of acidity. Riesling Germany Rheinhessen  Gustav Adolf Schmitt

description: Aromas of dried rose, violet and red berry meld together in the glass. The refined palate offers dried cherry, light toast, mineral and a hint of spice alongside soft, supple tannins.
title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2011 Sanct Valentin Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
description2: Aromas of dried rose, violet and red berry meld together in the glass. The refined palate offers dried cherry, light toast, mineral and a hint of spice alongside soft, supple tannins. Pinot Nero Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano

description: Sleek and polished, this opens with aromas of raspberry preserve and rose petal. The elegant palate offers crushed red berry with hints of green tea, cinnamon and a mineral note alongside firm acidity and supple tannins.
title: Cantina Terlano 2013 Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
description2: Sleek and polished, this opens with aromas of raspberry preserve and rose petal. The elegant palate offers crushed red berry with hints of green tea, cinnamon and a mineral note alongside firm acidity and supple tannins. Pinot Nero Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Cantina Terlano

description: This vibrant wine opens with varietal aromas of cut grass, passion fruit and crushed tomato vine. The linear palate offers up yellow peach, cantaloupe and a hint of ginger drop alongside racy acidity. It offers excellent value.
title: Cembra 2013 Sauvignon (Trentino)
description2: This vibrant wine opens with varietal aromas of cut grass, passion fruit and crushed tomato vine. The linear palate offers up yellow peach, cantaloupe and a hint of ginger drop alongside racy acidity. It offers excellent value. Sauvignon Italy Northeastern Italy Trentino Cembra

description: Generous tannins surround a core of ripe, brawny blackberry fruit and a powerful imprint of dried herb in this wine, which is rich and concentrated. Earthy tobacco and chocolate seal the finish.
title: Cliff Lede 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
description2: Generous tannins surround a core of ripe, brawny blackberry fruit and a powerful imprint of dried herb in this wine, which is rich and concentrated. Earthy tobacco and chocolate seal the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Stags Leap District Cliff Lede

description: Rubbery berry and plum aromas come with a note of latex. In the mouth, this is juicy, bright and focused, with good raspberry and plum fruit. Textural balance is an attribute, while the finish is round, lively and full of tasty berry flavors. Drink through 2018.
title: Clos Figueras 2013 Serras del Priorat Red (Priorat)
description2: Rubbery berry and plum aromas come with a note of latex. In the mouth, this is juicy, bright and focused, with good raspberry and plum fruit. Textural balance is an attribute, while the finish is round, lively and full of tasty berry flavors. Drink through 2018. Red Blend Spain Catalonia Priorat Clos Figueras

description: This wine's nose begins very steely, with fresh cracked chalk aromas, then allows soft caramel candy, pound cake and white flowers to emerge. The very inviting flavors include apple flesh and skins, fresh cut pineapple and slated nuts, all clinging to a very pithy element that cuts the entire palate.
title: Consilience 2013 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
description2: This wine's nose begins very steely, with fresh cracked chalk aromas, then allows soft caramel candy, pound cake and white flowers to emerge. The very inviting flavors include apple flesh and skins, fresh cut pineapple and slated nuts, all clinging to a very pithy element that cuts the entire palate. Chardonnay US California Santa Barbara County Consilience

description: This complex, flavorful wine walks on the wild side with a bit of funky barnyard in the aromas and flavors. It's dry, moderately tannic, rather light in body, and brings spicy black pepper, grilled beef and ripe plum flavors.
title: Cedar Creek 2011 Estate Grown Syrah (Fair Play)
description2: This complex, flavorful wine walks on the wild side with a bit of funky barnyard in the aromas and flavors. It's dry, moderately tannic, rather light in body, and brings spicy black pepper, grilled beef and ripe plum flavors. Syrah US California Fair Play Cedar Creek

description: Aromas suggest red berry and plum with a hint of cake spice. The palate is elegant and reserved, offering sour cherry, toast and vanilla alongside fine-grained tannins. It closes on a light mineral note.
title: Colterenzio 2011 Cornell Villa Nigra Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
description2: Aromas suggest red berry and plum with a hint of cake spice. The palate is elegant and reserved, offering sour cherry, toast and vanilla alongside fine-grained tannins. It closes on a light mineral note. Pinot Nero Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Colterenzio

description: This is a successful straight-ahead Chardonnay, with aromas of buttercream, vanilla and orange cake developing complexity thanks to alkaline, pithy notes. For such a rich nose, it proves quite clean and crisp on the palate, with lemon-lime soda, wet slate and just a touch of buttered apples.
title: Demetria 2012 Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
description2: This is a successful straight-ahead Chardonnay, with aromas of buttercream, vanilla and orange cake developing complexity thanks to alkaline, pithy notes. For such a rich nose, it proves quite clean and crisp on the palate, with lemon-lime soda, wet slate and just a touch of buttered apples. Chardonnay US California Santa Barbara County Demetria

description: This is a ripe, fresh and fruity wine that's filled out with a tangy, mineral texture. Grapefruit and lime juice flavors give a zesty feel as well as intense acidity. It is ready to drink.
title: Domaine de Rome 2013  Sancerre
description2: This is a ripe, fresh and fruity wine that's filled out with a tangy, mineral texture. Grapefruit and lime juice flavors give a zesty feel as well as intense acidity. It is ready to drink. Sauvignon Blanc France Loire Valley Sancerre Domaine de Rome

description: Taut and cool with swathes of fresh tarragon and crisp melon rind, this elegant dry Riesling has a nervous vitality throughout. The palate is zesty and bright, highlighting tart flavors of tangerine and apricot before fading into a dusty mineral finish.
title: Domdechant Werner 2013 Hochheimer Hölle Kabinett Trocken Riesling (Rheingau)
description2: Taut and cool with swathes of fresh tarragon and crisp melon rind, this elegant dry Riesling has a nervous vitality throughout. The palate is zesty and bright, highlighting tart flavors of tangerine and apricot before fading into a dusty mineral finish. Riesling Germany Rheingau  Domdechant Werner

description: Spine-tingling acidity runs throughout this off-dry Riesling. Swathes of honey and fresh apple, saffron and dried berries lend sweetness and warmth, but this striking kabinett does not surrender its sharp edges easily.
title: Dr. Fischer 2013 Ockfener Bockstein Kabinett Riesling (Mosel)
description2: Spine-tingling acidity runs throughout this off-dry Riesling. Swathes of honey and fresh apple, saffron and dried berries lend sweetness and warmth, but this striking kabinett does not surrender its sharp edges easily. Riesling Germany Mosel  Dr. Fischer

description: This blends intensity and nutty richness on the nose, backed up by a full, balanced palate. Flavors of dark caramel, toffee and chocolate end with the distinct flavor of café mocha and a lasting streak of caramel.
title: Osborne NV Cream Sherry (Jerez)
description2: This blends intensity and nutty richness on the nose, backed up by a full, balanced palate. Flavors of dark caramel, toffee and chocolate end with the distinct flavor of café mocha and a lasting streak of caramel. Sherry Spain Andalucia Jerez Osborne

description: Rusty in color and earthy on the nose, with capped aromas of cedar and herbs, this mature Catalonian Cabernet is compact on the palate and fused by firm tannins. Flavors of dried berry, stone fruits and toffee finish long. This ranks as a fun challenge for Spanish wine geeks.
title: Pinord 2007 Chateldon Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Penedès)
description2: Rusty in color and earthy on the nose, with capped aromas of cedar and herbs, this mature Catalonian Cabernet is compact on the palate and fused by firm tannins. Flavors of dried berry, stone fruits and toffee finish long. This ranks as a fun challenge for Spanish wine geeks. Cabernet Sauvignon Spain Catalonia Penedès Pinord

description: Light, tart cherry fruit beckons for further exploration. The ripeness is there, and the wine comes across as clean and elegant in its modest proportions. As it breathes open there is a slight hint of volatility which, for most tasters, will be a plus.
title: Purple Hands 2013 Holstein Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
description2: Light, tart cherry fruit beckons for further exploration. The ripeness is there, and the wine comes across as clean and elegant in its modest proportions. As it breathes open there is a slight hint of volatility which, for most tasters, will be a plus. Pinot Noir US Oregon Dundee Hills Purple Hands

description: This blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura is initially crisp and fresh. Gradually, it broadens out into a rich wine with a blend between lemon and yellow fruits that is delicious and concentrated. This tangy wine is developing well, and is ready to drink now although it will age.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2014 Torre de Menagem Escolha White (Vinho Verde)
description2: This blend of Alvarinho and Trajadura is initially crisp and fresh. Gradually, it broadens out into a rich wine with a blend between lemon and yellow fruits that is delicious and concentrated. This tangy wine is developing well, and is ready to drink now although it will age. Portuguese White Portugal Vinho Verde  Quintas de Melgaço

description: This Zin speaks to compelling red fruit, plum and vanilla, with light oak presence. It's balanced yet still plenty big, showing off its well-worn roots within an historic vineyard. Before veering into syrupy territory, it pulls back, letting leathery cinnamon and black pepper have their say.
title: Rosenblum 2011 Monte Rosso Vineyard Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
description2: This Zin speaks to compelling red fruit, plum and vanilla, with light oak presence. It's balanced yet still plenty big, showing off its well-worn roots within an historic vineyard. Before veering into syrupy territory, it pulls back, letting leathery cinnamon and black pepper have their say. Zinfandel US California Sonoma Valley Rosenblum

description: This blend of 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 37% Merlot, 8% Petite Sirah and 5% Cabernet Franc shows aromas of sweet plum, cherry jam, grape candy and chocolate spices. The palate presents a medium level of density, with flavors of Bing cherry, ollallieberry and dried oregano, thyme and marjoram.
title: Still Waters 2010 Reflections of Still Waters Red (Paso Robles)
description2: This blend of 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, 37% Merlot, 8% Petite Sirah and 5% Cabernet Franc shows aromas of sweet plum, cherry jam, grape candy and chocolate spices. The palate presents a medium level of density, with flavors of Bing cherry, ollallieberry and dried oregano, thyme and marjoram. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Still Waters

description: Floral, this medium-bodied white is creamy and touched by richer notions of pear, pineapple and vanilla, reflective of its warmer appellation in a warm year. French oak (40% of it new) aged the wine for under a year. With a touch of honeysuckle and nutmeg, the minerality is subtle.
title: Summers 2013 Stuhlmuller Vineyards Reserve Chardonnay (Alexander Valley)
description2: Floral, this medium-bodied white is creamy and touched by richer notions of pear, pineapple and vanilla, reflective of its warmer appellation in a warm year. French oak (40% of it new) aged the wine for under a year. With a touch of honeysuckle and nutmeg, the minerality is subtle. Chardonnay US California Alexander Valley Summers

description: This bright, fresh wine offers aromas of woodland berry, alpine herb, graphite, and a touch of cake spice. On the palate, green tomato and peppermint accent the bright strawberry core.
title: Tenuta Peter Sölva & Söhne 2013 I Vigneti Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
description2: This bright, fresh wine offers aromas of woodland berry, alpine herb, graphite, and a touch of cake spice. On the palate, green tomato and peppermint accent the bright strawberry core. Pinot Nero Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Tenuta Peter Sölva & Söhne

description: A mix of strawberry-rhubarb compote, mocha-chocolate and chalky tannins are featured in this 80% Cabernet with smaller amounts of other Bordeaux varieties blended in. Dense and meaty, a powerful jolt of cassis rears its head on the finish.
title: Terra Valentine 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: A mix of strawberry-rhubarb compote, mocha-chocolate and chalky tannins are featured in this 80% Cabernet with smaller amounts of other Bordeaux varieties blended in. Dense and meaty, a powerful jolt of cassis rears its head on the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Terra Valentine

description: This opens with smoke, mint, coconut, red berry and graphite aromas. The palate offers dried red cherry and mineral alongside drying tannins. Enjoy it soon to capture the fruit flavors.
title: Tiefenbrunner 2011 Linticlarus Riserva Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
description2: This opens with smoke, mint, coconut, red berry and graphite aromas. The palate offers dried red cherry and mineral alongside drying tannins. Enjoy it soon to capture the fruit flavors. Pinot Nero Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Tiefenbrunner

description: Pretty aromas of red berry, crushed flower and a hint of rosemary lead the nose on this bright red. The fresh palate offers crushed raspberry, green tomato and cinnamon. It's fresh, sleek and balanced.
title: Tramin 2013 Pinot Nero (Alto Adige)
description2: Pretty aromas of red berry, crushed flower and a hint of rosemary lead the nose on this bright red. The fresh palate offers crushed raspberry, green tomato and cinnamon. It's fresh, sleek and balanced. Pinot Nero Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Tramin

description: A bright, floral fragrance invites one to further explore this softly structured wine. It's layered with ripe red fruit, leather and pepper flavors that are carried into the finish by tight, grippy tannins.
title: Viszlay Vineyards 2013 Estate Petite Sirah (Russian River Valley)
description2: A bright, floral fragrance invites one to further explore this softly structured wine. It's layered with ripe red fruit, leather and pepper flavors that are carried into the finish by tight, grippy tannins. Petite Sirah US California Russian River Valley Viszlay Vineyards

description: This lightly built wine is fully expressive, with floral aromas and bright layers of black cherry, peppery clove and toasted oak. Balanced and unhindered, it will work well at the table.
title: Viszlay Vineyards 2013 Winemaker's Reserve Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Russian River Valley)
description2: This lightly built wine is fully expressive, with floral aromas and bright layers of black cherry, peppery clove and toasted oak. Balanced and unhindered, it will work well at the table. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Russian River Valley Viszlay Vineyards

description: A considerable step up in quality from the basic Yealands Sauvignon Blanc, this offering boasts attractive aromas of white grapefruit and pea tendrils. There's a silky texture and green, grassy elements on the palate, but they never stray too far into vegetal, finishing zesty and clean.
title: Yealands 2016 Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Awatere Valley)
description2: A considerable step up in quality from the basic Yealands Sauvignon Blanc, this offering boasts attractive aromas of white grapefruit and pea tendrils. There's a silky texture and green, grassy elements on the palate, but they never stray too far into vegetal, finishing zesty and clean. Sauvignon Blanc New Zealand Awatere Valley  Yealands

description: Slight reduction still obstructs this wine's nose. The palate, however, is both zingy and rich—spiked with citrus and rounded with ripe, mellow apple fruit. There is verve and life at its core and tone to its medium body. The dry finish is appetizing.
title: Zahel 2016 White (Wiener Gemischter Satz)
description2: Slight reduction still obstructs this wine's nose. The palate, however, is both zingy and rich—spiked with citrus and rounded with ripe, mellow apple fruit. There is verve and life at its core and tone to its medium body. The dry finish is appetizing. White Blend Austria Wiener Gemischter Satz  Zahel

description: Focused crisp aromas of white fruits reflect a cool vintage. This is roughly one-quarter each Macabeo, Parellada, Xarello and Chardonnay, and it feels tight, fresh and focused. Dry stone-fruit flavors include a hint of lime, while this is clean on the finish.
title: Albet I Noya 2013 Brut Natural Reserva Sparkling (Penedès)
description2: Focused crisp aromas of white fruits reflect a cool vintage. This is roughly one-quarter each Macabeo, Parellada, Xarello and Chardonnay, and it feels tight, fresh and focused. Dry stone-fruit flavors include a hint of lime, while this is clean on the finish. Sparkling Blend Spain Catalonia Penedès Albet I Noya

description: Freshly cut pear, ivy leaf and spice mark the nose of this wine. The palate is slender but juicy, full of citrus-fresh fruit. It's all about joy and drinkability, feeling more structured and serious on the clean finish.
title: Allram 2016 Strassertaler Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
description2: Freshly cut pear, ivy leaf and spice mark the nose of this wine. The palate is slender but juicy, full of citrus-fresh fruit. It's all about joy and drinkability, feeling more structured and serious on the clean finish. Grüner Veltliner Austria Kamptal  Allram

description: Briny cidery aromas are fortunately not that loud or intense. This is wide and generous on the palate, with dry briny stone-fruit and apple flavors. A sense of dryness and pickle brine is amplified on a purposeful finish.
title: Alta Alella 2013 Privat Gran Reserva Brut Nature Sparkling (Cava)
description2: Briny cidery aromas are fortunately not that loud or intense. This is wide and generous on the palate, with dry briny stone-fruit and apple flavors. A sense of dryness and pickle brine is amplified on a purposeful finish. Sparkling Blend Spain Catalonia Cava Alta Alella

description: Made from 100% estate grapes, this wine is shy in aroma but happily light and bright on the palate. It's delicate yet framed by firm tannins, showing blueberry and toasty oak flavors and nuanced acidity.
title: Ampelos 2013 Ampelos Vineyard Syrah (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: Made from 100% estate grapes, this wine is shy in aroma but happily light and bright on the palate. It's delicate yet framed by firm tannins, showing blueberry and toasty oak flavors and nuanced acidity. Syrah US California Sta. Rita Hills Ampelos

description: Tangy boysenberry and elderberry fruit shows on the nose of this sultry bottling, along with thyme, potpourri and licorice. The flavors are more cooked than fresh, recalling charred blackberry, dried blueberry, leather and licorice. It's a hearty wine that consumes the entire palate.
title: Ascencion 2014 Mayhem Syrah (Paso Robles)
description2: Tangy boysenberry and elderberry fruit shows on the nose of this sultry bottling, along with thyme, potpourri and licorice. The flavors are more cooked than fresh, recalling charred blackberry, dried blueberry, leather and licorice. It's a hearty wine that consumes the entire palate. Syrah US California Paso Robles Ascencion

description: This plump, medium-bodied Chardonnay shows yellow fruit notes of mirabelle plum, peach and pineapple, all wrapped in a cocoon of woodsmoke. Drink now–2020.
title: Carrick 2015 Bannockburn Chardonnay (Central Otago)
description2: This plump, medium-bodied Chardonnay shows yellow fruit notes of mirabelle plum, peach and pineapple, all wrapped in a cocoon of woodsmoke. Drink now–2020. Chardonnay New Zealand Central Otago  Carrick

description: Woodsmoke, bramble and sharp raspberry sorbet aromas show on the nose of this appellation blend from winemaker Kevin Law and actress Challen Cates. Sour cranberry and tart plum skin flavors show on the palate, along with darker nutmeg-like spices.
title: Challen 2014 Scarlett Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: Woodsmoke, bramble and sharp raspberry sorbet aromas show on the nose of this appellation blend from winemaker Kevin Law and actress Challen Cates. Sour cranberry and tart plum skin flavors show on the palate, along with darker nutmeg-like spices. Pinot Noir US California Sta. Rita Hills Challen

description: The estate wine of Coutinel is dominated by the local Négrette grape. With the addition of 15% Syrah and (unusual for this part of the world) 15% Gamay, the wine is structured while also juicy. Soft tannins and black fruits are shot through with an attractive perfumed character. Drink from 2018.
title: Château Coutinel 2015 Red (Fronton)
description2: The estate wine of Coutinel is dominated by the local Négrette grape. With the addition of 15% Syrah and (unusual for this part of the world) 15% Gamay, the wine is structured while also juicy. Soft tannins and black fruits are shot through with an attractive perfumed character. Drink from 2018. Red Blend France Southwest France Fronton Château Coutinel

description: From organically grown grapes, this firmly structured red wine is stalky while also rich with potential. It is young, dense with tannins as well as black-currant fruit. The wine will need to age, so drink from 2019.
title: Château Grand Boise 2015 Red (Côtes de Provence Sainte-Victoire)
address: Côtes de Provence Sainte-Victoire, Provence, France
description2: From organically grown grapes, this firmly structured red wine is stalky while also rich with potential. It is young, dense with tannins as well as black-currant fruit. The wine will need to age, so drink from 2019. Provence red blend France Provence Côtes de Provence Sainte-Victoire Château Grand Boise

description: This ripe wine from a very fine vintage in Bergerac, is fully structured while also having a fine black-currant fruitiness. Half-and-half Merlot and Cabernet Franc, it has a perfumed edge along with rich juicy acidity and fruits. Drink this fine wine from late 2017.
title: Château le Payral 2015 Red (Bergerac)
description2: This ripe wine from a very fine vintage in Bergerac, is fully structured while also having a fine black-currant fruitiness. Half-and-half Merlot and Cabernet Franc, it has a perfumed edge along with rich juicy acidity and fruits. Drink this fine wine from late 2017. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Southwest France Bergerac Château le Payral

description: Meat, compost and leather notes mark the entry of this Syrah blended with smaller amounts of Mourvèdre and Petite Sirah. Light black pepper and red fruit flavors are sustained by a soft, round texture and lingering finish.
title: Crux 2013 Syrah (Russian River Valley)
description2: Meat, compost and leather notes mark the entry of this Syrah blended with smaller amounts of Mourvèdre and Petite Sirah. Light black pepper and red fruit flavors are sustained by a soft, round texture and lingering finish. Syrah US California Russian River Valley Crux

description: This highly aromatic Sauvignon Blanc dishes out loads of pretty white peach and yellow cherry flavors backed by a bristling streak of acidity. It's a vibrant yet satisfyingly full-bodied wine with a pristine grapefruit finish. Drink now through 2020.
title: Damiani 2015 Little Lotus Flower Sauvignon Blanc (Finger Lakes)
description2: This highly aromatic Sauvignon Blanc dishes out loads of pretty white peach and yellow cherry flavors backed by a bristling streak of acidity. It's a vibrant yet satisfyingly full-bodied wine with a pristine grapefruit finish. Drink now through 2020. Sauvignon Blanc US New York Finger Lakes Damiani

description: Deep penetrating sour-cherry and raspberry flavors are balanced against brisk blood-orange acidity in this dry Pinot Noir rosé. Full bodied and slightly silky on the palate, it's a satisfyingly mouthfilling but invigorating wine to enjoy now through the fall months.
title: Damiani 2016 Dry Rosé (Finger Lakes)
description2: Deep penetrating sour-cherry and raspberry flavors are balanced against brisk blood-orange acidity in this dry Pinot Noir rosé. Full bodied and slightly silky on the palate, it's a satisfyingly mouthfilling but invigorating wine to enjoy now through the fall months. Rosé US New York Finger Lakes Damiani

description: This perennially delicious blend brings together 53% Grenache, 35% Syrah and 12% Mourvèdre. It lets each variety speak, offering a structured expression of juicy strawberry, mint and balanced ripeness. Despite its nuances, it's not afraid to be bold.
title: Davis Family 2014 Throne G-S-M (Russian River Valley)
description2: This perennially delicious blend brings together 53% Grenache, 35% Syrah and 12% Mourvèdre. It lets each variety speak, offering a structured expression of juicy strawberry, mint and balanced ripeness. Despite its nuances, it's not afraid to be bold. G-S-M US California Russian River Valley Davis Family

description: This blend of Cinsault, Grenache and Syrah is attractively fruity. It has a crisp texture that gives it a bright character, red-currant fruitiness and intense refreshing acidity. The aftertaste is elegant and fruity. The wine's name (meaning to dare) is an anagram of Rosé. Drink now.
title: Domaine Clos Gautier 2016 Oser Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description2: This blend of Cinsault, Grenache and Syrah is attractively fruity. It has a crisp texture that gives it a bright character, red-currant fruitiness and intense refreshing acidity. The aftertaste is elegant and fruity. The wine's name (meaning to dare) is an anagram of Rosé. Drink now. Rosé France Provence Côtes de Provence Domaine Clos Gautier

description: This is a ripe, full and fruity wine. It is packed with attractive red-berry fruits and a crisp dry backbone. The acidity and the bright aftertaste make it a fine food rosé. It comes from a small appellation surrounded by the large Côtes de Provence area.
title: Domaine Harmonie des Arpents 2016 Rosé (Coteaux Varois en Provence)
address: Coteaux Varois en Provence, Provence, France
description2: This is a ripe, full and fruity wine. It is packed with attractive red-berry fruits and a crisp dry backbone. The acidity and the bright aftertaste make it a fine food rosé. It comes from a small appellation surrounded by the large Côtes de Provence area. Rosé France Provence Coteaux Varois en Provence Domaine Harmonie des Arpents

description: Produced from organic grapes, the wine is ripe and packed with fruit. It has a delicious line of acidity, as well as weight and peach and red-fruit flavors. The acidity keeps the exuberance in check. Drink now.
title: Domaine Sainte-Marie 2016 Paparazzi Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description2: Produced from organic grapes, the wine is ripe and packed with fruit. It has a delicious line of acidity, as well as weight and peach and red-fruit flavors. The acidity keeps the exuberance in check. Drink now. Rosé France Provence Côtes de Provence Domaine Sainte-Marie

description: Fresh Conference pear notes abound on the nose of this wine. The palate is sprightly and fresh, with a zestier core of lime and pear peel. Slender in frame, it dances on the palate, displaying seriousness and levity at the same time. The finish is totally refreshing.
title: Domäne Wachau 2016 Terrassen Federspiel Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
description2: Fresh Conference pear notes abound on the nose of this wine. The palate is sprightly and fresh, with a zestier core of lime and pear peel. Slender in frame, it dances on the palate, displaying seriousness and levity at the same time. The finish is totally refreshing. Grüner Veltliner Austria Wachau  Domäne Wachau

description: Blackberry and chocolate flavors intertwine nicely in this soft, round and bright red from a tiny site in the appellation. Lightly spiced with clove and cedar, it strikes a balance between fruit and tension, making it a food-friendly option that won't overpower in the glass.
title: Doren 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
description2: Blackberry and chocolate flavors intertwine nicely in this soft, round and bright red from a tiny site in the appellation. Lightly spiced with clove and cedar, it strikes a balance between fruit and tension, making it a food-friendly option that won't overpower in the glass. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Sonoma Valley Doren

description: Damp chaparral, dried blueberry, beef and pencil lead scents show on the nose of this blend of 54% Grenache, 35% Syrah and 11% Mourvèdre. Rounded blueberry and black plum flavors meet loamy soil, anise, thyme and marjoram spice, with a savory touch of smoke.
title: Écluse 2014 Rendition Red (Paso Robles)
description2: Damp chaparral, dried blueberry, beef and pencil lead scents show on the nose of this blend of 54% Grenache, 35% Syrah and 11% Mourvèdre. Rounded blueberry and black plum flavors meet loamy soil, anise, thyme and marjoram spice, with a savory touch of smoke. Rhône-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Écluse

description: Spanish broom, yellow stone fruit and citrus zest aromas take shape in the glass. Lively acidity carries juicy nectarine, intense lemon, thyme, pineapple and Mediterranean herb flavors into the round, juicy finish.
title: Feudo Montoni 2016 della Timpa Grillo (Sicilia)
description2: Spanish broom, yellow stone fruit and citrus zest aromas take shape in the glass. Lively acidity carries juicy nectarine, intense lemon, thyme, pineapple and Mediterranean herb flavors into the round, juicy finish. Grillo Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Feudo Montoni

description: Intense and loaded with scents and flavors of fully ripe fruit, this parades down the tree fruit and tropical fruit avenues, with peach, apricot, papaya and mango in the lead. It's a delicious bottle, with just enough acidity to keep it bright and lively.
title: Grizzly Peak 2015 Viognier (Rogue Valley)
description2: Intense and loaded with scents and flavors of fully ripe fruit, this parades down the tree fruit and tropical fruit avenues, with peach, apricot, papaya and mango in the lead. It's a delicious bottle, with just enough acidity to keep it bright and lively. Viognier US Oregon Rogue Valley Grizzly Peak

description: This is herbal and clipped smelling, with a scattering of berry and plum notes. It feels saturated and chewy, with roasted berry, pepper and spice flavors that lead to a lightly herbal finish, with a rubbery accent and a baked fruit note.
title: Tilia 2011 Bonarda (Mendoza)
description2: This is herbal and clipped smelling, with a scattering of berry and plum notes. It feels saturated and chewy, with roasted berry, pepper and spice flavors that lead to a lightly herbal finish, with a rubbery accent and a baked fruit note. Bonarda Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Tilia

description: An easy-drinking rosato, this has dusty aromas of dried rose petal, stone fruit and citrus. The mouthfeel is clean, lean and crisp.
title: Villa Mottura 2011 Le Pitre Rosato (Salento)
description2: An easy-drinking rosato, this has dusty aromas of dried rose petal, stone fruit and citrus. The mouthfeel is clean, lean and crisp. Rosato Italy Southern Italy Salento Villa Mottura

description: Regrettably, this has no sweetness scale on the back label, but the 11.5% alcohol suggests that it is off-dry, as it certainly tastes. It's a heavy, honey-soaked style, perhaps due to grapes that were affected by botrytis. Apple juice and honey flavors are right in the heart of this wine, which would pair well with a simple dessert of fresh fruit.
title: 14 Hands 2010 Riesling (Washington)
description2: Regrettably, this has no sweetness scale on the back label, but the 11.5% alcohol suggests that it is off-dry, as it certainly tastes. It's a heavy, honey-soaked style, perhaps due to grapes that were affected by botrytis. Apple juice and honey flavors are right in the heart of this wine, which would pair well with a simple dessert of fresh fruit. Riesling US Washington Washington 14 Hands

description: Zibibbo is usually presented as a passito dessert wine, but this is dry. The natural floral fragrance of the variety emerges on the nose, while the mouthfeel and the honey and peach flavors are detailed with acids.
title: Barraco 2010 Zibibbo (Sicilia)
description2: Zibibbo is usually presented as a passito dessert wine, but this is dry. The natural floral fragrance of the variety emerges on the nose, while the mouthfeel and the honey and peach flavors are detailed with acids. Zibibbo Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Barraco

description: This is a lean, compact expression of Falanghina, opening with bright citrus, pear and kiwi aromas. It delivers fresh acidity and a bright, easygoing personality.
title: Capolino Perlingieri 2011 Preta Falanghina (Sannio)
description2: This is a lean, compact expression of Falanghina, opening with bright citrus, pear and kiwi aromas. It delivers fresh acidity and a bright, easygoing personality. Falanghina Italy Southern Italy Sannio Capolino Perlingieri

description: An attractively fragrant rosé, this is very crisp and clean. It has lively raspberry and red currant flavors that are lightly touched by a herb note. A bright finish completes this refreshing wine.
title: Chateau le Grand Verdus 2011 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description2: An attractively fragrant rosé, this is very crisp and clean. It has lively raspberry and red currant flavors that are lightly touched by a herb note. A bright finish completes this refreshing wine. Rosé France Bordeaux Bordeaux Rosé Chateau le Grand Verdus

description: Strong in black currant, raisin, blackberry pie and oaky flavors, this full-bodied effort has thick tannins. It's pleasant for drinking now with barbecue and roasts.
title: Dark Hundred 2011 Red (California)
description2: Strong in black currant, raisin, blackberry pie and oaky flavors, this full-bodied effort has thick tannins. It's pleasant for drinking now with barbecue and roasts. Red Blend US California California Dark Hundred

description: This mix of 62% Pepper Bridge Vineyard Syrah and 38% Klipsun Vineyard Malbec has not entirely come together. The grapey fruit flavors and slightly stemmy tannins may ultimately complement each other, but that will require more bottle age. For the moment, give it a good decanting, or wait a couple more years before opening.
title: Flying Trout 2010 Cutthroat Red Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This mix of 62% Pepper Bridge Vineyard Syrah and 38% Klipsun Vineyard Malbec has not entirely come together. The grapey fruit flavors and slightly stemmy tannins may ultimately complement each other, but that will require more bottle age. For the moment, give it a good decanting, or wait a couple more years before opening. Red Blend US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Flying Trout

description: Dry and firm, this is smothered with hard-edged tannins that give the wine a tough character. It will soften a little bit, but not completely.
title: Horeau-Beylot 2009 Château Grand Martinet  (Saint-Émilion)
description2: Dry and firm, this is smothered with hard-edged tannins that give the wine a tough character. It will soften a little bit, but not completely. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Saint-Émilion Horeau-Beylot

description: A fairly lean Pinot, this lacks voluptuousness, but it's dry and crisp, with fine cherry, cranberry, tobacco and pepper flavors. Give it some airing and drink now.
title: Toad Hollow 2010 Goldie's Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: A fairly lean Pinot, this lacks voluptuousness, but it's dry and crisp, with fine cherry, cranberry, tobacco and pepper flavors. Give it some airing and drink now. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley Toad Hollow

description: It's hard to get around the tannins that battle in this wine, which is savory and dark with a smoky aura. Lay it down another couple of years or let it air out a bit before pouring.
title: Penumbra 2010 Petite Sirah (North Coast)
description2: It's hard to get around the tannins that battle in this wine, which is savory and dark with a smoky aura. Lay it down another couple of years or let it air out a bit before pouring. Petite Sirah US California North Coast Penumbra

description: Using fruit that was sourced from the vineyards of Feudo Arancio near the town of Sambuca in southern Sicily, this pretty white wine offers bright aromas of lemon, green apple and cut grass. A long list of seafood menu items would pair with this Grillo.
title: Stemmari 2011 Grillo (Sicilia)
description2: Using fruit that was sourced from the vineyards of Feudo Arancio near the town of Sambuca in southern Sicily, this pretty white wine offers bright aromas of lemon, green apple and cut grass. A long list of seafood menu items would pair with this Grillo. Grillo Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Stemmari

description: A blend of Viognier, Grenache Blanc, Marasanne and Roussanne, this is very generous, offering orange, pear, honeysuckle and vanilla flavors. However, the oak seems a little heavy-handed.
title: Tablas Creek 2011 Côtes de Tablas Blanc White (Paso Robles)
description2: A blend of Viognier, Grenache Blanc, Marasanne and Roussanne, this is very generous, offering orange, pear, honeysuckle and vanilla flavors. However, the oak seems a little heavy-handed. Rhône-style White Blend US California Paso Robles Tablas Creek

description: “Sangue Blu,” which translates to “blue blood,” offers sun-drenched aromas of ripe fruit and rum cake that are backed by tobacco and sweet Indian spice notes. The mouthfeel is textured, gritty and rich.
title: Torre Quarto 2009 Sangue Blu Negroamaro (Puglia)
description2: “Sangue Blu,” which translates to “blue blood,” offers sun-drenched aromas of ripe fruit and rum cake that are backed by tobacco and sweet Indian spice notes. The mouthfeel is textured, gritty and rich. Negroamaro Italy Southern Italy Puglia Torre Quarto

description: There's a slightly confected top-note of cotton candy or bubble gum to this wine, but also decent concentration of canteloupe and peach fruit aromas and flavors. It's plump and medium-bodied, with a touch of refreshing minerality on the finish.
title: Saint André de Figuière 2007 Magali Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description2: There's a slightly confected top-note of cotton candy or bubble gum to this wine, but also decent concentration of canteloupe and peach fruit aromas and flavors. It's plump and medium-bodied, with a touch of refreshing minerality on the finish. Rosé France Provence Côtes de Provence Saint André de Figuière

description: Lavender and licorice on the nose; the palate mixes shy black cherry and cassis flavors with a bit of Chile's patented leafy character. The finish is round and offers a touch of vanilla and mocha. For the money this is solid and very easy to drink.
title: Santa Alicia 2006 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
description2: Lavender and licorice on the nose; the palate mixes shy black cherry and cassis flavors with a bit of Chile's patented leafy character. The finish is round and offers a touch of vanilla and mocha. For the money this is solid and very easy to drink. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Maipo Valley  Santa Alicia

description: This is smoky and minerally upfront, influenced by barrel notes, but there's also some intense strawberry and raspberry fruit on the palate and a minerally reprise on the concentrated finish.
title: Château d'Esclans 2006 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description2: This is smoky and minerally upfront, influenced by barrel notes, but there's also some intense strawberry and raspberry fruit on the palate and a minerally reprise on the concentrated finish. Rosé France Provence Côtes de Provence Château d'Esclans

description: A nice, dry Chard, a bit on the earthy, tobaccoey side, with pleasantly acidic mineral flavors and hints of lemons, limes and pineapples.
title: Gainey 2006 Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: A nice, dry Chard, a bit on the earthy, tobaccoey side, with pleasantly acidic mineral flavors and hints of lemons, limes and pineapples. Chardonnay US California Sta. Rita Hills Gainey

description: Bonterra's first rosé, showing the clean purity and balance that nearly always characterize its wines. Bone dry and vibrant in acidity, this Sangiovese, Zinfandel and Grenache blend has tart cherry, raspberry, tea and vanilla flavors. You might want to open it early to let some sulfur blow off.
title: Bonterra 2007 Rosé (Mendocino County)
description2: Bonterra's first rosé, showing the clean purity and balance that nearly always characterize its wines. Bone dry and vibrant in acidity, this Sangiovese, Zinfandel and Grenache blend has tart cherry, raspberry, tea and vanilla flavors. You might want to open it early to let some sulfur blow off. Rosé US California Mendocino County Bonterra

description: Intriguing all around, this displays earthy notes of truffle and meat on the nose, and balanced flavors of full raspberry and spicy caramel on the palate. Though a touch angular, the wine has elegance and good fruit.
title: Chaddsford 2005 Syrah (Pennsylvania)
description2: Intriguing all around, this displays earthy notes of truffle and meat on the nose, and balanced flavors of full raspberry and spicy caramel on the palate. Though a touch angular, the wine has elegance and good fruit. Syrah US Pennsylvania Pennsylvania Chaddsford

description: This is a very fragrant and pungent Pinot Bianco with aromas of exotic fruit, pineapple, apricot and melon. It represents a lighter, fresher take on the robust grape and delivers a medium, compact structure in the mouth.
title: Di Lenardo 2007 Vigneto Vigne dai Vieris Pinot Bianco (Venezia Giulia)
description2: This is a very fragrant and pungent Pinot Bianco with aromas of exotic fruit, pineapple, apricot and melon. It represents a lighter, fresher take on the robust grape and delivers a medium, compact structure in the mouth. Pinot Bianco Italy Northeastern Italy Venezia Giulia Di Lenardo

description: This mountain-grown Zin is dry, lusty, robust and briary, with peppery flavors of wild forest berries, leather and cola. You'll find firm acids, but the wine has a silky texture that's almost like Pinot Noir.
title: Lava Cap 2005 Reserve Zinfandel (El Dorado)
description2: This mountain-grown Zin is dry, lusty, robust and briary, with peppery flavors of wild forest berries, leather and cola. You'll find firm acids, but the wine has a silky texture that's almost like Pinot Noir. Zinfandel US California El Dorado Lava Cap

description: Made in a soft, gentle way, this pretty Mourvèdre has chocolate-infused blackberry, currant, raspberry, licorice, cola and pepper flavors. It's very dry, and will drink well with a char-broiled steak.
title: Lavender Ridge 2006 Mourvèdre (Sierra Foothills)
description2: Made in a soft, gentle way, this pretty Mourvèdre has chocolate-infused blackberry, currant, raspberry, licorice, cola and pepper flavors. It's very dry, and will drink well with a char-broiled steak. Mourvèdre US California Sierra Foothills Lavender Ridge

description: Slightly confected on the nose, showing cotton candy and bubble gum aromas, but you'll also find plenty of strawberry-raspberry flavors. Very fruity and clean, with a fresh finish.
title: Mas de la Dame 2007 Rosé du Mas Rosé (Les Baux de Provence)
address: Les Baux de Provence, Provence, France
description2: Slightly confected on the nose, showing cotton candy and bubble gum aromas, but you'll also find plenty of strawberry-raspberry flavors. Very fruity and clean, with a fresh finish. Rosé France Provence Les Baux de Provence Mas de la Dame

description: More tannic, drier and more acidic than most fine coastal Syrahs, this one from the Sierra Foothills is marked by its firm structure.The black currant, licorice, beef jerky and tobacco flavors are complex. Best now.
title: Montevina 2005 Terra d'Oro Syrah (Amador County)
description2: More tannic, drier and more acidic than most fine coastal Syrahs, this one from the Sierra Foothills is marked by its firm structure.The black currant, licorice, beef jerky and tobacco flavors are complex. Best now. Syrah US California Amador County Montevina

description: Ripe, fruity wine with quince and pineapple flavors, layered through with apple skin tannins. It could do with six months aging, but it will certainly be ready to drink by the fall.
title: Quinta de Ventozelo 2007 Cister da Ribeira White (Douro)
description2: Ripe, fruity wine with quince and pineapple flavors, layered through with apple skin tannins. It could do with six months aging, but it will certainly be ready to drink by the fall. Portuguese White Portugal Douro  Quinta de Ventozelo

description: This austere and lightly herbal Cabernet is balanced and varietal, but at first seems a bit dull, as if tasted through a screen. That said, it actually improved after 24 hours, with more presence to the tart red and black fruits. It's an elegant style that will probably show best with food.
title: Substance 2006 Cs Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This austere and lightly herbal Cabernet is balanced and varietal, but at first seems a bit dull, as if tasted through a screen. That said, it actually improved after 24 hours, with more presence to the tart red and black fruits. It's an elegant style that will probably show best with food. Cabernet Sauvignon US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Substance

description: This is a robust, dense wine, showing the hot character of the vintage in its aromas and flavors of fruitcake and spice and slightly rough texture. It's a blend of 60% Syrah and 40% Cabernet, matured in one-third new oak.
title: Mas de la Dame 2003 La Stèle Rouge Syrah-Cabernet (Les Baux de Provence)
address: Les Baux de Provence, Provence, France
description2: This is a robust, dense wine, showing the hot character of the vintage in its aromas and flavors of fruitcake and spice and slightly rough texture. It's a blend of 60% Syrah and 40% Cabernet, matured in one-third new oak. Syrah-Cabernet France Provence Les Baux de Provence Mas de la Dame

description: This is a blush wine made primarily from the Spanish variety, Tempranillo. It's fairly dark for a rosé and quite full-bodied in cherry jam, pepper and vanilla flavors, while a splash of Albariño adds needed acidity and the bright taste of citrus.
title: Stevenot 2007 Rosado Rosé (Sierra Foothills)
description2: This is a blush wine made primarily from the Spanish variety, Tempranillo. It's fairly dark for a rosé and quite full-bodied in cherry jam, pepper and vanilla flavors, while a splash of Albariño adds needed acidity and the bright taste of citrus. Rosé US California Sierra Foothills Stevenot

description: A little sugary-sweet, but the acidity is so crisp and clean, it balances things out. The pineapple, papaya, peach jam, honeysuckle and vanilla flavors are really delicious.
title: Stonehouse 2006 Tumbas Vineyard Viognier (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
description2: A little sugary-sweet, but the acidity is so crisp and clean, it balances things out. The pineapple, papaya, peach jam, honeysuckle and vanilla flavors are really delicious. Viognier US California Shenandoah Valley (CA) Stonehouse

description: A good but awkward attempt at a bigger, more saturated, more serious wine. The nose tells you that it's ripe, but there's some reduction in there too. The palate is revved up and tannic with turbulence along the way. Spice, chocolate and heat all play a part on the berry-driven palate.
title: TerraMater 2006 Vineyard Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon-Carmenère (Curicó Valley)
description2: A good but awkward attempt at a bigger, more saturated, more serious wine. The nose tells you that it's ripe, but there's some reduction in there too. The palate is revved up and tannic with turbulence along the way. Spice, chocolate and heat all play a part on the berry-driven palate. Cabernet Sauvignon-Carmenère Chile Curicó Valley  TerraMater

description: Verdelho is one of those new varieties imported from old Europe that's providing a badly needed shot in the arm for California, namely, the need for crisply acidic, dry whites. It's a zesty, refreshing wine, with lemon-honey, peach and vanilla flavors.
title: Fenestra 2006 Silvaspoons Vineyard Verdelho (Lodi)
description2: Verdelho is one of those new varieties imported from old Europe that's providing a badly needed shot in the arm for California, namely, the need for crisply acidic, dry whites. It's a zesty, refreshing wine, with lemon-honey, peach and vanilla flavors. Verdelho US California Lodi Fenestra

description: Crisp, cutting lime and lemon lend verve to crisp green apple and pear flavors in this fruity, fresh Riesling. It's approachable and refreshing, slicked with subtle honey and spice tones. The finish is brisk and clean.
title: S.A. Prüm 2014 Essence Riesling (Mosel)
description2: Crisp, cutting lime and lemon lend verve to crisp green apple and pear flavors in this fruity, fresh Riesling. It's approachable and refreshing, slicked with subtle honey and spice tones. The finish is brisk and clean. Riesling Germany Mosel  S.A. Prüm

description: The high alcohol is a good indication of the ultraripe fruit flavors here. Raisins and cooked cherries dominate, set against a background of tart cherry-pie acids. The concentration is impressive, as is the purity of the fruit flavors.
title: Schmidt 2011 Malbec (Southern Oregon)
description2: The high alcohol is a good indication of the ultraripe fruit flavors here. Raisins and cooked cherries dominate, set against a background of tart cherry-pie acids. The concentration is impressive, as is the purity of the fruit flavors. Malbec US Oregon Southern Oregon Schmidt

description: Light and clear in color, this wine veers into cool-climate, restrained territory in its well-defined lines of sage, dried herb and stemmy earth. Dry tannins give an oomph of power beneath traces of dried rose.
title: August Truth 2013 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: Light and clear in color, this wine veers into cool-climate, restrained territory in its well-defined lines of sage, dried herb and stemmy earth. Dry tannins give an oomph of power beneath traces of dried rose. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley August Truth

description: The nose of this Chenin is light and dainty, with soft scents of toast, orange blossom, pear and white peach that dance in the glass. The palate is a bit more assertive, showing ripe flavors of pear and peach purée alongside a pleasant citric lift that refreshes the finish. Drink now.
title: Terre Brûlée 2014 Chenin Blanc (Swartland)
description2: The nose of this Chenin is light and dainty, with soft scents of toast, orange blossom, pear and white peach that dance in the glass. The palate is a bit more assertive, showing ripe flavors of pear and peach purée alongside a pleasant citric lift that refreshes the finish. Drink now. Chenin Blanc South Africa Swartland  Terre Brûlée

description: Delicate scents of elderflower and orchard fruit mix in the glass while the lively palate offers rennet apple, citrus zest and a whiff of nutmeg. Crisp acidity brightens the juicy flavors.
title: Abbazia di Novacella 2014 Müller-Thurgau (Alto Adige Valle Isarco)
address: Alto Adige Valle Isarco, Northeastern Italy, Italy
description2: Delicate scents of elderflower and orchard fruit mix in the glass while the lively palate offers rennet apple, citrus zest and a whiff of nutmeg. Crisp acidity brightens the juicy flavors. Müller-Thurgau Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Valle Isarco Abbazia di Novacella

description: Cola, black cherry and crushed purple flowers show on the nose of this bottling, one of the first reds to emerge from the 2014 vintage. It's light and energetic on the palate, with tangy cranberry juice and a touch of licorice.
title: Apriori 2014 Hicks Family Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains)
description2: Cola, black cherry and crushed purple flowers show on the nose of this bottling, one of the first reds to emerge from the 2014 vintage. It's light and energetic on the palate, with tangy cranberry juice and a touch of licorice. Pinot Noir US California Santa Cruz Mountains Apriori

description: This screaming violet-colored chunkster is big and blocky up front, with aromas of vitamins and grapy black fruits. A giant palate holds big tannins, while heady flavors of black plum and oak spice finish minty, toasty and with power.
title: Bodega Norton 2013 Reserva Malbec (Mendoza)
description2: This screaming violet-colored chunkster is big and blocky up front, with aromas of vitamins and grapy black fruits. A giant palate holds big tannins, while heady flavors of black plum and oak spice finish minty, toasty and with power. Malbec Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Bodega Norton

description: Rare to find on its own, as it's mainly used in sparkling-wine blends, this Pinot Meunier is earthy in dark truffle and herb, more savory, dry flavors that are wrapped in tightly woven tannins and oak. The muted fruit that's there recalls sweet raspberry.
title: Bouchaine 2013 Bacchus Collection Estate Vineyard Pinot Meunier (Carneros)
description2: Rare to find on its own, as it's mainly used in sparkling-wine blends, this Pinot Meunier is earthy in dark truffle and herb, more savory, dry flavors that are wrapped in tightly woven tannins and oak. The muted fruit that's there recalls sweet raspberry. Pinot Meunier US California Carneros Bouchaine

description: Dark-berry aromas meet hints of menthol and game on the nose. The medium-bodied palate follows suit on entry, but becomes lighter by the midpalate from a slick of minerality. Pair alongside gamy meats such as grilled venison loin.
title: Brys 2012 Estate Grown Cabernet Franc (Old Mission Peninsula)
description2: Dark-berry aromas meet hints of menthol and game on the nose. The medium-bodied palate follows suit on entry, but becomes lighter by the midpalate from a slick of minerality. Pair alongside gamy meats such as grilled venison loin. Cabernet Franc US Michigan Old Mission Peninsula Brys

description: This LBV from the Bulas family vineyards, downriver from Pinhão is all ready to drink. It is fruity with just the right amount of structure. Fresh berry fruits are lifted by fine acidity and well integrated into the smooth, just tannic structure. Drink now.
title: Bulas 2011 Late Bottled Vintage  (Port)
description2: This LBV from the Bulas family vineyards, downriver from Pinhão is all ready to drink. It is fruity with just the right amount of structure. Fresh berry fruits are lifted by fine acidity and well integrated into the smooth, just tannic structure. Drink now. Port Portugal Port  Bulas

description: Flavors of pressed apple and pears are uncomplicated but pleasing in this sprightly off-dry Riesling. While delicately framed, it's punchy and penetrating, finishing with a lingering apple-cider sweetness. Drink now through 2017.
title: C. von Nell-Breuning 2014 Kaseler Dominikaner Riesling (Mosel)
description2: Flavors of pressed apple and pears are uncomplicated but pleasing in this sprightly off-dry Riesling. While delicately framed, it's punchy and penetrating, finishing with a lingering apple-cider sweetness. Drink now through 2017. Riesling Germany Mosel  C. von Nell-Breuning

description: Varietal scents of cut grass, grapefruit and a hint of tomato vine come forward on this vibrant white. The racy palate offers gooseberry, kiwi and a note of green bell pepper that lead up to a tangy finish.
title: Caldaro 2014 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
description2: Varietal scents of cut grass, grapefruit and a hint of tomato vine come forward on this vibrant white. The racy palate offers gooseberry, kiwi and a note of green bell pepper that lead up to a tangy finish. Sauvignon Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Caldaro

description: This is a fruity, juicy wine that has a dry tanninc core. That gives a mineral texture to the otherwise ripe and fruity wine. Full of black currant fruit flavors, shot through with acidity, the wine is ready to drink.
title: Casa da Passarella 2012 Somontes Colheita Red (Dão)
description2: This is a fruity, juicy wine that has a dry tanninc core. That gives a mineral texture to the otherwise ripe and fruity wine. Full of black currant fruit flavors, shot through with acidity, the wine is ready to drink. Portuguese Red Portugal Dão  Casa da Passarella

description: With 26 months in small oak barrels, aromas of coconut cream, finely ground sawdust and cherry stems ride over condensed black cherry and currant. The medium-weight palate has a plush feel to it, offering a balance of ripe berry fruit and zesty streaks of minerals.
title: Chateau Grand Traverse 2012 Reserve Cabernet Franc (Old Mission Peninsula)
description2: With 26 months in small oak barrels, aromas of coconut cream, finely ground sawdust and cherry stems ride over condensed black cherry and currant. The medium-weight palate has a plush feel to it, offering a balance of ripe berry fruit and zesty streaks of minerals. Cabernet Franc US Michigan Old Mission Peninsula Chateau Grand Traverse

description: Aromas of orchard fruit, nut and a light whiff of toast lift from the glass. The medium-bodied, straightforward palate offers pear, apple and a note of lemon drop. Vibrant acidity gives it a clean finish.
title: Colterenzio 2014 Puiten Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
description2: Aromas of orchard fruit, nut and a light whiff of toast lift from the glass. The medium-bodied, straightforward palate offers pear, apple and a note of lemon drop. Vibrant acidity gives it a clean finish. Pinot Grigio Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Colterenzio

description: This lively white opens with aromas of grapefruit, light oak and crushed rock. On the racy palate, zesty acidity underscores yellow peach, citrus zest, ginger and a hint of vanilla. A hint of mineral marks the finish.
title: Manincor 2014 Tannenberg Sauvignon (Alto Adige Terlano)
address: Alto Adige Terlano, Northeastern Italy, Italy
description2: This lively white opens with aromas of grapefruit, light oak and crushed rock. On the racy palate, zesty acidity underscores yellow peach, citrus zest, ginger and a hint of vanilla. A hint of mineral marks the finish. Sauvignon Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Terlano Manincor

description: This is an unusual commingling of mostly Rhone varieties, a mix of 75% Viognier, 12% Roussanne and 12% Marsanne, with the addition of 3% Sémillon. Honeycomb and Nilla wafer rise from the nose before a medium-bodied swirl of sour lemon, grapefruit and yuzu give it tartness on the finish.
title: Martin Ray 2014 The Tower White (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: This is an unusual commingling of mostly Rhone varieties, a mix of 75% Viognier, 12% Roussanne and 12% Marsanne, with the addition of 3% Sémillon. Honeycomb and Nilla wafer rise from the nose before a medium-bodied swirl of sour lemon, grapefruit and yuzu give it tartness on the finish. White Blend US California Dry Creek Valley Martin Ray

description: This big but balanced wine has melon and apple aromas, lots of fruit and toasty oak in the flavors, and a super-smooth and rich texture. The finish lingers.
title: Matchbook 2014 Old Head Chardonnay (Dunnigan Hills)
description2: This big but balanced wine has melon and apple aromas, lots of fruit and toasty oak in the flavors, and a super-smooth and rich texture. The finish lingers. Chardonnay US California Dunnigan Hills Matchbook

description: Grapefruit, peach and nectarine aromas carry over to the racy palate along with apricot. Zesty acidity provides refreshing balance and a tangy finish.
title: Nals Margreid 2014 Kerner (Alto Adige)
description2: Grapefruit, peach and nectarine aromas carry over to the racy palate along with apricot. Zesty acidity provides refreshing balance and a tangy finish. Kerner Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Nals Margreid

description: This linear wine opens with aromas that suggest tomato vine, white spring flower and yellow grapefruit that carry over to the crisp palate along with a hint of zesty lemon peel. Racy acidity adds even more verve.
title: Nals Margreid 2014 Sauvignon (Alto Adige)
description2: This linear wine opens with aromas that suggest tomato vine, white spring flower and yellow grapefruit that carry over to the crisp palate along with a hint of zesty lemon peel. Racy acidity adds even more verve. Sauvignon Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Nals Margreid

description: Opaque and thick, this soft, black peppery wine is ripe and bright in clove, crisp red currant and cranberry, with a streak of eucalyptus-like mint. It finishes in a subtle flourish of cedar and tar.
title: Paratus 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Mount Veeder)
description2: Opaque and thick, this soft, black peppery wine is ripe and bright in clove, crisp red currant and cranberry, with a streak of eucalyptus-like mint. It finishes in a subtle flourish of cedar and tar. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Mount Veeder Paratus

description: Aromas of pressed apples and pears turn fleshier and riper on the palate of this forward, concentrated Riesling. Sumptuous peach and apricot flavors amass a honeyed sweetness on the midpalate, balanced neatly by squirts of tangerine acidity. It's an approachable, fruity wine to drink now through 2017.
title: Peter Mertes 2014 Platinum Riesling (Mosel)
description2: Aromas of pressed apples and pears turn fleshier and riper on the palate of this forward, concentrated Riesling. Sumptuous peach and apricot flavors amass a honeyed sweetness on the midpalate, balanced neatly by squirts of tangerine acidity. It's an approachable, fruity wine to drink now through 2017. Riesling Germany Mosel  Peter Mertes

description: The dark color and high acidity of this wine are both typical of the Sousão grape which is normally found only in Douro blends. It is ripe, fruity and juicy although with tight acidity and black currant fruits. The wine's tannins suggest it needs to age, so drink from 2017.
title: Quinta do Vallado 2013 Sousão (Douro)
description2: The dark color and high acidity of this wine are both typical of the Sousão grape which is normally found only in Douro blends. It is ripe, fruity and juicy although with tight acidity and black currant fruits. The wine's tannins suggest it needs to age, so drink from 2017. Sousão Portugal Douro  Quinta do Vallado

description: The balance between wood aging and fruit is at its best in this wine. It shows plenty of red fruits filled out with raisins and nutmeg. As a contrast the wood aging has brought out a spicy, almond character. It is fresh, on the dry side for an aged tawny and, of course, ready to drink.
title: Quinta dos Murças NV 10 Anos Old Tawny  (Port)
description2: The balance between wood aging and fruit is at its best in this wine. It shows plenty of red fruits filled out with raisins and nutmeg. As a contrast the wood aging has brought out a spicy, almond character. It is fresh, on the dry side for an aged tawny and, of course, ready to drink. Port Portugal Port  Quinta dos Murças

description: While big and brawny in style, this Pinot still maintains good balance. The aromas resemble toasty, spicy oak, with cranberry and dark cherry notes. The flavors echo the nose and are vivid due to lively acidity and a firm layer of tannins.
title: Replica 2014 Pinot Noir (California)
description2: While big and brawny in style, this Pinot still maintains good balance. The aromas resemble toasty, spicy oak, with cranberry and dark cherry notes. The flavors echo the nose and are vivid due to lively acidity and a firm layer of tannins. Pinot Noir US California California Replica

description: This is a remarkably spicy wine that is also finely balanced. It's sophisticated as well as rich, with spice and lychee flavors lifted by a crisp edge of acidity. It's complex in texture and should age well. Drink from 2015.
title: Domaine Weinbach 2011 Cuvée Théo Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
description2: This is a remarkably spicy wine that is also finely balanced. It's sophisticated as well as rich, with spice and lychee flavors lifted by a crisp edge of acidity. It's complex in texture and should age well. Drink from 2015. Gewürztraminer France Alsace Alsace Domaine Weinbach

description: This is a medium-sweet wine that's warm and rich due to the ripening abilities of the Spiegel vineyard. It is spiced, concentrated and full of a smoky character that contrasts with its fruitiness. It's ready to drink now, although it will certainly age well. Drink until 2019.
title: Domaines Schlumberger 2007 Spiegel Grand Cru Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description2: This is a medium-sweet wine that's warm and rich due to the ripening abilities of the Spiegel vineyard. It is spiced, concentrated and full of a smoky character that contrasts with its fruitiness. It's ready to drink now, although it will certainly age well. Drink until 2019. Pinot Gris France Alsace Alsace Domaines Schlumberger

description: The cool vintage was a challenge, which speaks well of the winery's vineyard team. Blended with 5% Petite Sirah, the wine is unusually complex and sumptuous, even by Dry Creek standards. The flavors are rich with wild summer blueberries and blackberries, and savory with pepper and other exotic spices.
title: Dry Creek Vineyard 2011 Somers Ranch Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: The cool vintage was a challenge, which speaks well of the winery's vineyard team. Blended with 5% Petite Sirah, the wine is unusually complex and sumptuous, even by Dry Creek standards. The flavors are rich with wild summer blueberries and blackberries, and savory with pepper and other exotic spices. Zinfandel US California Dry Creek Valley Dry Creek Vineyard

description: The sixteenth edition of Dunham's benchmark Cabernet Sauvignon bears a strong scent of new oak—it's aged in 70% French and 30% American. The wood is dominant, which is not surprising in a wine built for long term aging. Given plenty of time to breathe, bright red fruits, citrusy acids and a lovely mix of toast, caramel and clove accents emerge.
title: Dunham 2010 XVI Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: The sixteenth edition of Dunham's benchmark Cabernet Sauvignon bears a strong scent of new oak—it's aged in 70% French and 30% American. The wood is dominant, which is not surprising in a wine built for long term aging. Given plenty of time to breathe, bright red fruits, citrusy acids and a lovely mix of toast, caramel and clove accents emerge. Cabernet Sauvignon US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Dunham

description: Richly aromatic, on the strength of the nose alone this could pass for something from Napa's Rutherford Bench. The blue and purple fruit notes and dusty tannins all say California, but the laser-like definition, minerality and natural acidity prove it's Washington fruit all the way. Strikingly dense and complex, with decades of life ahead.
title: Tamarack Cellars 2009 Ciel du Cheval Vineyard Reserve Red (Red Mountain)
description2: Richly aromatic, on the strength of the nose alone this could pass for something from Napa's Rutherford Bench. The blue and purple fruit notes and dusty tannins all say California, but the laser-like definition, minerality and natural acidity prove it's Washington fruit all the way. Strikingly dense and complex, with decades of life ahead. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US Washington Red Mountain Tamarack Cellars

description: Sourced entirely from the Sagemoor vineyard, this richly endowed Viognier smothers the palate in a lush mix of fat, candied citrus and tropical fruits. Honeysuckle and orange pekoe tea flavors trickle into the lingering, lip-smacking finish.
title: Tamarack Cellars 2012 Viognier (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Sourced entirely from the Sagemoor vineyard, this richly endowed Viognier smothers the palate in a lush mix of fat, candied citrus and tropical fruits. Honeysuckle and orange pekoe tea flavors trickle into the lingering, lip-smacking finish. Viognier US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Tamarack Cellars

description: The 2005 and 2006 bottlings of this Cabernet were awesome. So is this 2007. At the age of more than six years, it's just beginning its long journey. It's still tannic, but with ripe, sweet tannins that frame gorgeous, deeply satisfying blueberry, black currant, mocha and cedar flavors. It drinks well now, and will develop further in the bottle over the next eight years.
title: Marita's Vineyard 2007 SOMA Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: The 2005 and 2006 bottlings of this Cabernet were awesome. So is this 2007. At the age of more than six years, it's just beginning its long journey. It's still tannic, but with ripe, sweet tannins that frame gorgeous, deeply satisfying blueberry, black currant, mocha and cedar flavors. It drinks well now, and will develop further in the bottle over the next eight years. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Marita's Vineyard

description: Sourced principally from Klipsun, with smaller amounts from Champoux and Seven Hills, this tight, dark, richly-flavored wine has impeccable credentials. Black fruits, espresso and citrus—notably blood orange—mingle seamlessly, though it takes some hours to open up. The Red Mountain fruit contributes characteristic notes of iron ore and underlying minerality.
title: Pamplin 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Sourced principally from Klipsun, with smaller amounts from Champoux and Seven Hills, this tight, dark, richly-flavored wine has impeccable credentials. Black fruits, espresso and citrus—notably blood orange—mingle seamlessly, though it takes some hours to open up.
