Gelber Muskateller Austria Wachau  Domäne Wachau

description: Easy to drink this blend of all five classic Bordeaux varieties, with Merlot predominating. It's all about cherries, blackberries, plum jam, currants and chocolate. Not particularly subtle or ageworthy, but very pretty.
title: Happy Canyon Vineyard 2010 Piocho Red (Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara)
address: Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara, California, US
description2: Easy to drink this blend of all five classic Bordeaux varieties, with Merlot predominating. It's all about cherries, blackberries, plum jam, currants and chocolate. Not particularly subtle or ageworthy, but very pretty. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California Happy Canyon of Santa Barbara Happy Canyon Vineyard

description: This opens with a good mix of tobacco, black cherry, cola and mocha aromas. In the mouth, this offers good body, size and balance along with lightly herbal, leafy flavors of mossy black fruits. A mellow finish with a solid structure is a welcome ending.
title: Viña Bisquertt 2011 La Joya Gran Reserva Merlot (Colchagua Valley)
description2: This opens with a good mix of tobacco, black cherry, cola and mocha aromas. In the mouth, this offers good body, size and balance along with lightly herbal, leafy flavors of mossy black fruits. A mellow finish with a solid structure is a welcome ending. Merlot Chile Colchagua Valley  Viña Bisquertt

description: This opens with evident oak aromas of toasted wood, espresso and coffee bean followed by underpinnings of black fruit and pepper. The palate shows ripe black fruit, espresso and oak. Although it has nice depth, the finish is cut short by by drying wood tannins.
title: Virna Borgogno 2009 Cannubi Boschis  (Barolo)
description2: This opens with evident oak aromas of toasted wood, espresso and coffee bean followed by underpinnings of black fruit and pepper. The palate shows ripe black fruit, espresso and oak. Although it has nice depth, the finish is cut short by by drying wood tannins. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Virna Borgogno

description: This is a tough, chewy Merlot, a bit of a stylistic departure for Walla Walla Vintners. Perhaps it's the addition of Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, or perhaps just the result of the challenging 2010 vintage in the Walla Walla Valley. But the greenish tannins bring a lot of herbal flavors to the forefront, and tend to bury the fruit.
title: Walla Walla Vintners 2010 Merlot (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: This is a tough, chewy Merlot, a bit of a stylistic departure for Walla Walla Vintners. Perhaps it's the addition of Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, or perhaps just the result of the challenging 2010 vintage in the Walla Walla Valley. But the greenish tannins bring a lot of herbal flavors to the forefront, and tend to bury the fruit. Merlot US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Walla Walla Vintners

description: Dense planting for this vineyard has resulted in a wine that has greater concentration than in the past. The wine has firm tannins, while showing already delicious black-currant fruit. For drinking over the next 2–4 years.
title: Pezat 2011  Bordeaux Supérieur
description2: Dense planting for this vineyard has resulted in a wine that has greater concentration than in the past. The wine has firm tannins, while showing already delicious black-currant fruit. For drinking over the next 2–4 years. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Supérieur Pezat

description: This is a pretty, well-made Barbera with an invitingly floral and fruity bouquet. The palate shows ripe black-fruit flavors accompanied by touches of spice, coffee and chocolate. This would be perfect with grilled meats.
title: Pico Maccario 2011 Tre Rovere  (Barbera d'Asti Superiore)
description2: This is a pretty, well-made Barbera with an invitingly floral and fruity bouquet. The palate shows ripe black-fruit flavors accompanied by touches of spice, coffee and chocolate. This would be perfect with grilled meats. Barbera Italy Piedmont Barbera d'Asti Superiore Pico Maccario

description: Mondavi's done it again, produced another very nice Cabernet at an everyday price. It shows classy elegance, with blackberry, currant and mocha notes.
title: Robert Mondavi 2011 Private Selection Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
description2: Mondavi's done it again, produced another very nice Cabernet at an everyday price. It shows classy elegance, with blackberry, currant and mocha notes. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Central Coast Robert Mondavi

description: This is a soft, appealing Chardonnay layered with toasted marshmallow and superripe peach. It's round in the mouth and lushly textured, then turns citrusy—almost metallic—on the finish.
title: Robert Oatley 2011 Finisterre Chardonnay (Margaret River)
description2: This is a soft, appealing Chardonnay layered with toasted marshmallow and superripe peach. It's round in the mouth and lushly textured, then turns citrusy—almost metallic—on the finish. Chardonnay Australia Western Australia Margaret River Robert Oatley

description: Here's a refreshing and attractive Chenin Blanc that offers clean notes of ripe pear, green apple and honewdew melon alongside accents of cinnamon and white florals. The palate is light weight and vibrant, with lifting acidity that adds zest to the medium-length finish.
title: Shvo 2010 Chenin Blanc (Upper Galilee)
description2: Here's a refreshing and attractive Chenin Blanc that offers clean notes of ripe pear, green apple and honewdew melon alongside accents of cinnamon and white florals. The palate is light weight and vibrant, with lifting acidity that adds zest to the medium-length finish. Chenin Blanc Israel Upper Galilee  Shvo

description: Fruit and spice aromas show dark cherry, white pepper and toasted oak aromas of espresso and chocolate, with a hint of orange peel. The palate has fresh strawberry, coffee and citrusy notes but not much depth.
title: Stroppiana 2008 Vigna San Giacomo  (Barolo)
description2: Fruit and spice aromas show dark cherry, white pepper and toasted oak aromas of espresso and chocolate, with a hint of orange peel. The palate has fresh strawberry, coffee and citrusy notes but not much depth. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Stroppiana

description: Fine, rich black-fruit flavors give this wine a sense of ripeness, openness and generosity. The wood and fruit balance is already fine, showing that it will be ready to drink this year.
title: Château Grand Billard 2011  Bordeaux
description2: Fine, rich black-fruit flavors give this wine a sense of ripeness, openness and generosity. The wood and fruit balance is already fine, showing that it will be ready to drink this year. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Château Grand Billard

description: Mint marks the nose of this otherwise darkly attractive wine. Notes of mocha and plum nicely set up the wine, as do the supple tannins, but then there's a jarring edge of prickly acidity that cuts across the palate and disrupts the flow. There are some nice parts here that don't quite come together.
title: Mitolo 2009 Reiver Shiraz (Barossa Valley)
description2: Mint marks the nose of this otherwise darkly attractive wine. Notes of mocha and plum nicely set up the wine, as do the supple tannins, but then there's a jarring edge of prickly acidity that cuts across the palate and disrupts the flow. There are some nice parts here that don't quite come together. Shiraz Australia South Australia Barossa Valley Mitolo

description: Tea, tomato, raspberry and spice aromas are typical for Leyda Pinot. The body is a bit light and hollow, but that also means it's not heavy. Raspberry and spiced tea flavors control the palate, while plum, spice and light herb flavors work the almost dilute finish.
title: Anakena 2011 Ona Special Reserve Pinot Noir (Leyda Valley)
description2: Tea, tomato, raspberry and spice aromas are typical for Leyda Pinot. The body is a bit light and hollow, but that also means it's not heavy. Raspberry and spiced tea flavors control the palate, while plum, spice and light herb flavors work the almost dilute finish. Pinot Noir Chile Leyda Valley  Anakena

description: With a bit of Merlot, Petit Verdot and Malbec, this Cab is marked by hard tannins and blackberry and cherry jam, black currant and oak flavors. The finish is gripping, however, it's pretty tart, and you have to wonder if that sharpness will ever age out. Decant and drink up.
title: Cade 2009 Napa Cuvée Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: With a bit of Merlot, Petit Verdot and Malbec, this Cab is marked by hard tannins and blackberry and cherry jam, black currant and oak flavors. The finish is gripping, however, it's pretty tart, and you have to wonder if that sharpness will ever age out. Decant and drink up. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Cade

description: This blend of Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot opens with fiery, oaky aromas that include cherry, cassis and vanilla. The palate has a severe tartaric shear to it along with clampy tannins. High-toned flavors of raspberry and plum are propped up by blazing acidity, while the finish is herbal and peppery in taste, with a scouring feel.
designation: Tribute Edicion Limitada Cabernet Franc-Petit Verdot
title: Caliterra 2010 Tribute Edicion Limitada Cabernet Franc-Petit Verdot Red (Colchagua Valley)
description2: This blend of Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot opens with fiery, oaky aromas that include cherry, cassis and vanilla. The palate has a severe tartaric shear to it along with clampy tannins. High-toned flavors of raspberry and plum are propped up by blazing acidity, while the finish is herbal and peppery in taste, with a scouring feel. Red Blend Chile Colchagua Valley  Caliterra

description: A green, minty wave of challenging aromas comes with black olive, coconutty oak and graphite. The palate is bullish, scratchy in feel and tannic, with feral, herbal flavors of blackberry, juniper and wild herbs. Herbal and wild are the best words to describe this Syrah.
title: Casa Rivas 2010 Gran Reserva Syrah (Maipo Valley)
description2: A green, minty wave of challenging aromas comes with black olive, coconutty oak and graphite. The palate is bullish, scratchy in feel and tannic, with feral, herbal flavors of blackberry, juniper and wild herbs. Herbal and wild are the best words to describe this Syrah. Syrah Chile Maipo Valley  Casa Rivas

description: Aged in 68% new French oak, the barrel notes take center stage here with aromas of toast and spice. The palate is creamy and full with a viscous feel, tapering in concentration toward the finish.
title: Waterbrook 2011 Reserve Chardonnay (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Aged in 68% new French oak, the barrel notes take center stage here with aromas of toast and spice. The palate is creamy and full with a viscous feel, tapering in concentration toward the finish. Chardonnay US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Waterbrook

description: Ripe fruit, sweet tannins and soft texture mark this wine. It's full, ripe and lightly structured. An attractive wine for its black fruit and forward character. Drink in 2–4 years.
title: Château Macquin 2011  Saint-Georges-Saint-Émilion
description2: Ripe fruit, sweet tannins and soft texture mark this wine. It's full, ripe and lightly structured. An attractive wine for its black fruit and forward character. Drink in 2–4 years. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Saint-Georges-Saint-Émilion Château Macquin

description: Fruity wine, light, elegant with a touch of minerality, it shows a fine balance of green fruits and its spice. The wine is all about freshness, crispness, a touch of minerality to give texture. At the end, the fragrant acidity shines. Screwcap.
title: Domäne Wachau 2012 Terrassen Federspiel Grüner Veltliner (Wachau)
description2: Fruity wine, light, elegant with a touch of minerality, it shows a fine balance of green fruits and its spice. The wine is all about freshness, crispness, a touch of minerality to give texture. At the end, the fragrant acidity shines. Screwcap. Grüner Veltliner Austria Wachau  Domäne Wachau

description: It's not easy to get 16.5% alcohol from a vintage as cool as 2010 in Washington. The wine has a grain and grass bouquet, wild and brambly fruit, and plenty of Asian spices. Interesting, though not especially typical for the grape variety
title: Hawks View 2010 Merlot (Washington)
description2: It's not easy to get 16.5% alcohol from a vintage as cool as 2010 in Washington. The wine has a grain and grass bouquet, wild and brambly fruit, and plenty of Asian spices. Interesting, though not especially typical for the grape variety Merlot US Washington Washington Hawks View

description: Not the richest Chardonnay ever, but it has complex notes of citrus, apple, nectarine and tropical fruits, with kisses of vanilla and cream. Acidity gives it elegant brightness.
title: Chime 2012 Chardonnay (Oakville)
description2: Not the richest Chardonnay ever, but it has complex notes of citrus, apple, nectarine and tropical fruits, with kisses of vanilla and cream. Acidity gives it elegant brightness. Chardonnay US California Oakville Chime

description: Great value, simple and fruity, this is a ripe wine without wood aging, just bursting with black fruit flavors. It's rich, slightly stalky and ready to drink now.
title: Clos Troteligotte 2011 K-nom Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
description2: Great value, simple and fruity, this is a ripe wine without wood aging, just bursting with black fruit flavors. It's rich, slightly stalky and ready to drink now. Malbec-Merlot France Southwest France Cahors Clos Troteligotte

description: This is an enormously rich Cabernet. It explodes in milk chocolate, black cherry, spicy plum and sweet, toasty oak flavors, wrapped into smooth tannins. Delicious, if a bit one-dimensional. Drink now.
title: Coghlan 2010 Coghlan Estate Vineyard Block 2 Diamond Cabernet Sauvignon (Santa Ynez Valley)
description2: This is an enormously rich Cabernet. It explodes in milk chocolate, black cherry, spicy plum and sweet, toasty oak flavors, wrapped into smooth tannins. Delicious, if a bit one-dimensional. Drink now. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Santa Ynez Valley Coghlan

description: Made in a richer, riper style, this Zin brims with flavors of raspberries, cherries, red currants and brown sugar, like a Christmas fruitcake. The alcohol is quite high. Drink soon.
title: Collier Falls 2010 Hillside Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: Made in a richer, riper style, this Zin brims with flavors of raspberries, cherries, red currants and brown sugar, like a Christmas fruitcake. The alcohol is quite high. Drink soon. Zinfandel US California Dry Creek Valley Collier Falls

description: This is a fine, all-purpose red blend, mostly Cabernet, with time in one-third new French and American oak. Heavily charred, smoky and earthy, it's got a fair amount of dark cassis fruit to carry all the barrel toast and finishes with some notes of bark and stem.
title: Dumas Station 2010 Cow Catcher Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: This is a fine, all-purpose red blend, mostly Cabernet, with time in one-third new French and American oak. Heavily charred, smoky and earthy, it's got a fair amount of dark cassis fruit to carry all the barrel toast and finishes with some notes of bark and stem. Red Blend US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Dumas Station

description: Lots of early-drinking charm in this Pinot Noir. It's light and silky, with a modest alcohol level that makes it easy to drink. The raspberry, cherry, cola and oak flavors are delicious.
title: Laetitia 2011 Clone 113 Pinot Noir (Arroyo Grande Valley)
description2: Lots of early-drinking charm in this Pinot Noir. It's light and silky, with a modest alcohol level that makes it easy to drink. The raspberry, cherry, cola and oak flavors are delicious. Pinot Noir US California Arroyo Grande Valley Laetitia

description: Scratchy berry aromas come with a hint of sweet-smelling plastic, but overall this bargain-priced Cab is good and welcoming. The palate has a pure, medium-bodied feel, while flavors of baked berry, cassis and chocolate finish with a mocha taste and mild heat.
title: Mancura 2011 Guardián Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
description2: Scratchy berry aromas come with a hint of sweet-smelling plastic, but overall this bargain-priced Cab is good and welcoming. The palate has a pure, medium-bodied feel, while flavors of baked berry, cassis and chocolate finish with a mocha taste and mild heat. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Maipo Valley  Mancura

description: This Bordeaux-style blend remains a fair value, showing some sweet barrel spices along with opening fruit flavors of red and black berry. It thins out in the middle and finishes with a simple, fruity flourish.
title: O•S Winery 2009 Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This Bordeaux-style blend remains a fair value, showing some sweet barrel spices along with opening fruit flavors of red and black berry. It thins out in the middle and finishes with a simple, fruity flourish. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) O•S Winery

description: A cool, very Sauvignon wine, with strong herbaceous and citrus flavors. It's crisp, showing a bright, tight, slightly mineral texture.
title: Pezat 2012  Bordeaux Blanc
description2: A cool, very Sauvignon wine, with strong herbaceous and citrus flavors. It's crisp, showing a bright, tight, slightly mineral texture. Sauvignon Blanc France Bordeaux Bordeaux Blanc Pezat

description: There's a honeyed note to this wine, yet it's crisp in acidity, giving it a mouthwatering savoriness for drinking now. The flavors veer toward Asian pears, peaches and tart gooseberries.
title: Purlieu 2012 Le Pich Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
description2: There's a honeyed note to this wine, yet it's crisp in acidity, giving it a mouthwatering savoriness for drinking now. The flavors veer toward Asian pears, peaches and tart gooseberries. Sauvignon Blanc US California Napa Valley Purlieu

description: Though this is pure Cabernet from an excellent Walla Walla vineyard, the flavors seem rather harsh and quite astringent. The dark fruit is cloaked in bitter, chalky tannins that require some rich food to cut through.
title: SuLei 2010 Les Collines Vineyard Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: Though this is pure Cabernet from an excellent Walla Walla vineyard, the flavors seem rather harsh and quite astringent. The dark fruit is cloaked in bitter, chalky tannins that require some rich food to cut through. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) SuLei

description: On the nose, this Cab delivers a mix of vinegar, rubber and jumpy berry aromas. The palate is smooth but bland and soft, while flavors of licorice, prune and herbal notes finish easy.
title: Valle Secreto 2010 First Edition Cabernet Sauvignon (Cachapoal Valley)
description2: On the nose, this Cab delivers a mix of vinegar, rubber and jumpy berry aromas. The palate is smooth but bland and soft, while flavors of licorice, prune and herbal notes finish easy. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Cachapoal Valley  Valle Secreto

description: Yogev, meaning “tiller of the soil,” is a friendly and easy-pleasing wine, with direct notes of cherry skins, fresh cassis and black currant leaf. Medium weight, with moderate acidity, fine tannins and a clean, fruit-driven finish. Drink now.
title: Binyamina 2010 Yogev Cabernet Sauvignon (Galilee)
description2: Yogev, meaning “tiller of the soil,” is a friendly and easy-pleasing wine, with direct notes of cherry skins, fresh cassis and black currant leaf. Medium weight, with moderate acidity, fine tannins and a clean, fruit-driven finish. Drink now. Cabernet Sauvignon Israel Galilee  Binyamina

description: This Chard's oak accents pineapple and lemon fruit flavors. It's dry yet honeyed, that paradox of Chardonnay, with a good burst of citrusy acids for brightness.
title: Wild Horse 2011 Unbridled Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
description2: This Chard's oak accents pineapple and lemon fruit flavors. It's dry yet honeyed, that paradox of Chardonnay, with a good burst of citrusy acids for brightness. Chardonnay US California Santa Maria Valley Wild Horse

description: Bold and fruity, this is laden with bitter cherry and juicy plum flavors. The tannins are light and attractive, with juicy, refreshing acidity. Age this for a few more months.
title: Robert Perroud 2011 L'Enfer des Balloquets  (Brouilly)
description2: Bold and fruity, this is laden with bitter cherry and juicy plum flavors. The tannins are light and attractive, with juicy, refreshing acidity. Age this for a few more months. Gamay France Beaujolais Brouilly Robert Perroud

description: Rich and dense, this has blackberry and black cherry jam, mocha and spice flavors. It contains 16% Cabernet Sauvignon, which lends the wine weight and body. While it's technically dry, there's a sweetness that comes from the ripeness of fruit and the caramel flavor from the oak, which gives it a sugary, bacony taste. Delicious now and for a few years.
title: Stephanie 2008 Merlot (Napa Valley)
description2: Rich and dense, this has blackberry and black cherry jam, mocha and spice flavors. It contains 16% Cabernet Sauvignon, which lends the wine weight and body. While it's technically dry, there's a sweetness that comes from the ripeness of fruit and the caramel flavor from the oak, which gives it a sugary, bacony taste. Delicious now and for a few years. Merlot US California Napa Valley Stephanie

description: Rich, exotic notes of honey-glazed papaya and warm pear are accented by touches of white flower, graham cracker and lemon custard. The palate feels round and weighty, with flavors that aren't as effusive as one might expect. Acids provide enough spine to keep the palate from drooping, with hints of clove and lemongrass adding interest. A blend of 55% Chardonnay, 45% Viognier.
title: Tarara 2010 Nevaeh White (Virginia)
description2: Rich, exotic notes of honey-glazed papaya and warm pear are accented by touches of white flower, graham cracker and lemon custard. The palate feels round and weighty, with flavors that aren't as effusive as one might expect. Acids provide enough spine to keep the palate from drooping, with hints of clove and lemongrass adding interest. A blend of 55% Chardonnay, 45% Viognier. White Blend US Virginia Virginia Tarara

description: This has acidity and tannins that are rich and complex. The raspberry, cola and licorice flavors have a nice coating of smoky oak.
title: The Gardener 2011 Pinot Noir (Carneros)
description2: This has acidity and tannins that are rich and complex. The raspberry, cola and licorice flavors have a nice coating of smoky oak. Pinot Noir US California Carneros The Gardener

description: This is dry, full bodied and pretty tannic, with a sense of elegance, plus flavors of sour cherry candy, red licorice, tobacco and sweet, smoky cedar.
title: Turnbull 2009 Leopoldina Cabernet Franc (Oakville)
description2: This is dry, full bodied and pretty tannic, with a sense of elegance, plus flavors of sour cherry candy, red licorice, tobacco and sweet, smoky cedar. Cabernet Franc US California Oakville Turnbull

description: This has a firmly tannic structure and juicy fruit, suggesting its aging potential. It is rich and ripe, with black cherry and plum flavors that create a generous finish.
title: Vignerons de Bel Air 2011 Domaine de la Source  (Chiroubles)
description2: This has a firmly tannic structure and juicy fruit, suggesting its aging potential. It is rich and ripe, with black cherry and plum flavors that create a generous finish. Gamay France Beaujolais Chiroubles Vignerons de Bel Air

description: The light-framed aromas of strawberry and raspberry are clean and citrusy. The palate on this wine made by the Chablis-based producer Laroche is crisp, tangy and juicy, with flavors of raspberry and cranberry that are fresh and tight. A clean, honest Pinot to enjoy now.
title: Laroche 2010 Viña Punto Alto Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
description2: The light-framed aromas of strawberry and raspberry are clean and citrusy. The palate on this wine made by the Chablis-based producer Laroche is crisp, tangy and juicy, with flavors of raspberry and cranberry that are fresh and tight. A clean, honest Pinot to enjoy now. Pinot Noir Chile Casablanca Valley  Laroche

description: Sporting a much-improved label design, the 2009 Natasha brings pungent, assertive scents of tomato leaf, pepper and moist earth. Sharp and focused, the fruit is there, though it's the leaf and earth components that stand out. For its earthy style, it's a well-made and complex offering.
title: Youngberg Hill Vineyards 2009 Natasha Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
description2: Sporting a much-improved label design, the 2009 Natasha brings pungent, assertive scents of tomato leaf, pepper and moist earth. Sharp and focused, the fruit is there, though it's the leaf and earth components that stand out. For its earthy style, it's a well-made and complex offering. Pinot Noir US Oregon Willamette Valley Youngberg Hill Vineyards

description: Cherry and blackberry notes dominate this ripe, full wine. It has a smoky, toasty character that lends good balance and aging potential. The estate is planted with Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon.
title: Château de Bordes-Quancard 2010  Bordeaux
description2: Cherry and blackberry notes dominate this ripe, full wine. It has a smoky, toasty character that lends good balance and aging potential. The estate is planted with Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Château de Bordes-Quancard

description: Tough tannins set the scene for this firm and extracted wine, giving it a smokiness and a touch of bitter fruit. However, the wine has the weight to support the tannins, and it hints at future juicy fruit. Keep this for at least five years.
title: Château de Panigon 2010  Médoc
description2: Tough tannins set the scene for this firm and extracted wine, giving it a smokiness and a touch of bitter fruit. However, the wine has the weight to support the tannins, and it hints at future juicy fruit. Keep this for at least five years. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Médoc Château de Panigon

description: Showing a mineral-driven structure and firm tannins, this is a Beaujolais that needs to age. Rich and juicy, its perfumed red fruits currently cut through the dry tannins.
title: Château de Raousset 2011  Chiroubles
description2: Showing a mineral-driven structure and firm tannins, this is a Beaujolais that needs to age. Rich and juicy, its perfumed red fruits currently cut through the dry tannins. Gamay France Beaujolais Chiroubles Château de Raousset

description: This is full of crisp, herbaceous flavors of apple, grapefruit and lime. It has weight and concentration, with some richness to its freshness. Acidity cuts through on the finish. Age this for 2–3 years.
title: Château Tour des Gendres 2011 Cuvée des Contis White (Bergerac Sec)
description2: This is full of crisp, herbaceous flavors of apple, grapefruit and lime. It has weight and concentration, with some richness to its freshness. Acidity cuts through on the finish. Age this for 2–3 years. Bordeaux-style White Blend France Southwest France Bergerac Sec Château Tour des Gendres

description: Made from Nerello Mascalese and Nerello Cappuccio, this shows bright berry aromas of blackberry and cassis, with cola, dried ginger and polished mineral notes. The mouthfeel is clean and bright, with a touch of chopped mint.
title: Cottanera 2011 Barbazzale  (Etna)
description2: Made from Nerello Mascalese and Nerello Cappuccio, this shows bright berry aromas of blackberry and cassis, with cola, dried ginger and polished mineral notes. The mouthfeel is clean and bright, with a touch of chopped mint. Red Blend Italy Sicily & Sardinia Etna Cottanera

description: At just 12.6% alcohol, this might seem underripe for warm climate varieties, but it tastes perfectly full and nicely balanced. It's tart and lemony, to be sure, and in fact makes a fine accompaniment to fresh-shucked oysters.
title: Cowhorn 2011 Marsanne-Roussanne (Applegate Valley)
description2: At just 12.6% alcohol, this might seem underripe for warm climate varieties, but it tastes perfectly full and nicely balanced. It's tart and lemony, to be sure, and in fact makes a fine accompaniment to fresh-shucked oysters. Marsanne-Roussanne US Oregon Applegate Valley Cowhorn

description: This is the most complete of the four Prince Hill clonal selection bottlings. It has flavors of cherry, Dr. Pepper, cherry candy and a hint of incense. It's a pleasant, easy-drinking wine best consumed while still young.
title: Erath 2010 Prince Hill Pommard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
description2: This is the most complete of the four Prince Hill clonal selection bottlings. It has flavors of cherry, Dr. Pepper, cherry candy and a hint of incense. It's a pleasant, easy-drinking wine best consumed while still young. Pinot Noir US Oregon Dundee Hills Erath

description: This is the second wine of Château de Mercuès, and it has some of the same concentration and tannins as the first wine, without the huge and powerful structure. It will develop its black cherry and spice flavors relatively quickly, to yield a ready-to-drink wine in 2–3 years.
designation: Château de Mercuès Le Vassal de Mercuès
title: Georges Vigouroux 2010 Château de Mercuès Le Vassal de Mercuès Malbec (Cahors)
description2: This is the second wine of Château de Mercuès, and it has some of the same concentration and tannins as the first wine, without the huge and powerful structure. It will develop its black cherry and spice flavors relatively quickly, to yield a ready-to-drink wine in 2–3 years. Malbec France Southwest France Cahors Georges Vigouroux

description: This offers ripe cherry and blackberry notes, followed by bright acidity and a palate that bears medium density. It's a great food wine to pair with breaded veal, sausage or meatloaf.
title: Leone de Castris 2010 Elo Veni Negroamaro (Salento)
description2: This offers ripe cherry and blackberry notes, followed by bright acidity and a palate that bears medium density. It's a great food wine to pair with breaded veal, sausage or meatloaf. Negroamaro Italy Southern Italy Salento Leone de Castris

description: This best-of-barrels Chardonnay is oaky, offering waves of butterscotch and buttered toast that dominate the tart underlying flavors of pineapple and lime. It's certainly rich and well-structured, but quite oaky.
title: Pessagno 2010 Intrinity Chardonnay (Santa Lucia Highlands)
description2: This best-of-barrels Chardonnay is oaky, offering waves of butterscotch and buttered toast that dominate the tart underlying flavors of pineapple and lime. It's certainly rich and well-structured, but quite oaky. Chardonnay US California Santa Lucia Highlands Pessagno

description: Soft, sweet and appealing, this has raspberry and cherry jam flavors, with an oak-influenced note of buttered toast. It's an easy, gentle wine, with some real depth and complexity.
title: Pessagno 2010 Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
description2: Soft, sweet and appealing, this has raspberry and cherry jam flavors, with an oak-influenced note of buttered toast. It's an easy, gentle wine, with some real depth and complexity. Pinot Noir US California Santa Lucia Highlands Pessagno

description: This smells deep and bass-like, with resonating notes of honeyed white currant, spiced breakfast toast and apricot preserves, accented with touches of caramel and toasted nut. It feels round, rich and opulent, with a nice lift of acids that give the wine some spring.
title: Potomac Point 2010 Richland Reserve Chardonnay (Virginia)
description2: This smells deep and bass-like, with resonating notes of honeyed white currant, spiced breakfast toast and apricot preserves, accented with touches of caramel and toasted nut. It feels round, rich and opulent, with a nice lift of acids that give the wine some spring. Chardonnay US Virginia Virginia Potomac Point

description: This Syrah offers bright tones of leather, cured meat and blackberry. Smooth and long-lasting, the palate boasts loads of bright berries.
title: Principi di Spadafora 2007 Schietto Syrah (Sicilia)
description2: This Syrah offers bright tones of leather, cured meat and blackberry. Smooth and long-lasting, the palate boasts loads of bright berries. Syrah Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Principi di Spadafora

description: An exotic, spicy Pinot Noir, this is medium-bodied and crisp, with complex cranberry, raspberry, red licorice and smoky sandalwood flavors. Drink this dry, silky effort now.
title: Renteria 2009 Knittel Vineyard Pinot Noir (Carneros)
description2: An exotic, spicy Pinot Noir, this is medium-bodied and crisp, with complex cranberry, raspberry, red licorice and smoky sandalwood flavors. Drink this dry, silky effort now. Pinot Noir US California Carneros Renteria

description: A blend of Grenache, Syrah, Cinsault and Counoise, this is bone dry and brisk in acidity, with complex flavors of mineral, herb, sour cherry candy, red currant and white pepper. Although production was only 2,000 cases, this wine is worth the search.
title: Robert Hall 2011 Rhône de Robles Red (Paso Robles)
description2: A blend of Grenache, Syrah, Cinsault and Counoise, this is bone dry and brisk in acidity, with complex flavors of mineral, herb, sour cherry candy, red currant and white pepper. Although production was only 2,000 cases, this wine is worth the search. Rhône-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Robert Hall

description: For a Morgon, this is relatively light, showing more fruit than structure, with freshness that's tempered by a firm edge and minerality. Keep for a year, or drink now.
title: Signé Vigneron 2011 Domaine de l'Oseraie  (Morgon)
description2: For a Morgon, this is relatively light, showing more fruit than structure, with freshness that's tempered by a firm edge and minerality. Keep for a year, or drink now. Gamay France Beaujolais Morgon Signé Vigneron

description: Berry and cherry aromas are surprisingly sturdy and clean. Freshness is maintained on the palate, which is honest enough to offer modest tannic bite. Lightly spiced plum and raspberry flavors change little on an easy finish.
region_1: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla
title: Felix Solis 2013 Flirty Bird Syrah (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
address: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla, Central Spain, Spain
description2: Berry and cherry aromas are surprisingly sturdy and clean. Freshness is maintained on the palate, which is honest enough to offer modest tannic bite. Lightly spiced plum and raspberry flavors change little on an easy finish. Syrah Spain Central Spain Vino de la Tierra de Castilla Felix Solis

description: Gritty aromas of stewed berry, lemony oak, green herbs and tin set up a tannic, chewy, highly extracted palate that's lacking in elegance. Flavors of chocolate, green herbs, blueberry, vanilla and plastic finish oaky and creamy, with lasting heat.
title: Marionette 2012 Monastrell-Syrah (Jumilla)
description2: Gritty aromas of stewed berry, lemony oak, green herbs and tin set up a tannic, chewy, highly extracted palate that's lacking in elegance. Flavors of chocolate, green herbs, blueberry, vanilla and plastic finish oaky and creamy, with lasting heat. Monastrell-Syrah Spain Levante Jumilla Marionette

description: This is serviceable but rather bland, with a dusting of cinnamon spice and simple, tart fruit.
title: Wildewood 2013 Chardonnay (Willamette Valley)
description2: This is serviceable but rather bland, with a dusting of cinnamon spice and simple, tart fruit. Chardonnay US Oregon Willamette Valley Wildewood

description: A lightly fruity wine that has a soft texture, gentle acidity and a perfumed aftertaste. It is ready to drink with its steely backbone well enmeshed in the fruitiness.
title: Wunsch & Mann 2012 Roi Clovis Riesling (Alsace)
description2: A lightly fruity wine that has a soft texture, gentle acidity and a perfumed aftertaste. It is ready to drink with its steely backbone well enmeshed in the fruitiness. Riesling France Alsace Alsace Wunsch & Mann

description: Initial plum and berry aromas fall off with airing and reveal notes of chemical and chewing gum dust. On the palate, this blend of 60% Malbec and 40% Tannat is chewy, sticky and flat. Modest but sweet berry flavors veer toward molasses prior to finishing without much acidity or verve.
title: Ricominciare 2010 Malbec-Tannat (Uco Valley)
description2: Initial plum and berry aromas fall off with airing and reveal notes of chemical and chewing gum dust. On the palate, this blend of 60% Malbec and 40% Tannat is chewy, sticky and flat. Modest but sweet berry flavors veer toward molasses prior to finishing without much acidity or verve. Malbec-Tannat Argentina Mendoza Province Uco Valley Ricominciare

description: Aromas of latex, plastic, clove and wild berry fruits try to come together. A hard, high-acid palate is narrow and choppy, with biting tannins, while a salty flavor profile that includes blackberry finishes woody and savory, with a lasting taste of clove.
title: Ricominciare 2011 Malbec-Cabernet Franc (Uco Valley)
description2: Aromas of latex, plastic, clove and wild berry fruits try to come together. A hard, high-acid palate is narrow and choppy, with biting tannins, while a salty flavor profile that includes blackberry finishes woody and savory, with a lasting taste of clove. Malbec-Cabernet Franc Argentina Mendoza Province Uco Valley Ricominciare

description: Gritty, roasted berry aromas are rubbery and hint at Band-Aids. In the mouth, this is O.K. in feel, albeit a bit jammy and thick. Short, generic berry flavors come with minty accents and some green on the finish.
title: Rutini 2012 Trumpeter Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
description2: Gritty, roasted berry aromas are rubbery and hint at Band-Aids. In the mouth, this is O.K. in feel, albeit a bit jammy and thick. Short, generic berry flavors come with minty accents and some green on the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Rutini

description: Lemon curd and artificial butter show on the nose and palate, with underripe peach adding verve to a creamy body.
title: Chatham 2012 Church Creek Oak Chardonnay (Virginia's Eastern Shore)
description2: Lemon curd and artificial butter show on the nose and palate, with underripe peach adding verve to a creamy body. Chardonnay US Virginia Virginia's Eastern Shore Chatham

description: This full-throttle, oaky Chardonnay features an intriguingly curious mix of corn nuts, diesel and marijuana on the nose. The corresponding layers of flavor are straightforward and simple.
title: McIlroy 2013 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: This full-throttle, oaky Chardonnay features an intriguingly curious mix of corn nuts, diesel and marijuana on the nose. The corresponding layers of flavor are straightforward and simple. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley McIlroy

description: Despite its single-vineyard designation, this watery effort could be from anywhere. Thin, dilute, barely ripe strawberry fruit vanishes quickly once in the mouth, and there is little trace of any barrel flavors from aging in 20% new French oak.
title: Wildewood 2013 Guadalupe Vineyard Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
description2: Despite its single-vineyard designation, this watery effort could be from anywhere. Thin, dilute, barely ripe strawberry fruit vanishes quickly once in the mouth, and there is little trace of any barrel flavors from aging in 20% new French oak. Pinot Noir US Oregon Willamette Valley Wildewood

description: Towards the dry end of the Pinot Gris spectrum, this is a crisp, apple and pear flavored wine that has a light character. It's fruity, crisp and ready to drink.
title: Cave de Beblenheim 2013 Réserve Particulière Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description2: Towards the dry end of the Pinot Gris spectrum, this is a crisp, apple and pear flavored wine that has a light character. It's fruity, crisp and ready to drink. Pinot Gris France Alsace Alsace Cave de Beblenheim

description: This wine has a light, fresh character to go with the ripe spiced fruits. It's smooth with a tangy lime-zest flavor filled out with yellow fruits. Drink now.
title: Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg 2013 Anne de K Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
description2: This wine has a light, fresh character to go with the ripe spiced fruits. It's smooth with a tangy lime-zest flavor filled out with yellow fruits. Drink now. Gewürztraminer France Alsace Alsace Cave de Kientzheim-Kaysersberg

description: The nose isn't very expressive but reveals white flower and tropical fruit. The simple palate delivers pineapple and lemon zest alongside brisk acidity.
title: Feudi del Pisciotto 2013 Baglio del Sole Inzolia (Sicilia)
description2: The nose isn't very expressive but reveals white flower and tropical fruit. The simple palate delivers pineapple and lemon zest alongside brisk acidity. Inzolia Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Feudi del Pisciotto

description: Dusty aromas of red cherry are muddled by oaky notes of plastic and latex. A jumpy, bright palate is rudimentary, as are lightly spiced plum and raspberry flavors. A fresh, dry, basic finish seems appropriate.
region_1: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla
title: Mureda 2012 Oak Aged Syrah (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
address: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla, Central Spain, Spain
description2: Dusty aromas of red cherry are muddled by oaky notes of plastic and latex. A jumpy, bright palate is rudimentary, as are lightly spiced plum and raspberry flavors. A fresh, dry, basic finish seems appropriate. Syrah Spain Central Spain Vino de la Tierra de Castilla Mureda

description: Dry, spicy aromas aren't overly ripe or expressive. In the mouth, this basic Cab is raw, racy and spiky in feel. Flavors of herbal red-berry fruits are leafy, while finishing flavors of carob and pepper register as adequate.
title: San Felipe 2012 Oak Cask Estate Bottled Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
description2: Dry, spicy aromas aren't overly ripe or expressive. In the mouth, this basic Cab is raw, racy and spiky in feel. Flavors of herbal red-berry fruits are leafy, while finishing flavors of carob and pepper register as adequate. Cabernet Sauvignon Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza San Felipe

description: Soft, floral and fruity, this is a rounded wine with a gentle texture, yellow fruits and light acidity. There is a good touch of spice to fill the wine out right at the end.
title: Vieil Armand 2013 Tradition Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
description2: Soft, floral and fruity, this is a rounded wine with a gentle texture, yellow fruits and light acidity. There is a good touch of spice to fill the wine out right at the end. Pinot Blanc France Alsace Alsace Vieil Armand

description: Underripe fruit seems more sour than anything. Some bitter, stemmy flavors creep into the finish.
title: Wine by Joe 2013 Pinot Noir (Oregon)
description2: Underripe fruit seems more sour than anything. Some bitter, stemmy flavors creep into the finish. Pinot Noir US Oregon Oregon Wine by Joe

description: Made from Castelão, the local grape of the Setúbal region, this wine is as bright and clean as possible. The light texture makes it ideal for summer drinking.
title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Azul Portugal Rosé (Península de Setúbal)
description2: Made from Castelão, the local grape of the Setúbal region, this wine is as bright and clean as possible. The light texture makes it ideal for summer drinking. Rosé Portugal Península de Setúbal  Wines & Winemakers

description: The style is all perfume, recalling straightforward lychee and spice wine. It has a rounded texture, soft and medium sweet, and is ready to be enjoyed.
title: Wunsch & Mann 2013 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
description2: The style is all perfume, recalling straightforward lychee and spice wine. It has a rounded texture, soft and medium sweet, and is ready to be enjoyed. Gewürztraminer France Alsace Alsace Wunsch & Mann

description: This is soft and easy in texture, light in flavors and slightly sweet. Light to medium bodied, it has very little tannin or astringency, is low in acidity and quiet on the finish.
title: Murphy-Goode 2012 HomeFront Red (California)
description2: This is soft and easy in texture, light in flavors and slightly sweet. Light to medium bodied, it has very little tannin or astringency, is low in acidity and quiet on the finish. Red Blend US California California Murphy-Goode

description: This is light, fruity and fresh for a Gewurztraminer. A crisp character brings out bitter orange and ripe pear flavors. Drink now.
title: Pierre Sparr 2013 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
description2: This is light, fruity and fresh for a Gewurztraminer. A crisp character brings out bitter orange and ripe pear flavors. Drink now. Gewürztraminer France Alsace Alsace Pierre Sparr

description: There's no mistaking the grape in this spiced and peppery wine. Candy-shop aromas and bergamot flavors go together with a light acidity to create a wine that's drinkable now.
title: Rieflé 2013 Bonheur Convivial Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
description2: There's no mistaking the grape in this spiced and peppery wine. Candy-shop aromas and bergamot flavors go together with a light acidity to create a wine that's drinkable now. Gewürztraminer France Alsace Alsace Rieflé

description: Amid the blackberry and asphalt tones, this has a funky rubber twist on the nose. The bottling is a side label of Avelina, founded by former Oreana Winery owner Christian Garvin. It's tart and sour on the palate, with dried raspberries and a bit more funk.
title: Sands Point 2012 Pinot Noir (Central Coast)
description2: Amid the blackberry and asphalt tones, this has a funky rubber twist on the nose. The bottling is a side label of Avelina, founded by former Oreana Winery owner Christian Garvin. It's tart and sour on the palate, with dried raspberries and a bit more funk. Pinot Noir US California Central Coast Sands Point

description: Dusty aromas of balloon rubber and apple juice are sketchy, but in the mouth this is fair and balanced. Flavors of lychee, mango candy and sweet papaya finish soft and lightly oxidized.
title: Árido 2013 Sustainably Farmed Moscato (Mendoza)
description2: Dusty aromas of balloon rubber and apple juice are sketchy, but in the mouth this is fair and balanced. Flavors of lychee, mango candy and sweet papaya finish soft and lightly oxidized. Moscato Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Árido

description: This wine is all about perfumes and spice. It's ripe, fruity and already drinkable. Bergamot and fruity candy dominate the light acidity and soft texture.
title: Arthur Metz 2013 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
description2: This wine is all about perfumes and spice. It's ripe, fruity and already drinkable. Bergamot and fruity candy dominate the light acidity and soft texture. Gewürztraminer France Alsace Alsace Arthur Metz

description: This wine is soft, rounded and smooth. With just enough acidity to give a fresh character, it is ripe with pear and quince flavors. It's ready to drink, light and fragrant.
title: Cave de Cleebourg 2013 Prestige Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description2: This wine is soft, rounded and smooth. With just enough acidity to give a fresh character, it is ripe with pear and quince flavors. It's ready to drink, light and fragrant. Pinot Gris France Alsace Alsace Cave de Cleebourg

description: Produced from a number of parcels around the village of Katzenthal, this is a fresh and fruity wine, easy to drink. It's bright with acidity, flavored with ripe quince and apple fruits. It's ready to drink.
title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2013 Cuvée Particulière Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description2: Produced from a number of parcels around the village of Katzenthal, this is a fresh and fruity wine, easy to drink. It's bright with acidity, flavored with ripe quince and apple fruits. It's ready to drink. Pinot Gris France Alsace Alsace Jean-Marc Bernhard

description: Made from Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Zinfandel, this is one of Rock Wall's drier, lower-alcohol wines. It's high in acidity, with a silky mouthfeel. A little rustic, it shows cherry skin, tobacco and white pepper flavors.
title: Rock Wall 2012 Super Alamedan Red (California)
description2: Made from Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Zinfandel, this is one of Rock Wall's drier, lower-alcohol wines. It's high in acidity, with a silky mouthfeel. A little rustic, it shows cherry skin, tobacco and white pepper flavors. Red Blend US California California Rock Wall

description: Ready for drinking now with its raspberries, currants, persimmons and oak. The acidity is bright, and the finish is clean and spicy. Pair now with lamb dishes.
title: Sanglier Cellars 2011 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: Ready for drinking now with its raspberries, currants, persimmons and oak. The acidity is bright, and the finish is clean and spicy. Pair now with lamb dishes. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley Sanglier Cellars

description: It's a midnight-black wine, full-bodied and tannic, with immense black currant, grilled meat and black pepper flavors that finish bone dry. Already throwing some sediment, it will live for two decades, without gaining in complexity. Drink now–2025.
title: Santa Barbara Winery 2010 Petite Sirah (Santa Barbara County)
description2: It's a midnight-black wine, full-bodied and tannic, with immense black currant, grilled meat and black pepper flavors that finish bone dry. Already throwing some sediment, it will live for two decades, without gaining in complexity. Drink now–2025. Petite Sirah US California Santa Barbara County Santa Barbara Winery

description: Coming from the cool 2010 vintage, this 100% varietal wine doesn't quite seem to have fully ripened but still offers plenty of enjoyment with its savory notes of leafy herbs, olive and cherry. It's elegant in its styling with a fresh feel and a cinnamon-speckled finish.
title: Schmidt 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Applegate Valley)
description2: Coming from the cool 2010 vintage, this 100% varietal wine doesn't quite seem to have fully ripened but still offers plenty of enjoyment with its savory notes of leafy herbs, olive and cherry. It's elegant in its styling with a fresh feel and a cinnamon-speckled finish. Cabernet Sauvignon US Oregon Applegate Valley Schmidt

description: Spicy and savory, it offers aromas of white and black pepper along with raspberry, dark cherry and hints of bell pepper that carry over to the palate along with aggressive tannins. Drink 2015–2021.
title: Tenuta Luisa 2011 Refosco (Venezia Giulia)
description2: Spicy and savory, it offers aromas of white and black pepper along with raspberry, dark cherry and hints of bell pepper that carry over to the palate along with aggressive tannins. Drink 2015–2021. Refosco Italy Northeastern Italy Venezia Giulia Tenuta Luisa

description: Sourced from a single vineyard, this spent 17 months in French oak, 38% new. It's light and spicy, with pleasant fruit flavors of apple and pear.
title: Willamette Valley Vineyards 2011 Elton Chardonnay (Eola-Amity Hills)
description2: Sourced from a single vineyard, this spent 17 months in French oak, 38% new. It's light and spicy, with pleasant fruit flavors of apple and pear. Chardonnay US Oregon Eola-Amity Hills Willamette Valley Vineyards

description: Reedy berry aromas mixed with herbal notes set up a chunky, voluminous palate. Spicy flavors of olive, green herbs, tobacco and oak run alongside berry and plum fruit. On the finish, a resiny oak flavor and herbal notes meld then fade away. This is 55% Carmenère, 30% Petit Verdot and 15% Syrah.
title: Santa Alicia 2010 Anke Blend 2 Carménère-Petit Verdot-Shiraz Red (Maipo Valley)
description2: Reedy berry aromas mixed with herbal notes set up a chunky, voluminous palate. Spicy flavors of olive, green herbs, tobacco and oak run alongside berry and plum fruit. On the finish, a resiny oak flavor and herbal notes meld then fade away. This is 55% Carmenère, 30% Petit Verdot and 15% Syrah. Red Blend Chile Maipo Valley  Santa Alicia

description: With touches of vanilla and caramel as well as ripe yellow fruits, this is a warm, generous Chardonnay. It has freshness from the citrus edge and a soft texture. Straightforward, it is an open and ready-to-drink wine.
title: Louis Jadot 2012  Mâcon-Villages
description2: With touches of vanilla and caramel as well as ripe yellow fruits, this is a warm, generous Chardonnay. It has freshness from the citrus edge and a soft texture. Straightforward, it is an open and ready-to-drink wine. Chardonnay France Burgundy Mâcon-Villages Louis Jadot

description: A familiar Chilean mix of berry, plum, spice and herbal aromas feed into a lifted but prickly palate that supports roasted, earthy flavors of berry, cassis and olive. A racy, slightly rough finish is home to spicy, chocolaty flavors on top of residual herbal berry.
title: Mancura 2010 Gran Reserva Petit Verdot-Carmère-Cabernet Sauvignon Red (Maipo Valley)
description2: A familiar Chilean mix of berry, plum, spice and herbal aromas feed into a lifted but prickly palate that supports roasted, earthy flavors of berry, cassis and olive. A racy, slightly rough finish is home to spicy, chocolaty flavors on top of residual herbal berry. Bordeaux-style Red Blend Chile Maipo Valley  Mancura

description: Aromas include white spring flowers, tropical fruit and a hint of graphite. The juicy palate offers green apples, white peach and melon alongside fresh acidity. Delicate almond marks the close.
title: Montonale 2012 Montunal  (Lugana)
description2: Aromas include white spring flowers, tropical fruit and a hint of graphite. The juicy palate offers green apples, white peach and melon alongside fresh acidity. Delicate almond marks the close. Turbiana Italy Lombardy Lugana Montonale

description: A fifty-fifty blend of Sangiovese and Syrah, this densely concentrated wine has aromas that suggest underbrush, wet leaves, black berries and prune. The palate delivers fleshy black cherry, raisin, black pepper, espresso, bitter dark chocolate and a sugary vanilla note alongside solid tannins. It's at its ideal drinking window so enjoy soon.
title: Olivi 2008 Memento Red (Toscana)
description2: A fifty-fifty blend of Sangiovese and Syrah, this densely concentrated wine has aromas that suggest underbrush, wet leaves, black berries and prune. The palate delivers fleshy black cherry, raisin, black pepper, espresso, bitter dark chocolate and a sugary vanilla note alongside solid tannins. It's at its ideal drinking window so enjoy soon. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Toscana Olivi

description: With brisk acidity, a bone-dry finish and some dusty tannins, this is an interesting Pinot Noir, with a silky texture and cherry jam, pomegranate and cranberry flavors that are ready to drink now.
title: Publix 2012 Premium Limited Edition Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: With brisk acidity, a bone-dry finish and some dusty tannins, this is an interesting Pinot Noir, with a silky texture and cherry jam, pomegranate and cranberry flavors that are ready to drink now. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley Publix

description: Very Douro in its mineral texture and dry core, it also has a surround of ripe black fruits. It's concentrated and has some aging potential, although it can be drunk now.
title: Quinta de Porrais 2010 Porrais Red (Douro)
description2: Very Douro in its mineral texture and dry core, it also has a surround of ripe black fruits. It's concentrated and has some aging potential, although it can be drunk now. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Quinta de Porrais

description: Dry and tannic, this 100% Cab has flavors of herbs, blackberries and tea. It's a tough wine not showing generosity now. You can age for a couple years, but the tannins will outlast the fruit.
title: Rodney Strong 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
description2: Dry and tannic, this 100% Cab has flavors of herbs, blackberries and tea. It's a tough wine not showing generosity now. You can age for a couple years, but the tannins will outlast the fruit. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Alexander Valley Rodney Strong

description: This Syrah, Grenache and Mourvèdre blend shows hot alcohol and superripe flavors of blackberries, cassis, dark chocolate and raisins. It's a big, rich, thick wine that sticks to the gums, almost syrupy, but fully dry. Decant it and drink with stews, casseroles, barbecue.
title: Star Angel by Montes 2009 Aurelio's Selection Red (Paso Robles)
description2: This Syrah, Grenache and Mourvèdre blend shows hot alcohol and superripe flavors of blackberries, cassis, dark chocolate and raisins. It's a big, rich, thick wine that sticks to the gums, almost syrupy, but fully dry. Decant it and drink with stews, casseroles, barbecue. Rhône-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Star Angel by Montes

description: Floral aromas of white spring flowers partner hints of pear and stone fruit. The juicy palate offers white peach, apple and green melon alongside a mineral note and fresh acidity.
title: Cantina del Castello 2013 Castello  (Soave Classico)
description2: Floral aromas of white spring flowers partner hints of pear and stone fruit. The juicy palate offers white peach, apple and green melon alongside a mineral note and fresh acidity. White Blend Italy Veneto Soave Classico Cantina del Castello

description: Subdued aromas recall Alpine wild flowers and lychee. The fresh, linear palate offers Golden Delicious apples and citrus notes with a hint of wax alongside crisp acidity.
title: Castelfeder 2012 Vom Stein Pinot Bianco (Alto Adige)
description2: Subdued aromas recall Alpine wild flowers and lychee. The fresh, linear palate offers Golden Delicious apples and citrus notes with a hint of wax alongside crisp acidity. Pinot Bianco Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Castelfeder

description: A dense and rich, jammy Merlot that is full of black fruit and has an ultra-ripe feel. It is hardly Bordeaux, but it does hold attraction with its rich, full fruits and dense tannins. A smoke and bitter chocolate aftertaste suggests some firm extraction.
title: Château Magondeau 2010  Fronsac
description2: A dense and rich, jammy Merlot that is full of black fruit and has an ultra-ripe feel. It is hardly Bordeaux, but it does hold attraction with its rich, full fruits and dense tannins. A smoke and bitter chocolate aftertaste suggests some firm extraction. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Fronsac Château Magondeau

description: This is a balanced wine, moving easily between rich fruit and a tight mineral and grapefruit texture. There is a hint of toast to give extra weight. Worth aging for several years.
title: Drappier 2002 Millésime Exception Brut  (Champagne)
description2: This is a balanced wine, moving easily between rich fruit and a tight mineral and grapefruit texture. There is a hint of toast to give extra weight. Worth aging for several years. Champagne Blend France Champagne Champagne Drappier

description: Earns a high score for sheer richness and decadance. Huge in blackberry, blueberry, cassis, dark chocolate, bacon, pepper and oak flavors, wrapped into big, velvety tannins. Impresses for its size, but is totally dry, and retains balance and elegance. Now–2015.
title: Falcone 2008 Syrah (Paso Robles)
description2: Earns a high score for sheer richness and decadance. Huge in blackberry, blueberry, cassis, dark chocolate, bacon, pepper and oak flavors, wrapped into big, velvety tannins. Impresses for its size, but is totally dry, and retains balance and elegance. Now–2015. Syrah US California Paso Robles Falcone

description: Barolo Gramolere offers an attractive window onto the Nebbiolo grape with peek views at its inherent complexity and elegance. The wine opens with a ruby-garnet color and offers aromas of wild berry, white cherry, tar, licorice, hazelnut and ginger.
title: Fratelli Alessandria 2006 Gramolere  (Barolo)
description2: Barolo Gramolere offers an attractive window onto the Nebbiolo grape with peek views at its inherent complexity and elegance. The wine opens with a ruby-garnet color and offers aromas of wild berry, white cherry, tar, licorice, hazelnut and ginger. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Fratelli Alessandria

description: Barolo Bricco delle Viole is a lush and generous wine with a bright ruby color and attractively intense aromas of cherry, wild berry, nutmeg, clove, powdered licorice and root beer. The oak influence is still obvious at this early stage, but will no doubt integrate with time. The mouthfeel is exceedingly soft, smooth and velvety. You don't need to wait too many years before uncorking this bottle.
title: G D Vajra 2006 Bricco delle Viole  (Barolo)
description2: Barolo Bricco delle Viole is a lush and generous wine with a bright ruby color and attractively intense aromas of cherry, wild berry, nutmeg, clove, powdered licorice and root beer. The oak influence is still obvious at this early stage, but will no doubt integrate with time. The mouthfeel is exceedingly soft, smooth and velvety. You don't need to wait too many years before uncorking this bottle. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo G D Vajra

description: Very different from the Bricco delle Viole cru expression from the same producer, this wine offers bold, ripe fruit with lingering tones of red cherry, leather, charcoal and campfire. The fruit is thick and succulent and the finish offers sweet, succulent spice flavors. Multiple U.S. importers.
title: G D Vajra 2006 Luigi Baudana Cerretta  (Barolo)
description2: Very different from the Bricco delle Viole cru expression from the same producer, this wine offers bold, ripe fruit with lingering tones of red cherry, leather, charcoal and campfire. The fruit is thick and succulent and the finish offers sweet, succulent spice flavors. Multiple U.S. importers. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo G D Vajra

description: Very rich in texture while also balanced, this is a wine that shows extreme concentration—honey, yellow fruits and final sugar all wrapped in lively acidity.
title: Zull 2006 Beerenauslese 375ml Riesling (Niederösterreich)
description2: Very rich in texture while also balanced, this is a wine that shows extreme concentration—honey, yellow fruits and final sugar all wrapped in lively acidity. Riesling Austria Niederösterreich  Zull

description: Intense acidity, with the sweetness held in check by a bright, crisp character. Rich honey is balanced by an exquisite freshness, lightly perfumed, so clean and clear in final taste.
title: Zull 2008 Eiswein 375ml Riesling (Niederösterreich)
description2: Intense acidity, with the sweetness held in check by a bright, crisp character. Rich honey is balanced by an exquisite freshness, lightly perfumed, so clean and clear in final taste. Riesling Austria Niederösterreich  Zull

description: Both crisp and rich, a magical combination with beautiful acidity, light currants, the whole wine infused with honey. The final acidity leaves a long-lasting aftertaste.
title: Norbert Bauer 2008 Eiswein 375ml Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
description2: Both crisp and rich, a magical combination with beautiful acidity, light currants, the whole wine infused with honey. The final acidity leaves a long-lasting aftertaste. Grüner Veltliner Austria Niederösterreich  Norbert Bauer

description: A beautifully accessible wine, polished, pretty and likeable now for its gentle texture and silky tannins. The sweet cherry and raspberry fruit is encircled with a coat of fancy smoked oak. Made from 100% Cabernet, the wine is balanced enough to gain bottle complexity for a decade.
title: Sawyer 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
description2: A beautifully accessible wine, polished, pretty and likeable now for its gentle texture and silky tannins. The sweet cherry and raspberry fruit is encircled with a coat of fancy smoked oak. Made from 100% Cabernet, the wine is balanced enough to gain bottle complexity for a decade. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Rutherford Sawyer

description: Here's a powerful Cabernet Sauvignon, ripe and opulent, offering summer blackberry, sour cherry candy, currant, dried herb and rose petal aromas and flavors. The addition of 21% Merlot brings a candied softness, but it's still pretty tannic, and wants 4–5 years in the cellar.
title: Sullivan 2007 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
description2: Here's a powerful Cabernet Sauvignon, ripe and opulent, offering summer blackberry, sour cherry candy, currant, dried herb and rose petal aromas and flavors. The addition of 21% Merlot brings a candied softness, but it's still pretty tannic, and wants 4–5 years in the cellar. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Rutherford Sullivan

description: Here's a very attractive and seductive Barolo with chiseled mineral tones that really help the wine stand out in a crowd. Layers of graphite and slate give purity, linearity and clarity to this austere and elegant expression. Earthy tones, as well as forest berry flavors, appear on the long finish.
title: Tenuta Arnulfo 2006 Costa di Bussia  (Barolo)
description2: Here's a very attractive and seductive Barolo with chiseled mineral tones that really help the wine stand out in a crowd. Layers of graphite and slate give purity, linearity and clarity to this austere and elegant expression. Earthy tones, as well as forest berry flavors, appear on the long finish. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Tenuta Arnulfo

description: Founded in 1986, Tenuta Rocca is a hilltop property in Monforte d'Alba that overlooks some of the most beautiful landscapes in the Langhe. This wonderful Barolo opens with sweet smells of candle wax, nutmeg, ginger, chocolate and bright red fruit. The wine imparts a squeaky clean, polished feel in the mouth.
title: Tenuta Rocca 2006  Barolo
description2: Founded in 1986, Tenuta Rocca is a hilltop property in Monforte d'Alba that overlooks some of the most beautiful landscapes in the Langhe. This wonderful Barolo opens with sweet smells of candle wax, nutmeg, ginger, chocolate and bright red fruit. The wine imparts a squeaky clean, polished feel in the mouth. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Tenuta Rocca

description: The prized Cannubi cru offers fruit that is interpreted by some of the finest winemakers in northern Italy. This expression from the dynamic Damilano winery is characterized by tight tannins, power, personality and ripe berry flavors. Pair this Barolo with risotto topped with thinly shaved truffles.
title: Damilano 2006 Cannubi  (Barolo)
description2: The prized Cannubi cru offers fruit that is interpreted by some of the finest winemakers in northern Italy. This expression from the dynamic Damilano winery is characterized by tight tannins, power, personality and ripe berry flavors. Pair this Barolo with risotto topped with thinly shaved truffles. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Damilano

description: This brilliant Sauvignon Blanc should be scooped up by sommeliers. It's exceptionally dry and tart in citrusy acids, with a mineral scour that's perfect for shellfish or savory appetizers. The flavors are of lemons, limes, gooseberries and white pepper. Beautiful and compelling.
title: Broman 2008 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
description2: This brilliant Sauvignon Blanc should be scooped up by sommeliers. It's exceptionally dry and tart in citrusy acids, with a mineral scour that's perfect for shellfish or savory appetizers. The flavors are of lemons, limes, gooseberries and white pepper. Beautiful and compelling. Sauvignon Blanc US California Napa Valley Broman

description: From 100% grand cru Chardonnay vineyards in the Côte des Blancs, this is a rich but almost bone-dry wine. It has a great mineral character that offers freshness, apple skins and a flinty edge. The disgorgement date is indicated on the bottle. Impressive, this would benefit from six months' aging.
title: De Sousa & Fils NV Réserve Blanc de Blancs Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
description2: From 100% grand cru Chardonnay vineyards in the Côte des Blancs, this is a rich but almost bone-dry wine. It has a great mineral character that offers freshness, apple skins and a flinty edge. The disgorgement date is indicated on the bottle. Impressive, this would benefit from six months' aging. Chardonnay France Champagne Champagne De Sousa & Fils

description: From a cool part of the valley, this wine is marked by fresh acids that give it a grapey jamminess. It's very rich in black cherries, black raspberries and toast, and very dry. Feels sharp and angular now. Give it through 2010 to calm down.
title: Dutton-Goldfield 2007 Dutton Ranch-Freestone Hill Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: From a cool part of the valley, this wine is marked by fresh acids that give it a grapey jamminess. It's very rich in black cherries, black raspberries and toast, and very dry. Feels sharp and angular now. Give it through 2010 to calm down. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley Dutton-Goldfield

description: A beautiful Gewürz that could get more people to drink this Alsatian variety. It's dry and crisp, with rich flavors of citrus and tropical fruits, honeysuckle flowers, lychee nuts, vanilla and Asian spices.
title: Dutton-Goldfield 2008 Dutton Ranch-Green Valley Vineyard Gewürztraminer (Green Valley)
description2: A beautiful Gewürz that could get more people to drink this Alsatian variety. It's dry and crisp, with rich flavors of citrus and tropical fruits, honeysuckle flowers, lychee nuts, vanilla and Asian spices. Gewürztraminer US California Green Valley Dutton-Goldfield

description: You want black pepper? You'll get plenty of it in this dry, interesting Rhône blend of Mourvèdre and Syrah. It has briary flavors of wild blackberries, with an edge of leather, tobacco and herbs, and is thoroughly dry. Pretty tannic, too. An interesting wine, and one to watch.
title: Twisted Oak 2007 River of Skulls Dalton Vineyard Red (Calaveras County)
description2: You want black pepper? You'll get plenty of it in this dry, interesting Rhône blend of Mourvèdre and Syrah. It has briary flavors of wild blackberries, with an edge of leather, tobacco and herbs, and is thoroughly dry. Pretty tannic, too. An interesting wine, and one to watch. Rhône-style Red Blend US California Calaveras County Twisted Oak

description: A very fine Cabernet, dry and firm, but it needs a little time in the cellar. Astringent now, it has a deep core of black currants and cedar, with the polished tannins that Napa so easily crafts. Try between 2010–2012.
title: Waypoint 2006 Beckstoffer Missouri Hopper Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: A very fine Cabernet, dry and firm, but it needs a little time in the cellar. Astringent now, it has a deep core of black currants and cedar, with the polished tannins that Napa so easily crafts. Try between 2010–2012. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Waypoint

description: Much improved, with different vineyard sources than in 2004, this strong, varietal Cabernet mixes cassis, black cherry, light herb and hints of moist earth. Aging for 18 months in new French oak brings in coffee and chocolate, balanced and subtly displayed. Nice details of leaf and leather run richly into the tannins.
title: Whitman Cellars 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: Much improved, with different vineyard sources than in 2004, this strong, varietal Cabernet mixes cassis, black cherry, light herb and hints of moist earth. Aging for 18 months in new French oak brings in coffee and chocolate, balanced and subtly displayed. Nice details of leaf and leather run richly into the tannins. Cabernet Sauvignon US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Whitman Cellars

description: A good Cab, dry and balanced, whose tannins are richly impressive and sweet. Shows a good tension between the oak and the ripe black currants. Easy to like, and should develop for a few years.
title: Wild Oak by St. Francis 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
description2: A good Cab, dry and balanced, whose tannins are richly impressive and sweet. Shows a good tension between the oak and the ripe black currants. Easy to like, and should develop for a few years. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Sonoma County Wild Oak by St. Francis

description: Elegantly structured, with firm tannins, a silky texture and a fine balance of fruit, acidity and oak. Shows cherry, red currant, cola and sandalwood flavors that are delicious, but those tannins close in on the finish, making the wine hard. Try after 2011.
title: Alma Rosa 2007 La Encantada Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: Elegantly structured, with firm tannins, a silky texture and a fine balance of fruit, acidity and oak. Shows cherry, red currant, cola and sandalwood flavors that are delicious, but those tannins close in on the finish, making the wine hard. Try after 2011. Pinot Noir US California Sta. Rita Hills Alma Rosa

description: A 50/50 blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, this shows big fruity flavors tempered with a dry core of tannins. There is a stalky element of black currant skins which adds to the sensation of dryness, but there is also a more mouthfilling character of black plum juice to give the wine a final roundness.
title: Vieux Château Gaubert 2005  Graves
description2: A 50/50 blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, this shows big fruity flavors tempered with a dry core of tannins. There is a stalky element of black currant skins which adds to the sensation of dryness, but there is also a more mouthfilling character of black plum juice to give the wine a final roundness. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Graves Vieux Château Gaubert

description: Tangy berry/black cherry fruit is backed with lots of acid and hints of earthy funk. It's not vegetal but it is definitely herbal, a complex and flavorful reserve that falls right between Balboa's regular Syrah and the Sayulita.
title: Balboa 2007 Reserve Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Tangy berry/black cherry fruit is backed with lots of acid and hints of earthy funk. It's not vegetal but it is definitely herbal, a complex and flavorful reserve that falls right between Balboa's regular Syrah and the Sayulita. Red Blend US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Balboa

description: Lamorèmio is a blend of Nerello Mascalese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Nero d'Avola in equal parts that tastes of Indian spice, clove, sweet cinnamon and blackberry. You'll also get a touch of caper or green olive that rides on the heels of the wine's smooth, supple mouthfeel.
title: Benanti 2005 Lamorèmio Red (Sicilia)
description2: Lamorèmio is a blend of Nerello Mascalese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Nero d'Avola in equal parts that tastes of Indian spice, clove, sweet cinnamon and blackberry. You'll also get a touch of caper or green olive that rides on the heels of the wine's smooth, supple mouthfeel. Red Blend Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Benanti

description: Il Monovitigno is a pure expression of Nerello Mascalese—Mt. Etna's most promising variety—with aromas of black olive, Indian spice, mesquite, black fruit and volcanic ash. It's tonic and fresh in the mouth and encourages a pairing with spicy meat recipes.
title: Benanti 2006 Il Monovitigno Nerello Mascalese (Sicilia)
description2: Il Monovitigno is a pure expression of Nerello Mascalese—Mt. Etna's most promising variety—with aromas of black olive, Indian spice, mesquite, black fruit and volcanic ash. It's tonic and fresh in the mouth and encourages a pairing with spicy meat recipes. Nerello Mascalese Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Benanti

description: A richly Merlot wine, soft, ripe, packed with black jelly flavors, sweet acidity and generous balanced tannins. The flavors come together in a balanced, rich way. An attractive wine, ready to drink now.
title: Château Pavillon Bel-Air 2006  Lalande de Pomerol
description2: A richly Merlot wine, soft, ripe, packed with black jelly flavors, sweet acidity and generous balanced tannins. The flavors come together in a balanced, rich way. An attractive wine, ready to drink now. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Lalande de Pomerol Château Pavillon Bel-Air

description: Opulence is the reserve Syrah, a firm and juicy wine with dark, smoky, wild berry flavors. It's gamy and brambly, chewy and tart, and it has the length and polish to sustain your interest through glass after glass.
title: Coeur d'Alene 2006 Opulence Syrah (Washington)
description2: Opulence is the reserve Syrah, a firm and juicy wine with dark, smoky, wild berry flavors. It's gamy and brambly, chewy and tart, and it has the length and polish to sustain your interest through glass after glass. Syrah US Washington Washington Coeur d'Alene

description: We won't call this the best Terrunyo SB to date, but it is typically clean, mineral and full of lime and passion fruit. The overall balance and purity are up the ladder, while the flavors of green fruits, passion fruit, brine and lime don't hold back. Top notch SB from Chile to drink now.
title: Concha y Toro 2008 Terrunyo El Triángulo Vineyard Block: 28 Sauvignon Blanc (Casablanca Valley)
description2: We won't call this the best Terrunyo SB to date, but it is typically clean, mineral and full of lime and passion fruit. The overall balance and purity are up the ladder, while the flavors of green fruits, passion fruit, brine and lime don't hold back. Top notch SB from Chile to drink now. Sauvignon Blanc Chile Casablanca Valley  Concha y Toro

description: Following the elegant Deutz tradition, this wine has a character that is light as a feather, but still anchored into vivid red fruits and tight acidity, leavened by a softness. The final taste is soft, but well integrated.
title: Deutz 2005 Rosé Brut  (Champagne)
description2: Following the elegant Deutz tradition, this wine has a character that is light as a feather, but still anchored into vivid red fruits and tight acidity, leavened by a softness. The final taste is soft, but well integrated. Champagne Blend France Champagne Champagne Deutz

description: Ripe and oaky. May fall a bit short on complexity and finesse, but makes up for it in sheer power. Pineapple crème brûlée, spicy green apple butter, ripe pear, Asian spices and smoky oak are the flavors, backed with firm acidity.
title: J Vineyards & Winery 2007 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Ripe and oaky. May fall a bit short on complexity and finesse, but makes up for it in sheer power. Pineapple crème brûlée, spicy green apple butter, ripe pear, Asian spices and smoky oak are the flavors, backed with firm acidity. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley J Vineyards & Winery

description: Young and fresh in citrusy acidity, with forward fruit flavors of cherries, raspberries, pomegranates, cola, bacon and sweet oak. Good and dry and silky, but immature.
title: James Family Cellars 2007 Stony Point Vineyards Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: Young and fresh in citrusy acidity, with forward fruit flavors of cherries, raspberries, pomegranates, cola, bacon and sweet oak. Good and dry and silky, but immature. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast James Family Cellars

description: This is an example of a lighter, drier style of Cabernet that maintains great elegance and charm. It's very dry, showing blackberry, black currant, herb and cedar flavors wrapped into firm tannins, and brightened with crispness. Best now–2011.
