title: Long Meadow Ranch 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: This is an example of a lighter, drier style of Cabernet that maintains great elegance and charm. It's very dry, showing blackberry, black currant, herb and cedar flavors wrapped into firm tannins, and brightened with crispness. Best now–2011. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Long Meadow Ranch

description: Aggressive smelling early on but then it settles on classy raspberry, cassis and herbs. The palate is very healthy, juicy, rich and big, but the flavors of dark berry fruit are subtle and smooth. Chunky, sweet and ripe on the finish. A Malbec to drink this winter. Only 300 cases produced.
title: Marchiori & Barraud 2007 Cuartel 2 Marchiori Vineyard Malbec (Perdriel)
description2: Aggressive smelling early on but then it settles on classy raspberry, cassis and herbs. The palate is very healthy, juicy, rich and big, but the flavors of dark berry fruit are subtle and smooth. Chunky, sweet and ripe on the finish. A Malbec to drink this winter. Only 300 cases produced. Malbec Argentina Mendoza Province Perdriel Marchiori & Barraud

description: It's been a while since we've reviewed this wine, so this is a fine comeback. Plum, blackberry and rubber aromas are solid, but the real star is the palate, which is smooth and thick, with lush dark fruit flavors and a smoky background. Good, slightly herbal and long on the finish.
title: Morandé 2007 Edición Limitada Carmenère (Maipo Valley)
description2: It's been a while since we've reviewed this wine, so this is a fine comeback. Plum, blackberry and rubber aromas are solid, but the real star is the palate, which is smooth and thick, with lush dark fruit flavors and a smoky background. Good, slightly herbal and long on the finish. Carmenère Chile Maipo Valley  Morandé

description: It's hard to make Petite Sirah smooth and elegant, but Newsome-Harlow has done it. The wine shows classically fine tannins, while the flavors run toward milk chocolate, ripe blackberries and lots of crushed black pepper. Delicious and refined, a great wine for peppersteak.
title: Newsome-Harlow 2007 El Portal Petite Sirah (Calaveras County)
description2: It's hard to make Petite Sirah smooth and elegant, but Newsome-Harlow has done it. The wine shows classically fine tannins, while the flavors run toward milk chocolate, ripe blackberries and lots of crushed black pepper. Delicious and refined, a great wine for peppersteak. Petite Sirah US California Calaveras County Newsome-Harlow

description: Great now with lamb, this Pinot is softly complex and forward in fruit, with a silky texture. It shows cherry, raspberry, mocha, anise and smoky oak flavors. Best now and for a few more years.
title: Pali 2007 Turner Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: Great now with lamb, this Pinot is softly complex and forward in fruit, with a silky texture. It shows cherry, raspberry, mocha, anise and smoky oak flavors. Best now and for a few more years. Pinot Noir US California Sta. Rita Hills Pali

description: This is Peju's best Sauvignon Blanc in many years. It's bone dry and elegantly crisp in acidity, a clean, vibrant, food-friendly wine. With just a hint of oak, it shows rich flavors of Meyer lemons and limes, with exotic notes of papaya and white flowers. What a great comeback.
title: Peju 2008 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
description2: This is Peju's best Sauvignon Blanc in many years. It's bone dry and elegantly crisp in acidity, a clean, vibrant, food-friendly wine. With just a hint of oak, it shows rich flavors of Meyer lemons and limes, with exotic notes of papaya and white flowers. What a great comeback. Sauvignon Blanc US California Napa Valley Peju

description: Could almost be Zinfandel, it's so spicy and briary, with wild berry, red currant and tobacco flavors. But it's lighter in body, with the silky texture of Pinot Noir, and drier than any Zin could be. A lovely, complex and food-friendly wine.
title: Quivira 2007 Wine Creek Ranch Grenache (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: Could almost be Zinfandel, it's so spicy and briary, with wild berry, red currant and tobacco flavors. But it's lighter in body, with the silky texture of Pinot Noir, and drier than any Zin could be. A lovely, complex and food-friendly wine. Grenache US California Dry Creek Valley Quivira

description: If you want to taste ripe Pinot Noir in Champagne, this grand cru blend (with 40% Chardonnay, 60% Pinot Noir) from Soutiran is where to come. The wine has weight, delicious white fruits and kiwi, and a textured mouthfeel. It is concentrated, certainly in a food wine style.
title: Soutiran NV Brut Grand Cru  (Champagne)
description2: If you want to taste ripe Pinot Noir in Champagne, this grand cru blend (with 40% Chardonnay, 60% Pinot Noir) from Soutiran is where to come. The wine has weight, delicious white fruits and kiwi, and a textured mouthfeel. It is concentrated, certainly in a food wine style. Champagne Blend France Champagne Champagne Soutiran

description: A nicely crafted debut from a new Walla Walla boutique. The blend—two thirds Cabernet Sauvignon, one third Syrah—is becoming a classic in Walla Walla. This wraps delicious caramel around bright berries and plums. It's nicely focused, smooth and compact, but feels like a wine that will flesh out with a bit more bottle age.
title: SuLei 2007 Beet Red Red (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: A nicely crafted debut from a new Walla Walla boutique. The blend—two thirds Cabernet Sauvignon, one third Syrah—is becoming a classic in Walla Walla. This wraps delicious caramel around bright berries and plums. It's nicely focused, smooth and compact, but feels like a wine that will flesh out with a bit more bottle age. Red Blend US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) SuLei

description: Named after local nobility in the city of Borba, this is a popular brand in Portugal. In its white manifestation, the wine is soft, very clean, with pear and cinnamon flavors, the texture just moving toward fat, but working well as a food wine.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2006 Marquês de Borba White (Alentejo)
description2: Named after local nobility in the city of Borba, this is a popular brand in Portugal. In its white manifestation, the wine is soft, very clean, with pear and cinnamon flavors, the texture just moving toward fat, but working well as a food wine. Portuguese White Portugal Alentejo  J. Portugal Ramos

description: Honey, kiwi, mango and peach come to mind and color an easy, but fragrant Grigio from the mountains of northern Italy that would pair well with exotic or Asian foods. It closes with spicy acidity and is a perfect palate cleaner.
title: Tolloy 2007 Pinot Grigio (Alto Adige)
description2: Honey, kiwi, mango and peach come to mind and color an easy, but fragrant Grigio from the mountains of northern Italy that would pair well with exotic or Asian foods. It closes with spicy acidity and is a perfect palate cleaner. Pinot Grigio Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Tolloy

description: A fine, crisp wine, with delicious green apple flavors and a tang of lime, a touch of yeast, and a dry, fresh aftertaste. There's a delicious bite to this fragrant wine.
title: Quinta de Serrade 2006 Solar de Serrade Alvarinho (Vinho Verde)
description2: A fine, crisp wine, with delicious green apple flavors and a tang of lime, a touch of yeast, and a dry, fresh aftertaste. There's a delicious bite to this fragrant wine. Alvarinho Portugal Vinho Verde  Quinta de Serrade

description: A nice, crisp Chard that has pineapple, peach, pear and caramel-vanilla flavors that turn honeyed and spicy on the finish. From the Sonoma producer Ty Caton.
title: Racchus 2005 Chardonnay (Central Coast)
description2: A nice, crisp Chard that has pineapple, peach, pear and caramel-vanilla flavors that turn honeyed and spicy on the finish. From the Sonoma producer Ty Caton. Chardonnay US California Central Coast Racchus

description: Forward and easy in cherry, currant, raspberry, tangerine zest, cola and peppery spice flavors, this Zin has a gentle texture. There's also a wealth of firm, dusty tannins that could help the wine age for a few years.
title: Sobon Estate 2006 Cougar Hill Zinfandel (Amador County)
description2: Forward and easy in cherry, currant, raspberry, tangerine zest, cola and peppery spice flavors, this Zin has a gentle texture. There's also a wealth of firm, dusty tannins that could help the wine age for a few years. Zinfandel US California Amador County Sobon Estate

description: Dark, soft and rich, this single-vineyard Pinot brims with deep, almost brooding flavors of red currants, cherries, red plums, mocha and dusty spices. It also has an edge of tannins that will help it negotiate a good steak. Drink over the next several years.
title: Stephen's 2005 Encell Vineyard Pinot Noir (San Luis Obispo County)
address: San Luis Obispo County, California, US
description2: Dark, soft and rich, this single-vineyard Pinot brims with deep, almost brooding flavors of red currants, cherries, red plums, mocha and dusty spices. It also has an edge of tannins that will help it negotiate a good steak. Drink over the next several years. Pinot Noir US California San Luis Obispo County Stephen's

description: Former Wild Horse proprietor Ken Volk is back with his own personal brand after selling the winery. He's sourced his fruit from this very famous old vineyard. It's a good start, a deep golden wine showing ripe apricot, pear and sweet smoky oak flavors.
title: Kenneth Volk 2005 Sierra Madre Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
description2: Former Wild Horse proprietor Ken Volk is back with his own personal brand after selling the winery. He's sourced his fruit from this very famous old vineyard. It's a good start, a deep golden wine showing ripe apricot, pear and sweet smoky oak flavors. Chardonnay US California Santa Maria Valley Kenneth Volk

description: A very easy wine to like. It's so softly balanced, so rich in cherries, licorice and smoky vanilla, so light in texture, you could drink it as a cocktail wine. But it will also nicely complement a wide variety of foods.
title: Lava Cap 2004 Reserve Cabernet Franc (El Dorado)
description2: A very easy wine to like. It's so softly balanced, so rich in cherries, licorice and smoky vanilla, so light in texture, you could drink it as a cocktail wine. But it will also nicely complement a wide variety of foods. Cabernet Franc US California El Dorado Lava Cap

description: A little sweet, dense and pasty on the nose, and that's also how the wine plays out. It's a ripe style of Carmenère, with brooding but not overly expressive black-fruit flavors. Ripeness is clearly not an issue as it shows no vegetal or herbal notes. Simply big, bold and not terribly unique.
title: De Martino 2006 Legado Reserva Carmenère (Maipo Valley)
description2: A little sweet, dense and pasty on the nose, and that's also how the wine plays out. It's a ripe style of Carmenère, with brooding but not overly expressive black-fruit flavors. Ripeness is clearly not an issue as it shows no vegetal or herbal notes. Simply big, bold and not terribly unique. Carmenère Chile Maipo Valley  De Martino

description: You don't think of Livermore Valley as Pinot territory, but this is a pretty nice wine. It's medium-bodied and silky, with pleasurable flavors of cherries, red currants, cola, vanilla and smoke, and a long, sweetly spicy finish.
title: Fenestra 2005 Pinot Noir (Livermore Valley)
description2: You don't think of Livermore Valley as Pinot territory, but this is a pretty nice wine. It's medium-bodied and silky, with pleasurable flavors of cherries, red currants, cola, vanilla and smoke, and a long, sweetly spicy finish. Pinot Noir US California Livermore Valley Fenestra

description: This delicious Chardonnay offers creamy opulence and rich notes of vanilla, honey and peach. It has dense, slightly sweet, fruit flavors lavished over good structure and ends with spicy crispness. Pair it with white meat or pasta salad.
title: Folonari 2007 Chardonnay Chardonnay (Delle Venezie)
description2: This delicious Chardonnay offers creamy opulence and rich notes of vanilla, honey and peach. It has dense, slightly sweet, fruit flavors lavished over good structure and ends with spicy crispness. Pair it with white meat or pasta salad. Chardonnay Italy Northeastern Italy Delle Venezie Folonari

description: This Cab/Merlot/Syrah blend is very much in a Washington style, with crisp acids and tart berry and currant flavors, wrapped in chocolate and showing a few specks of pepper, presumably from the Syrah. It's solid and well-made and a good example of how Oregon vintners are breaking out of the Pinot box.
title: Brimstone 2006 Red Wine Red (Columbia Valley (OR))
description2: This Cab/Merlot/Syrah blend is very much in a Washington style, with crisp acids and tart berry and currant flavors, wrapped in chocolate and showing a few specks of pepper, presumably from the Syrah. It's solid and well-made and a good example of how Oregon vintners are breaking out of the Pinot box. Red Blend US Oregon Columbia Valley (OR) Brimstone

description: A blend of 70% Clairette, 15% Sémillon and 15% Rolle, this is a slightly nutty, almondy white with touches of honeyed richness and apricot. Turns a bit astringent on the finish.
title: Château Calissanne 2006 Clos Victoire White (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
description2: A blend of 70% Clairette, 15% Sémillon and 15% Rolle, this is a slightly nutty, almondy white with touches of honeyed richness and apricot. Turns a bit astringent on the finish. White Blend France Provence Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence Château Calissanne

description: Ripe and juicy, this is packed with black currant fruit and lined with soft, open tannins. The wine has a dry core, yet this is surrounded by attractive smoky fruit and bright acidity. Ready to drink now.
title: Château Beauvillage 2009  Médoc
description2: Ripe and juicy, this is packed with black currant fruit and lined with soft, open tannins. The wine has a dry core, yet this is surrounded by attractive smoky fruit and bright acidity. Ready to drink now. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Médoc Château Beauvillage

description: This is a very rich wine with black fruit and bitter coffee flavors and dense tannins. Its weight is almost too much for the firm structure that is underneath.
title: Château Cap Léon Veyrin 2009  Listrac-Médoc
description2: This is a very rich wine with black fruit and bitter coffee flavors and dense tannins. Its weight is almost too much for the firm structure that is underneath. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Listrac-Médoc Château Cap Léon Veyrin

description: Big fruit aromas of plum, raspberry and a whiff of pepper start this enjoyable red from Gerovassiliou. On the palate, flavors of spicy black fruit, clove and smoke appeal and should pair well with grilled meat dishes and stews.
title: Gerovassiliou 2007 Evangelo Red (Epanomi)
description2: Big fruit aromas of plum, raspberry and a whiff of pepper start this enjoyable red from Gerovassiliou. On the palate, flavors of spicy black fruit, clove and smoke appeal and should pair well with grilled meat dishes and stews. Red Blend Greece Epanomi  Gerovassiliou

description: This delivers the soft, velvety texture you want in a nice Merlot, along with ripe black-cherry, anise, cola and sandalwood flavors that finish dry and spicy.
title: Firestone 2008 Merlot (Santa Ynez Valley)
description2: This delivers the soft, velvety texture you want in a nice Merlot, along with ripe black-cherry, anise, cola and sandalwood flavors that finish dry and spicy. Merlot US California Santa Ynez Valley Firestone

description: Tart and juicy, this nicely balanced Riesling mixes fruit flavors of orange, Meyer lemon and tangerine. The acids are natural and tangy, and the overall balance is just right.
title: Gård 2010 Lawrence Vineyards Dry Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Tart and juicy, this nicely balanced Riesling mixes fruit flavors of orange, Meyer lemon and tangerine. The acids are natural and tangy, and the overall balance is just right. Riesling US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Gård

description: A blend of approximately 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, with Merlot, Malbec, Syrah and Petit Verdot making up the remainder, this barbecue-ready wine is scented with dried herb and forest floor components. Brambly berry fruit and tart acids work to balance out the earthy tannins.
designation: Quarry Butte Destiny Ridge Vineyards Estate Grown
title: Alexandria Nicole 2009 Quarry Butte Destiny Ridge Vineyards Estate Grown Red (Horse Heaven Hills)
description2: A blend of approximately 50% Cabernet Sauvignon, with Merlot, Malbec, Syrah and Petit Verdot making up the remainder, this barbecue-ready wine is scented with dried herb and forest floor components. Brambly berry fruit and tart acids work to balance out the earthy tannins. Red Blend US Washington Horse Heaven Hills Alexandria Nicole

description: Andis's 100% Barbera tempts with ripe, dried black-cherry and mint flavors, and toasty layers of coffee and toffee that linger until the finish.
title: Andis 2010 Barbera (Amador County)
description2: Andis's 100% Barbera tempts with ripe, dried black-cherry and mint flavors, and toasty layers of coffee and toffee that linger until the finish. Barbera US California Amador County Andis

description: There's a savage appeal (what the French call sauvage) to this unabashedly rustic Cabernet Franc that was fermented entirely using wild yeasts. Initial notes of tomato leaf and green stem blow off to reveal aripe red fruit with a gorgeously floral character. Tart acidity and a concentrated red-cherry flavor are accented with graphite and black tea notes.
title: Anthony Nappa 2010 Bordo Cabernet Franc (North Fork of Long Island)
address: North Fork of Long Island, New York, US
description2: There's a savage appeal (what the French call sauvage) to this unabashedly rustic Cabernet Franc that was fermented entirely using wild yeasts. Initial notes of tomato leaf and green stem blow off to reveal aripe red fruit with a gorgeously floral character. Tart acidity and a concentrated red-cherry flavor are accented with graphite and black tea notes. Cabernet Franc US New York North Fork of Long Island Anthony Nappa

description: Now maturing, this retains its red fruits; its bright texture and acidity go with the firm tannins and dark structure. It is balanced and ready to drink.
title: Château Bellegrave du Poujeau 2006  Haut-Médoc
description2: Now maturing, this retains its red fruits; its bright texture and acidity go with the firm tannins and dark structure. It is balanced and ready to drink. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Haut-Médoc Château Bellegrave du Poujeau

description: This is structured and firm, with its dry tannins prominent along with blackberry and black cherry acidity. The wine does have density, a dusty texture and the chance to further age.
title: Château Haut-Goujon 2008 La Rose Saint-Vincent  (Lalande de Pomerol)
description2: This is structured and firm, with its dry tannins prominent along with blackberry and black cherry acidity. The wine does have density, a dusty texture and the chance to further age. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Lalande de Pomerol Château Haut-Goujon

description: This shows the rich density of Merlot in 2009, giving a solid structure, with dried fruit and red berry flavors and a concentrated line of tannins. Big and dense, this is ready to age.
title: Château La Fleur Plaisance 2009  Montagne-Saint-Émilion
description2: This shows the rich density of Merlot in 2009, giving a solid structure, with dried fruit and red berry flavors and a concentrated line of tannins. Big and dense, this is ready to age. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Montagne-Saint-Émilion Château La Fleur Plaisance

description: A very rich wine—this has a warm, soft mouthfeel and ripe, jammy flavors enhanced with oak. Except for the heat, it's a lovely wine. Drink now.
title: Justin 2008 Isoceles Reserve Red (Paso Robles)
description2: A very rich wine—this has a warm, soft mouthfeel and ripe, jammy flavors enhanced with oak. Except for the heat, it's a lovely wine. Drink now. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Justin

description: Easily as good as Chardonnays costing two or three times as much, this is a great value, and with production at 12,000 cases, it should be fairly easy to find. It's rich in orange, apricot and buttered toast flavors, with balancing acidity and a dry finish.
title: Leese-Fitch 2010 Chardonnay (California)
description2: Easily as good as Chardonnays costing two or three times as much, this is a great value, and with production at 12,000 cases, it should be fairly easy to find. It's rich in orange, apricot and buttered toast flavors, with balancing acidity and a dry finish. Chardonnay US California California Leese-Fitch

description: With a rich, velvety texture and flavors of black cherries, green olives and smoky cedar, this is a very nice Merlot for drinking now. Drink this with upscale fare.
title: Martin Ray 2010 Reserve Merlot (Oak Knoll District)
description2: With a rich, velvety texture and flavors of black cherries, green olives and smoky cedar, this is a very nice Merlot for drinking now. Drink this with upscale fare. Merlot US California Oak Knoll District Martin Ray

description: This is 75% Merlot, with Cabernet, Malbec and Syrah comprising the other 25%. Despite all of the components, it tastes like there is a bit of a hole. The fruit is soft and plummy, and the overall balance is excellent.
title: Obelisco Estate 2009 Reserve Merlot (Red Mountain)
description2: This is 75% Merlot, with Cabernet, Malbec and Syrah comprising the other 25%. Despite all of the components, it tastes like there is a bit of a hole. The fruit is soft and plummy, and the overall balance is excellent. Merlot US Washington Red Mountain Obelisco Estate

description: This opens has a bold appearance with dark extraction. The aromas that follow are reminiscent of ripe cherry, cinnamon spice, plum and pulpy black fruit. Round and soft, this closes with firm grittiness.
title: Ponchione Maurizio 2009 Monfrini  (Roero)
description2: This opens has a bold appearance with dark extraction. The aromas that follow are reminiscent of ripe cherry, cinnamon spice, plum and pulpy black fruit. Round and soft, this closes with firm grittiness. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Roero Ponchione Maurizio

description: Everything in this wine is strong and obvious: With its powerful tropical fruit, sweet oak and intense finish, this is what many Americans like in Chardonnay. But as impressive as the winemaker's art is here, the flash is all on the surface. Drink up.
title: Freeman 2010 Ryo-Fu Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Everything in this wine is strong and obvious: With its powerful tropical fruit, sweet oak and intense finish, this is what many Americans like in Chardonnay. But as impressive as the winemaker's art is here, the flash is all on the surface. Drink up. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley Freeman

description: Blackberry, tobacco and spice flavors give this an appropriate air of sophistication. It should pair with pizza or pasta.
title: Bersano 2009 Costalunga  (Barbera d'Asti)
description2: Blackberry, tobacco and spice flavors give this an appropriate air of sophistication. It should pair with pizza or pasta. Barbera Italy Piedmont Barbera d'Asti Bersano

description: This superripe, late-harvest style of wine smells like raisins and dried plums. It tastes so fruity and ripe that it's sweet, with a full body to match. It would be best as a dessert wine.
title: 2Plank 2014 Zinfandel (Amador County)
description2: This superripe, late-harvest style of wine smells like raisins and dried plums. It tastes so fruity and ripe that it's sweet, with a full body to match. It would be best as a dessert wine. Zinfandel US California Amador County 2Plank

description: Brassy in color and woody in aroma, this Chardonnay is a pleasant enough drink, offering ample weight and modest pear and citrus flavors. Drink it through 2017.
title: Angove 2014 Family Crest Chardonnay (McLaren Vale)
description2: Brassy in color and woody in aroma, this Chardonnay is a pleasant enough drink, offering ample weight and modest pear and citrus flavors. Drink it through 2017. Chardonnay Australia South Australia McLaren Vale Angove

description: Grassy stalky berry aromas lean towards green. This feels grippy, while spicy herbal berry flavors stay the course and finish with minty green notes on top of basic plum and berry.
title: Trapiche 2014 Oak Cask Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
description2: Grassy stalky berry aromas lean towards green. This feels grippy, while spicy herbal berry flavors stay the course and finish with minty green notes on top of basic plum and berry. Cabernet Sauvignon Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Trapiche

description: The wine is lean for the vintage, tight and with an austere structure. Its tannins and juicy red fruits are in the background. The aftertaste is dry and firm.
title: Château Kalon Nodoz 2012 Carpe Diem  (Côtes de Bourg)
description2: The wine is lean for the vintage, tight and with an austere structure. Its tannins and juicy red fruits are in the background. The aftertaste is dry and firm. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Côtes de Bourg Château Kalon Nodoz

description: Too alcoholic for its own good, the wine is full bodied and heavy. It has tannins, superripe black fruits while missing structure and acidity. It is developing fast and will be ready to drink from 2017.
title: L. Tramier & Fils 2015 Collection  (Moulin-à-Vent)
description2: Too alcoholic for its own good, the wine is full bodied and heavy. It has tannins, superripe black fruits while missing structure and acidity. It is developing fast and will be ready to drink from 2017. Gamay France Beaujolais Moulin-à-Vent L. Tramier & Fils

description: Light aromas of red fruit, game and vanilla are followed by quite tart puckering fruit flavors. It needs food to counteract the screaming acid.
title: Oak Knoll 2011 Goose Ridge Vineyard Barbera (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Light aromas of red fruit, game and vanilla are followed by quite tart puckering fruit flavors. It needs food to counteract the screaming acid. Barbera US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Oak Knoll

description: This shows the tannic chewy, vegetal nature of the grape, without off-setting it with other flavors. One-third new French oak has made little impact, and the wine is rough and astringent through a quick finish.
title: South Stage 2012 Carmenère (Rogue Valley)
description2: This shows the tannic chewy, vegetal nature of the grape, without off-setting it with other flavors. One-third new French oak has made little impact, and the wine is rough and astringent through a quick finish. Carmenère US Oregon Rogue Valley South Stage

description: The tannins are firm, still controlling the black fruits in this wine. It is concentrated, with considerable extraction giving a dry wine with a hard edge. The red-berry flavors are lost.
title: Quinta da Padrela 2013 Premium Red (Douro)
description2: The tannins are firm, still controlling the black fruits in this wine. It is concentrated, with considerable extraction giving a dry wine with a hard edge. The red-berry flavors are lost. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Quinta da Padrela

description: Most of the action is on the outside of this gaudy bottle. However, this light and slightly sweet wine has appley, floral flavors and a soft, easy texture.
title: La Catrina NV Pinot Grigio (California)
description2: Most of the action is on the outside of this gaudy bottle. However, this light and slightly sweet wine has appley, floral flavors and a soft, easy texture. Pinot Grigio US California California La Catrina

description: Heavy oak aromas sit atop wiry plum and spice scents. This feels tannic and tough, with up-front oak and herbal berry flavors. A dry tannic, spicy finish features palpable oak that tastes forced and like plastic.
region_1: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla
title: Venta Morales 2015 Made With Organic Grapes Tempranillo (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
address: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla, Central Spain, Spain
description2: Heavy oak aromas sit atop wiry plum and spice scents. This feels tannic and tough, with up-front oak and herbal berry flavors. A dry tannic, spicy finish features palpable oak that tastes forced and like plastic. Tempranillo Spain Central Spain Vino de la Tierra de Castilla Venta Morales

description: This light-colored and light-bodied wine combines an earthy, metallic aroma with mildly fruity, candied flavors. Its texture is mild and smooth.
title: Grayson 2015 Lot 6 Merlot (California)
description2: This light-colored and light-bodied wine combines an earthy, metallic aroma with mildly fruity, candied flavors. Its texture is mild and smooth. Merlot US California California Grayson

description: Prickly berry aromas include notes of both candied raspberry and cinnamon. This feels a bit clunky and sticky, with sugary berry flavors and a slightly cloying finish.
region_1: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla
title: Bodegas Isidro Milagro 2015 SPÑ Red (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
address: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla, Central Spain, Spain
description2: Prickly berry aromas include notes of both candied raspberry and cinnamon. This feels a bit clunky and sticky, with sugary berry flavors and a slightly cloying finish. Red Blend Spain Central Spain Vino de la Tierra de Castilla Bodegas Isidro Milagro

description: Dusty aromas of desert brush, oak, blueberry, animal hide and green herbs are strained. This feels raw and choppy, while reedy herbal red-fruit flavors finish with a note of raisin. This Monastrell (with 10% Syrah) is okay but all over the map.
title: Campos de Risca 2013 Estate Wine Organic Monastrell-Syrah (Jumilla)
description2: Dusty aromas of desert brush, oak, blueberry, animal hide and green herbs are strained. This feels raw and choppy, while reedy herbal red-fruit flavors finish with a note of raisin. This Monastrell (with 10% Syrah) is okay but all over the map. Monastrell-Syrah Spain Levante Jumilla Campos de Risca

description: The aromas are light, with notes of white flowers, green herbs and peach. The flavors are tart and elegant in style, seeming quite watery in concentration.
title: Kestrel 2015 Falcon Series Estate Viognier (Yakima Valley)
description2: The aromas are light, with notes of white flowers, green herbs and peach. The flavors are tart and elegant in style, seeming quite watery in concentration. Viognier US Washington Yakima Valley Kestrel

description: This wine is ripe with red fruits and soft tannins. It is smooth, packed with red-berry flavors lifted by the acidity. Made to be drunk young, it is ready now.
title: Adega Mãe 2015 Pinta Negra Tinto Red (Lisboa)
description2: This wine is ripe with red fruits and soft tannins. It is smooth, packed with red-berry flavors lifted by the acidity. Made to be drunk young, it is ready now. Portuguese Red Portugal Lisboa  Adega Mãe

description: Slightly sweet and quite light in body, this wine has modest peach and herb aromas, generic fruit flavors and a soft texture.
title: Bota Box 2015 Riesling (California)
description2: Slightly sweet and quite light in body, this wine has modest peach and herb aromas, generic fruit flavors and a soft texture. Riesling US California California Bota Box

description: Lemon and apple aromas precede a high-acid citric palate without much elegance or finesse. This pedestrian Albariño deals pithy orange flavors that come with a note of grape skins. On the finish, this seems like orange juice.
title: Lo Nuevo 2015 Covello Albariño (Rías Baixas)
description2: Lemon and apple aromas precede a high-acid citric palate without much elegance or finesse. This pedestrian Albariño deals pithy orange flavors that come with a note of grape skins. On the finish, this seems like orange juice. Albariño Spain Galicia Rías Baixas Lo Nuevo

description: High-toned aromatics complement aggressive, unintegrated flavors of raw wood. It's lumber, not toast, that you taste, along with bitter tannins and little evidence of ripe fruit.
title: Wetzel Estate 2012 Premier Cuvée Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
description2: High-toned aromatics complement aggressive, unintegrated flavors of raw wood. It's lumber, not toast, that you taste, along with bitter tannins and little evidence of ripe fruit. Pinot Noir US Oregon Willamette Valley Wetzel Estate

description: Crushed stones and river rocks take center stage in this elegant off-dry Riesling. It's gorgeously mineral, yet also anchored against a backdrop of crisp cutting yellow-peach, tangerine and lemon flavors. It's a zesty, invigorating wine with a clean but persistent finish.
title: Keuka Spring 2016 Humphrey's Vineyard Riesling (Finger Lakes)
description2: Crushed stones and river rocks take center stage in this elegant off-dry Riesling. It's gorgeously mineral, yet also anchored against a backdrop of crisp cutting yellow-peach, tangerine and lemon flavors. It's a zesty, invigorating wine with a clean but persistent finish. Riesling US New York Finger Lakes Keuka Spring

description: Peach and blossom notes abound on this delightfully fresh fruity wine. Its sunny stone-fruit flavors are concentrated and juicy, balanced against zesty lime acidity and a meandering pollen finish. Sprightly in texture yet buoyant.
title: Keuka Spring 2016 Semi Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
description2: Peach and blossom notes abound on this delightfully fresh fruity wine. Its sunny stone-fruit flavors are concentrated and juicy, balanced against zesty lime acidity and a meandering pollen finish. Sprightly in texture yet buoyant. Riesling US New York Finger Lakes Keuka Spring

description: Thyme and crushed herbs on the nose of this red lead into flavors of sweet spice, smoked meat and boysenberry. The wine has an exotic spin and a balanced overall character. Elegant and distinctive.
title: Kintonis 2012 Agiorgitiko (Nemea)
description2: Thyme and crushed herbs on the nose of this red lead into flavors of sweet spice, smoked meat and boysenberry. The wine has an exotic spin and a balanced overall character. Elegant and distinctive. Agiorgitiko Greece Nemea  Kintonis

description: Strawberry and watermelon highlight a light, creamy palate of vanilla and lemon peel, the freshness maintained by moderate acidity.
title: Kokomo 2016 Pauline's Vineyard Grenache Rosé (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: Strawberry and watermelon highlight a light, creamy palate of vanilla and lemon peel, the freshness maintained by moderate acidity. Rosé US California Dry Creek Valley Kokomo

description: Pretty and floral, juicy and substantial, this wine delivers in flavor and texture, conveying caramel, baked pear and pineapple. Notable oak wraps around the fruit, ending with hazelnut and nutmeg.
title: La Crema 2015 Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Pretty and floral, juicy and substantial, this wine delivers in flavor and texture, conveying caramel, baked pear and pineapple. Notable oak wraps around the fruit, ending with hazelnut and nutmeg. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley La Crema

description: A touch of smoky petrol in the aroma and flavor adds intrigue to this full-bodied, creamy-textured wine. A lot of effort in the winery, including native fermentation, 33% new French barrels and lees stirring helped it have a good sense of depth and richness without being overripe, contributing a mouthflling sensation and lingering finish.
title: La Folia Winery 2015 Vermentino (Sierra Foothills)
description2: A touch of smoky petrol in the aroma and flavor adds intrigue to this full-bodied, creamy-textured wine. A lot of effort in the winery, including native fermentation, 33% new French barrels and lees stirring helped it have a good sense of depth and richness without being overripe, contributing a mouthflling sensation and lingering finish. Vermentino US California Sierra Foothills La Folia Winery

description: The restrained nose just gives a glimpse of lemon freshness. Lemon notes intensify on the palate, where they attain a lovely textural feel of pith and zest. A slender wine, it still carries a hint of yeast on the midpalate, but is subtle, clean, slender and fine. The finish is dry and refreshing.
title: Malat 2016 Ried am Zaum Hefeabzug Pinot Blanc (Wachau)
description2: The restrained nose just gives a glimpse of lemon freshness. Lemon notes intensify on the palate, where they attain a lovely textural feel of pith and zest. A slender wine, it still carries a hint of yeast on the midpalate, but is subtle, clean, slender and fine. The finish is dry and refreshing. Pinot Blanc Austria Wachau  Malat

description: Tight and focused, this opens with aromas of wild berry, red rose, culinary spice and a whisper of menthol. Chiseled and austere, the palate offers sour cherry, pomegranate, white pepper and a hint of anise. Youthfully assertive fine-grained tannins and bright acidity provide the framework. Give it time to soften and fully develop. Drink 2023–2033.
title: Marchesi di Barolo 2013 Cannubi  (Barolo)
description2: Tight and focused, this opens with aromas of wild berry, red rose, culinary spice and a whisper of menthol. Chiseled and austere, the palate offers sour cherry, pomegranate, white pepper and a hint of anise. Youthfully assertive fine-grained tannins and bright acidity provide the framework. Give it time to soften and fully develop. Drink 2023–2033. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Marchesi di Barolo

description: This 100% varietal wine brings lightly styled aromas of green grass, herb, snap pea and whiffs of green pepper. The palate is full bodied and textured, bringing a sense of richness but never losing its balance. It lingers on the finish.
title: Matthews 2016 Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This 100% varietal wine brings lightly styled aromas of green grass, herb, snap pea and whiffs of green pepper. The palate is full bodied and textured, bringing a sense of richness but never losing its balance. It lingers on the finish. Sauvignon Blanc US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Matthews

description: Rose petal, underbrush, grilled herb and game aromas take shape in the glass along with a balsamic note. On the firm full-bodied palate, hints of baking spice accent ripe (almost overripe) morello cherry and raspberry. Close-grained tannins give it an assertive finish. It's already almost accessible. Drink 2021–2028.
title: Monchiero 2013 Rocche di Castiglione  (Barolo)
description2: Rose petal, underbrush, grilled herb and game aromas take shape in the glass along with a balsamic note. On the firm full-bodied palate, hints of baking spice accent ripe (almost overripe) morello cherry and raspberry. Close-grained tannins give it an assertive finish. It's already almost accessible. Drink 2021–2028. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Monchiero

description: Made as an ice wine, this sweet treat smells nutty, honeyed and a touch earthy It tastes rich, like salted peanuts coated with toffee and apricot syrup. The texture is viscous, palate-clinging and persistent, holding unctuous flavors for a long finish.
title: Mt. Konocti Winery 2015 Vin de Glace Muscat (Lake County)
description2: Made as an ice wine, this sweet treat smells nutty, honeyed and a touch earthy It tastes rich, like salted peanuts coated with toffee and apricot syrup. The texture is viscous, palate-clinging and persistent, holding unctuous flavors for a long finish. Muscat US California Lake County Mt. Konocti Winery

description: Pretty pink in color, this wine is inviting in aromatics, offering a depth of fresh strawberry and watermelon atop a substantial mouthfeel of body and weight. It finishes balanced and dry.
title: Paraduxx 2016 Rosé (Napa Valley)
description2: Pretty pink in color, this wine is inviting in aromatics, offering a depth of fresh strawberry and watermelon atop a substantial mouthfeel of body and weight. It finishes balanced and dry. Rosé US California Napa Valley Paraduxx

description: Medium in build and lengthy with layers of flavor, this vineyard-designate offers a wealth of rhubarb, pomegranate, cherry and black tea, the background built around strong notions of forest floor.
title: Peter Paul Wines 2014 Frere Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: Medium in build and lengthy with layers of flavor, this vineyard-designate offers a wealth of rhubarb, pomegranate, cherry and black tea, the background built around strong notions of forest floor. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley Peter Paul Wines

description: Soft notes of green bell pepper, nettle and grass give this a fresh aspect. The slender palate then adds lemon, giving a focused zestiness, with glimpses of boxwood. The wine is citric, slender and very refreshing.
title: Pratsch 2016 Ried Kittel Sauvignon Blanc (Niederösterreich)
description2: Soft notes of green bell pepper, nettle and grass give this a fresh aspect. The slender palate then adds lemon, giving a focused zestiness, with glimpses of boxwood. The wine is citric, slender and very refreshing. Sauvignon Blanc Austria Niederösterreich  Pratsch

description: This aerated, yellow-tinted brut nature smells mature, bready and buttery. The palate is full bodied, yeasty and anything but sweet. Salted citrus and papaya flavors are nutty and hold steady on a slightly flat finish. Drink now.
title: Maria Casanovas NV Glaç Brut Nature Sparkling (Cava)
description2: This aerated, yellow-tinted brut nature smells mature, bready and buttery. The palate is full bodied, yeasty and anything but sweet. Salted citrus and papaya flavors are nutty and hold steady on a slightly flat finish. Drink now. Sparkling Blend Spain Catalonia Cava Maria Casanovas

description: A year older than the other rosés tasted for this report, this is mossy and developed, yet retains a hint of red berries. It's earthy, chocolaty and rich, with along, lingering, savory finish. Drink up.
title: E. Guigal 2015  Tavel
description2: A year older than the other rosés tasted for this report, this is mossy and developed, yet retains a hint of red berries. It's earthy, chocolaty and rich, with along, lingering, savory finish. Drink up. Rosé France Rhône Valley Tavel E. Guigal

description: Don't let the playful label fool you, this is an impressive, dry wine. Big, very ripe and fruity, it also has a good grippy texture due to firm tannins and acidity that make it appetizing. The color is quite dark, and the black cherry, blackberry and raspberry flavors run deep.
designation: Ryker Red; Pilot Ridge Vineyard; Estate Grown
title: Hart 2 Hart 2014 Ryker Red; Pilot Ridge Vineyard; Estate Grown Red (El Dorado)
description2: Don't let the playful label fool you, this is an impressive, dry wine. Big, very ripe and fruity, it also has a good grippy texture due to firm tannins and acidity that make it appetizing. The color is quite dark, and the black cherry, blackberry and raspberry flavors run deep. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California El Dorado Hart 2 Hart

description: Lemon zest, mango and flowers lead the nose on this elegant Malagousia. Smooth and silky with juicy orange and citrus flavors, the wine has an elegant overall character.
title: Kintonis 2015 M Malagousia (Peloponnese)
description2: Lemon zest, mango and flowers lead the nose on this elegant Malagousia. Smooth and silky with juicy orange and citrus flavors, the wine has an elegant overall character. Malagousia Greece Peloponnese  Kintonis

description: This wine is 95% Sangiovese and 5% Aglianico, hailing from Seven Hills, Loess, Mill Creek Upland and Serra Pedace vineyards. Aromas of cranberry, raspberry, and fruit leather lead to quite tart cranberry flavors. The concentration doesn't quite seem all there to stand up by itself but it should fit in well at the dinner table.
title: Leonetti Cellar 2014 Sangiovese (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: This wine is 95% Sangiovese and 5% Aglianico, hailing from Seven Hills, Loess, Mill Creek Upland and Serra Pedace vineyards. Aromas of cranberry, raspberry, and fruit leather lead to quite tart cranberry flavors. The concentration doesn't quite seem all there to stand up by itself but it should fit in well at the dinner table. Sangiovese US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Leonetti Cellar

description: Fresh lemon, sea salt and grapefruit aromas lead this buoyant pour from Crete. On the palate, appealing flavors of ripe lemon, tropical fruit and spice give it weight enough to pair with heartier dishes. That said, it finishes clean with a peppery finish.
title: Lyrarakis 2015 Vóila Vineyard Assyrtiko (Crete)
description2: Fresh lemon, sea salt and grapefruit aromas lead this buoyant pour from Crete. On the palate, appealing flavors of ripe lemon, tropical fruit and spice give it weight enough to pair with heartier dishes. That said, it finishes clean with a peppery finish. Assyrtiko Greece Crete  Lyrarakis

description: As effusive in flavor as a bowl full of orchard fruits, this wine exudes fresh apple, melon and spearmint aromas backed by ripe yet crisp flavors that carry a vein of apple blossoms. It's not sweet, but it has a pleasant softness around the edges of the mouthfeel.
title: Muddy Boot 2015 Chenin Blanc (Clarksburg)
description2: As effusive in flavor as a bowl full of orchard fruits, this wine exudes fresh apple, melon and spearmint aromas backed by ripe yet crisp flavors that carry a vein of apple blossoms. It's not sweet, but it has a pleasant softness around the edges of the mouthfeel. Chenin Blanc US California Clarksburg Muddy Boot

description: A touch of Riesling accentuates the fresh citrusy backbone on this Cabernet Sauvignon rosé. Dry in style with a sprightly light-footed tone, it offers loads of concentrated cherry and berry flavors. The finish is brisk and clean.
title: Osprey's Dominion 2016 Dry Rosé (North Fork of Long Island)
address: North Fork of Long Island, New York, US
description2: A touch of Riesling accentuates the fresh citrusy backbone on this Cabernet Sauvignon rosé. Dry in style with a sprightly light-footed tone, it offers loads of concentrated cherry and berry flavors. The finish is brisk and clean. Rosé US New York North Fork of Long Island Osprey's Dominion

description: Quite powerful and oaky in style, this full-bodied wine matches ripeness with firm tannins, carrying a hint of brown-sugar sweetness from the aroma through the finish. It's dry, but the spicy effect of new-oak barrels adds a pastry-like accent, which the texture balances with a welcome bite of astringency.
title: Parducci 2015 True Grit Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino)
description2: Quite powerful and oaky in style, this full-bodied wine matches ripeness with firm tannins, carrying a hint of brown-sugar sweetness from the aroma through the finish. It's dry, but the spicy effect of new-oak barrels adds a pastry-like accent, which the texture balances with a welcome bite of astringency. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Mendocino Parducci

description: Slightly sour Meyer-lemon-pith aromas meet with honeysuckle and yellow pear on the nose of this bottling by veteran Bob Lindquist. There is a strong sizzle of acidity on the sip, where green-apple flavors meet with tart nectarine and lime-peel zip. It's very fresh and food-friendly.
title: Qupé 2015 Y Block Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
description2: Slightly sour Meyer-lemon-pith aromas meet with honeysuckle and yellow pear on the nose of this bottling by veteran Bob Lindquist. There is a strong sizzle of acidity on the sip, where green-apple flavors meet with tart nectarine and lime-peel zip. It's very fresh and food-friendly. Chardonnay US California Santa Barbara County Qupé

description: Black-cherry-cola aromas along with lots of licorice and Dr Pepper spice show on the nose of this bottling from a relatively new winery in northeast Paso Robles. There is slight sweetness to the palate, with baked cherry and baking-spice flavors. Accents of dried blackberry, leather, dried meat and purple flower add complexity.
title: Record Family Wines 2014 Reserve Syrah (Paso Robles)
description2: Black-cherry-cola aromas along with lots of licorice and Dr Pepper spice show on the nose of this bottling from a relatively new winery in northeast Paso Robles. There is slight sweetness to the palate, with baked cherry and baking-spice flavors. Accents of dried blackberry, leather, dried meat and purple flower add complexity. Syrah US California Paso Robles Record Family Wines

description: Boisterous blueberry, black cherry and black-currant aromas make for a hedonistic nose on this bottling that also offers a sultry line of cocoa, espresso and clove spice. The palate shows similar layering, from black-cherry compote to herbs to black olives, proving unique overall.
title: Sculpterra 2014 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
description2: Boisterous blueberry, black cherry and black-currant aromas make for a hedonistic nose on this bottling that also offers a sultry line of cocoa, espresso and clove spice. The palate shows similar layering, from black-cherry compote to herbs to black olives, proving unique overall. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Paso Robles Sculpterra

description: This wine is a unique in the state blend and features Cinsault (35%), Grenache (35%) and Mourvèdre. Pale peach in color with a slight bronze tinge, the aromas are light, with notes of strawberry, citrus zest and mineral. The flavors are dry, sleek and high acid. It's a perfect summer wine.
title: Syncline 2016 McKinley Springs Vineyard Rosé (Horse Heaven Hills)
description2: This wine is a unique in the state blend and features Cinsault (35%), Grenache (35%) and Mourvèdre. Pale peach in color with a slight bronze tinge, the aromas are light, with notes of strawberry, citrus zest and mineral. The flavors are dry, sleek and high acid. It's a perfect summer wine. Rosé US Washington Horse Heaven Hills Syncline

description: Highly herbal aromas shadow black cherry, plum, oregano and beet scents. This feels plump and full, while the flavor profile is pure Carmenère—herbal, minty and peppery as well as black-fruit driven. Heat, herbs and spice are draped on the finish of this love-it-or-leave-it Chilean specialty.
title: Casa Silva 2013 Los Lingues Vineyard Carmenère (Colchagua Valley)
description2: Highly herbal aromas shadow black cherry, plum, oregano and beet scents. This feels plump and full, while the flavor profile is pure Carmenère—herbal, minty and peppery as well as black-fruit driven. Heat, herbs and spice are draped on the finish of this love-it-or-leave-it Chilean specialty. Carmenère Chile Colchagua Valley  Casa Silva

description: Fresh-squeezed lemon and jalapeño open the bouquet of this wine, kosher-made in Berkeley by Covenant. With the right pairing, it'll sing, offering medium texture and a lengthy finish, the acidity balanced and in keeping with the fresh elements of tropical fruit and citrus.
title: Red C 2014 Allan Nelson Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: Fresh-squeezed lemon and jalapeño open the bouquet of this wine, kosher-made in Berkeley by Covenant. With the right pairing, it'll sing, offering medium texture and a lengthy finish, the acidity balanced and in keeping with the fresh elements of tropical fruit and citrus. Sauvignon Blanc US California Dry Creek Valley Red C

description: Floral aromas like lilac and lavender, then dry and substantial flavors like blueberry and boysenberry give this full-bodied wine an interesting personality. It tastes well structured with acidity and tannins, so it's well balanced and has an appetizing sense of reserve that will be great at the table.
title: Rock Wall 2012 Heringer Vineyard Teroldego (Yolo County)
description2: Floral aromas like lilac and lavender, then dry and substantial flavors like blueberry and boysenberry give this full-bodied wine an interesting personality. It tastes well structured with acidity and tannins, so it's well balanced and has an appetizing sense of reserve that will be great at the table. Teroldego US California Yolo County Rock Wall

description: Rich aromas of black cherry, anise seeds and buttered violets greet the nose on this dense bottling of a grape that rarely gets solo treatment. The palate is tarry and grippy, with dried sour cherries, boysenberry, black pepper and tightly grained cedar flavors that approach pine sap.
title: Santa Barbara Winery 2012 Curtis Vineyard Petit Verdot (Santa Ynez Valley)
description2: Rich aromas of black cherry, anise seeds and buttered violets greet the nose on this dense bottling of a grape that rarely gets solo treatment. The palate is tarry and grippy, with dried sour cherries, boysenberry, black pepper and tightly grained cedar flavors that approach pine sap. Petit Verdot US California Santa Ynez Valley Santa Barbara Winery

description: While the nose gives little away here apart from the slightest lemon flavors, the palate is lightly textured and shows straitlaced lemon freshness with bright rays of zesty fruit. It's an ideal, refreshing apéritif for warm summer days.
title: Sipp Mack 2014 Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
description2: While the nose gives little away here apart from the slightest lemon flavors, the palate is lightly textured and shows straitlaced lemon freshness with bright rays of zesty fruit. It's an ideal, refreshing apéritif for warm summer days. Riesling France Alsace Alsace Sipp Mack

description: Smooth and spicy, this wine explodes in layers of cinnamon and clove dusted in sugary plum and black cherry, a powerful weight and degree of ripeness at its core. The finish is soft and lengthy in vanilla oak.
title: Terlato 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
description2: Smooth and spicy, this wine explodes in layers of cinnamon and clove dusted in sugary plum and black cherry, a powerful weight and degree of ripeness at its core. The finish is soft and lengthy in vanilla oak. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Rutherford Terlato

description: This solidly good block selection shows shy aromas of dark red and purple fruit with a touch of earth and asphalt. The palate is tart and tight, with a bit of sagebrush nuance.
designation: Henry Ayrton's Block Rapley Trail Vineyard
title: Thomas Fogarty 2012 Henry Ayrton's Block Rapley Trail Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains)
description2: This solidly good block selection shows shy aromas of dark red and purple fruit with a touch of earth and asphalt. The palate is tart and tight, with a bit of sagebrush nuance. Pinot Noir US California Santa Cruz Mountains Thomas Fogarty

description: Produced by the Terravant facility in Buellton, this shows lots of smoked pork and bacon fat against a boysenberry-fruit frame on the nose. Flavors are quite sanguine, with iron and blood elements, as well as more smoke and some dried herbs.
title: Tines 2013 Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
description2: Produced by the Terravant facility in Buellton, this shows lots of smoked pork and bacon fat against a boysenberry-fruit frame on the nose. Flavors are quite sanguine, with iron and blood elements, as well as more smoke and some dried herbs. Petite Sirah US California Paso Robles Tines

description: A blend of predominantly Merlot and Syrah, this wine offers aromas of raspberries, herbs, plum and vanilla. The flavors are sweet, plump and juicy, delivering a lot of bang for the buck.
title: 14 Hands 2013 Hot to Trot Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: A blend of predominantly Merlot and Syrah, this wine offers aromas of raspberries, herbs, plum and vanilla. The flavors are sweet, plump and juicy, delivering a lot of bang for the buck. Red Blend US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) 14 Hands

description: Vibrant aromas of tangerine and flowers lead to sweet fruit flavors that show persistence. Enjoy it as an apéritif.
title: 14 Hands 2014 Moscato (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Vibrant aromas of tangerine and flowers lead to sweet fruit flavors that show persistence. Enjoy it as an apéritif. Moscato US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) 14 Hands

description: Nutty aromas of popcorn, buttered toast, peach and apple create a solid nose. This feels lively but also a bit oily. A mix of roasted nut, wood resin and pineapple flavors finish toasty, with racy acidity working as a preservative.
title: Arboleda 2014 Chardonnay (Aconcagua Costa)
description2: Nutty aromas of popcorn, buttered toast, peach and apple create a solid nose. This feels lively but also a bit oily. A mix of roasted nut, wood resin and pineapple flavors finish toasty, with racy acidity working as a preservative. Chardonnay Chile Aconcagua Costa  Arboleda

description: With 58% Mourvèdre, 20% Syrah, 20% Grenache and 2% Counoise grapes from the dry-farmed, head-pruned Old Oak Vineyard (formerly Sheep Camp Creek), this wine shows dried black cherries, pencil lead, uncrushed cloves and nutmeg on the nose. The palate is flatter, with cooked cherries as well as other dried purple and red fruits.
title: Lone Madrone 2013 Oveja Negra Red (Paso Robles Willow Creek District)
address: Paso Robles Willow Creek District, California, US
description2: With 58% Mourvèdre, 20% Syrah, 20% Grenache and 2% Counoise grapes from the dry-farmed, head-pruned Old Oak Vineyard (formerly Sheep Camp Creek), this wine shows dried black cherries, pencil lead, uncrushed cloves and nutmeg on the nose. The palate is flatter, with cooked cherries as well as other dried purple and red fruits. Rhône-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Willow Creek District Lone Madrone

description: Generous, sweet pear fruit tumbles out over palate and throat, held carefully in check by fresh zestiness. This is about easy fruit and simple pleasure, held in beautiful balance. Drink soon.
title: Lucien Albrecht 2014 Cuvée Romanus Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description2: Generous, sweet pear fruit tumbles out over palate and throat, held carefully in check by fresh zestiness. This is about easy fruit and simple pleasure, held in beautiful balance. Drink soon. Pinot Gris France Alsace Alsace Lucien Albrecht

description: A soft and layered expression of dense black cherry, chocolate and spicy tobacco, this is easy to enjoy and approachable, rich and round. A taste of black licorice dots the finishing moments.
title: Merryvale 2012 Malbec (Napa Valley)
description2: A soft and layered expression of dense black cherry, chocolate and spicy tobacco, this is easy to enjoy and approachable, rich and round. A taste of black licorice dots the finishing moments. Malbec US California Napa Valley Merryvale

description: Dusty and leathery on the rustic nose, this shows slightly sour dried red fruits and anise. The palate is all about earth—sand, clay, dirt, etc.—along with plump, ripe cranberries and cinnamon spice.
title: Mesa Del Sol 2011 Sangiovese (Arroyo Seco)
description2: Dusty and leathery on the rustic nose, this shows slightly sour dried red fruits and anise. The palate is all about earth—sand, clay, dirt, etc.—along with plump, ripe cranberries and cinnamon spice. Sangiovese US California Arroyo Seco Mesa Del Sol

description: Concentrated in toasted marshmallow and juicy blackberry, this is a large, full-bodied wine marked by puckering tannins that still need time to resolve. Powerfully built, it's big on flavor and intensity, with vanilla on the finish.
title: Murphy-Goode 2012 Reserve Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
description2: Concentrated in toasted marshmallow and juicy blackberry, this is a large, full-bodied wine marked by puckering tannins that still need time to resolve. Powerfully built, it's big on flavor and intensity, with vanilla on the finish. Zinfandel US California Alexander Valley Murphy-Goode

description: Rounded rose and honey notes with inflections of apple and Mirabelle are cut very pleasingly by the citric freshness of tangerine peel. This is easy drinking, medium bodied and aromatic.
title: Paul Blanck 2014 Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
description2: Rounded rose and honey notes with inflections of apple and Mirabelle are cut very pleasingly by the citric freshness of tangerine peel. This is easy drinking, medium bodied and aromatic. Gewürztraminer France Alsace Alsace Paul Blanck

description: Produced with dried Garganega grapes, this boasts aromas and flavors of dried apricot, baked apple, citrus zest and toasted sensations. It ends on a note of roasted hazelnut.
title: Pieropan 2011 Le Colombare  (Recioto di Soave)
description2: Produced with dried Garganega grapes, this boasts aromas and flavors of dried apricot, baked apple, citrus zest and toasted sensations. It ends on a note of roasted hazelnut. Garganega Italy Veneto Recioto di Soave Pieropan

description: Lime pith, sharp gray slate, steel and a warmer lemon-curd aroma show on the nose of this wine from a region between Morgan Hill and Gilroy. Apples and pear-skin bitterness mark the palate that grows riper through the sip.
title: Jason-Stephens 2012 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (Santa Clara Valley)
description2: Lime pith, sharp gray slate, steel and a warmer lemon-curd aroma show on the nose of this wine from a region between Morgan Hill and Gilroy. Apples and pear-skin bitterness mark the palate that grows riper through the sip. Chardonnay US California Santa Clara Valley Jason-Stephens

description: This is round and mouthfilling without being fat or blowsy, finishing fairly crisp and dry. Along the way, hints of apple and citrus alternate with almond skin and cinnamon, providing a delicate balance of fruity and savory.
title: Kim Crawford 2014 Pinot Gris (Marlborough)
description2: This is round and mouthfilling without being fat or blowsy, finishing fairly crisp and dry. Along the way, hints of apple and citrus alternate with almond skin and cinnamon, providing a delicate balance of fruity and savory. Pinot Gris New Zealand Marlborough  Kim Crawford

description: The mellowness of baked apple envelops all other aromas. While the baked apple is also apparent on the palate, it is pulled into sharp focus by fresh, lively and bright lemon acidity.
title: Kuentz-Bas 2014 Collection Riesling (Alsace)
description2: The mellowness of baked apple envelops all other aromas. While the baked apple is also apparent on the palate, it is pulled into sharp focus by fresh, lively and bright lemon acidity. Riesling France Alsace Alsace Kuentz-Bas

description: Herbal, spicy tomato and red-berry aromas come with oak-based coffee notes. This feels full, saucy, fresh and largely complete. The blend is Carignan, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, with the wine's aromas translating to flavors of stalky berry and coffee. Spice notes and dry tannins push the finish. Drink through 2019.
title: Las Casas de Vacquería 2012 Sucesor Red (Maule Valley)
description2: Herbal, spicy tomato and red-berry aromas come with oak-based coffee notes. This feels full, saucy, fresh and largely complete. The blend is Carignan, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc, with the wine's aromas translating to flavors of stalky berry and coffee. Spice notes and dry tannins push the finish. Drink through 2019. Red Blend Chile Maule Valley  Las Casas de Vacquería

description: Despite opening with saucy, earthy, gaseous aromas, this mountain-vineyard Pinot delivers textural balance and modest acidity in support of peppery, toasty, spicy flavors of dried cherry, tomato and earth. A mildly spicy, round finish provides for a good ending.
title: William Fèvre 2013 Espino Pinot Noir (Maipo Valley)
description2: Despite opening with saucy, earthy, gaseous aromas, this mountain-vineyard Pinot delivers textural balance and modest acidity in support of peppery, toasty, spicy flavors of dried cherry, tomato and earth. A mildly spicy, round finish provides for a good ending. Pinot Noir Chile Maipo Valley  William Fèvre

description: This is tropical, boisterous rendition of the grape, with heavy tuberose, white lily, peach and apple-blossom aromas. The palate combines honeysuckle, ripe apple flesh and pineapple-guava flavors.
title: Zinke 2013 Viognier (Santa Barbara County)
description2: This is tropical, boisterous rendition of the grape, with heavy tuberose, white lily, peach and apple-blossom aromas. The palate combines honeysuckle, ripe apple flesh and pineapple-guava flavors. Viognier US California Santa Barbara County Zinke

description: Warm aromas of red cherries, star anise and cinnamon greet the nose with inviting brown spice scents on this entry-level bottling. Cinnamon, cranberry and black plum show on the palate, along with pencil-lead minerality and a tart plum-skin finish.
title: Hahn 2014 Pinot Noir (Monterey County)
description2: Warm aromas of red cherries, star anise and cinnamon greet the nose with inviting brown spice scents on this entry-level bottling. Cinnamon, cranberry and black plum show on the palate, along with pencil-lead minerality and a tart plum-skin finish. Pinot Noir US California Monterey County Hahn

description: The toast, freshly ground coffee, dark chocolate and cherry aromas pop. Plum and chocolate flavors are smooth in feel and linger on the finish.
title: Columbia Crest 2013 Grand Estates Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: The toast, freshly ground coffee, dark chocolate and cherry aromas pop. Plum and chocolate flavors are smooth in feel and linger on the finish. Merlot US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Columbia Crest

description: Shrouds of leafy herbs and savory stems lend a fresh tone to this brisk yet fruity, concentrated Cab. Crisp blackberry and currant flavors shine bright and pert on the palate, framed squarely by lingering strikes of tannin and acidity.
title: Fulkerson 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
description2: Shrouds of leafy herbs and savory stems lend a fresh tone to this brisk yet fruity, concentrated Cab. Crisp blackberry and currant flavors shine bright and pert on the palate, framed squarely by lingering strikes of tannin and acidity. Cabernet Sauvignon US New York Finger Lakes Fulkerson

description: Opens with dark concentration and extra flesh and density in terms of texture. There's an extra padding of softness that helps buffer the vintage's high acidity and natural firmness. Not ready to drink for another 10 years at least.
title: Fornacina 2006 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
description2: Opens with dark concentration and extra flesh and density in terms of texture. There's an extra padding of softness that helps buffer the vintage's high acidity and natural firmness. Not ready to drink for another 10 years at least. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Fornacina

description: A rich and sophisticated wine, with loads of dark fruit and exotic spice. It's bright ruby-garnet appearance, with bright acidity and a fresh, lively finish.
title: San Polino 2006 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
description2: A rich and sophisticated wine, with loads of dark fruit and exotic spice. It's bright ruby-garnet appearance, with bright acidity and a fresh, lively finish. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino San Polino

description: Tenuta di Sesta is run by a perfect father-mother-daughter-son team and is located in one of the least-traveled corners of Montalcino. The 2007 Brunello delivers sweet oak tones that drive the initial bouquet and are soon followed by bright cherry, vanilla bean, sweet mocha and rum cake. Pretty balsam notes at the back will undoubtedly increase and evolve with age. Cellar this wine 10 years.
title: Tenuta di Sesta 2007  Brunello di Montalcino
description2: Tenuta di Sesta is run by a perfect father-mother-daughter-son team and is located in one of the least-traveled corners of Montalcino. The 2007 Brunello delivers sweet oak tones that drive the initial bouquet and are soon followed by bright cherry, vanilla bean, sweet mocha and rum cake. Pretty balsam notes at the back will undoubtedly increase and evolve with age. Cellar this wine 10 years. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Tenuta di Sesta

description: At this stage, the wine is all dark structure and very firm. It will need time to develop its full potential as an intensely rich wine. Concentrated and firm, it is powered by tannins as well as sweet red fruits. So age for five years at least.
title: Louis Jadot 2009 Petite Chapelle Premier Cru  (Gevrey-Chambertin)
description2: At this stage, the wine is all dark structure and very firm. It will need time to develop its full potential as an intensely rich wine. Concentrated and firm, it is powered by tannins as well as sweet red fruits. So age for five years at least. Pinot Noir France Burgundy Gevrey-Chambertin Louis Jadot

description: The ripe fruit element is perfectly contained and just short of seeming overdone or jammy. It's soft and round, with loads of oak-driven spice, like cinnamon and ground clove, and plump tones of red cherry, blackberry and plum. What's really nice is the freshness and overall supple texture.
title: Máté 2007  Brunello di Montalcino
description2: The ripe fruit element is perfectly contained and just short of seeming overdone or jammy. It's soft and round, with loads of oak-driven spice, like cinnamon and ground clove, and plump tones of red cherry, blackberry and plum. What's really nice is the freshness and overall supple texture. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Máté

description: Made from eight vineyards located throughout this sprawling appellation, this wine showcases the art of the blend, and is an extraordinary achievement for its sheer opulence. Offers wave after wave of Pinot flavor, with superb tannins and mouthwatering acidity. The fact that this is Merry Edwards's least expensive Pinot Noir is amazing and makes it a special buy. Production was 2,370 cases.
title: Merry Edwards 2009 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: Made from eight vineyards located throughout this sprawling appellation, this wine showcases the art of the blend, and is an extraordinary achievement for its sheer opulence. Offers wave after wave of Pinot flavor, with superb tannins and mouthwatering acidity. The fact that this is Merry Edwards's least expensive Pinot Noir is amazing and makes it a special buy. Production was 2,370 cases. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast Merry Edwards

description: Well stitched together with a broad, wide assembly of dark fruit, spice and cola-like aromas. All the wine's elements sing loud as a single chorus; bold, plush, chewy. Ends with ripe fruit, rum cake, pipe tobacco and dark espresso bean. Firm, great length.
title: Molino di Sant'Antimo 2007  Brunello di Montalcino
description2: Well stitched together with a broad, wide assembly of dark fruit, spice and cola-like aromas. All the wine's elements sing loud as a single chorus; bold, plush, chewy. Ends with ripe fruit, rum cake, pipe tobacco and dark espresso bean. Firm, great length. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Molino di Sant'Antimo

description: A lovely Pinot, dry, crisp and silky, with ripe raspberry, strawberry and cherry fruit flavors, grounded by notes of grilled mushrooms, exotic spices and forest undergrowth. Sweetly delicious now, it should blossom over the next six years.
title: Native 9 2009 Rancho Ontiveros Vineyards Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
description2: A lovely Pinot, dry, crisp and silky, with ripe raspberry, strawberry and cherry fruit flavors, grounded by notes of grilled mushrooms, exotic spices and forest undergrowth. Sweetly delicious now, it should blossom over the next six years. Pinot Noir US California Santa Maria Valley Native 9

description: This wine has some big shoulders. There's a dusty, aged quality, with sophisticated, silky tannins and tertiary aromas of black licorice, dried tobacco, peppercorn and dried berry fruit. It's firm, tight and compact; age 10 more years.
title: Podere Brizio 2006 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
description2: This wine has some big shoulders. There's a dusty, aged quality, with sophisticated, silky tannins and tertiary aromas of black licorice, dried tobacco, peppercorn and dried berry fruit. It's firm, tight and compact; age 10 more years. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Podere Brizio

description: Madre is the name of a beautiful vineyard parcel on the Poggio Antico estate, with views that extend from Montalcino to the Mediterranean Sea. This hearty blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon is intense and rich, with long-lasting notes of blackberry, smoke, spice and black pepper. The mouthfeel is lush and velvety.
title: Poggio Antico 2009 Madre Red (Toscana)
description2: Madre is the name of a beautiful vineyard parcel on the Poggio Antico estate, with views that extend from Montalcino to the Mediterranean Sea. This hearty blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon is intense and rich, with long-lasting notes of blackberry, smoke, spice and black pepper. The mouthfeel is lush and velvety. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Toscana Poggio Antico

description: This Brunello delivers an intense and complex bouquet featuring beautifully integrated aromas of dark fruit, spice, leather and tobacco. Tight tannins promise a long future ahead.
title: Mocali 2006 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
description2: This Brunello delivers an intense and complex bouquet featuring beautifully integrated aromas of dark fruit, spice, leather and tobacco. Tight tannins promise a long future ahead. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Mocali

description: You know you're dealing with a great Pinot Noir when it's this delicious right out of the bottle, yet will age. This wine is enormously rich and sweet in cherries, blackberries, blueberries and cola, a wine that almost everyone will find delicious. Yet with thick tannins and brisk acidity, it has the protective structure to evolve over at least six years, and possibly longer.
title: Pessagno 2009 Four Boys Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
description2: You know you're dealing with a great Pinot Noir when it's this delicious right out of the bottle, yet will age. This wine is enormously rich and sweet in cherries, blackberries, blueberries and cola, a wine that almost everyone will find delicious. Yet with thick tannins and brisk acidity, it has the protective structure to evolve over at least six years, and possibly longer. Pinot Noir US California Santa Lucia Highlands Pessagno

description: Opens with dark concentration and ripe berry fruit with layers of plum, blackberry, dark chocolate, pipe tobacco, cherry liqueur, cola and underbrush. It offers a wonderful 360-degree portrait of Sangiovese Grosso. Tight structure, integration and loads of fruity intensity. Drink after 2018.
title: Pietranera 2007  Brunello di Montalcino
description2: Opens with dark concentration and ripe berry fruit with layers of plum, blackberry, dark chocolate, pipe tobacco, cherry liqueur, cola and underbrush. It offers a wonderful 360-degree portrait of Sangiovese Grosso. Tight structure, integration and loads of fruity intensity. Drink after 2018. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Pietranera

description: Just wonderful, showing the great richness and complexity of a top Santa Rita Pinot Noir. Partial whole-cluster fermentation gives the wine a spicy earthiness and full-bodied tannins, yet the underlying red berry and cherry fruit shines through. Showing well now and over the next six years.
title: Samsara 2009 Kessler-Haak Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: Just wonderful, showing the great richness and complexity of a top Santa Rita Pinot Noir. Partial whole-cluster fermentation gives the wine a spicy earthiness and full-bodied tannins, yet the underlying red berry and cherry fruit shines through. Showing well now and over the next six years. Pinot Noir US California Sta. Rita Hills Samsara

description: This full-bodied wine opens with compelling aromas of black fruit, smoked bacon, leather, cinnamon and crushed clove. There's a sassy, spicy characteristic here that is further underlined by the wine's natural sweetness and roundness.
title: Tenimenti Angelini 2006 Vigna Spuntali Val di Suga  (Brunello di Montalcino)
description2: This full-bodied wine opens with compelling aromas of black fruit, smoked bacon, leather, cinnamon and crushed clove. There's a sassy, spicy characteristic here that is further underlined by the wine's natural sweetness and roundness. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Tenimenti Angelini

description: Austere, tight and sophisticated, this well-extracted Brunello shows dry aromas of crushed granite along with ethereal tones of dried ginger, black licorice and root beer. Inky appearance with chewy richness. The mouthfeel is round, chewy and packed with sweet fruit and spice. Drink after 2015.
title: Uccelliera 2007  Brunello di Montalcino
description2: Austere, tight and sophisticated, this well-extracted Brunello shows dry aromas of crushed granite along with ethereal tones of dried ginger, black licorice and root beer. Inky appearance with chewy richness. The mouthfeel is round, chewy and packed with sweet fruit and spice. Drink after 2015. Sangiovese Grosso Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Uccelliera

description: One sip is all it takes to know this is a terrific Pinot Noir. It's dry, silky and complex, and not only that, it will develop bottle nuance over the next six years. Rich and flamboyant in cherry pie filling, persimmon and mushu-plum sauce flavors, yet layered with earthy, foresty notes of mushrooms, soy sauce and balsam. You can drink it now, but give it an hour or two of decanting.
title: Chronicle 2009 Cerise Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
description2: One sip is all it takes to know this is a terrific Pinot Noir. It's dry, silky and complex, and not only that, it will develop bottle nuance over the next six years. Rich and flamboyant in cherry pie filling, persimmon and mushu-plum sauce flavors, yet layered with earthy, foresty notes of mushrooms, soy sauce and balsam. You can drink it now, but give it an hour or two of decanting. Pinot Noir US California Anderson Valley Chronicle

description: While the texture of this Pinot is silky and light, it's dramatic in flavor. The cherries, plums, pomegranates and persimmons are packed together into a dense core of taste, all spiced up with cinnamon, cloves and anise. Feels dramatic and complex, but young and fresh in acids and tannins. Give it 5–6 years.
title: Coghlan 2009 Diopside Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: While the texture of this Pinot is silky and light, it's dramatic in flavor. The cherries, plums, pomegranates and persimmons are packed together into a dense core of taste, all spiced up with cinnamon, cloves and anise. Feels dramatic and complex, but young and fresh in acids and tannins. Give it 5–6 years. Pinot Noir US California Sta. Rita Hills Coghlan

description: This successful riserva displays opulence and a bold, modern style that focuses on bright cherry and savory spice aromas. The wine is loaded with density and richness, and combines a ripe soft feel with a lively berries on the finish.
title: Collosorbo 2006 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
description2: This successful riserva displays opulence and a bold, modern style that focuses on bright cherry and savory spice aromas.
