description2: The quinta for this wine is on the plateau north of the Douro river. It has produced a red-fruit wine, rich with soft tannins and juicy fruitiness. The wood aging is already well integrated into this bold, ripe wine. Drink now. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Quinta de Porrais

description: This wine is light in body but heavily perfumed. Clean fruit shows on the palate, with an addition of geranium aromas.
title: Quinta do Vale Meão 2015 Vintage  (Port)
description2: This wine is light in body but heavily perfumed. Clean fruit shows on the palate, with an addition of geranium aromas. Port Portugal Port  Quinta do Vale Meão

description: This full-bodied wine conveys Douro warmth. A light touch of tannin gives it shape. Pepper and red-berry fruits complete a generous wine that will be best with food. Drink now.
title: Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo 2016 Rosé (Douro)
winery: Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo
description2: This full-bodied wine conveys Douro warmth. A light touch of tannin gives it shape. Pepper and red-berry fruits complete a generous wine that will be best with food. Drink now. Rosé Portugal Douro  Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmo

description: This late release sourced from several vineyards dating back to the 1970s and 1980s is thin on the palate, with tart plum, herb, orange peel and of pineapple hints. Low alcohol reflects the cool vintage.
title: Ransom 2013 Selection Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
description2: This late release sourced from several vineyards dating back to the 1970s and 1980s is thin on the palate, with tart plum, herb, orange peel and of pineapple hints. Low alcohol reflects the cool vintage. Pinot Noir US Oregon Eola-Amity Hills Ransom

description: This simple, open and fruity wine has gentle tannins. It is all about ripe berries and acidity. Made to be drunk young for its fruitiness, it is ready now.
title: Rui Roboredo Madeira 2015 Beyra Colheita Red (Beira Interior)
description2: This simple, open and fruity wine has gentle tannins. It is all about ripe berries and acidity. Made to be drunk young for its fruitiness, it is ready now. Portuguese Red Portugal Beira Interior  Rui Roboredo Madeira

description: From vines grown in the upper Douro Superior, this is crisp while also having ripe apple and apricot fruitiness. It is a lively wine, tangy with orange zest and a touch of spice. Drink now.
title: Rui Roboredo Madeira 2016 Castello d'Alba Branco White (Douro)
description2: From vines grown in the upper Douro Superior, this is crisp while also having ripe apple and apricot fruitiness. It is a lively wine, tangy with orange zest and a touch of spice. Drink now. Portuguese White Portugal Douro  Rui Roboredo Madeira

description: This ripe, full-bodied rosé is made from 100% rich, perfumed Touriga Nacional. Good balance between ripe strawberry fruits and the crisp acidity make it both fruity and warm. Drink now.
title: Secret Spot Wines 2016 Vale da Poupa Rosé (Douro)
description2: This ripe, full-bodied rosé is made from 100% rich, perfumed Touriga Nacional. Good balance between ripe strawberry fruits and the crisp acidity make it both fruity and warm. Drink now. Rosé Portugal Douro  Secret Spot Wines

description: Made in the style of a southern Rhône blend (half Viognier and one quarter each Marsanne and Roussanne), this is lightly lemony, with a bit more fat in the middle. None of the three grapes overpowers the others, but the flavors feel a bit generic. Though fermented in stainless steel, it's gold in color and shows some hints of toast.
title: Simple Machine 2013 Leverage White (Rogue Valley)
description2: Made in the style of a southern Rhône blend (half Viognier and one quarter each Marsanne and Roussanne), this is lightly lemony, with a bit more fat in the middle. None of the three grapes overpowers the others, but the flavors feel a bit generic. Though fermented in stainless steel, it's gold in color and shows some hints of toast. Rhône-style White Blend US Oregon Rogue Valley Simple Machine

description: This medium-bodied wine features a heavy dose of baking spices and vanilla layered atop notions of earth and red cherries. It's a little dry and woody, but cinnamon and clove notes add charm.
title: Ten Sisters 2015 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
description2: This medium-bodied wine features a heavy dose of baking spices and vanilla layered atop notions of earth and red cherries. It's a little dry and woody, but cinnamon and clove notes add charm. Pinot Noir New Zealand Marlborough  Ten Sisters

description: This early-drinking Nero d'Avola opens with ripe black-skinned fruit, tilled soil and cooking spice aromas. Straightforward and savory, it delivers black cherry, blackberry and ground pepper flavors alongside round tannins.
title: Tenuta Rapitalà 2016 Campo Reale Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
description2: This early-drinking Nero d'Avola opens with ripe black-skinned fruit, tilled soil and cooking spice aromas. Straightforward and savory, it delivers black cherry, blackberry and ground pepper flavors alongside round tannins. Nero d'Avola Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Tenuta Rapitalà

description: Exceptionally light, this acid-driven wine is all flowers and green apple, with just the slightest reach out to honeycomb-like texture and weight. It'll do well at the table in its unfussy approach and crispness.
title: Uptick Vineyards 2014 Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Exceptionally light, this acid-driven wine is all flowers and green apple, with just the slightest reach out to honeycomb-like texture and weight. It'll do well at the table in its unfussy approach and crispness. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley Uptick Vineyards

description: Consistently the top showing wine from the Le Val range, this is ripe and rounded, with a creamy texture and a toasty, spicy touch from light wood aging. Drink now.
title: Vinadeis 2016 Le Val Chardonnay (Vin de France)
address: Vin de France, France Other, France
description2: Consistently the top showing wine from the Le Val range, this is ripe and rounded, with a creamy texture and a toasty, spicy touch from light wood aging. Drink now. Chardonnay France France Other Vin de France Vinadeis

description: Woody oak shows the 50% barrel fermentation behind this wine, sourced largely from the Dry Creek Valley. Baked apple and vanilla cream accent a thickly concentrated frame of big flavor and soft lush texture.
title: Wild Thing 2015 Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
description2: Woody oak shows the 50% barrel fermentation behind this wine, sourced largely from the Dry Creek Valley. Baked apple and vanilla cream accent a thickly concentrated frame of big flavor and soft lush texture. Chardonnay US California Sonoma County Wild Thing

description: This wine's aromas are marked by bright cherries and an undercurrent of button mushrooms. It's medium bodied and crisp, with just enough silky-textured tannin to give it some grip. Drink now.
title: Dashwood 2015 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
description2: This wine's aromas are marked by bright cherries and an undercurrent of button mushrooms. It's medium bodied and crisp, with just enough silky-textured tannin to give it some grip. Drink now. Pinot Noir New Zealand Marlborough  Dashwood

description: Made from 100% Chardonnay, this shows lemon, apple and nectarine on the nose with hints of croisant. Spritely bubbles quickly fade, leaving honeydew, green apple, nectarine and a hint of pastry. The finish is fresh with lemon juice and tart apple.
title: Gruet 2011 Sauvage Sparkling (America)
description2: Made from 100% Chardonnay, this shows lemon, apple and nectarine on the nose with hints of croisant. Spritely bubbles quickly fade, leaving honeydew, green apple, nectarine and a hint of pastry. The finish is fresh with lemon juice and tart apple. Sparkling Blend US America  Gruet

description: Based in Burgundy, this producer understands Chardonnay. That's why this wine is so finely balanced, with a ripe and perfumed character and a warm, full aftertaste. Drink now.
title: L. Tramier & Fils 2016 Tramier Chardonnay (Vin de France)
address: Vin de France, France Other, France
description2: Based in Burgundy, this producer understands Chardonnay. That's why this wine is so finely balanced, with a ripe and perfumed character and a warm, full aftertaste. Drink now. Chardonnay France France Other Vin de France L. Tramier & Fils

description: This is weighty, creamy and medium to full in body. It has plenty of lime and pear flavors, plus slight brown sugar and vanilla notes.
title: Souverain 2010 Chardonnay (North Coast)
description2: This is weighty, creamy and medium to full in body. It has plenty of lime and pear flavors, plus slight brown sugar and vanilla notes. Chardonnay US California North Coast Souverain

description: There's a touch of toasted almond at the start, but then this Grillo revs up in the glass to deliver notes of citrus, stone fruit, crushed stone and lemon tart. The mouthfeel is crisp and simple.
title: Tasca d'Almerita 2011 Sallier de la Tour Grillo (Sicilia)
description2: There's a touch of toasted almond at the start, but then this Grillo revs up in the glass to deliver notes of citrus, stone fruit, crushed stone and lemon tart. The mouthfeel is crisp and simple. Grillo Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Tasca d'Almerita

description: Lightly herbal strawberry and raspberry aromas are authentic and fresh. On the palate, this is light and juicy, with snappy, lean flavors of red fruit and dry spice. The finish is dry and oaky.
title: Tres Palacios 2011 Reserve Pinot Noir (Maipo Valley)
description2: Lightly herbal strawberry and raspberry aromas are authentic and fresh. On the palate, this is light and juicy, with snappy, lean flavors of red fruit and dry spice. The finish is dry and oaky. Pinot Noir Chile Maipo Valley  Tres Palacios

description: Fruity and lightly herbaceous, this has fine textured acidity along with a pink grapefruit flavor. The wine is bright and easy, and it will be ready to drink in a few months.
title: Château de Sours 2011 La Fleur d'Amélie  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description2: Fruity and lightly herbaceous, this has fine textured acidity along with a pink grapefruit flavor. The wine is bright and easy, and it will be ready to drink in a few months. Bordeaux-style White Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Blanc Château de Sours

description: Made from Roussanne, Viognier and other Rhône varieties, this blend is dry, soft and heavy. But it is flavorful, offering waves of apricots, peaches and coconut-tinged macaroons.
title: Derby 2010 Fifteen 10 White White (Paso Robles)
description2: Made from Roussanne, Viognier and other Rhône varieties, this blend is dry, soft and heavy. But it is flavorful, offering waves of apricots, peaches and coconut-tinged macaroons. Rhône-style White Blend US California Paso Robles Derby

description: Heavy and soft, this is lacking in structure and vitality. It has some ripe flavors of blackberries, currants and spice. Drink up.
title: Envolve 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
description2: Heavy and soft, this is lacking in structure and vitality. It has some ripe flavors of blackberries, currants and spice. Drink up. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Sonoma Valley Envolve

description: This is a prickly wine, with a strong blast of nettle and green herb aromas. It has weight and texture on the palate, while the flavors of citrus fruits and salad greens are pithy and mildly bitter. Green and white pepper notes dominate the finish.
title: Arboleda 2011 Sauvignon Blanc (Aconcagua Valley)
description2: This is a prickly wine, with a strong blast of nettle and green herb aromas. It has weight and texture on the palate, while the flavors of citrus fruits and salad greens are pithy and mildly bitter. Green and white pepper notes dominate the finish. Sauvignon Blanc Chile Aconcagua Valley  Arboleda

description: Rich and substantial, this is potent in blackberry, cassis and dark chocolate flavors. High alcohol gives it a hot mouthfeel. It's not really representative of the Arrowood name of old.
title: Arrowood 2008 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
description2: Rich and substantial, this is potent in blackberry, cassis and dark chocolate flavors. High alcohol gives it a hot mouthfeel. It's not really representative of the Arrowood name of old. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Sonoma County Arrowood

description: Dark and inky, this natural wine is made from organic fruit, and it offers aromas of cured beef and prune, followed by accents of tobacco and wet earth. There's not much fruit, and it shows slightly bitter tannins on the close.
title: Bonavita 2009  Faro
description2: Dark and inky, this natural wine is made from organic fruit, and it offers aromas of cured beef and prune, followed by accents of tobacco and wet earth. There's not much fruit, and it shows slightly bitter tannins on the close. Red Blend Italy Sicily & Sardinia Faro Bonavita

description: This tastes bone dry, with a caramel note that's followed by light, bright notes of red berry and apple. The finish is crisp and tight.
title: Château de Pizay 2011 Rosé d'Une Nuit Gamay (Beaujolais Rosé)
description2: This tastes bone dry, with a caramel note that's followed by light, bright notes of red berry and apple. The finish is crisp and tight. Gamay France Beaujolais Beaujolais Rosé Château de Pizay

description: From an estate in the Entre-Deux-Mers region, this wine is firm and concentrated, packed with ripe tannins and juicy blackberry fruit. Dense, with dusty tannins, it is smooth and polished in texture.
title: Château Marac 2010  Bordeaux Supérieur
description2: From an estate in the Entre-Deux-Mers region, this wine is firm and concentrated, packed with ripe tannins and juicy blackberry fruit. Dense, with dusty tannins, it is smooth and polished in texture. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Supérieur Château Marac

description: Tart and dry, this has a broad flavor that does not express much varietal specificity, with some notes of caramel and butter. Not yet knit together, this could improve significantly with further bottle age.
title: Chehalem 2011 Stoller Vineyards Pinot Blanc (Dundee Hills)
description2: Tart and dry, this has a broad flavor that does not express much varietal specificity, with some notes of caramel and butter. Not yet knit together, this could improve significantly with further bottle age. Pinot Blanc US Oregon Dundee Hills Chehalem

description: Leather, cheese, licorice, herb and tomato notes define the nose on this snappy, crisp Cabernet that's more racy and zesty than rich and deep. The finish is wiry, but overall the wine is short on richness.
title: Cono Sur 2010 Visión El Recurso Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
description2: Leather, cheese, licorice, herb and tomato notes define the nose on this snappy, crisp Cabernet that's more racy and zesty than rich and deep. The finish is wiry, but overall the wine is short on richness. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Maipo Valley  Cono Sur

description: A classically fruity Beaujolais from the south of the region, this is packed with bitter cherry and ripe raspberry flavors. The tannins are soft—plentiful enough to lend structure. It is delicious, juicy and ready to drink.
title: Domaine du Vissoux 2011 Les Griottes  (Beaujolais)
description2: A classically fruity Beaujolais from the south of the region, this is packed with bitter cherry and ripe raspberry flavors. The tannins are soft—plentiful enough to lend structure. It is delicious, juicy and ready to drink. Gamay France Beaujolais Beaujolais Domaine du Vissoux

description: A big, heavy rosé, this has an orange-pink color and slightly sweet flavors of jammy raspberry, vanilla and cream. A blend of Syrah and Grenache.
title: Envolve 2011 Rosé (Sonoma Mountain)
description2: A big, heavy rosé, this has an orange-pink color and slightly sweet flavors of jammy raspberry, vanilla and cream. A blend of Syrah and Grenache. Rosé US California Sonoma Mountain Envolve

description: The Dion is a new entry in the long list of Erath single-vineyard wines. It doesn't show much in this difficult vintage. Short and intensely herbal, it has strong scents and flavors of tomato leaf, which override any hint of ripe fruit flavor.
title: Erath 2010 Dion Pinot Noir (Chehalem Mountains)
description2: The Dion is a new entry in the long list of Erath single-vineyard wines. It doesn't show much in this difficult vintage. Short and intensely herbal, it has strong scents and flavors of tomato leaf, which override any hint of ripe fruit flavor. Pinot Noir US Oregon Chehalem Mountains Erath

description: It's difficult to understand what this is trying to be. Pinot Gris can show some light blush color, but this wine is almost pink. The result is tannic and tart, with a rhubarb-like flavor.
title: Erath 2011 Dion Vineyard Rosé Pinot Gris (Chehalem Mountains)
description2: It's difficult to understand what this is trying to be. Pinot Gris can show some light blush color, but this wine is almost pink. The result is tannic and tart, with a rhubarb-like flavor. Pinot Gris US Oregon Chehalem Mountains Erath

description: This has surprisingly structured fruits and firm tannins for a Nouveau, and it still maintains a juicy cherry flavor and ripe acidity. The finish has a tangy, textured character.
title: Georges Duboeuf 2012 Nouveau  (Beaujolais)
description2: This has surprisingly structured fruits and firm tannins for a Nouveau, and it still maintains a juicy cherry flavor and ripe acidity. The finish has a tangy, textured character. Gamay France Beaujolais Beaujolais Georges Duboeuf

description: This is an earthy effort that shows the tough soil of Cahors in its minerally, tight character. Dark in color, this is laced with intense acids and firm tannins.
title: Georges Vigouroux 2011 Pigmentum Malbec (Cahors)
description2: This is an earthy effort that shows the tough soil of Cahors in its minerally, tight character. Dark in color, this is laced with intense acids and firm tannins. Malbec France Southwest France Cahors Georges Vigouroux

description: This starts out fresh on the nose, with a modest herbal accent. The palate is lively and clean, with ample body and good balance. Flavors of cherry, plum and herb lead to a mildly green-tasting finish.
title: Lomas del Valle 2011 Coastal Cool Climate Merlot (Casablanca Valley)
description2: This starts out fresh on the nose, with a modest herbal accent. The palate is lively and clean, with ample body and good balance. Flavors of cherry, plum and herb lead to a mildly green-tasting finish. Merlot Chile Casablanca Valley  Lomas del Valle

description: A blend of Primitivo (70%) and Syrah, this opens with sweet aromas of raspberry candy and bitter almond. The finish is characterized by a fresh blueberry flavor.
title: Miali 2011 Ametys Rosato (Puglia)
description2: A blend of Primitivo (70%) and Syrah, this opens with sweet aromas of raspberry candy and bitter almond. The finish is characterized by a fresh blueberry flavor. Rosato Italy Southern Italy Puglia Miali

description: This delivers great Pinot-like character for its price tier. Give it credit for the dry silkiness, clean acidity and vibrant cherry, cola and oak flavors.
title: Newman's Own 2010 Pinot Noir (California)
description2: This delivers great Pinot-like character for its price tier. Give it credit for the dry silkiness, clean acidity and vibrant cherry, cola and oak flavors. Pinot Noir US California California Newman's Own

description: This demonstrates Viognier's typical full, fleshy, intensely flavored palate, with tropical flavors of kiwi and bitter papaya seed, plus an ultraripe note of honeydew and a hint of flower.
title: Pearmund 2011 Vinecroft Vineyard Viognier (Virginia)
description2: This demonstrates Viognier's typical full, fleshy, intensely flavored palate, with tropical flavors of kiwi and bitter papaya seed, plus an ultraripe note of honeydew and a hint of flower. Viognier US Virginia Virginia Pearmund

description: A blend of St. Laurent and Pinot Noir, this is a full, round wine. It has a soft, juicy texture that comes with a touch of barnyard as well as warm strawberry fruit. The finish is rich, and the wine is ready to drink.
title: Pratsch 2009 Erdpress Red (Niederösterreich)
description2: A blend of St. Laurent and Pinot Noir, this is a full, round wine. It has a soft, juicy texture that comes with a touch of barnyard as well as warm strawberry fruit. The finish is rich, and the wine is ready to drink. Austrian Red Blend Austria Niederösterreich  Pratsch

description: Made with organically farmed grapes, this blend of 60% Sangiovese, 30% Barbera and 10% Sagrantino opens with aromas of tilled earth, blue flower, ripe berry and spice. The dense palate doles out fleshy black cherry, crushed plum, black pepper and tobacco alongside firm but velvety tannins. It finishes on a succulent note.
title: Di Filippo 2012  Montefalco Rosso
description2: Made with organically farmed grapes, this blend of 60% Sangiovese, 30% Barbera and 10% Sagrantino opens with aromas of tilled earth, blue flower, ripe berry and spice. The dense palate doles out fleshy black cherry, crushed plum, black pepper and tobacco alongside firm but velvety tannins. It finishes on a succulent note. Red Blend Italy Central Italy Montefalco Rosso Di Filippo

description: Soft and sexy, this small-production Pinot is made from Swan-clone grapes exclusively, which provides an intriguing spiciness to the wine. Amid the spice is a brambly taste of blackberry and blueberry, layered and juicy on the palate, the tannins well-ingrained through the finish.
title: Domaine Carneros 2012 Clonal Series Swan Pinot Noir (Carneros)
description2: Soft and sexy, this small-production Pinot is made from Swan-clone grapes exclusively, which provides an intriguing spiciness to the wine. Amid the spice is a brambly taste of blackberry and blueberry, layered and juicy on the palate, the tannins well-ingrained through the finish. Pinot Noir US California Carneros Domaine Carneros

description: This very approachable and likable wine puts the typical dried-grass aromas atop stone fruit scents. The palate is very herb-tinged, with parsley, thyme and rosemary finding a nice symbiosis with the riper nectarine and melon flesh.
title: J. Lohr 2013 Flume Crossing Sauvignon Blanc (Arroyo Seco)
description2: This very approachable and likable wine puts the typical dried-grass aromas atop stone fruit scents. The palate is very herb-tinged, with parsley, thyme and rosemary finding a nice symbiosis with the riper nectarine and melon flesh. Sauvignon Blanc US California Arroyo Seco J. Lohr

description: Supple and accessible, this Cabernet is bright in acidity and soft in tannins, yet amply structured. The palate is layered with flavors of cherry and cranberry, with a hit of nuanced oak on the finish.
title: Jamieson Ranch 2012 Double Lariat Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: Supple and accessible, this Cabernet is bright in acidity and soft in tannins, yet amply structured. The palate is layered with flavors of cherry and cranberry, with a hit of nuanced oak on the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Jamieson Ranch

description: This is the first vintage made by the vineyard owners in 25 years, a welcome return for one of the founding families of Oregon viticulture. Strawberries and raspberries, tart and spicy, anchor an elegant and interesting young wine. The finish continues clean and well-defined. Don't look for a blockbuster style; rather it's more delicate and refined.
title: Knudsen 2012 Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
description2: This is the first vintage made by the vineyard owners in 25 years, a welcome return for one of the founding families of Oregon viticulture. Strawberries and raspberries, tart and spicy, anchor an elegant and interesting young wine. The finish continues clean and well-defined. Don't look for a blockbuster style; rather it's more delicate and refined. Pinot Noir US Oregon Dundee Hills Knudsen

description: There's an earthy intensity to this reserve wine, generous in oak and cedar notes with complicated, concentrated mix of plum, cherry and berry. Nonetheless, the wine intrigues and delights.
title: Buena Vista 2012 Private Reserve Pinot Noir (Sonoma County)
description2: There's an earthy intensity to this reserve wine, generous in oak and cedar notes with complicated, concentrated mix of plum, cherry and berry. Nonetheless, the wine intrigues and delights. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma County Buena Vista

description: Bright and silky, this blend of Sangiovese, Sagrantino, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot offers aromas of blue flower, spicy red berry and a hint of leather. The savory palate offers layers of crushed wild cherry, red raspberry, white pepper and clove alongside supple tannins. Succulent and easy drinking, it should be enjoyed through 2016 to capture fresh fruit.
title: Cantina Fratelli Pardi 2011  Montefalco Rosso
description2: Bright and silky, this blend of Sangiovese, Sagrantino, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot offers aromas of blue flower, spicy red berry and a hint of leather. The savory palate offers layers of crushed wild cherry, red raspberry, white pepper and clove alongside supple tannins. Succulent and easy drinking, it should be enjoyed through 2016 to capture fresh fruit. Red Blend Italy Central Italy Montefalco Rosso Cantina Fratelli Pardi

description: This wine delivers on richness of flavor without being overwhelming or overdone. Refined in soft tannins and a core of expressive, juicy blue and black berry fruit, it is seductive and smoky on the finish, sourced mainly from vineyards in the Dry Creek Valley.
title: Rancho Zabaco 2012 Sonoma Heritage Vines Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
description2: This wine delivers on richness of flavor without being overwhelming or overdone. Refined in soft tannins and a core of expressive, juicy blue and black berry fruit, it is seductive and smoky on the finish, sourced mainly from vineyards in the Dry Creek Valley. Zinfandel US California Sonoma County Rancho Zabaco

description: Underbrush, forest floor, crushed violet, new leather, mature plum and graphite aromas lead the nose on this brawny red. The hearty palate delivers dried black cherry, blackberry, nutmeg, grilled sage and licorice alongside youthfully aggressive but ripe tannins. Drink 2015–2025.
title: Romanelli 2010  Montefalco Sagrantino
description2: Underbrush, forest floor, crushed violet, new leather, mature plum and graphite aromas lead the nose on this brawny red. The hearty palate delivers dried black cherry, blackberry, nutmeg, grilled sage and licorice alongside youthfully aggressive but ripe tannins. Drink 2015–2025. Sagrantino Italy Central Italy Montefalco Sagrantino Romanelli

description: Made from old vines of Cesanese, this structured red offers an intriguing fragrance of violets, rose, red berry, scorched earth and a whiff of nutmeg. The bright, juicy palate delivers wild cherry, orange peel, clove and baking spice alongside supple, smooth tannins.
title: Principe Pallavicini 2012 Amarasco Cesanese (Lazio)
description2: Made from old vines of Cesanese, this structured red offers an intriguing fragrance of violets, rose, red berry, scorched earth and a whiff of nutmeg. The bright, juicy palate delivers wild cherry, orange peel, clove and baking spice alongside supple, smooth tannins. Cesanese Italy Central Italy Lazio Principe Pallavicini

description: Lithe and dancing in texture, yet robustly concentrated with yellow peach and cherry flavors, Red Newt's Circle delivers great quality for a gentle price, vintage after vintage. Off dry in style, it's zesty and bright, finishing long with a fresh herbal edge.
title: Red Newt Cellars 2013 Circle Riesling (Finger Lakes)
description2: Lithe and dancing in texture, yet robustly concentrated with yellow peach and cherry flavors, Red Newt's Circle delivers great quality for a gentle price, vintage after vintage. Off dry in style, it's zesty and bright, finishing long with a fresh herbal edge. Riesling US New York Finger Lakes Red Newt Cellars

description: Pretty aromas of red berry, menthol, savory herb and cooking spice lead the nose. The palate offers tart red cherry, white pepper and Mediterranean herb alongside firm, refined tannins and bright acidity. It needs time to develop fully. Drink 2017–2022.
title: Ruffino 2010 Greppone Mazzi  (Brunello di Montalcino)
description2: Pretty aromas of red berry, menthol, savory herb and cooking spice lead the nose. The palate offers tart red cherry, white pepper and Mediterranean herb alongside firm, refined tannins and bright acidity. It needs time to develop fully. Drink 2017–2022. Sangiovese Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Ruffino

description: Serious and concentrated, this is a big and bold wine packed with ripe fruit flavors and firm tannins. It smells oaky and smoky, tastes rich with blackberry and dark chocolate and feels appropriately astringent, dry and full-bodied. Drinkable now, it will be best after 2017.
title: Sanglier Cellars 2012 Left Tusque Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
description2: Serious and concentrated, this is a big and bold wine packed with ripe fruit flavors and firm tannins. It smells oaky and smoky, tastes rich with blackberry and dark chocolate and feels appropriately astringent, dry and full-bodied. Drinkable now, it will be best after 2017. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Alexander Valley Sanglier Cellars

description: Cola, dark red fruit, black pepper and oak greet the nose on this blend of 77% Grenache, 19% Syrah and 4% Mourvèdre. The palate is quite structured with firm tannins that could use some mellowing, with flavors of roasted pork, blackberry and prevalent cedar.
title: Sextant 2012 Caverio G-S-M (Paso Robles)
description2: Cola, dark red fruit, black pepper and oak greet the nose on this blend of 77% Grenache, 19% Syrah and 4% Mourvèdre. The palate is quite structured with firm tannins that could use some mellowing, with flavors of roasted pork, blackberry and prevalent cedar. G-S-M US California Paso Robles Sextant

description: This wine is a blend of Upland Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (50%), Double Canyon Petit Verdot (38%) and McKinley Springs Malbec. It's aromatically reserved, revealing fresh and dried herbs, green pepper, vanilla, cocoa and dark cherry. The dark fruit flavors show a very pretty combination of richness and restraint.
title: Thurston Wolfe 2010 The Geologist Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This wine is a blend of Upland Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (50%), Double Canyon Petit Verdot (38%) and McKinley Springs Malbec. It's aromatically reserved, revealing fresh and dried herbs, green pepper, vanilla, cocoa and dark cherry. The dark fruit flavors show a very pretty combination of richness and restraint. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Thurston Wolfe

description: You'd swear this 100% varietal wine had some Viognier in it, but the orange-peel aromas and flavors are just a hallmark of Yakima Valley fruit. It also features abundant cranberry, mulberry, rose hip and savory notes. The supple feel with light meat accents is where this wine really shines, showing purity, texture and a lot of elegance. Those looking for big fruit, look elsewhere.
title: Two Mountain 2012 Copeland Vineyard Syrah (Yakima Valley)
description2: You'd swear this 100% varietal wine had some Viognier in it, but the orange-peel aromas and flavors are just a hallmark of Yakima Valley fruit. It also features abundant cranberry, mulberry, rose hip and savory notes. The supple feel with light meat accents is where this wine really shines, showing purity, texture and a lot of elegance. Those looking for big fruit, look elsewhere. Syrah US Washington Yakima Valley Two Mountain

description: Aged for 30 months in French and American oak (90% new), this wine brings pleasing notes of café au lait, pencil lead, cashew and woodspice. Rich coffee and chocolate flavors are backed by a silky feel, with the wood playing prominent role.
title: 14 Hands 2011 The Reserve Merlot (Horse Heaven Hills)
description2: Aged for 30 months in French and American oak (90% new), this wine brings pleasing notes of café au lait, pencil lead, cashew and woodspice. Rich coffee and chocolate flavors are backed by a silky feel, with the wood playing prominent role. Merlot US Washington Horse Heaven Hills 14 Hands

description: Like a lemon-cream pastry in a bottle, this low-yield, hillside-grown wine has buttery, creamy aromas, rich almond and bright lemon flavors and a soft, nearly sweet finish. Not too full-bodied, it's a bit lighter in texture than many, because of that fresh lemony acidity to buoy it up.
title: Alder Springs 2013 Signature Chardonnay (Mendocino)
description2: Like a lemon-cream pastry in a bottle, this low-yield, hillside-grown wine has buttery, creamy aromas, rich almond and bright lemon flavors and a soft, nearly sweet finish. Not too full-bodied, it's a bit lighter in texture than many, because of that fresh lemony acidity to buoy it up. Chardonnay US California Mendocino Alder Springs

description: This strikes a good balance between spicy oak, fruitiness and firm texture. It smells lightly spicy from oak barrels, and also fresh like red cherry and sweet plums. Rich and layered in feel, it finishes dry and full bodied. Not overblown, it has just the right mix of elements for the dinner table.
title: Andis 2011 Goedeck-Liu Vineyard Meritage (Sierra Foothills)
description2: This strikes a good balance between spicy oak, fruitiness and firm texture. It smells lightly spicy from oak barrels, and also fresh like red cherry and sweet plums. Rich and layered in feel, it finishes dry and full bodied. Not overblown, it has just the right mix of elements for the dinner table. Meritage US California Sierra Foothills Andis

description: This energized white wine has a German accent. Aromas recall honey, honeysuckle, tart apple and pineapple, and the flavors are like orange zest—tart, crisp and slightly bitter in a good way. This blend of Kerner, Gewürztraminer, Riesling and Bacchus grapes should be brilliant with rich shellfish. It was barrel-fermented in 60% new oak, which one can't so much taste as feel subtly.
title: Borra 2012 Markus Nimmo White (California)
description2: This energized white wine has a German accent. Aromas recall honey, honeysuckle, tart apple and pineapple, and the flavors are like orange zest—tart, crisp and slightly bitter in a good way. This blend of Kerner, Gewürztraminer, Riesling and Bacchus grapes should be brilliant with rich shellfish. It was barrel-fermented in 60% new oak, which one can't so much taste as feel subtly. White Blend US California California Borra

description: Floral scents of rose and violet also convey red berry, Mediterranean scrub and peppermint camphor. The palate is still tightly wound but reveals crunchy red cherry, cinnamon, white pepper and anise alongside bracing tannins. Drink after 2018.
title: Capanne Ricci 2010  Brunello di Montalcino
description2: Floral scents of rose and violet also convey red berry, Mediterranean scrub and peppermint camphor. The palate is still tightly wound but reveals crunchy red cherry, cinnamon, white pepper and anise alongside bracing tannins. Drink after 2018. Sangiovese Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Capanne Ricci

description: The color of decades-aged Chardonnay, medium-to-dark straw, this dessert wine is rich in toasted almonds and hazelnuts, with secondary flavors of baked apple and stone fruit. Mouthfillingly rich, it remains balanced and complex, lingering on the finish in baking spices.
title: Chalk Hill 2011 Botrytised Semillon (Chalk Hill)
description2: The color of decades-aged Chardonnay, medium-to-dark straw, this dessert wine is rich in toasted almonds and hazelnuts, with secondary flavors of baked apple and stone fruit. Mouthfillingly rich, it remains balanced and complex, lingering on the finish in baking spices. Sémillon US California Chalk Hill Chalk Hill

description: From vines owned by Château Giscours but outside the Margaux appellation, this ripe and structured wine is a great success. Its rich berry and black currant fruits are pushed forward by the firm tannins that are so perfectly judged. It's a wine to enjoy soon, so drink from 2017.
title: Château Giscours 2012 Le Haut-Médoc de Giscours  (Haut-Médoc)
description2: From vines owned by Château Giscours but outside the Margaux appellation, this ripe and structured wine is a great success. Its rich berry and black currant fruits are pushed forward by the firm tannins that are so perfectly judged. It's a wine to enjoy soon, so drink from 2017. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Haut-Médoc Château Giscours

description: This very complete wine offers dark tannins, ripe berry fruits and a velvet texture. It's rich, relying on blackberry and black plum flavors and a dense structure. Mouth-filling, it delivers delicious fragrant acidity at the end. Drink from 2017.
title: Château Laforge 2012  Saint-Émilion
description2: This very complete wine offers dark tannins, ripe berry fruits and a velvet texture. It's rich, relying on blackberry and black plum flavors and a dense structure. Mouth-filling, it delivers delicious fragrant acidity at the end. Drink from 2017. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Saint-Émilion Château Laforge

description: From the northern end of the Haut-Médoc region, close to Saint-Estèphe, this dark-hued wine is still very structured. Smoky wood-aging flavors give complexity that balances the ripe black currant fruitiness. It's still developing, so don't drink before 2018.
title: Château Larrivaux 2011  Haut-Médoc
description2: From the northern end of the Haut-Médoc region, close to Saint-Estèphe, this dark-hued wine is still very structured. Smoky wood-aging flavors give complexity that balances the ripe black currant fruitiness. It's still developing, so don't drink before 2018. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Haut-Médoc Château Larrivaux

description: Big, firm tannins dominate this structured wine. New wood aging shows, giving a very dry feeling. It's also rich and full in the mouth, packed with ripe black plum and berry flavors. It's going to balance well and richly. Drink from 2018.
title: Château Rollan de By 2012  Médoc
description2: Big, firm tannins dominate this structured wine. New wood aging shows, giving a very dry feeling. It's also rich and full in the mouth, packed with ripe black plum and berry flavors. It's going to balance well and richly. Drink from 2018. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Médoc Château Rollan de By

description: The small area of Pez is one of the top sites in Saint-Estèphe, with many highly rated chateaus. This is one. New wood aging shows strongly at this stage, although so does the fruit. That gives a structured wine, firm and also full of blackberry fruit flavors. The future is good for this wine, so drink from 2018.
title: Château Tour de Pez 2012  Saint-Estèphe
description2: The small area of Pez is one of the top sites in Saint-Estèphe, with many highly rated chateaus. This is one. New wood aging shows strongly at this stage, although so does the fruit. That gives a structured wine, firm and also full of blackberry fruit flavors. The future is good for this wine, so drink from 2018. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Saint-Estèphe Château Tour de Pez

description: Aromas of stewed fruit, prune and hay lead the nose on this brawny wine. The savory but monolithic palate offers dried cherry, fig, licorice and tobacco alongside velvety tannins. Drink through 2018.
title: Collosorbo 2009 Riserva  (Brunello di Montalcino)
description2: Aromas of stewed fruit, prune and hay lead the nose on this brawny wine. The savory but monolithic palate offers dried cherry, fig, licorice and tobacco alongside velvety tannins. Drink through 2018. Sangiovese Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Collosorbo

description: Intense, nutty, yeasty aromas are briny and a touch creamy. This has a tight, pure, round palate with salty nectarine, apricot and nut flavors. Walnut oil and white pepper notes grace a direct, lively finish.
title: Delgado Zuleta NV Premium Fino Sherry (Jerez)
description2: Intense, nutty, yeasty aromas are briny and a touch creamy. This has a tight, pure, round palate with salty nectarine, apricot and nut flavors. Walnut oil and white pepper notes grace a direct, lively finish. Sherry Spain Andalucia Jerez Delgado Zuleta

description: Rich in flavor and texture, this smells like white peach and buttered popcorn with a hint of chalky earthiness. The taste is creamy and reminiscent of honey and toasted almonds. It is medium bodied, but lush and almost thick in mouthfeel, with flavors that linger on the finish.
title: Hansen Cellars 2012 Viognier (Lodi)
description2: Rich in flavor and texture, this smells like white peach and buttered popcorn with a hint of chalky earthiness. The taste is creamy and reminiscent of honey and toasted almonds. It is medium bodied, but lush and almost thick in mouthfeel, with flavors that linger on the finish. Viognier US California Lodi Hansen Cellars

description: Deftly calibrating sultry black fruit against savory earth tones, this blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc offers refinement. Toast, smoke and bramble integrate amid black plum and cherry flavors. The finish is powerful and persistent, fringed with finely grained tannins.
title: Heron Hill 2011 Eclipse Red (New York)
description2: Deftly calibrating sultry black fruit against savory earth tones, this blend of Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc offers refinement. Toast, smoke and bramble integrate amid black plum and cherry flavors. The finish is powerful and persistent, fringed with finely grained tannins. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US New York New York Heron Hill

description: Aromatic and elegant, generous and supple, this tastes rich while feeling polished and complete. An enticing, light aroma of oaky spice and raspberry mixes with tasty red cherry and black currant flavors on the palate. It is medium bodied, smooth in texture, and has a mild finish.
title: Line 39 2013 Pinot Noir (California)
description2: Aromatic and elegant, generous and supple, this tastes rich while feeling polished and complete. An enticing, light aroma of oaky spice and raspberry mixes with tasty red cherry and black currant flavors on the palate. It is medium bodied, smooth in texture, and has a mild finish. Pinot Noir US California California Line 39

description: Coming from one of the appellation's most consistent producers, this offers a tight, restrained nose of blackberry and licorice. It's also tight and bright on the palate, with refreshing flavors of black cherries and crushed rocks. An expert balance of tannins and acidity gives the mouth a clean wash.
title: Lone Madrone 2011 Bailey Ranch Dry Farmed Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
description2: Coming from one of the appellation's most consistent producers, this offers a tight, restrained nose of blackberry and licorice. It's also tight and bright on the palate, with refreshing flavors of black cherries and crushed rocks. An expert balance of tannins and acidity gives the mouth a clean wash. Zinfandel US California Paso Robles Lone Madrone

description: Extra dark in color, this has equally attention-getting dark chocolate and espresso aromas, rich black currant and blackberry flavors, and a firm, generously tannic texture. Although tempting to drink now, this will improve in complexity and smoothness through 2017.
title: McGrail 2011 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Livermore Valley)
description2: Extra dark in color, this has equally attention-getting dark chocolate and espresso aromas, rich black currant and blackberry flavors, and a firm, generously tannic texture. Although tempting to drink now, this will improve in complexity and smoothness through 2017. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Livermore Valley McGrail

description: This vineyard near the confluence of the Salinas and Carmel valleys is producing strong wines, in this case one offering aromas of roasted game, smoked blueberries and cracked slate. It's juicy but not jammy on the palate, showing a pleasant, bright blend of blackberry and cherry fruits.
title: Mesa Del Sol 2010 Zinfandel (Arroyo Seco)
description2: This vineyard near the confluence of the Salinas and Carmel valleys is producing strong wines, in this case one offering aromas of roasted game, smoked blueberries and cracked slate. It's juicy but not jammy on the palate, showing a pleasant, bright blend of blackberry and cherry fruits. Zinfandel US California Arroyo Seco Mesa Del Sol

description: Seamless and soft, this medium-built expression of clove, tobacco and dark red plum offers integrated tannins and a punch of oak, before settling into a whispered finish.
title: Clos Pegase 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: Seamless and soft, this medium-built expression of clove, tobacco and dark red plum offers integrated tannins and a punch of oak, before settling into a whispered finish. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Clos Pegase

description: A fairly dark and dense nose of boysenberry and smashed graphite entertain the nose on this blend of 50% Syrah, 45% Grenache and 5% Mourvèdre, which is named after San Jose-based winemaker Adam Comartin's daughter. The palate is very iron-driven and minerally, with more boysenberry fruit and some concentrated violets giving nuance.
title: Comartin 2013 Cuvee Cassidy G-S-M (Santa Ynez Valley)
description2: A fairly dark and dense nose of boysenberry and smashed graphite entertain the nose on this blend of 50% Syrah, 45% Grenache and 5% Mourvèdre, which is named after San Jose-based winemaker Adam Comartin's daughter. The palate is very iron-driven and minerally, with more boysenberry fruit and some concentrated violets giving nuance. G-S-M US California Santa Ynez Valley Comartin

description: From a 10-acre site called Scopus farmed by Ulises Valdez, this wine is rich and golden in color, given time to barrel-ferment and develop layers of fulsome complexity. Oaky, it has weight and depth, veering into ripe tropical notes and vanilla as it develops in the glass.
title: Covenant 2013 Lavan Chardonnay (Sonoma Mountain)
description2: From a 10-acre site called Scopus farmed by Ulises Valdez, this wine is rich and golden in color, given time to barrel-ferment and develop layers of fulsome complexity. Oaky, it has weight and depth, veering into ripe tropical notes and vanilla as it develops in the glass. Chardonnay US California Sonoma Mountain Covenant

description: Blackberries, violet and black-slate aromas mix with a bit of soy sauce on this blend of 62% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Mourvèdre and 18% Grenache, grown in what today is known as the San Miguel District of Paso Robles. Juicy flavors of black raspberry and licorice combine for an easy-quaffing palate.
title: Domaine Degher 2010 Mojo Estate Red (Paso Robles)
description2: Blackberries, violet and black-slate aromas mix with a bit of soy sauce on this blend of 62% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Mourvèdre and 18% Grenache, grown in what today is known as the San Miguel District of Paso Robles. Juicy flavors of black raspberry and licorice combine for an easy-quaffing palate. Red Blend US California Paso Robles Domaine Degher

description: This moderately aromatic wine offers notes of pear, citrus and apricot. It drinks medium sweet with stone-fruit and citrus flavors along with spritely acidity, bringing a whole lot of appeal.
title: 14 Hands 2014 Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This moderately aromatic wine offers notes of pear, citrus and apricot. It drinks medium sweet with stone-fruit and citrus flavors along with spritely acidity, bringing a whole lot of appeal. Riesling US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) 14 Hands

description: Cocoa, toast, vanilla, cigar box, coconut and raspberry aromas lead the way on this 100% varietal wine. The palate is full of dark fruit flavors with slightly gritty tannins and tart acids. Give it some time to come together.
title: Airfield Estates 2012 Merlot (Yakima Valley)
description2: Cocoa, toast, vanilla, cigar box, coconut and raspberry aromas lead the way on this 100% varietal wine. The palate is full of dark fruit flavors with slightly gritty tannins and tart acids. Give it some time to come together. Merlot US Washington Yakima Valley Airfield Estates

description: Syrah (51%) makes up most of this wine with the balance Merlot (35%), Cabernet Sauvignon (10%), Malbec (2%) and Petit Verdot. Vanilla, baking spice and plum aromas are followed by sweet blue-fruit flavors that go down easy.
title: Airfield Estates 2013 Bombshell Red Vineyard Salute Red (Yakima Valley)
description2: Syrah (51%) makes up most of this wine with the balance Merlot (35%), Cabernet Sauvignon (10%), Malbec (2%) and Petit Verdot. Vanilla, baking spice and plum aromas are followed by sweet blue-fruit flavors that go down easy. Red Blend US Washington Yakima Valley Airfield Estates

description: The aromas of lime leaf and peach are bright and appealing. It drinks medium sweet with a finish that lingers.
title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2014 Harvest Select Riesling (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: The aromas of lime leaf and peach are bright and appealing. It drinks medium sweet with a finish that lingers. Riesling US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Chateau Ste. Michelle

description: This Cabernet Franc (70%) and Merlot blend brings aromas of green herbs, dark chocolate, flowers and a mixture of red and black fruit. It's soft in feel with polished fruit and barrel flavors that linger.
title: Columbia Crest 2013 Limited Release Gold Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This Cabernet Franc (70%) and Merlot blend brings aromas of green herbs, dark chocolate, flowers and a mixture of red and black fruit. It's soft in feel with polished fruit and barrel flavors that linger. Red Blend US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Columbia Crest

description: A blend of 50% Sauvignon Blanc, 40% Feteasca Alba (a native Romanian variety) and 10% Riesling Italico, this medium-straw colored wine has a bouquet of lemon skin with a hint of licorice. The flavor profile is dominated by lemon with soft spice notes.
title: Davino 2013 Domaine Ceptura White (Dealu Mare)
description2: A blend of 50% Sauvignon Blanc, 40% Feteasca Alba (a native Romanian variety) and 10% Riesling Italico, this medium-straw colored wine has a bouquet of lemon skin with a hint of licorice. The flavor profile is dominated by lemon with soft spice notes. White Blend Romania Dealu Mare  Davino

description: Aromas of cherry and currant are a bit flat. On the palate, this is perfectly good but common. Blackberry, plum and a dusting of chocolate are the key flavors, while this runs long and loamy on the finish.
title: Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite) 2014 Los Vascos Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
description2: Aromas of cherry and currant are a bit flat. On the palate, this is perfectly good but common. Blackberry, plum and a dusting of chocolate are the key flavors, while this runs long and loamy on the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Colchagua Valley  Domaines Barons de Rothschild (Lafite)

description: The aromas offer barrel spices, toast, black licorice and red fruit while the palate brings dark fruit flavors with a grainy feel. The oak (100% new French) juts out a bit and overrides the fruit.
title: Finn Hill 2012 Bon Mot Cabernet Franc (Wahluke Slope)
description2: The aromas offer barrel spices, toast, black licorice and red fruit while the palate brings dark fruit flavors with a grainy feel. The oak (100% new French) juts out a bit and overrides the fruit. Cabernet Franc US Washington Wahluke Slope Finn Hill

description: The Nashville-based R.S. Lipman Company, formerly just a Tennessee distributor, comes west for this deal of a wine, with lime blossoms, pink grapefruit and Gala apple slices on the nose. The palate is clean, crisp and rounded with lime spritzer and green-apple flavors.
title: Hidden Jewel 2014 Unoaked Chardonnay (Santa Barbara County)
description2: The Nashville-based R.S. Lipman Company, formerly just a Tennessee distributor, comes west for this deal of a wine, with lime blossoms, pink grapefruit and Gala apple slices on the nose. The palate is clean, crisp and rounded with lime spritzer and green-apple flavors. Chardonnay US California Santa Barbara County Hidden Jewel

description: Lots of apple tones, some rounded, some tart, are coralled into a core of bright, lemony freshness on this simple, refreshing and dry Riesling. This is a lovely, easy and versatile wine with enlivening spikes of acidity.
title: Jean-Baptiste Adam 2013 Réserve Riesling (Alsace)
description2: Lots of apple tones, some rounded, some tart, are coralled into a core of bright, lemony freshness on this simple, refreshing and dry Riesling. This is a lovely, easy and versatile wine with enlivening spikes of acidity. Riesling France Alsace Alsace Jean-Baptiste Adam

description: Rounded, almost luscious fruitiness is at the core of this easy wine. Lychee, lemon, peach and apricot scented with rose petals on a rich palate close with orange peel freshness.
title: Jean-Marc Bernhard 2014 Vieilles Vignes Gewurztraminer (Alsace)
description2: Rounded, almost luscious fruitiness is at the core of this easy wine. Lychee, lemon, peach and apricot scented with rose petals on a rich palate close with orange peel freshness. Gewürztraminer France Alsace Alsace Jean-Marc Bernhard

description: This wine is fresh, perfumed with a juicy red-fruit character. It offers red cherries, with a soft texture and acidity. The great fruitiness leads to a bright, crisp aftertaste.
title: Joseph Drouhin 2012  Chorey-lès-Beaune
description2: This wine is fresh, perfumed with a juicy red-fruit character. It offers red cherries, with a soft texture and acidity. The great fruitiness leads to a bright, crisp aftertaste. Pinot Noir France Burgundy Chorey-lès-Beaune Joseph Drouhin

description: A strong blast of oak and wood shavings are up front and on top of the nose on this chunky Cabernet. Baked, herbal flavors of cassis and raspberry are toasty, slightly green and minty. Flavors of herbs and carob rest heavily on a plump, warm finish.
title: Koyle 2013 Gran Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (Colchagua Valley)
description2: A strong blast of oak and wood shavings are up front and on top of the nose on this chunky Cabernet. Baked, herbal flavors of cassis and raspberry are toasty, slightly green and minty. Flavors of herbs and carob rest heavily on a plump, warm finish. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Colchagua Valley  Koyle

description: This opens with herbal berry aromas that are textbook Carmenère, but with airing a floral note comes in to accent black-cherry aromas. Toasty, herbal berry flavors are fruity and solid, while this shows some bitterness on the finish.
title: Koyle 2013 Gran Reserva Carmenère (Colchagua Valley)
description2: This opens with herbal berry aromas that are textbook Carmenère, but with airing a floral note comes in to accent black-cherry aromas. Toasty, herbal berry flavors are fruity and solid, while this shows some bitterness on the finish. Carmenère Chile Colchagua Valley  Koyle

description: A blend of 58% Cabernet Sauvignon with 21% Merlot, 8% Petit Verdot, 5% Cabernet Franc, 5% Malbec and 3% Syrah, the Frog Prince offers juicy blackberry and cherry around dusty, softened tannins and oak. Approachable now, it finishes awash in dried herb.
title: Kuleto Estate 2012 Frog Prince Red (Napa Valley)
description2: A blend of 58% Cabernet Sauvignon with 21% Merlot, 8% Petit Verdot, 5% Cabernet Franc, 5% Malbec and 3% Syrah, the Frog Prince offers juicy blackberry and cherry around dusty, softened tannins and oak. Approachable now, it finishes awash in dried herb. Red Blend US California Napa Valley Kuleto Estate

description: Aromas of honeysuckle, jasmine and stone fruit lead the nose on this vibrant wine. The juicy palate delivers creamy white peach, green apple and honeydew melon alongside crisp acidity.
title: La Cappuccina 2013 Monte Stelle  (Soave Classico)
description2: Aromas of honeysuckle, jasmine and stone fruit lead the nose on this vibrant wine. The juicy palate delivers creamy white peach, green apple and honeydew melon alongside crisp acidity. Garganega Italy Veneto Soave Classico La Cappuccina

description: Made with dried Verduzzo and Riesling grapes, this sweet wine offers aromas of ripe apricot, baked apple and pressed flower. The palate delivers dried orchard fruit, orange zest and vanilla. It ends on a note of acacia honey.
title: Lis Neris 2010 Tal Lùc White (Venezia Giulia)
description2: Made with dried Verduzzo and Riesling grapes, this sweet wine offers aromas of ripe apricot, baked apple and pressed flower. The palate delivers dried orchard fruit, orange zest and vanilla. It ends on a note of acacia honey. White Blend Italy Northeastern Italy Venezia Giulia Lis Neris

description: A fairly uncommon grape for the entire Central Coast, this bottling offers squeezed blueberry and dark purple fruit aromas bolstered by black pepper and black rocks. Lighter in body than expected upon the sip, the palate shows cola, bright cranberry juice and a sandalwood spice that makes it very easy to drink.
title: Lone Madrone 2012 Barbera (Paso Robles)
description2: A fairly uncommon grape for the entire Central Coast, this bottling offers squeezed blueberry and dark purple fruit aromas bolstered by black pepper and black rocks. Lighter in body than expected upon the sip, the palate shows cola, bright cranberry juice and a sandalwood spice that makes it very easy to drink. Barbera US California Paso Robles Lone Madrone

description: Sunny, peachy sweetness abounds in this light-footed Riesling. Off dry in style, it's breathlessly fresh and fruity, yet intensified by shimmering lime and mineral tones. Drink now for its youthful effervescence.
title: McGregor 2014 Semi Dry Riesling (Finger Lakes)
description2: Sunny, peachy sweetness abounds in this light-footed Riesling. Off dry in style, it's breathlessly fresh and fruity, yet intensified by shimmering lime and mineral tones. Drink now for its youthful effervescence. Riesling US New York Finger Lakes McGregor

description: Ripe pear on nose and palate is the central theme on this broad-shouldered and richly textured wine. A dollop of sweetness is countered with fresh lime acidity that concludes in ripe accord.
title: Domaine Zinck 2013 Terroir Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description2: Ripe pear on nose and palate is the central theme on this broad-shouldered and richly textured wine. A dollop of sweetness is countered with fresh lime acidity that concludes in ripe accord. Pinot Gris France Alsace Alsace Domaine Zinck

description: This wine made from an indigenous Romanian grape has a bouquet of red raspberry, tart cherry, and clove with a touch of brambles. Flavors of cassis, cherry vanilla, red plum and raspberry work their way across the palate, concluding in an agreeably spicy finish.
title: Domeniile Panciu 2012 Feteasca Neagra (Panciu)
description2: This wine made from an indigenous Romanian grape has a bouquet of red raspberry, tart cherry, and clove with a touch of brambles. Flavors of cassis, cherry vanilla, red plum and raspberry work their way across the palate, concluding in an agreeably spicy finish. Feteasca Neagra Romania Panciu  Domeniile Panciu

description: Aromas of cocoa, spice, vanilla and dark fruit lead, with the oak (20% new French and American) playing a significant role. The blue-fruit flavors are plump in feel, narrowing toward the finish.
title: Waterbrook 2013 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Aromas of cocoa, spice, vanilla and dark fruit lead, with the oak (20% new French and American) playing a significant role. The blue-fruit flavors are plump in feel, narrowing toward the finish. Syrah US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Waterbrook

description: A dense thicket of dark chocolate is prominent in this wine, alongside black raspberry and blackberry. Dried herb and pencil shavings also make their way through midpalate, atop a soft, approachable texture and full body.
title: Altvs 2011 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: A dense thicket of dark chocolate is prominent in this wine, alongside black raspberry and blackberry. Dried herb and pencil shavings also make their way through midpalate, atop a soft, approachable texture and full body. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Altvs

description: Initially, this Carmenère smells green and minty, with a heavy herbal blast. Airing settles things down in front of a fresh palate with thorough body and build. Oak and salted-meat flavors with black fruits finish woody, toasty and herbal.
title: Apaltagua 2013 Envero Gran Reserve Carmenère (Colchagua Valley)
description2: Initially, this Carmenère smells green and minty, with a heavy herbal blast. Airing settles things down in front of a fresh palate with thorough body and build. Oak and salted-meat flavors with black fruits finish woody, toasty and herbal. Carmenère Chile Colchagua Valley  Apaltagua

description: A tight nose of boysenberry and pepper shows on this wine from a boutique, artistically labeled SoCal wine project by Ian Sergy and Zach Jarosz. The palate is light and texturally intriguing, with flavors of squeezed berries and crushed oregano, showing bright energy on the sip.
title: Archium 2013 Faction Syrah (Santa Ynez Valley)
description2: A tight nose of boysenberry and pepper shows on this wine from a boutique, artistically labeled SoCal wine project by Ian Sergy and Zach Jarosz. The palate is light and texturally intriguing, with flavors of squeezed berries and crushed oregano, showing bright energy on the sip. Syrah US California Santa Ynez Valley Archium

description: Purple fruit aromas of blueberry, blackberry and boysenberry are given complexity with Indian spice, hot asphalt and beef char on the nose of this blend of 88% Syrah and 12% Grenache. The palate is full of crushed herbs, from oregano to thyme to marjoram, with just a tiny shred of cranberry fruit and lots of pine sap and even bell pepper.
title: Asuncion Ridge 2012 Nefarious Red (Paso Robles)
description2: Purple fruit aromas of blueberry, blackberry and boysenberry are given complexity with Indian spice, hot asphalt and beef char on the nose of this blend of 88% Syrah and 12% Grenache. The palate is full of crushed herbs, from oregano to thyme to marjoram, with just a tiny shred of cranberry fruit and lots of pine sap and even bell pepper. Rhône-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Asuncion Ridge

description: Sunflower-gold in color, this heady, hedonistic Chardonnay brims with aromas of toasted brioche, lemon and herb. Bright and completely balanced, it invites sip after sip until there simply is no more. Concentrated and complex it finishes dry, lingering in beautiful layers on the tongue.
title: Paul Hobbs 2012 Ellen Lane Estate Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Sunflower-gold in color, this heady, hedonistic Chardonnay brims with aromas of toasted brioche, lemon and herb. Bright and completely balanced, it invites sip after sip until there simply is no more. Concentrated and complex it finishes dry, lingering in beautiful layers on the tongue. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley Paul Hobbs

description: This structured wine opens with earthy aromas of tilled soil, underbrush, leather, cedar, bright berries and baking spices. The vibrant palate displays classic Nebbiolo flavors of crushed dark cherry, clove, cinnamon, truffle, sage, thyme and licorice alongside brisk acidity and bracing but noble tannins. It will bloom into a beauty. Drink 2020–2040.
title: Aurelio Settimo 2010 Rocche dell'Annunziata  (Barolo)
description2: This structured wine opens with earthy aromas of tilled soil, underbrush, leather, cedar, bright berries and baking spices. The vibrant palate displays classic Nebbiolo flavors of crushed dark cherry, clove, cinnamon, truffle, sage, thyme and licorice alongside brisk acidity and bracing but noble tannins. It will bloom into a beauty. Drink 2020–2040. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Aurelio Settimo

description: Scents of woodland berries, violets, dried rose petals, baking spices and Mediterranean herbs emerge from this wine. Crushed Morello cherry, graphite, red raspberry and white pepper all come seamlessly together on the palate alongside invigorating energy and intensity. It shows fantastic aging potential. Drink 2020–2040.
title: Giacomo Fenocchio 2010 Villero  (Barolo)
description2: Scents of woodland berries, violets, dried rose petals, baking spices and Mediterranean herbs emerge from this wine. Crushed Morello cherry, graphite, red raspberry and white pepper all come seamlessly together on the palate alongside invigorating energy and intensity. It shows fantastic aging potential. Drink 2020–2040. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Giacomo Fenocchio

description: Aromas of Mediterranean herbs, hay, leather and red berry come together in this structured Barolo. Loaded with energy and intensity, it delivers creamy cherry-berry flavors layered with white pepper, clove, nutmeg and orange zest. It already has depth but needs time to develop complexity. Drink after 2022.
title: Giovanni Rosso 2010 Cerretta  (Barolo)
description2: Aromas of Mediterranean herbs, hay, leather and red berry come together in this structured Barolo. Loaded with energy and intensity, it delivers creamy cherry-berry flavors layered with white pepper, clove, nutmeg and orange zest. It already has depth but needs time to develop complexity. Drink after 2022. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Giovanni Rosso

description: It offers classic Nebbiolo scents of red berry, forest floor, violet, baking spices, leather and Mediterranean herbs. The juicy palate doles out bright red cherry, mint, sage and black pepper alongside firm but velvety tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2016–2024.
title: Rizzi 2009 Boito Riserva  (Barbaresco)
description2: It offers classic Nebbiolo scents of red berry, forest floor, violet, baking spices, leather and Mediterranean herbs. The juicy palate doles out bright red cherry, mint, sage and black pepper alongside firm but velvety tannins and fresh acidity. Drink 2016–2024. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barbaresco Rizzi

description: Sourced from the best barrels made at the winery in 2013, this off-dry reserve checks in with roughly 30 g/L residual sugar, and plenty of acidity to more than balance it out. It's sweet, tart and sappy, with concentrated, juicy flavors of Meyer lemon, grapefruit and tangerine. It feels full-bodied and roundly fruity, then continues to extend itself with concentrated details of mineral and acid. A wine of exceptional power and length.
title: Trisaetum 2013 Estates Reserve Riesling (Willamette Valley)
description2: Sourced from the best barrels made at the winery in 2013, this off-dry reserve checks in with roughly 30 g/L residual sugar, and plenty of acidity to more than balance it out. It's sweet, tart and sappy, with concentrated, juicy flavors of Meyer lemon, grapefruit and tangerine. It feels full-bodied and roundly fruity, then continues to extend itself with concentrated details of mineral and acid. A wine of exceptional power and length. Riesling US Oregon Willamette Valley Trisaetum

description: Aromas of red rose, wild cherry, forest floor and a whiff of leather take center stage. The palate expresses ripe black cherry accented by vanilla, cinnamon, cocoa, clove, white pepper, balsamic herbs and subtle oak alongside firm tannins. It's already delicious, but give it time to develop. Drink after 2020.
title: Le Strette 2010 Bergera Pezzole  (Barolo)
description2: Aromas of red rose, wild cherry, forest floor and a whiff of leather take center stage. The palate expresses ripe black cherry accented by vanilla, cinnamon, cocoa, clove, white pepper, balsamic herbs and subtle oak alongside firm tannins. It's already delicious, but give it time to develop. Drink after 2020. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Le Strette

description: Fresh in mouthwatering minerality, this is positively bright, balanced and layered in lingering notes of lemon curd, green apple and just-picked vanilla bean. It is a gloriously delicate wine that's named for one of Marimar's beloved Springer Spaniels, made from one block planted to a selection of the See clone.
designation: Don Miguel Vineyard Bonita's Hill Unfiltered
title: Marimar Estate 2011 Don Miguel Vineyard Bonita's Hill Unfiltered Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Fresh in mouthwatering minerality, this is positively bright, balanced and layered in lingering notes of lemon curd, green apple and just-picked vanilla bean. It is a gloriously delicate wine that's named for one of Marimar's beloved Springer Spaniels, made from one block planted to a selection of the See clone. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley Marimar Estate

description: Juicy red and black cherry, crushed raspberry, violet, white pepper, cinnamon and sage sensations all come together. Assertive tannins and exhilarating acidity balance out the intense fruit and spice flavors. It's still austere and tight but displays great breeding and serious aging potential. Drink after 2020.
title: Roccheviberti 2010 Rocche di Castiglione  (Barolo)
description2: Juicy red and black cherry, crushed raspberry, violet, white pepper, cinnamon and sage sensations all come together. Assertive tannins and exhilarating acidity balance out the intense fruit and spice flavors. It's still austere and tight but displays great breeding and serious aging potential. Drink after 2020. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Roccheviberti

description: A perplexing wine to evaluate, the 2010 RunRig (97% Shiraz and 3% Viognier) evolves rapidly once poured, going from slightly stewed and overoaked to a wine that shows considerable class within 20 minutes or so. Aromas and flavors of brown sugar, mocha and roasted meat give way to raspberry compote, while the creamy texture and supple tannins conceal the wine's high alcohol level with ease.
title: Torbreck 2010 RunRig Shiraz-Viognier (Barossa Valley)
description2: A perplexing wine to evaluate, the 2010 RunRig (97% Shiraz and 3% Viognier) evolves rapidly once poured, going from slightly stewed and overoaked to a wine that shows considerable class within 20 minutes or so. Aromas and flavors of brown sugar, mocha and roasted meat give way to raspberry compote, while the creamy texture and supple tannins conceal the wine's high alcohol level with ease. Shiraz-Viognier Australia South Australia Barossa Valley Torbreck

description: Black cherry, mint and white pepper aromas jump out of the glass along with a whiff of balsamic herbs. The intense palate boasts mouthwatering red cherry and strawberry flavors restrained by black pepper, cinnamon, clove, orange zest and a hint of eucalyptus. It's already gorgeous but it will develop even more complexity. Drink 2020–2030.
title: Cascina Ballarin 2010 Tre Ciabot  (Barolo)
description2: Black cherry, mint and white pepper aromas jump out of the glass along with a whiff of balsamic herbs. The intense palate boasts mouthwatering red cherry and strawberry flavors restrained by black pepper, cinnamon, clove, orange zest and a hint of eucalyptus. It's already gorgeous but it will develop even more complexity. Drink 2020–2030. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Cascina Ballarin

description: It reveals aromas of rose, tilled earth, and smoky mineral. The bright palate doles out crushed red cherry and black raspberry accented with herbs, white pepper and clove. Juicy flavors are balanced by vibrant energy and polished tannins. Drink 2018–2038.
title: Comm. G. B. Burlotto 2010 Cannubi  (Barolo)
description2: It reveals aromas of rose, tilled earth, and smoky mineral. The bright palate doles out crushed red cherry and black raspberry accented with herbs, white pepper and clove. Juicy flavors are balanced by vibrant energy and polished tannins. Drink 2018–2038. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Comm. G. B. Burlotto

description: This concentrated Barolo opens with aromas of violet, plum, subtle oak and menthol. The dense palate delivers crushed black cherry and raspberry layered with milk chocolate, coffee, clove and white pepper alongside fresh acidity and bracing tannins. Drink 2018–2038.
title: Cordero di Montezemolo 2010 Bricco Gattera  (Barolo)
description2: This concentrated Barolo opens with aromas of violet, plum, subtle oak and menthol. The dense palate delivers crushed black cherry and raspberry layered with milk chocolate, coffee, clove and white pepper alongside fresh acidity and bracing tannins. Drink 2018–2038. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Cordero di Montezemolo

description: Intense and elegant, it brings together sensations of violet, crushed red berry, mineral and cake spices that are supported by firm but fine tannins and brisk acidity. Fermented with wild yeasts, it illustrates the vibrant character of the vintage. Drink 2018–2040. Acid Inc Selections, Stefano Miretti Imports.
title: Brezza 2010  Barolo
description2: Intense and elegant, it brings together sensations of violet, crushed red berry, mineral and cake spices that are supported by firm but fine tannins and brisk acidity. Fermented with wild yeasts, it illustrates the vibrant character of the vintage. Drink 2018–2040. Acid Inc Selections, Stefano Miretti Imports. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Brezza

description: Bold and savory, it delivers black cherry, violet, and baking spice aromas with a whiff of espresso. The palate is still a bit austere, but offers up juicy black cherry, raspberry, sage and licorice alongside solid, assertive tannins. Don't even attempt this before 2020, but it will blossom into a beauty.
title: Paolo Scavino 2010 Carobric  (Barolo)
description2: Bold and savory, it delivers black cherry, violet, and baking spice aromas with a whiff of espresso. The palate is still a bit austere, but offers up juicy black cherry, raspberry, sage and licorice alongside solid, assertive tannins. Don't even attempt this before 2020, but it will blossom into a beauty. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Paolo Scavino

description: Structured and powerful, it features aromas of underbrush, leather, spice, plum cake and subtle oak. The concentrated palate delivers juicy black cherry and red raspberry accented with notes of espresso alongside tightly packed tannins and fresh acidity. Give it time to unwind. Drink after 2020.
title: Pio Cesare 2010  Barolo
description2: Structured and powerful, it features aromas of underbrush, leather, spice, plum cake and subtle oak. The concentrated palate delivers juicy black cherry and red raspberry accented with notes of espresso alongside tightly packed tannins and fresh acidity. Give it time to unwind. Drink after 2020. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Pio Cesare

description: Aromas of wild cherry, leather and truffle are quintessential Barolo. On the palate, rich black cherry, raspberry, vanilla, cocoa, balsamic herbs, sage and black pepper all come together supported by brooding tannins and brisk acidity. Best after 2020.
title: Rivetto 2010 del Comune di Serralunga d'Alba  (Barolo)
description2: Aromas of wild cherry, leather and truffle are quintessential Barolo. On the palate, rich black cherry, raspberry, vanilla, cocoa, balsamic herbs, sage and black pepper all come together supported by brooding tannins and brisk acidity. Best after 2020. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Rivetto

description: Aromas of blackberry, violet and a whiff of dark spice lead the nose while the juicy palate serves up raspberry, black cherry, clove and white pepper. It's fresh and lively, with firm but approachable tannins.
title: Castelfeder 2013 Rieder Lagrein (Alto Adige)
description2: Aromas of blackberry, violet and a whiff of dark spice lead the nose while the juicy palate serves up raspberry, black cherry, clove and white pepper. It's fresh and lively, with firm but approachable tannins. Lagrein Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Castelfeder

description: Fruit comes from three places for this wine, Bennett Valley, Alexander Valley and Knights Valley, exhibiting some good blending skill in the cellar. Red currant, clove, cedar and pencil all appear around a full-bodied, leathery texture and dots of black pepper and sage.
title: Matanzas Creek 2012 Merlot (Sonoma County)
description2: Fruit comes from three places for this wine, Bennett Valley, Alexander Valley and Knights Valley, exhibiting some good blending skill in the cellar. Red currant, clove, cedar and pencil all appear around a full-bodied, leathery texture and dots of black pepper and sage. Merlot US California Sonoma County Matanzas Creek

description: Only very slight citrus notes appear on the nose. The palate opens into soft fruitiness with slight hints of apricot and peach. The chief attraction, though, is a central, vivid theme of white pepper. This is light bodied but full of subtle charms.
title: Nastl 2015 Klassik Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
description2: Only very slight citrus notes appear on the nose. The palate opens into soft fruitiness with slight hints of apricot and peach. The chief attraction, though, is a central, vivid theme of white pepper. This is light bodied but full of subtle charms. Grüner Veltliner Austria Niederösterreich  Nastl

description: Hints of white blossom mix with faint notes of pear to create a delicately balanced, fresh and spring-like wine that is as light as gossamer. This has verve and freshness, tender, blossomy aromatics and immense charm. Drink as soon as possible while its elderflower notes shimmer lastingly.
title: Nigl 2015 Gelber Muskateller (Niederösterreich)
description2: Hints of white blossom mix with faint notes of pear to create a delicately balanced, fresh and spring-like wine that is as light as gossamer. This has verve and freshness, tender, blossomy aromatics and immense charm. Drink as soon as possible while its elderflower notes shimmer lastingly. Gelber Muskateller Austria Niederösterreich  Nigl

description: The producer travels to Stagecoach Vineyard on Atlas Peak to source 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 38% Syrah and 7% Malbec, making for a softly layered wine with plenty of structure. Crisp red currant and plum dance around savory specks of cedar and toasty oak.
title: Patland 2012 Proprietary Red (Napa Valley)
description2: The producer travels to Stagecoach Vineyard on Atlas Peak to source 55% Cabernet Sauvignon, 38% Syrah and 7% Malbec, making for a softly layered wine with plenty of structure. Crisp red currant and plum dance around savory specks of cedar and toasty oak. Red Blend US California Napa Valley Patland

description: At this early stage, the oak is still prominent. Mocha and brown sugar mark the nose, the palate offers dark-roasted coffee bean notes and the finish seems rather dry and astringent. But dig deeper, and a core of cherry fruit comes into focus, fully ripened to silky tannins and just needing time to emerge. Drink 2018–2025.
title: Quartz Reef 2013 Bendigo Single Vineyard Pinot Noir (Central Otago)
description2: At this early stage, the oak is still prominent. Mocha and brown sugar mark the nose, the palate offers dark-roasted coffee bean notes and the finish seems rather dry and astringent.
