description2: This is 89% Cabernet Sauvignon, 8% Merlot and 3% Syrah. It's toasty to the max, with scents and flavors of coffee and smoke as much as berry and cassis. There is great acid/tannin balance and some additional years of bottle age should help to bring out more of the fruit. Cabernet Sauvignon US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) J. Bookwalter

description: Leaner and tighter than this bottling has been the previous few vintages, this wine is showing hard tannins obscure in plum, black cherry pie and mocha flavors. Yet it's a balanced wine, which should develop bottle complexity after 2016.
title: Keller Estate 2010 La Cruz Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: Leaner and tighter than this bottling has been the previous few vintages, this wine is showing hard tannins obscure in plum, black cherry pie and mocha flavors. Yet it's a balanced wine, which should develop bottle complexity after 2016. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast Keller Estate

description: L'Ecole tackles, with great success, two of the least-recognized strengths of Washington viticulture: Sémillon and Chenin Blanc. Here the blend includes 13% Sauvignon Blanc. It's well built, full bodied, with a mix of citrus and stone fruits, generous acidity, and some finishing skin flavors putting a slightly bitter frame around it.
title: L'Ecole No. 41 2012 Sémillon (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: L'Ecole tackles, with great success, two of the least-recognized strengths of Washington viticulture: Sémillon and Chenin Blanc. Here the blend includes 13% Sauvignon Blanc. It's well built, full bodied, with a mix of citrus and stone fruits, generous acidity, and some finishing skin flavors putting a slightly bitter frame around it. Sémillon US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) L'Ecole No. 41

description: This wine is mostly Sémillon, with Sauvignon Blanc filling in the rest. It's one of the rare white wines from the Walla Walla AVA, graceful, full-bodied and tasting of fig and green banana. Just recently bottled, it still carries a bit of yeast in the nose and in the finish. Give it another few months to pull itself together.
title: L'Ecole No. 41 2012 Seven Hills Vineyard Estate Luminesce Semillon-Sauvignon Blanc (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: This wine is mostly Sémillon, with Sauvignon Blanc filling in the rest. It's one of the rare white wines from the Walla Walla AVA, graceful, full-bodied and tasting of fig and green banana. Just recently bottled, it still carries a bit of yeast in the nose and in the finish. Give it another few months to pull itself together. Semillon-Sauvignon Blanc US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) L'Ecole No. 41

description: Inox is the winery's unoaked Chardonnay, the first of the vintage. This bottling provides a promising glimpse into the quality of the 2012s. It's so rich and ripe in citrus and tropical fruits, you won't miss the barrel influence. Try now with sushi, tuna tartare, or a salad of bitter greens, tropical fruits and feta cheese.
title: Melville 2012 Clone 76 Inox Estate Chardonnay (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: Inox is the winery's unoaked Chardonnay, the first of the vintage. This bottling provides a promising glimpse into the quality of the 2012s. It's so rich and ripe in citrus and tropical fruits, you won't miss the barrel influence. Try now with sushi, tuna tartare, or a salad of bitter greens, tropical fruits and feta cheese. Chardonnay US California Sta. Rita Hills Melville

description: A larger selection from Signal Ridge, Bravium's main bottling is still tiny production, light on its feet and aromatic in rose petal and violet. With notes of black cherry and pomegranate its tannins are silky and the wine deliciously priced.
title: Bravium 2011 Signal Ridge Vineyard Pinot Noir (Mendocino Ridge)
description2: A larger selection from Signal Ridge, Bravium's main bottling is still tiny production, light on its feet and aromatic in rose petal and violet. With notes of black cherry and pomegranate its tannins are silky and the wine deliciously priced. Pinot Noir US California Mendocino Ridge Bravium

description: Givry is one of the unsung values in Burgundy. This ripe and structured wine shows why. It has weight, a firm texture and red plum and strawberry fruit flavors. All these elements are held together by a dark sense of tannin and fine acidity.
title: Antonin Rodet 2010  Givry
description2: Givry is one of the unsung values in Burgundy. This ripe and structured wine shows why. It has weight, a firm texture and red plum and strawberry fruit flavors. All these elements are held together by a dark sense of tannin and fine acidity. Pinot Noir France Burgundy Givry Antonin Rodet

description: This 95% Cabernet Sauvignon with the balance of Merlot, Syrah and Malbec, is immediately accessible with notes of char, roasted coffee bean and cherry. The palate is rich, chocolaty and seamlessly stitched together.
title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2010 Canoe Ridge Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Horse Heaven Hills)
description2: This 95% Cabernet Sauvignon with the balance of Merlot, Syrah and Malbec, is immediately accessible with notes of char, roasted coffee bean and cherry. The palate is rich, chocolaty and seamlessly stitched together. Cabernet Sauvignon US Washington Horse Heaven Hills Chateau Ste. Michelle

description: Rich in black cherry jam, mocha and toasty oak flavors, this wine offers the firm tannins and minerality that give a young Spring Mountain Cabernet its noticeable characteristics. Give it eight years to begin to come around.
title: Eponymous 2009 Cabernet Sauvignon (Spring Mountain District)
description2: Rich in black cherry jam, mocha and toasty oak flavors, this wine offers the firm tannins and minerality that give a young Spring Mountain Cabernet its noticeable characteristics. Give it eight years to begin to come around. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Spring Mountain District Eponymous

description: This brut-style bubbly is comprised of 67% Pinot Noir and 33% Chardonnay and shows aspects of both varieties. It's fairly full bodied, with raspberry, strawberry, lime, brioche, vanilla and toast flavors. Feels elegant, complex and lush in the mouth, and should develop additional bottle notes over the next six years.
title: Gloria Ferrer 2005 Royal Cuvée Sparkling (Carneros)
description2: This brut-style bubbly is comprised of 67% Pinot Noir and 33% Chardonnay and shows aspects of both varieties. It's fairly full bodied, with raspberry, strawberry, lime, brioche, vanilla and toast flavors. Feels elegant, complex and lush in the mouth, and should develop additional bottle notes over the next six years. Sparkling Blend US California Carneros Gloria Ferrer

description: This is a good example of the high-alcohol style of warmth and deliciousness. While it's not common for Stags Leap wines to have these characteristics, it is incredibly deep in black cherries, milk chocolate and oak, with a spicy finish that goes on for a long time, indicating the power of this Cabernet. Drink over the next six years.
title: Hall 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Stags Leap District)
description2: This is a good example of the high-alcohol style of warmth and deliciousness. While it's not common for Stags Leap wines to have these characteristics, it is incredibly deep in black cherries, milk chocolate and oak, with a spicy finish that goes on for a long time, indicating the power of this Cabernet. Drink over the next six years. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Stags Leap District Hall

description: Unexpectedly thick and mouthfilling, with generous peach aromas and flavors underscored by mustard greens and citrus. Clean and refreshing on the finish. Best Buy.
title: Geretto 2001 Pinot Grigio (Delle Venezie)
description2: Unexpectedly thick and mouthfilling, with generous peach aromas and flavors underscored by mustard greens and citrus. Clean and refreshing on the finish. Best Buy. Pinot Grigio Italy Northeastern Italy Delle Venezie Geretto

description: Aromas of mature Cabernet: cassis, tobacco leaf and a touch of caramel. Not overly rich or heavy, this is a pretty, lightweight Cab best enjoyed now.
title: L.A. Cetto 1996 Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Valle de Guadalupe)
description2: Aromas of mature Cabernet: cassis, tobacco leaf and a touch of caramel. Not overly rich or heavy, this is a pretty, lightweight Cab best enjoyed now. Cabernet Sauvignon Mexico Valle de Guadalupe  L.A. Cetto

description: Fresh and clean, with light, lemony aromas in addition to tropical fruit. The palate is textured and full, with fairly pure apple and pineapple flavors and some nuttiness. Everything works here, including the smooth, lengthy finish.  Best Buy.
title: La Playa 2002 Estate Reserve Chardonnay (Colchagua Valley)
description2: Fresh and clean, with light, lemony aromas in addition to tropical fruit. The palate is textured and full, with fairly pure apple and pineapple flavors and some nuttiness. Everything works here, including the smooth, lengthy finish.  Best Buy. Chardonnay Chile Colchagua Valley  La Playa

description: Smooth smelling, with pure and fresh berry and plum aromas. Very young and a bit tangy on the palate, with cherry and berry flavors and an oaky, soft finish that goes sweet then sour, and lasts for a long time. In terms of structure, it's balanced, mildly tannic, yet meant for drinking now.
title: Undurraga 2001 Reserva Merlot (Maipo Valley)
description2: Smooth smelling, with pure and fresh berry and plum aromas. Very young and a bit tangy on the palate, with cherry and berry flavors and an oaky, soft finish that goes sweet then sour, and lasts for a long time. In terms of structure, it's balanced, mildly tannic, yet meant for drinking now. Merlot Chile Maipo Valley  Undurraga

description: The “least” of Lane Tanner's range of Pinots, but complex and delicious. Ripe berry and spice flavors are rich, and there's a tangy earthiness suggesting sauteed mushrooms. Very dry and crisp, with a silky texture and a long, smooth finish.
title: Lane Tanner 2000 Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
description2: The “least” of Lane Tanner's range of Pinots, but complex and delicious. Ripe berry and spice flavors are rich, and there's a tangy earthiness suggesting sauteed mushrooms. Very dry and crisp, with a silky texture and a long, smooth finish. Pinot Noir US California Santa Maria Valley Lane Tanner

description: From an emerging Mendocino appellation, an engaging, dry wine. Its mouth-cleansing acidity is fresh and clean, highlighting pretty flavors of lime and honeydew, and leads to a tart finish.
title: Lolonis 2001 Fumé Blanc (Redwood Valley)
description2: From an emerging Mendocino appellation, an engaging, dry wine. Its mouth-cleansing acidity is fresh and clean, highlighting pretty flavors of lime and honeydew, and leads to a tart finish. Fumé Blanc US California Redwood Valley Lolonis

description: Simple, delicate and fruity, a jammy style with sweetly ripe flavors of wild raspberries and strawberries, as well as espresso, tobacco and Oriental spices. It's light and silky on the palate.
title: River Road 2001 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: Simple, delicate and fruity, a jammy style with sweetly ripe flavors of wild raspberries and strawberries, as well as espresso, tobacco and Oriental spices. It's light and silky on the palate. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley River Road

description: Creamy aromas of vanilla and pears also carry some typical Sauvignon Blanc pungency. For a rounder style, which it is, it's quite refreshing. The mix across the palate of banana, grapefruit and almonds is attractive, and so is the round, pretty finish. Drink it very soon.
title: Santa Ines 2001 Legado de Armida Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Maipo Valley)
description2: Creamy aromas of vanilla and pears also carry some typical Sauvignon Blanc pungency. For a rounder style, which it is, it's quite refreshing. The mix across the palate of banana, grapefruit and almonds is attractive, and so is the round, pretty finish. Drink it very soon. Sauvignon Blanc Chile Maipo Valley  Santa Ines

description: Lean and angular right now, showing hints of mint and chocolate—the oak sticks out a bit over the tart cherry flavors.
title: Sebastiani 1996 Cherryblock Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
description2: Lean and angular right now, showing hints of mint and chocolate—the oak sticks out a bit over the tart cherry flavors. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Sonoma Valley Sebastiani

description: A good wine, grape-wise, with sharply etched, pure fruity flavors of citrus, fig and sweet tobacco. Acidity is fresh and juicy, and the wine is fully dry. Barrel fermented, it is super-oaky, maybe too much so, from the charry aromas to the woody flavors.
title: Signorello 2001 Seta Semillon-Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
description2: A good wine, grape-wise, with sharply etched, pure fruity flavors of citrus, fig and sweet tobacco. Acidity is fresh and juicy, and the wine is fully dry. Barrel fermented, it is super-oaky, maybe too much so, from the charry aromas to the woody flavors. Semillon-Sauvignon Blanc US California Napa Valley Signorello

description: This is a full-bodied Pinot, packed with ripe cherry and strawberry flavors and framed in spicy nuance. A shade hot on the finish, ending with an unusually bright licorice and herbal edge.
title: Silver 2000 Julia's Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
description2: This is a full-bodied Pinot, packed with ripe cherry and strawberry flavors and framed in spicy nuance. A shade hot on the finish, ending with an unusually bright licorice and herbal edge. Pinot Noir US California Santa Barbara County Silver

description: This is a great house pour for fans of Chilean Merlot with its consistent fruit, soft acidity and low tannins. On the nose and palate, a core of sweet, Red Delicious apple is accented by dry leather, toasty vanilla and dried herbs. Simple, but well crafted.
title: Château La Joya 2000 Estate Bottled Reserve Merlot (Colchagua Valley)
description2: This is a great house pour for fans of Chilean Merlot with its consistent fruit, soft acidity and low tannins. On the nose and palate, a core of sweet, Red Delicious apple is accented by dry leather, toasty vanilla and dried herbs. Simple, but well crafted. Merlot Chile Colchagua Valley  Château La Joya

description: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah and Merlot starts off a bit murky and brooding but then displays raspberry and plum fruit, and some big-time heft. A tad oaky and simple, but with grilled meats it should more than do the trick. If you like 'em big and a touch funky, get tattooed.
title: Two Brothers 2001 Big Tattoo Red Red (Colchagua Valley)
description2: This blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah and Merlot starts off a bit murky and brooding but then displays raspberry and plum fruit, and some big-time heft. A tad oaky and simple, but with grilled meats it should more than do the trick. If you like 'em big and a touch funky, get tattooed. Red Blend Chile Colchagua Valley  Two Brothers

description: Heavy and gold in color, with aromas of browned butter, wheat and corn cakes. The bouquet and color are heavy, and so is the palate: There you get oak barrel and toast, but little to no fruit. Even the finish is woody, with just a hint of melon and banana. A good experimental wine for those eager to taste oak; otherwise steer clear.
title: Viña Santa Monica 2001 Chardonnay (Rapel Valley)
description2: Heavy and gold in color, with aromas of browned butter, wheat and corn cakes. The bouquet and color are heavy, and so is the palate: There you get oak barrel and toast, but little to no fruit. Even the finish is woody, with just a hint of melon and banana. A good experimental wine for those eager to taste oak; otherwise steer clear. Chardonnay Chile Rapel Valley  Viña Santa Monica

description: The new clone on the block finally makes it onto the front label. Soft and silky, this wine has cherry-berry flavors with an earthy streak of tobacco and sage. There are some firm tannins that kick in on the finish, which suggest six months of aging.
title: Wolff 2001 Dijon Clones Selection Pinot Noir (Edna Valley)
description2: The new clone on the block finally makes it onto the front label. Soft and silky, this wine has cherry-berry flavors with an earthy streak of tobacco and sage. There are some firm tannins that kick in on the finish, which suggest six months of aging. Pinot Noir US California Edna Valley Wolff

description: The initial nosing reveals a char-broiled character along with maple. That nose turns even darker with airing, indicating that no barrel was spared in the making of this wine. The flavor profile is all dark berries and cream, with yet more wood at the heart. On the tail end, it's dry, broad and full of tannins and extract that coat the mouth. Best Buy.
title: Errazuriz 2001 Cabernet Sauvignon (Aconcagua Valley)
description2: The initial nosing reveals a char-broiled character along with maple. That nose turns even darker with airing, indicating that no barrel was spared in the making of this wine. The flavor profile is all dark berries and cream, with yet more wood at the heart. On the tail end, it's dry, broad and full of tannins and extract that coat the mouth. Best Buy. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Aconcagua Valley  Errazuriz

description: As easy and tasty as a summer wine gets, this blush also has a lovely coppery-pink color. Flavors of fresh strawberries and spice burst on the palate, and drink just a tad off-dry.
title: Iron Horse 2002 Rose de Pinot Noir Pinot Noir (Green Valley)
description2: As easy and tasty as a summer wine gets, this blush also has a lovely coppery-pink color. Flavors of fresh strawberries and spice burst on the palate, and drink just a tad off-dry. Pinot Noir US California Green Valley Iron Horse

description: From a vineyard in the Santa Lucia Highlands, a young, jammy wine bursting with candied flavors of raspberries and cherries. It drinks very concentrated and intense. There's a caramelly note that may come from well-charred barrels in this dry, full-bodied wine.
title: Opolo 2000 Pinot Noir (Central Coast)
description2: From a vineyard in the Santa Lucia Highlands, a young, jammy wine bursting with candied flavors of raspberries and cherries. It drinks very concentrated and intense. There's a caramelly note that may come from well-charred barrels in this dry, full-bodied wine. Pinot Noir US California Central Coast Opolo

description: Tasty and wonderfully drinkable. The basic flavors are cola and soy, with extra nuances of blackberries, cherries and quite a bit of smoky, sweet oak. Drinks very dry and spicy.
title: Savannah-Chanelle 2000 Sleepy Hollow Vineyard Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
description2: Tasty and wonderfully drinkable. The basic flavors are cola and soy, with extra nuances of blackberries, cherries and quite a bit of smoky, sweet oak. Drinks very dry and spicy. Pinot Noir US California Santa Lucia Highlands Savannah-Chanelle

description: Almost addictive with its fresh, clean flavors of sweet lemon, fig, tart green apple and cinnamon, encased in lively acidity. This zesty white wine has extra layers of complexity and depth. It's also one of the most versatile food wines around.
title: J Vineyards & Winery 2002 Pinot Gris (Russian River Valley)
description2: Almost addictive with its fresh, clean flavors of sweet lemon, fig, tart green apple and cinnamon, encased in lively acidity. This zesty white wine has extra layers of complexity and depth. It's also one of the most versatile food wines around. Pinot Gris US California Russian River Valley J Vineyards & Winery

description: A Soave that has been partially barrel fermented is unusual, but it works in this wine, which has great concentration, roundness and softness and the complexity of toast.
title: Masi 2002 Colbaraca Classico  (Soave)
description2: A Soave that has been partially barrel fermented is unusual, but it works in this wine, which has great concentration, roundness and softness and the complexity of toast. Garganega Italy Veneto Soave Masi

description: This luscious, balanced Pinot Grigio isn't overly complex, but scores for its cactus pear and toasted almond aromas and flavors and its peppery, refreshing finish. It's medium-bodied, with just a hint of unreleased CO2 to enliven it.
title: Masottina 2001 Vigneto Ai Palazzi Pinot Grigio (Piave)
description2: This luscious, balanced Pinot Grigio isn't overly complex, but scores for its cactus pear and toasted almond aromas and flavors and its peppery, refreshing finish. It's medium-bodied, with just a hint of unreleased CO2 to enliven it. Pinot Grigio Italy Veneto Piave Masottina

description: Solid and sturdy, and more big than small, this Syrah runs toward the red-fruit spectrum. But the nose offers dried fruit, herbs and clove, while there's more clove and fennel underneath the fruit on the palate. There's oak throughout, especially on the finish, but it's not overdone. And if many Syrah-based wines need time to settle, this one seems made for immediate drinking.
title: Montes 2001 Alpha Syrah (Curicó Valley)
description2: Solid and sturdy, and more big than small, this Syrah runs toward the red-fruit spectrum. But the nose offers dried fruit, herbs and clove, while there's more clove and fennel underneath the fruit on the palate. There's oak throughout, especially on the finish, but it's not overdone. And if many Syrah-based wines need time to settle, this one seems made for immediate drinking. Syrah Chile Curicó Valley  Montes

description: This Merlot excels beyond its bargain classification by showing purity and a high level of fruit quality. The bouquet exudes plum, chocolate and some creaminess, while the palate bursts with blackberry, bitter chocolate and espresso. Round and satisfying, with enough structure to last a year or two—or until the next vintage comes around.
title: Concha y Toro 2002 Xplorador Merlot (Rapel Valley)
description2: This Merlot excels beyond its bargain classification by showing purity and a high level of fruit quality. The bouquet exudes plum, chocolate and some creaminess, while the palate bursts with blackberry, bitter chocolate and espresso. Round and satisfying, with enough structure to last a year or two—or until the next vintage comes around. Merlot Chile Rapel Valley  Concha y Toro

description: Friendly apple fruit sits easily on nose and palate before a refreshing, clean finish. This is an easy, fruit-driven white ideal for a party.
title: Dopff & Irion 2014 Cuvée René Dopff Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
description2: Friendly apple fruit sits easily on nose and palate before a refreshing, clean finish. This is an easy, fruit-driven white ideal for a party. Pinot Blanc France Alsace Alsace Dopff & Irion

description: Made from the local Sciaccarellu grape, this is a delicious, light and perfumed wine. It has tight acidity to go with the red currant flavors and the crisp texture. The wine is poised and refreshing.
title: Union de Vignerons de l'Île de Beauté 2015 Rosé (Ile de Beauté)
winery: Union de Vignerons de l'Île de Beauté
address: Ile de Beauté, France Other, France
description2: Made from the local Sciaccarellu grape, this is a delicious, light and perfumed wine. It has tight acidity to go with the red currant flavors and the crisp texture. The wine is poised and refreshing. Rosé France France Other Ile de Beauté Union de Vignerons de l'Île de Beauté

description: Lively aromas like crisp apple and white peach join more creamy, pastry-like flavors of butter, vanilla and toasted almond in this medium-bodied wine. It is soft in texture and so fruity it seems sweet on the finish.
title: Van Ruiten 2015 Chardonnay (Lodi)
description2: Lively aromas like crisp apple and white peach join more creamy, pastry-like flavors of butter, vanilla and toasted almond in this medium-bodied wine. It is soft in texture and so fruity it seems sweet on the finish. Chardonnay US California Lodi Van Ruiten

description: This wine is tangy and textured with light tannins, a bite of citrus acidity and plenty of fruit. It's bright and has a juicy, lively aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Vignobles Bonhur 2015 Château Terres Douces Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description2: This wine is tangy and textured with light tannins, a bite of citrus acidity and plenty of fruit. It's bright and has a juicy, lively aftertaste. Drink now. Rosé France Bordeaux Bordeaux Rosé Vignobles Bonhur

description: Aromas suggesting honeydew melon, exotic fruit and a hint of tomato leaf lead the nose. The simple palate is a bit less expressive, offering grapefruit and a hint of white peach alongside lively acidity.
title: MandraRossa 2015 Urra di Mare Sauvignon (Sicilia)
description2: Aromas suggesting honeydew melon, exotic fruit and a hint of tomato leaf lead the nose. The simple palate is a bit less expressive, offering grapefruit and a hint of white peach alongside lively acidity. Sauvignon Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia MandraRossa

description: Made with white vinification of Aglianico grapes, this has aromas of dried-up chamomile flower and overripe citrus fruit. The simple palate offers crushed white currant alongside zesty acidity.
title: Mastroberardino 2013 Neroametà Aglianico (Campania)
description2: Made with white vinification of Aglianico grapes, this has aromas of dried-up chamomile flower and overripe citrus fruit. The simple palate offers crushed white currant alongside zesty acidity. Aglianico Italy Southern Italy Campania Mastroberardino

description: In many ways, this is a fascinating sip, but the components are a bit confusing altogether. Aromas of minty berries, tobacco, rustic leather and a very strong camphor scent introduce the nose, and then a lively, quite foamy acidity consumes the palate, where flavors of sweet berries are cut by garden herbs and pepper. It's a little too overpowering.
title: Joseph Filippi 2009 Old Vine Zinfandel (Cucamonga Valley)
description2: In many ways, this is a fascinating sip, but the components are a bit confusing altogether. Aromas of minty berries, tobacco, rustic leather and a very strong camphor scent introduce the nose, and then a lively, quite foamy acidity consumes the palate, where flavors of sweet berries are cut by garden herbs and pepper. It's a little too overpowering. Zinfandel US California Cucamonga Valley Joseph Filippi

description: A pleasant mix of dark berries and fruit lead the bouquet of this friendly wine, with solid notes of black cherry, blackberry and boysenberry throughout. A hint of spice adds interest to the finish, with medium-light tannins and ample acidity resulting in good overall balance.
title: Le Petit Cochonnet 2015 Cabernet Sauvignon (Pays d'Oc)
description2: A pleasant mix of dark berries and fruit lead the bouquet of this friendly wine, with solid notes of black cherry, blackberry and boysenberry throughout. A hint of spice adds interest to the finish, with medium-light tannins and ample acidity resulting in good overall balance. Cabernet Sauvignon France Languedoc-Roussillon Pays d'Oc Le Petit Cochonnet

description: A softly earthy tone is all the nose gives away. The palate is brisk, neutral and has both freshness and a slightly bitter edge. Drink soon.
title: Leon Beyer 2014 Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
description2: A softly earthy tone is all the nose gives away. The palate is brisk, neutral and has both freshness and a slightly bitter edge. Drink soon. Pinot Blanc France Alsace Alsace Leon Beyer

description: This medium-bodied wine is very fruity in aroma, and exudes ripe pear and fig flavors. Add in creamy vanilla accents and a very soft texture and the effect is almost sweet.
title: Tortoise Creek 2014 Jam's Blend Chardonnay (Lodi)
description2: This medium-bodied wine is very fruity in aroma, and exudes ripe pear and fig flavors. Add in creamy vanilla accents and a very soft texture and the effect is almost sweet. Chardonnay US California Lodi Tortoise Creek

description: Dusty earth, seashell notes and tomato aromas don't fully announce how snappy, tart and racy this coastal PN is. Almost sour red-plum and pie-cherry flavors finish angular, sharp and zesty to an extreme.
title: Undurraga 2014 Gran Reserva Sibaris Pinot Noir (Leyda Valley)
description2: Dusty earth, seashell notes and tomato aromas don't fully announce how snappy, tart and racy this coastal PN is. Almost sour red-plum and pie-cherry flavors finish angular, sharp and zesty to an extreme. Pinot Noir Chile Leyda Valley  Undurraga

description: This is a juicy and formidably tannic version of the variety, from a famed vineyard known also for Zinfandel. Dry oak and intrusively harsh texture need mellowing before the more gentle notions of dried herb and black cherry can shine.
title: Vermeil 2013 Frediani Vineyard Cabernet Franc (Calistoga)
description2: This is a juicy and formidably tannic version of the variety, from a famed vineyard known also for Zinfandel. Dry oak and intrusively harsh texture need mellowing before the more gentle notions of dried herb and black cherry can shine. Cabernet Franc US California Calistoga Vermeil

description: Apple and citrus aromas are neither well defined nor overly aromatic. Fresh and juicy on the palate, this offers citrus peel and green melon flavors. Mild and short on the finish.
title: Viña Maipo 2015 Vitral Chardonnay (Chile)
description2: Apple and citrus aromas are neither well defined nor overly aromatic. Fresh and juicy on the palate, this offers citrus peel and green melon flavors. Mild and short on the finish. Chardonnay Chile Chile  Viña Maipo

description: A soft fruitiness and smooth texture make this medium-bodied red easy to enjoy. Strawberry and cherry notes rest easily on a bed of light tannin that adds an appetizing mouthfeel.
title: Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi 2013 Merlot (California)
description2: A soft fruitiness and smooth texture make this medium-bodied red easy to enjoy. Strawberry and cherry notes rest easily on a bed of light tannin that adds an appetizing mouthfeel. Merlot US California California Woodbridge by Robert Mondavi

description: Aromas of herbal red fruits, tobacco and vanilla are basic and modest. This has a wiry, acidic mouthfeel and flavors of mixed herbs, tomato, pie cherry, red plum and olive. A fresh, racy finish is tangy and tomatoey.
title: Concha y Toro 2014 Reserva Casillero del Diablo Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
description2: Aromas of herbal red fruits, tobacco and vanilla are basic and modest. This has a wiry, acidic mouthfeel and flavors of mixed herbs, tomato, pie cherry, red plum and olive. A fresh, racy finish is tangy and tomatoey. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Central Valley  Concha y Toro

description: This might be a touch volatile at first, but saucy tomato-like aromas are offset by fresh red-plum notes. A tight and tannic palate softens with time in the glass, while berry flavors carry herb and spice notes onto a lightly herbal finish.
title: Echeverria 2014 Reserva Merlot (Central Valley)
description2: This might be a touch volatile at first, but saucy tomato-like aromas are offset by fresh red-plum notes. A tight and tannic palate softens with time in the glass, while berry flavors carry herb and spice notes onto a lightly herbal finish. Merlot Chile Central Valley  Echeverria

description: This is a very simple, friendly, fresh and lively white—easy to drink and enjoy with its lemony freshness. It's ideal for a party.
title: Famille Hauller 2015 Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
description2: This is a very simple, friendly, fresh and lively white—easy to drink and enjoy with its lemony freshness. It's ideal for a party. Pinot Blanc France Alsace Alsace Famille Hauller

description: This aromatic, medium-bodied white flirts with a distinct grassiness that can overwhelm, before settling into finer notions of grapefruit and stone fruit, as well as ripe, fleshy cantaloupe.
title: Black Stallion 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
description2: This aromatic, medium-bodied white flirts with a distinct grassiness that can overwhelm, before settling into finer notions of grapefruit and stone fruit, as well as ripe, fleshy cantaloupe. Sauvignon Blanc US California Napa Valley Black Stallion

description: Chunky aromas of tomato, saucy berry fruits, asphalt and tire rubber are somewhat harsh. Flat and lazy in feel, this chunky, full-bodied number from Bío Bío tastes of baked cherry and plum fruit. A finish with low acidity and not much kick is the ending.
title: Bodega Volcanes de Chile 2013 Tectonia Pinot Noir (Bío Bío Valley)
description2: Chunky aromas of tomato, saucy berry fruits, asphalt and tire rubber are somewhat harsh. Flat and lazy in feel, this chunky, full-bodied number from Bío Bío tastes of baked cherry and plum fruit. A finish with low acidity and not much kick is the ending. Pinot Noir Chile Bío Bío Valley  Bodega Volcanes de Chile

description: Lively, spicy oak aromas, rich fruit flavors and a lightly tannic texture make this a well-balanced dry wine that will be great with burgers, ribs or carne asada burritos. The price can't be beat either.
title: Bota Box 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
description2: Lively, spicy oak aromas, rich fruit flavors and a lightly tannic texture make this a well-balanced dry wine that will be great with burgers, ribs or carne asada burritos. The price can't be beat either. Cabernet Sauvignon US California California Bota Box

description: Almost white in color, this wine is fruity and crisp with lemon and lime flavors. A light hint of a tannic structure also suggests minerality. The aftertaste is bright and packed with acidity.
title: Château Côte Montpezat 2015 Le Canon de Côte Montpezat Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description2: Almost white in color, this wine is fruity and crisp with lemon and lime flavors. A light hint of a tannic structure also suggests minerality. The aftertaste is bright and packed with acidity. Rosé France Bordeaux Bordeaux Rosé Château Côte Montpezat

description: This pale-colored wine has a light, perfumed character. A blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, it is an attractive, bone-dry rosé, ripe with strawberry fruits, that will be best with food.
title: Château Léon 2015 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description2: This pale-colored wine has a light, perfumed character. A blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, it is an attractive, bone-dry rosé, ripe with strawberry fruits, that will be best with food. Rosé France Bordeaux Bordeaux Rosé Château Léon

description: Aromas of black plum, black cherry, green bramble and a touch of eucalyptus precede flavors of blackberry, raspberry and red plum.
title: Cramele Recas 2014 Legendary Estate Series Cabernet Sauvignon (Romania)
description2: Aromas of black plum, black cherry, green bramble and a touch of eucalyptus precede flavors of blackberry, raspberry and red plum. Cabernet Sauvignon Romania Romania  Cramele Recas

description: Pineapple, citrus blossom, and white peach aromas prepare your palate for tastes of green apple, lemon zest and apricots. The finish is crisp and acidic.
title: Cramele Recas 2014 Legendary Estate Series Pinot Grigio (Romania)
description2: Pineapple, citrus blossom, and white peach aromas prepare your palate for tastes of green apple, lemon zest and apricots. The finish is crisp and acidic. Pinot Grigio Romania Romania  Cramele Recas

description: Aromas of black berry and black cherry lead to flavors of cherry vanilla and red plum before a soft tannic finish.
title: Cramele Recas 2015 Dreambird Merlot (Romania)
description2: Aromas of black berry and black cherry lead to flavors of cherry vanilla and red plum before a soft tannic finish. Merlot Romania Romania  Cramele Recas

description: Rich flavors like vanilla and fig combine with a creamy texture and sweet finish to make a cream puff of a wine. The texture is soft and acidity quite low.
title: Nica 2012 Chardonnay (California)
description2: Rich flavors like vanilla and fig combine with a creamy texture and sweet finish to make a cream puff of a wine. The texture is soft and acidity quite low. Chardonnay US California California Nica

description: The caramel character of this wine is less attractive than its background of red fruits. The two sides need to come into balance for it to work completely, so wait until late 2016.
title: Producta Vignobles 2015 Cabane aux Oiseaux Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description2: The caramel character of this wine is less attractive than its background of red fruits. The two sides need to come into balance for it to work completely, so wait until late 2016. Rosé France Bordeaux Bordeaux Rosé Producta Vignobles

description: Bland, fleshy aromas of corn and apple cider are unconvincing but not overtly negative. This feels plump and heavy, like fruit punch. Flavors of cantaloupe and citrus fruits finish yeasty, with notes of corn and white bread.
title: Rios de Chile 2015 Chardonnay (Central Valley)
description2: Bland, fleshy aromas of corn and apple cider are unconvincing but not overtly negative. This feels plump and heavy, like fruit punch. Flavors of cantaloupe and citrus fruits finish yeasty, with notes of corn and white bread. Chardonnay Chile Central Valley  Rios de Chile

description: A very drinkable, light and easy to like Merlot, this offers ripe notes of black plum, cherry and berry on the nose and mouth, with a faint hint of milk chocolate in the background. The soft mouthfeel and fruity palate finish short, but clean.
title: Le Petit Cochonnet 2015 Merlot (Pays d'Oc)
description2: A very drinkable, light and easy to like Merlot, this offers ripe notes of black plum, cherry and berry on the nose and mouth, with a faint hint of milk chocolate in the background. The soft mouthfeel and fruity palate finish short, but clean. Merlot France Languedoc-Roussillon Pays d'Oc Le Petit Cochonnet

description: A light, easy and cheery selection, with direct aromas and flavors of sweet cherry, red raspberry and strawberry. The mouthfeel is soft and approachable, with virtually no tannins and a clean, short finish. Drink up.
title: Le Petit Cochonnet 2015 Pinot Noir (Pays d'Oc)
description2: A light, easy and cheery selection, with direct aromas and flavors of sweet cherry, red raspberry and strawberry. The mouthfeel is soft and approachable, with virtually no tannins and a clean, short finish. Drink up. Pinot Noir France Languedoc-Roussillon Pays d'Oc Le Petit Cochonnet

description: There are a lot of uncommon, unusual elements to this Pinot. For starters, the nose is volatile, with notes of horseradish and grapefruit. The palate has a solid, juicy feel to it, while mulchy cherry and plum flavors finish aimlessly.
title: Loma Larga 2013 Unfiltered Pinot Noir (Casablanca Valley)
description2: There are a lot of uncommon, unusual elements to this Pinot. For starters, the nose is volatile, with notes of horseradish and grapefruit. The palate has a solid, juicy feel to it, while mulchy cherry and plum flavors finish aimlessly. Pinot Noir Chile Casablanca Valley  Loma Larga

description: This wine smells fruity, like raspberry and cranberries, and turns very tart and astringent on the palate. Sharp fruit flavors come out on the finish along with a metallic edge.
title: Los Portales 2013 Garnacha (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
description2: This wine smells fruity, like raspberry and cranberries, and turns very tart and astringent on the palate. Sharp fruit flavors come out on the finish along with a metallic edge. Garnacha US California Shenandoah Valley (CA) Los Portales

description: This is herbal and ripely fruited all at once, smelling like sweet pea, carnation and baby powder combined with tones of plum and cherry. The fruity notes continue through to the medium-weight palate, though they're short-lived.
title: Maison Nicolas 2015 Rosé (Gard)
description2: This is herbal and ripely fruited all at once, smelling like sweet pea, carnation and baby powder combined with tones of plum and cherry. The fruity notes continue through to the medium-weight palate, though they're short-lived. Rosé France Languedoc-Roussillon Gard Maison Nicolas

description: Forced, candied aromas of chocolaty oak and herbal, slightly weedy berry fruits feed into a chunky, blocky, creamy palate with saucy berry flavors combined with minty, top-heavy oak. The finish tastes minty, lactic and oaky, with heat.
title: Montes 2014 Classic Series Merlot (Colchagua Costa)
description2: Forced, candied aromas of chocolaty oak and herbal, slightly weedy berry fruits feed into a chunky, blocky, creamy palate with saucy berry flavors combined with minty, top-heavy oak. The finish tastes minty, lactic and oaky, with heat. Merlot Chile Colchagua Costa  Montes

description: Berry and cherry aromas register as soupy and flat. Like the nose, this feels flat, chewy and dense. Stewed, rubbery prunes and plums finish with a fig-like note and rubbery tannins.
title: Rayun 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Valley)
description2: Berry and cherry aromas register as soupy and flat. Like the nose, this feels flat, chewy and dense. Stewed, rubbery prunes and plums finish with a fig-like note and rubbery tannins. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Central Valley  Rayun

description: Flat, dusty aromas of lees and vanilla cookies are rather lifeless. While this is wet and somewhat juicy in feel, it's bland as a whole, with yeasty melon and citrus flavors that finish bready.
title: Rios de Chile 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Central Valley)
description2: Flat, dusty aromas of lees and vanilla cookies are rather lifeless. While this is wet and somewhat juicy in feel, it's bland as a whole, with yeasty melon and citrus flavors that finish bready. Sauvignon Blanc Chile Central Valley  Rios de Chile

description: Fermented entirely in stainless steel, this is a simple, tropically sweet wine, characterized by mango, pineapple and juicy melon.
title: River Road 2015 Un-Oaked Chardonnay (Sonoma County)
description2: Fermented entirely in stainless steel, this is a simple, tropically sweet wine, characterized by mango, pineapple and juicy melon. Chardonnay US California Sonoma County River Road

description: This medium-bodied wine has an earthy aroma, muted cherry flavors and a smooth enough texture. It is good and drinkable.
title: Greenwood Ridge 2013 Hundred Point, Estate Bottled Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
description2: This medium-bodied wine has an earthy aroma, muted cherry flavors and a smooth enough texture. It is good and drinkable. Pinot Noir US California Anderson Valley Greenwood Ridge

description: This full-bodied wine has earthy, woodsy aromas, ripe and mature fruit flavors and a broad, almost soft texture. It's very mouth-filling and smooth, and will please people who like a little rusticity in their wines.
title: Housley's Century Oak 2013 Judy's Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
description2: This full-bodied wine has earthy, woodsy aromas, ripe and mature fruit flavors and a broad, almost soft texture. It's very mouth-filling and smooth, and will please people who like a little rusticity in their wines. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Lodi Housley's Century Oak

description: Aromas like jam and maple syrup and equally ripe, generous flavors give this medium-bodied wine an easy appeal. The texture is soft for this type, the flavors are not too deep and the finish is light.
title: Twisted 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
description2: Aromas like jam and maple syrup and equally ripe, generous flavors give this medium-bodied wine an easy appeal. The texture is soft for this type, the flavors are not too deep and the finish is light. Cabernet Sauvignon US California California Twisted

description: Saucy aromas run low on fruit and high on tomato and green herbs. In the mouth, this feels rough. Flavors of bell pepper, pizza sauce and oregano finish without the ripeness that should be present in a high-end 2011 RDD.
title: Valtravieso 2011 Vendimia Seleccionada  (Ribera del Duero)
address: Ribera del Duero, Northern Spain, Spain
description2: Saucy aromas run low on fruit and high on tomato and green herbs. In the mouth, this feels rough. Flavors of bell pepper, pizza sauce and oregano finish without the ripeness that should be present in a high-end 2011 RDD. Red Blend Spain Northern Spain Ribera del Duero Valtravieso

description: This is a strawberry-pink-colored wine with candied flavors balanced by acidity. It is fruity, crisp and light in character.
title: Château Lamothe-Vincent 2015 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description2: This is a strawberry-pink-colored wine with candied flavors balanced by acidity. It is fruity, crisp and light in character. Rosé France Bordeaux Bordeaux Rosé Château Lamothe-Vincent

description: With only the lightest texture, this wine almost tastes like a white wine. It has plenty of citrus character, partnered with apple and green-fruit flavors. At the end, look out for the bite of tannin that gives it a more rosé character.
title: Château Laubès 2015 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description2: With only the lightest texture, this wine almost tastes like a white wine. It has plenty of citrus character, partnered with apple and green-fruit flavors. At the end, look out for the bite of tannin that gives it a more rosé character. Rosé France Bordeaux Bordeaux Rosé Château Laubès

description: Rather vegetal aromas of jalapeño and bell pepper mix with red fruit on the nose of this bottling. Those same bell peppery notes carry through the palate, which is intriguing but will likely confuse many drinkers.
title: Four Sisters Ranch 2011 Serena's Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
description2: Rather vegetal aromas of jalapeño and bell pepper mix with red fruit on the nose of this bottling. Those same bell peppery notes carry through the palate, which is intriguing but will likely confuse many drinkers. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Paso Robles Four Sisters Ranch

description: This is a simple representation of the variety: medium in acidity and weight and a roundness of appropriate apple and pear that finishes flat.
title: Frei Brothers 2014 Reserve Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: This is a simple representation of the variety: medium in acidity and weight and a roundness of appropriate apple and pear that finishes flat. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley Frei Brothers

description: Woody, creamy aromas of black fruits precede a sketchy palate with acidity akin to vinegar. Medicinal flavors of oak, mint and generic berry fruits finish with a pasty feel and herbal, oaky flavors.
title: G7 2013 The 7th Generation Reserva Carmenère (Loncomilla Valley)
description2: Woody, creamy aromas of black fruits precede a sketchy palate with acidity akin to vinegar. Medicinal flavors of oak, mint and generic berry fruits finish with a pasty feel and herbal, oaky flavors. Carmenère Chile Loncomilla Valley  G7

description: Prickly, punchy, pryazinic aromas will have you thinking this is Sauvignon Blanc or Spanish Verdejo. A sharp palate is more about acid than body, while this continues with its SB-like character via green flavors of lime and arugula. A crisp finish evaporates into nothing.
title: Albamar 2015 Estate Bottled Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
description2: Prickly, punchy, pryazinic aromas will have you thinking this is Sauvignon Blanc or Spanish Verdejo. A sharp palate is more about acid than body, while this continues with its SB-like character via green flavors of lime and arugula. A crisp finish evaporates into nothing. Chardonnay Chile Casablanca Valley  Albamar

description: Heavy oak and marginal white-fruit scents make for a compromised nose. This feels chunky and resiny, with heavy flavors of clove and raw wood. Additional clove notes on the finish render this Chardonnay an underachiever.
title: Indomita 2015 Gran Reserva Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
description2: Heavy oak and marginal white-fruit scents make for a compromised nose. This feels chunky and resiny, with heavy flavors of clove and raw wood. Additional clove notes on the finish render this Chardonnay an underachiever. Chardonnay Chile Casablanca Valley  Indomita

description: Dark-colored, full-bodied and practically sweet with oak, this box wine spreads spicy flavors around the fruit, and becomes more syrupy with each sip.
title: Loft 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
description2: Dark-colored, full-bodied and practically sweet with oak, this box wine spreads spicy flavors around the fruit, and becomes more syrupy with each sip. Cabernet Sauvignon US California California Loft

description: Apple and honeydew aromas show on the nose of this boxed wine, which prides itself on having a small eco-footprint. The palate is flatter than the nose, with green apple skin flavors but not much texture or acidity to speak of.
title: Loft 2014 Chardonnay (Monterey)
description2: Apple and honeydew aromas show on the nose of this boxed wine, which prides itself on having a small eco-footprint. The palate is flatter than the nose, with green apple skin flavors but not much texture or acidity to speak of. Chardonnay US California Monterey Loft

description: Underripe aromas of bell pepper and scallion correctly announce a shearing, high-acid palate. Salty, tart flavors of citrus fruits finish with pyrazine-driven green notes.
title: Santa Alicia 2015 Reserva Sauvignon Blanc (Maipo Valley)
description2: Underripe aromas of bell pepper and scallion correctly announce a shearing, high-acid palate. Salty, tart flavors of citrus fruits finish with pyrazine-driven green notes. Sauvignon Blanc Chile Maipo Valley  Santa Alicia

description: Barely noticeable aromas of wet rocks and sour red-fruit skins try to show on the nose of this wine. The palate is characterized by iron, wet rocks and dust flavors, without much fruit.
title: Jekel 2014 Pinot Noir (Monterey)
description2: Barely noticeable aromas of wet rocks and sour red-fruit skins try to show on the nose of this wine. The palate is characterized by iron, wet rocks and dust flavors, without much fruit. Pinot Noir US California Monterey Jekel

description: Rustic, gaseous aromas of soupy berry fruits and tire rubber create a struggling nose. Rubbery tannins and a lack of a focal point make for a jumbled palate, while this tastes stewy, weedy and low on fresh fruit.
title: Kunza 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Maule Valley)
description2: Rustic, gaseous aromas of soupy berry fruits and tire rubber create a struggling nose. Rubbery tannins and a lack of a focal point make for a jumbled palate, while this tastes stewy, weedy and low on fresh fruit. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Maule Valley  Kunza

description: This feels very ripe, perhaps overripe, with its seemingly sweet flavor of black fruit juice and its soft structure. It's appealing and does have some tannins, but it is not for aging.
title: Herdade dos Machados 2009 Morgado da Canita Red (Alentejano)
description2: This feels very ripe, perhaps overripe, with its seemingly sweet flavor of black fruit juice and its soft structure. It's appealing and does have some tannins, but it is not for aging. Portuguese Red Portugal Alentejano  Herdade dos Machados

description: From Bacio Divino, this Sangiovese-based blend is curiously soft. While it has forward cherry, cocoa and spice flavors, it simply lacks structural integrity.The alcohol is evident on the warm, dry finish.
title: Pazzo 2009 Red (Napa Valley)
description2: From Bacio Divino, this Sangiovese-based blend is curiously soft. While it has forward cherry, cocoa and spice flavors, it simply lacks structural integrity.The alcohol is evident on the warm, dry finish. Red Blend US California Napa Valley Pazzo

description: This is a fresh and fragrant rosé from the Vinho Verde region. It has light acidity and a red fruit flavor. The lightest prickle gives just that extra lift.
title: Quinta de Gomariz 2011 Espadeiro Rosé (Vinho Verde)
description2: This is a fresh and fragrant rosé from the Vinho Verde region. It has light acidity and a red fruit flavor. The lightest prickle gives just that extra lift. Rosé Portugal Vinho Verde  Quinta de Gomariz

description: Simple and agreeable, this can be paired with a burger or beef taco. It's dry and clean, with pleasant cherry and cola flavors.
title: Sean Minor 2010 Pinot Noir (Carneros)
description2: Simple and agreeable, this can be paired with a burger or beef taco. It's dry and clean, with pleasant cherry and cola flavors. Pinot Noir US California Carneros Sean Minor

description: Simple, dry and one dimensional, this has cola and cherry jam flavors, and a silky, delicate texture.
title: Kirkland Signature 2009 Pinot Noir (Carneros)
description2: Simple, dry and one dimensional, this has cola and cherry jam flavors, and a silky, delicate texture. Pinot Noir US California Carneros Kirkland Signature

title: Lost Angel 2009 Ruckus White (California)

description: This crisp Chardonnay has a disjointedness about it. Its aroma and flavor is most akin to Lemonheads candy.
title: Matchbook 2010 Old Head Chardonnay (Dunnigan Hills)
description2: This crisp Chardonnay has a disjointedness about it. Its aroma and flavor is most akin to Lemonheads candy. Chardonnay US California Dunnigan Hills Matchbook

description: Soft and fruity with some sweetness, this red-fruit-flavored wine is rounded and warm, crispened by acidity.
title: Barton & Guestier 2011 Bistro Pinot Noir (Ile de Beauté)
address: Ile de Beauté, France Other, France
description2: Soft and fruity with some sweetness, this red-fruit-flavored wine is rounded and warm, crispened by acidity. Pinot Noir France France Other Ile de Beauté Barton & Guestier

description: Black Box hops onto the popular sweet red wine train with this blend. It is, as advertised, sweet, but not too much, giving a sugary edge to the blackberries and cherries.
title: Black Box 2010 Sweet Red (California)

description: A good Chardonnay to serve at parties, this shows plenty of oak-driven vanilla and toast flavors that ride high over the seemingly sweet note of pineapple candy. It will satisfy lots of Chardophiles, at an affordable price.
title: Black Box 2011 Chardonnay (California)
description2: A good Chardonnay to serve at parties, this shows plenty of oak-driven vanilla and toast flavors that ride high over the seemingly sweet note of pineapple candy. It will satisfy lots of Chardophiles, at an affordable price. Chardonnay US California California Black Box

description: Made in an old-fashioned Paso Robles style, this is pretty sweet, soft and simple. There's not much complexity, but it has plenty of ripe blackberry, cherry and spice flavors.
title: Twisted Sisters 2009 Matriarch Red (Paso Robles)
description2: Made in an old-fashioned Paso Robles style, this is pretty sweet, soft and simple. There's not much complexity, but it has plenty of ripe blackberry, cherry and spice flavors. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Twisted Sisters

description: This is for you, if you like your Zins in a sweet, soft style. It tastes like the filling from a black­berry and cherry pie, dusted with exotic spices, like cinnamon and black pepper.

title: Valentin Bianchi 2011 Elsa Chardonnay (Mendoza)
description2: Apple and white fruit aromas set up a balanced, reasonably full palate, with banana, creamy oak, vanilla and apple flavors. It feels solid and round, with a clean finish. Chardonnay Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Valentin Bianchi

description: The first noticeable aspect is that it seems to have no structure. The cherry, cola and pomegranate flavors have been elaborately oaked, but there's nothing for the mouth to grip onto.
title: Walt 2010 Hein Family Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
description2: The first noticeable aspect is that it seems to have no structure. The cherry, cola and pomegranate flavors have been elaborately oaked, but there's nothing for the mouth to grip onto. Pinot Noir US California Anderson Valley Walt

description: The mouthfeel has sandpapery tannins and some green peppercorn notes alongside riper flavors of blackberries and sweet currants. It's a rustic Zin to drink with barbecue.
title: Plungerhead 2010 Old Vine Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: The mouthfeel has sandpapery tannins and some green peppercorn notes alongside riper flavors of blackberries and sweet currants. It's a rustic Zin to drink with barbecue. Zinfandel US California Dry Creek Valley Plungerhead

description: This is a lively, off-dry wine with intense acidity to accompany its crisp apple and citrus flavors. Very fruity, it's ready to drink now. Screwcap.
title: Quinta do Portal 2011 Trevo White (Vinho Verde)
description2: This is a lively, off-dry wine with intense acidity to accompany its crisp apple and citrus flavors. Very fruity, it's ready to drink now. Screwcap. Portuguese White Portugal Vinho Verde  Quinta do Portal

description: Here's a good, robust red wine. It's made in a country-style, with tobacco, cherry and spice flavors and a jagged mouthfeel. Drink it with tacos and burgers.
title: Rare NV 4 Grape Blend Red (California)
description2: Here's a good, robust red wine. It's made in a country-style, with tobacco, cherry and spice flavors and a jagged mouthfeel. Drink it with tacos and burgers. Red Blend US California California Rare

title: Stephen Ross 2010 Pinot Noir (Central Coast)

title: L. Tramier & Fils 2010 Bourricot Pinot Noir (Vin de France)

description: Made to appeal to the modern taste for sweetness, this blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Chardonnay and Viognier is simple in jammy apricot, citrus and tropical fruit flavors. It has bright acidity, which helps balance it.

description: Ebullient blossom and berry notes waft from this unique carbonated Pinot Noir (blended with proportions of Cabernet Franc and Cayuga grapes). Plump strawberry and cherry flavors are dry on the palate, but concentrated, accented by brisk acidity and sharp, piercing bubbles.

description: Aromas of iodine, horse hide and saucy berry fruits are intriguing on the nose. The palate is tannic and mildly astringent offering rustic notes of baked, leathery black-fruit flavors. The finish is hot and jammy, with a leathery kick.

description: Cherry, raspberry and vanilla combine for an inviting mix of ripeness and sweet bouquet. A fruity component also sits nicely atop this structured wine marked by soft, fine tannins. The finish is robust in black pepper and clove.

description2: Cherry, raspberry and vanilla combine for an inviting mix of ripeness and sweet bouquet. A fruity component also sits nicely atop this structured wine marked by soft, fine tannins. The finish is robust in black pepper and clove. Merlot US California Oakville Kirkland Signature

description: Here's an earthy expression of Sangiovese that opens with aromas of truffle, forest floor, ripe plum and a whiff of barnyard. The rustic appeal carries over to the palate, which offers ripe blackberry, ground pepper, bitter sage and a gamey note. Assertive tannins provide backup but leave an astringent finish.
title: Le Casalte 2012 Quercetonda  (Vino Nobile di Montepulciano)
address: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano, Tuscany, Italy
description2: Here's an earthy expression of Sangiovese that opens with aromas of truffle, forest floor, ripe plum and a whiff of barnyard. The rustic appeal carries over to the palate, which offers ripe blackberry, ground pepper, bitter sage and a gamey note. Assertive tannins provide backup but leave an astringent finish. Sangiovese Italy Tuscany Vino Nobile di Montepulciano Le Casalte

description: Pear and spice aromas lead to rich pineapple and prickly pear flavors. There's much to love, with unmistakable varietal expression.

description: An exceptional value for a Bordeaux, this is ripe, full and fruity. Smoky tannins and juicy black currant flavors are bright and generous. It will be ready to drink from 2016.
title: Cave du Marmandais 2014 Murets de Mez  (Bordeaux)
description2: An exceptional value for a Bordeaux, this is ripe, full and fruity. Smoky tannins and juicy black currant flavors are bright and generous. It will be ready to drink from 2016. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Cave du Marmandais

description: A blend of six different varieties with Syrah (72%) in the lead, this pale cherry-color wine pops with aromas of bubble gum, wild strawberry and orange peel. The concentration is a bit light with the tart finish that pulls it together.
title: Charles & Charles 2014 Rosé (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: A blend of six different varieties with Syrah (72%) in the lead, this pale cherry-color wine pops with aromas of bubble gum, wild strawberry and orange peel. The concentration is a bit light with the tart finish that pulls it together. Rosé US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Charles & Charles

description: This wine is smooth while keeping all of its fresh wits about it. Citrus, red apple and quince flavors give both spice and ripe fruits. With its lively, tangy aftertaste, it does need to broaden out, so drink from 2016.
title: Château de l'Aubrade 2014  Bordeaux Blanc
description2: This wine is smooth while keeping all of its fresh wits about it. Citrus, red apple and quince flavors give both spice and ripe fruits. With its lively, tangy aftertaste, it does need to broaden out, so drink from 2016. Bordeaux-style White Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Blanc Château de l'Aubrade

description: Very crisp and fruity, this is a light, bright and refreshing wine, with a tangy edge that gives texture. Apples and a strong citrus character promise a wine that will round out over the next few months. Drink from late 2015.
title: Château Guichot 2014  Bordeaux Blanc
description2: Very crisp and fruity, this is a light, bright and refreshing wine, with a tangy edge that gives texture. Apples and a strong citrus character promise a wine that will round out over the next few months. Drink from late 2015. Bordeaux-style White Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Blanc Château Guichot

description: This blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Muscadelle and Sémillon is round, full and softly textured. White fruits, spice and fresh acidity are already well integrated. The end is tangy with lemon zest flavors. Drink now. The estate has been in the Forcato family since 1950.
title: Château Lary 2014  Bordeaux Blanc
description2: This blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Muscadelle and Sémillon is round, full and softly textured. White fruits, spice and fresh acidity are already well integrated. The end is tangy with lemon zest flavors. Drink now. The estate has been in the Forcato family since 1950. Bordeaux-style White Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Blanc Château Lary

description: Still toasty, this is a fruity, spicy wine. Firm tannins form the backdrop to the red berry fruits and fresh acidity. It will develop attractively over the next few years, so drink from 2017.
title: Château Maison Noble 2013  Bordeaux Supérieur
description2: Still toasty, this is a fruity, spicy wine. Firm tannins form the backdrop to the red berry fruits and fresh acidity. It will develop attractively over the next few years, so drink from 2017. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Supérieur Château Maison Noble

description: This blend of Sangiovese, 10% Canaiolo and 10% Merlot offers aromas of violet, black plum and a whiff of baking spice. The simple but fleeting palate offers black cherry, raspberry and a hint of clove alongside mild tannins and fresh acidity.
title: Coli 2013 Pratale  (Chianti Classico)
description2: This blend of Sangiovese, 10% Canaiolo and 10% Merlot offers aromas of violet, black plum and a whiff of baking spice. The simple but fleeting palate offers black cherry, raspberry and a hint of clove alongside mild tannins and fresh acidity. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Chianti Classico Coli

description: A light, bright version of the variety, this soft and herbaceous wine mixes a subtle richness of toasted oak and dark chocolate with black plum and cherry. It retains its acidity well, showing a tightness of structure with enough approachability.
title: Bench 2014 Merlot (Knights Valley)
description2: A light, bright version of the variety, this soft and herbaceous wine mixes a subtle richness of toasted oak and dark chocolate with black plum and cherry. It retains its acidity well, showing a tightness of structure with enough approachability. Merlot US California Knights Valley Bench

description: A blend of Syrah, Cabernet Franc, Merlot and a dollop of Petit Verdot, this has subtle aromas of ground pepper, toast, French oak and espresso. The aromas follow over to the rather lean, straightforward palate along with a note of fresh cherry set against loose-knit, fine-grained tannins. Enjoy over the next few years.
title: Campo di Sasso 2014 Insoglio del Cinghiale Red (Toscana)
description2: A blend of Syrah, Cabernet Franc, Merlot and a dollop of Petit Verdot, this has subtle aromas of ground pepper, toast, French oak and espresso. The aromas follow over to the rather lean, straightforward palate along with a note of fresh cherry set against loose-knit, fine-grained tannins. Enjoy over the next few years. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Toscana Campo di Sasso

description: Fresh greens and white grapefruit aromas come together in this medium-bodied wine. A silky texture carries celery leaf and citrus flavors through the slightly bitter finish.
title: Cottesbrook 2016 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
description2: Fresh greens and white grapefruit aromas come together in this medium-bodied wine. A silky texture carries celery leaf and citrus flavors through the slightly bitter finish. Sauvignon Blanc New Zealand Marlborough  Cottesbrook

description: The variety is unmistakable on this wine, with its aromas of black currant, black cherry, dried herb and spice. The palate is fruit filled but well structured, with tart acids and a firm squeeze of tannin. Dark chocolate notes linger on the finish.
title: Disruption 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Washington)
description2: The variety is unmistakable on this wine, with its aromas of black currant, black cherry, dried herb and spice. The palate is fruit filled but well structured, with tart acids and a firm squeeze of tannin. Dark chocolate notes linger on the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon US Washington Washington Disruption

description: Made with 60% Sangiovese and 40% Vermentino, this offers delicate aromas of red berry, white peach and a hint of Mediterranean scrub that carry on to the palate. It closes on a refreshing citrus note.
title: Fattoria Sardi 2015 Le Cicale Rosato (Toscana)
description2: Made with 60% Sangiovese and 40% Vermentino, this offers delicate aromas of red berry, white peach and a hint of Mediterranean scrub that carry on to the palate. It closes on a refreshing citrus note. Rosato Italy Tuscany Toscana Fattoria Sardi

description: This is a romantic conjunction of names. The cru wine is silky and smooth, with integrated tannins and red-cherry fruit. It is bright and crisply textured, ready to drink from mid-2017.
title: Georges Duboeuf 2015 Domaine du Paradis  (Saint-Amour)
description2: This is a romantic conjunction of names. The cru wine is silky and smooth, with integrated tannins and red-cherry fruit. It is bright and crisply textured, ready to drink from mid-2017. Gamay France Beaujolais Saint-Amour Georges Duboeuf

description: This cru wine comes from a 44-acre vineyard with 50-year-old vines supplied by one of Duboeuf's regular growers. It is structured and dense, perhaps too dense with its heavy dry tannins. The wine will need time. Drink from 2019.
title: Georges Duboeuf 2015 Domaine Mont Chavy  (Morgon)
description2: This cru wine comes from a 44-acre vineyard with 50-year-old vines supplied by one of Duboeuf's regular growers. It is structured and dense, perhaps too dense with its heavy dry tannins. The wine will need time. Drink from 2019. Gamay France Beaujolais Morgon Georges Duboeuf

description: Full of crisp fruit, this cru wine is bright with red-berry flavors. It is light and with a cool character that comes from the high altitude of the vineyards. There is an edgy texture that keeps the wine together. Drink now.
title: Georges Duboeuf 2015 Flower Label  (Chiroubles)
description2: Full of crisp fruit, this cru wine is bright with red-berry flavors. It is light and with a cool character that comes from the high altitude of the vineyards. There is an edgy texture that keeps the wine together. Drink now. Gamay France Beaujolais Chiroubles Georges Duboeuf

description: A floral wine, full of ripe black-cherry fruit and with a firm structure that sustains the wine. This cru wine is rich, still developing, still with enough tannins and acidity to allow it to age further. Drink this attractive wine from mid-2017.
title: Georges Duboeuf 2015 Flower Label  (Fleurie)
description2: A floral wine, full of ripe black-cherry fruit and with a firm structure that sustains the wine. This cru wine is rich, still developing, still with enough tannins and acidity to allow it to age further. Drink this attractive wine from mid-2017. Gamay France Beaujolais Fleurie Georges Duboeuf

description: This wine draws a lot of its flavor power from oak, which is evident from the spicy, cinnamon aroma to the lightly sweet maple flavor and finish. Not too full bodied, it is also light in tannins and rather easy on the palate.
title: Great American Wine Company 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
description2: This wine draws a lot of its flavor power from oak, which is evident from the spicy, cinnamon aroma to the lightly sweet maple flavor and finish. Not too full bodied, it is also light in tannins and rather easy on the palate. Cabernet Sauvignon US California California Great American Wine Company

description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Merlot, this opens earthy aromas of game, ripe black-skinned fruit and scorched earth. The mature palate displays dried black cherry, prune and leather alongside grippy tannins that leave a firm finish.
title: Guicciardini Strozzi 2012 Vignarè Red (Toscana)
description2: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Merlot, this opens earthy aromas of game, ripe black-skinned fruit and scorched earth. The mature palate displays dried black cherry, prune and leather alongside grippy tannins that leave a firm finish. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Toscana Guicciardini Strozzi

description: This medium-bodied wine blends lively citrus and crisp apple aromas with just-rich-enough pear, apple and butter flavors for good balance. Satisfying and refreshing, it will be great with many different dishes.
title: Happy Camper 2015 Chardonnay (California)
description2: This medium-bodied wine blends lively citrus and crisp apple aromas with just-rich-enough pear, apple and butter flavors for good balance. Satisfying and refreshing, it will be great with many different dishes. Chardonnay US California California Happy Camper

description: The flower and peach aromas are quite subdued for the variety. The stone-fruit flavors provide more generosity while still displaying elegance.
title: Hawkins Cellars 2015 Barrel Select Viognier (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: The flower and peach aromas are quite subdued for the variety. The stone-fruit flavors provide more generosity while still displaying elegance. Viognier US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Hawkins Cellars

description: Made with 45% Sangiovese, 45% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, this has a restrained nose that eventually reveals aromas of cassis, toast and leather. The polished palate shows mature red plum, tobacco and vanilla alongside assertive, fine-grained tannins and somewhat soft acidity.
title: Il Palagio 2012 Sister Moon Red (Toscana)
description2: Made with 45% Sangiovese, 45% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, this has a restrained nose that eventually reveals aromas of cassis, toast and leather. The polished palate shows mature red plum, tobacco and vanilla alongside assertive, fine-grained tannins and somewhat soft acidity. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Toscana Il Palagio

description: Dark in color, intense in fruit flavor and firmly packed with tannins, this blockbuster Bordeaux-style blend feels massive and grippy. It tastes like cranberry and blackberry, leaving astringency on the palate that will match up to the richest foods. Age a few bottles through 2019 to see how it matures.
title: Marietta Cellars NV Arme Lot Number 3 Red (North Coast)
description2: Dark in color, intense in fruit flavor and firmly packed with tannins, this blockbuster Bordeaux-style blend feels massive and grippy. It tastes like cranberry and blackberry, leaving astringency on the palate that will match up to the richest foods. Age a few bottles through 2019 to see how it matures. Red Blend US California North Coast Marietta Cellars

description: Slightly muted tones of black cherry and plum preserves are accented by wet soil, mushroom and coconut in this rustic yet elegant Cabernet Franc. Ripe fruit is contrasted by vibrant acidity, rigid tannins and a pleasant bite of astringency that persists through the finish. Drink now through 2022.
title: McGregor 2013 Reserve Cabernet Franc (Finger Lakes)
description2: Slightly muted tones of black cherry and plum preserves are accented by wet soil, mushroom and coconut in this rustic yet elegant Cabernet Franc. Ripe fruit is contrasted by vibrant acidity, rigid tannins and a pleasant bite of astringency that persists through the finish. Drink now through 2022. Cabernet Franc US New York Finger Lakes McGregor

description: Fig, black plum, dried cherry and chai spice show on the nose of this bottling from River Road south of Salinas. Heavy flavors of dried black cherry and dried cranberry show on the sip, lifted by eucalyptus oil, juniper and black-tea elements.
title: Pessagno 2013 Pinot Noir (Santa Lucia Highlands)
description2: Fig, black plum, dried cherry and chai spice show on the nose of this bottling from River Road south of Salinas. Heavy flavors of dried black cherry and dried cranberry show on the sip, lifted by eucalyptus oil, juniper and black-tea elements. Pinot Noir US California Santa Lucia Highlands Pessagno

description: This opens with aromas suggesting underbrush, scorched earth, chopped herb and dried berry. The straightforward palate delivers concentrated black cherry, black currant and dark spice set against rounded tannins. A coffee note signals the close.
title: Val delle Rose 2015  Morellino di Scansano
description2: This opens with aromas suggesting underbrush, scorched earth, chopped herb and dried berry. The straightforward palate delivers concentrated black cherry, black currant and dark spice set against rounded tannins. A coffee note signals the close. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Morellino di Scansano Val delle Rose

description: Earthy plum and berry aromas come with hints of rubber and animal. This is a saturated chewy dark Malbec with salty blackberry and savory oak flavors. A spicy blackened well-oaked finish is balanced and healthy.
title: Valle Hermoso 2014 Elegido Gran Reserva Malbec (Colchagua Valley)
description2: Earthy plum and berry aromas come with hints of rubber and animal. This is a saturated chewy dark Malbec with salty blackberry and savory oak flavors. A spicy blackened well-oaked finish is balanced and healthy. Malbec Chile Colchagua Valley  Valle Hermoso

description: This opens with aromas of toast, prune, scorched earth and chopped mint. The juicy palate offers dried black cherry, star anise and a hint of sweet baking spice alongside supple tannins. Straightforward and already approachable, it will offer enjoyable sipping in the near term. Drink through 2020.
title: Baccinetti 2011 Saporaia  (Brunello di Montalcino)
description2: This opens with aromas of toast, prune, scorched earth and chopped mint. The juicy palate offers dried black cherry, star anise and a hint of sweet baking spice alongside supple tannins. Straightforward and already approachable, it will offer enjoyable sipping in the near term. Drink through 2020. Sangiovese Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Baccinetti

description: Quite light in the glass, the aromas on this bottling are also a bit weak, with cinnamon and red fruits emerging with patience. It's light and lithe on the palate, with candied cherry, rose petals and tons of cracked pepper making for a lengthy, grippy sip.
title: Rideau 2014 Estate Grenache
description2: Quite light in the glass, the aromas on this bottling are also a bit weak, with cinnamon and red fruits emerging with patience. It's light and lithe on the palate, with candied cherry, rose petals and tons of cracked pepper making for a lengthy, grippy sip. Grenache US California Central Coast Rideau

description: This wine is made in a ripe forward style, with lightly volatile aromas of apple, plum and dark raspberries. It's full bodied and pulls no punches as generous red and black-fruit flavors with cocoa accents show some warmth on the finish.
title: Ryan Patrick 2013 Reserve Northridge Vineyard Grenache (Wahluke Slope)
description2: This wine is made in a ripe forward style, with lightly volatile aromas of apple, plum and dark raspberries. It's full bodied and pulls no punches as generous red and black-fruit flavors with cocoa accents show some warmth on the finish. Grenache US Washington Wahluke Slope Ryan Patrick

description: Roasted smoky berry aromas are good but nothing special. This feels alive and wiry, with grabby tannins and prodding acidity. Roasted spicy plum and berry flavors finish dry, spicy and in good shape.
title: San Pedro 2014 1865 Single Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Maipo Valley)
description2: Roasted smoky berry aromas are good but nothing special. This feels alive and wiry, with grabby tannins and prodding acidity. Roasted spicy plum and berry flavors finish dry, spicy and in good shape. Cabernet Sauvignon Chile Maipo Valley  San Pedro

description: Made entirely with Merlot, the shy nose eventually reveals whiffs of violet and clove. The medium-bodied palate offers prune, vanilla and French oak alongside chewy tannins and rather modest acidity.
title: Sangervasio 2011 I Renai Merlot (Toscana)
description2: Made entirely with Merlot, the shy nose eventually reveals whiffs of violet and clove. The medium-bodied palate offers prune, vanilla and French oak alongside chewy tannins and rather modest acidity. Merlot Italy Tuscany Toscana Sangervasio

description: Made with 80% Sangiovese, 10% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with subtle aromas of red berry and leather. The smooth palate doles out mature black cherry and clove alongside chewy tannins.
title: Scaranto 2013 Red (Toscana)
description2: Made with 80% Sangiovese, 10% Merlot and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with subtle aromas of red berry and leather. The smooth palate doles out mature black cherry and clove alongside chewy tannins. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Toscana Scaranto

description: Aromas of ripe peaches, white flowers and fresh jasmine explode from the glass. The wine tastes sweet but still shows delicacy, with enough acid to balance it all out.
title: Ste. Chapelle 2015 Special Harvest Riesling
description2: Aromas of ripe peaches, white flowers and fresh jasmine explode from the glass. The wine tastes sweet but still shows delicacy, with enough acid to balance it all out. Riesling US Idaho  Ste. Chapelle

description: Made with 75% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Sangiovese and 5% Cabernet Franc, this opens with aromas of black currant and a whiff of brown spice. The palate doles out blackberry jam, clove and a toasted note alongside gripping tannins that leave a firm finish.
