title: Tolaini 2011 Valdisanti Red (Toscana)
description2: Made with 75% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Sangiovese and 5% Cabernet Franc, this opens with aromas of black currant and a whiff of brown spice. The palate doles out blackberry jam, clove and a toasted note alongside gripping tannins that leave a firm finish. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Toscana Tolaini

description: A mild current of cinnamon, clove and tobacco provide a spicy entry into this wine, backed up by a fruity mid-palate. Medium weight and body give it some power and substance, while on the finish, it comes under an herbaceous light.
title: Vanderbilt 2013 Reserve Merlot (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: A mild current of cinnamon, clove and tobacco provide a spicy entry into this wine, backed up by a fruity mid-palate. Medium weight and body give it some power and substance, while on the finish, it comes under an herbaceous light. Merlot US California Dry Creek Valley Vanderbilt

description: Flower petal, mineral and blackberry aromas solidify the bouquet on this excellent Tempranillo. The palate is big and chewy, with fine balance and driving flavors of cherry, plum, vanilla and oak resin. With a finish that's bone dry and focused, this Ribera wine is ready to drink but can last another 5–8 years in a good cellar.
title: Protos 2006 Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
address: Ribera del Duero, Northern Spain, Spain
description2: Flower petal, mineral and blackberry aromas solidify the bouquet on this excellent Tempranillo. The palate is big and chewy, with fine balance and driving flavors of cherry, plum, vanilla and oak resin. With a finish that's bone dry and focused, this Ribera wine is ready to drink but can last another 5–8 years in a good cellar. Tempranillo Spain Northern Spain Ribera del Duero Protos

description: One of the best Stoller Vineyard designates from anywhere, this bright and spicy effort is bursting with flavors of red currants, accented with smoky chocolate. Tannins are fine tuned and the wine has excellent balance throughout.
title: Purple Hands 2011 Stoller Vineyard Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
description2: One of the best Stoller Vineyard designates from anywhere, this bright and spicy effort is bursting with flavors of red currants, accented with smoky chocolate. Tannins are fine tuned and the wine has excellent balance throughout. Pinot Noir US Oregon Dundee Hills Purple Hands

description: The fresh acidity typical of Fernão Pires is broadened by wood aging to yield a wine that has peach, apricot and green-fruit flavors, enhanced by floral aromas. There is a final, mineral texture.
title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2011 Falcoaria Fernão Pires (Tejo)
description2: The fresh acidity typical of Fernão Pires is broadened by wood aging to yield a wine that has peach, apricot and green-fruit flavors, enhanced by floral aromas. There is a final, mineral texture. Fernão Pires Portugal Tejo  Quinta do Casal Branco

description: This is a very successful wine, made in the Paso style of soft voluptuousness and plenty of ripe, fruity flavors. Blended from the classic Bordeaux varieties, it's rich in blackberry and blueberry jam, buttered toast and spice flavors, wrapped into smooth tannins. Should develop over the next six years.
title: RN Estate 2010 Harmonie des Cepages Red (Paso Robles)
description2: This is a very successful wine, made in the Paso style of soft voluptuousness and plenty of ripe, fruity flavors. Blended from the classic Bordeaux varieties, it's rich in blackberry and blueberry jam, buttered toast and spice flavors, wrapped into smooth tannins. Should develop over the next six years. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles RN Estate

description: A massive wine, rich and forward in black cherry and raspberry jam, red currant, bacon and sandalwood flavors. Structural integrity fortunately provides balance by way of crisp acidity, firm tannins and a rocky minerality. Enjoyable now, after decanting, and should age through 2019.
title: RN Estate 2011 Fiddlestix Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: A massive wine, rich and forward in black cherry and raspberry jam, red currant, bacon and sandalwood flavors. Structural integrity fortunately provides balance by way of crisp acidity, firm tannins and a rocky minerality. Enjoyable now, after decanting, and should age through 2019. Pinot Noir US California Sta. Rita Hills RN Estate

description: California Cabernet simply doesn't get richer or riper than this. It explodes with blackberry and cherry jam and chocolate flavors whose sweetness persists into the long, spicy finish. And yet the wine is technically dry. Drink over the next few years.
title: Écluse 2010 Lock Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
description2: California Cabernet simply doesn't get richer or riper than this. It explodes with blackberry and cherry jam and chocolate flavors whose sweetness persists into the long, spicy finish. And yet the wine is technically dry. Drink over the next few years. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Paso Robles Écluse

description: Candied fruit, caramel, smooth vanilla cream and apricot open the opulent bouquet of this beautifully made Riserva Chardonnay. Elena Walch produces one of the best, oak-aged expressions of the grape in Italy. It closes with creamy richness and persistence.
title: Elena Walch 2009 Riserva Castel Ringberg Chardonnay (Alto Adige)
description2: Candied fruit, caramel, smooth vanilla cream and apricot open the opulent bouquet of this beautifully made Riserva Chardonnay. Elena Walch produces one of the best, oak-aged expressions of the grape in Italy. It closes with creamy richness and persistence. Chardonnay Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Elena Walch

description: While this is certainly herbaceous, it also carries richer fruit flavors like apricots and melon to go with the grapefruit acidity. That gives it a rounded texture, full in the mouth and with a touch of minerality. Age this impressive wine another 1–2 years.
title: Fournier Père et Fils 2010 Cuvée Silex  (Sancerre)
description2: While this is certainly herbaceous, it also carries richer fruit flavors like apricots and melon to go with the grapefruit acidity. That gives it a rounded texture, full in the mouth and with a touch of minerality. Age this impressive wine another 1–2 years. Sauvignon Blanc France Loire Valley Sancerre Fournier Père et Fils

description: Made with fruit from old vines, this deliciously oak-aged Soave Classico is rich and opulent with lovely tones of stone fruit, dusty mineral, melon, dried sage and vanilla spice. The roundness and fullness of the mouthfeel promises five years or more of cellar aging potential.
title: Gini 2010 Contrada Salvarenza Vecchie Vigne  (Soave Classico)
description2: Made with fruit from old vines, this deliciously oak-aged Soave Classico is rich and opulent with lovely tones of stone fruit, dusty mineral, melon, dried sage and vanilla spice. The roundness and fullness of the mouthfeel promises five years or more of cellar aging potential. Garganega Italy Veneto Soave Classico Gini

description: How can a wine be softly appealing and yet brisk in acidity at the same time? The paradox is resolved with one sip of this wonderful Pinot. It's rich in raspberry-pie filling and cola flavors, with wonderful spices and a sweet kick of toasted oak. Drink now–2016.
title: W.H. Smith 2010 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: How can a wine be softly appealing and yet brisk in acidity at the same time? The paradox is resolved with one sip of this wonderful Pinot. It's rich in raspberry-pie filling and cola flavors, with wonderful spices and a sweet kick of toasted oak. Drink now–2016. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast W.H. Smith

description: Hard to tell the difference between this wine and a Pinot Noir. It's silky, brisk and lightly tannic, with savory raspberry jam, cola, sautéed mushroom and spice flavors. Drink over the next few years for freshness.
title: Bjornstad 2009 Van der Kamp Vineyard Pinot Meunier (Sonoma Mountain)
description2: Hard to tell the difference between this wine and a Pinot Noir. It's silky, brisk and lightly tannic, with savory raspberry jam, cola, sautéed mushroom and spice flavors. Drink over the next few years for freshness. Pinot Meunier US California Sonoma Mountain Bjornstad

description: Pretty expensive for a Petite Sirah, but it really is fantastic. Shows the variety's powerful tannins and fruit, with a velvety texture framing jammy blackberries, blueberries, carob, vanilla, exotic spices and smoky cedar. Will develop for many years, but there's no reason not to drink it now.
title: Chase 2009 Petite Sirah (Calistoga)
description2: Pretty expensive for a Petite Sirah, but it really is fantastic. Shows the variety's powerful tannins and fruit, with a velvety texture framing jammy blackberries, blueberries, carob, vanilla, exotic spices and smoky cedar. Will develop for many years, but there's no reason not to drink it now. Petite Sirah US California Calistoga Chase

description: This Chardonnay-based sparkler opens with immediate elegance and intensity. The bouquet delivers tones of apricot, exotic fruit, toasted nut and yellow rose. The perlage is steady and clean and the acidity is very nicely balanced.
title: Contadi Castaldi 2008 Brut Satèn Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
description2: This Chardonnay-based sparkler opens with immediate elegance and intensity. The bouquet delivers tones of apricot, exotic fruit, toasted nut and yellow rose. The perlage is steady and clean and the acidity is very nicely balanced. Chardonnay Italy Lombardy Franciacorta Contadi Castaldi

description: A return to elegance, this aromatic, inviting wine suggests ripe fruit dusted with cocoa powder. Raspberries pack a juicy wallop, balanced against hints of clean earth and ripe tannins.
title: Ken Wright 2011 Shea Vineyard Pinot Noir
description2: A return to elegance, this aromatic, inviting wine suggests ripe fruit dusted with cocoa powder. Raspberries pack a juicy wallop, balanced against hints of clean earth and ripe tannins. Pinot Noir US Oregon Willamette Valley Ken Wright

description: This is done in an open, palate-friendly style, with rich, generous black fruits accented with cocoa, coffee and caramel. There's a streak of vanilla custard also, and the fruit has enough depth and mass to hold up through a satisfying finish.
title: Market Vineyards 2009 Benchmark Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This is done in an open, palate-friendly style, with rich, generous black fruits accented with cocoa, coffee and caramel. There's a streak of vanilla custard also, and the fruit has enough depth and mass to hold up through a satisfying finish. Merlot US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Market Vineyards

description: Shows Petite Sirah's tremendous power, with full-bodied blackberry jam, black currant, dark chocolate and pepper flavors, and there's a wonderful meatiness suggesting charred beef fat. The alcohol is high, yet the wine is measured, with firm, ripe tannins. Really a fine expression of Petite Sirah, Paso-style.
title: MCV 2011 Rosewynn Vineyard Petite Sirah (Paso Robles)
description2: Shows Petite Sirah's tremendous power, with full-bodied blackberry jam, black currant, dark chocolate and pepper flavors, and there's a wonderful meatiness suggesting charred beef fat. The alcohol is high, yet the wine is measured, with firm, ripe tannins. Really a fine expression of Petite Sirah, Paso-style. Petite Sirah US California Paso Robles MCV

description: From rocky estate soils, Terre Rouge's Viognier opens with delicious aromas of honeysuckle, mango and guava, lightly put together with a jolt of wet stone. Rich in mouthfeel, the finish is woodsy, like the finest herb garden.
title: Terre Rouge 2011 Viognier (Fiddletown)
description2: From rocky estate soils, Terre Rouge's Viognier opens with delicious aromas of honeysuckle, mango and guava, lightly put together with a jolt of wet stone. Rich in mouthfeel, the finish is woodsy, like the finest herb garden. Viognier US California Fiddletown Terre Rouge

description: The winery pulled out all the stops on this Cabernet-based Bordeaux blend, yet the wine is so tannic and sharp now. Shows massively extracted black currant and oak flavors that run deep and long in the finish. Who knows what this wine might do in 10–15 years, but it's a roll of the dice.
title: V. Sattui 2009 Paradiso Red (Napa Valley)
description2: The winery pulled out all the stops on this Cabernet-based Bordeaux blend, yet the wine is so tannic and sharp now. Shows massively extracted black currant and oak flavors that run deep and long in the finish. Who knows what this wine might do in 10–15 years, but it's a roll of the dice. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California Napa Valley V. Sattui

description: Give this brisk, young Pinot 5–6 years in the cellar to mellow. It's clearly a very fine wine, clean and elegantly constructed, with rich tannins and a bright squirt of acidity framing ripe cherry, currant and licorice flavors.
title: Westerly 2010 Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: Give this brisk, young Pinot 5–6 years in the cellar to mellow. It's clearly a very fine wine, clean and elegantly constructed, with rich tannins and a bright squirt of acidity framing ripe cherry, currant and licorice flavors. Pinot Noir US California Sta. Rita Hills Westerly

description: Give this lovely Pinot Noir a few hours in the decanter and serve now with your best lamb and steak entrées. It's dry, refined in the acid-tannin balance and deliciously complex, with waves of raspberries and cherries, pie crust, baking spices and toasted oak.
title: Whitcraft 2011 Pence Ranch Pinot Noir (Santa Ynez Valley)
description2: Give this lovely Pinot Noir a few hours in the decanter and serve now with your best lamb and steak entrées. It's dry, refined in the acid-tannin balance and deliciously complex, with waves of raspberries and cherries, pie crust, baking spices and toasted oak. Pinot Noir US California Santa Ynez Valley Whitcraft

description: This wine is frankly high in alcohol, clocking in at 16% by volume. But it's also incredibly delicious, offering soft waves of milk chocolate, black cherry jam, red currants, bacon and black pepper. Drink this wine at night, with rich stews or barbecue, but be careful about driving.
title: Nicora 2010 Euphoric La Vista Vineyard Grenache-Syrah (Paso Robles)
description2: This wine is frankly high in alcohol, clocking in at 16% by volume. But it's also incredibly delicious, offering soft waves of milk chocolate, black cherry jam, red currants, bacon and black pepper. Drink this wine at night, with rich stews or barbecue, but be careful about driving. Grenache-Syrah US California Paso Robles Nicora

description: Softly tannic, rich and enormously enjoyable, this Rhône-style blend offers lush flavors of raspberries, cherries, milk chocolate, crispy bacon, black pepper and sandalwood. The alcohol is heady, but balanced with fine acidity. Drink over the next two years for freshness.
title: Nicora 2010 G-S-M (Paso Robles)
description2: Softly tannic, rich and enormously enjoyable, this Rhône-style blend offers lush flavors of raspberries, cherries, milk chocolate, crispy bacon, black pepper and sandalwood. The alcohol is heady, but balanced with fine acidity. Drink over the next two years for freshness. G-S-M US California Paso Robles Nicora

description: A block of vines set literally near a grove of Redwood trees, the 2010 Redwood's Edge is structured and slightly austere and elusive, a concentrated rendering of deep, dark red fruit, lavender and woody undertones that's incredibly delicious.
title: Black Kite 2010 Redwood's Edge Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
description2: A block of vines set literally near a grove of Redwood trees, the 2010 Redwood's Edge is structured and slightly austere and elusive, a concentrated rendering of deep, dark red fruit, lavender and woody undertones that's incredibly delicious. Pinot Noir US California Anderson Valley Black Kite

description: Spicy and floral, with pretty cherry fruit concentrated at the core, this inviting Grenache combines grace and power. The flavors are complex and concentrated, with hints of green tea, cut tobacco, and a finishing streak of espresso and cocoa.
title: Bunnell 2009 Grenache (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Spicy and floral, with pretty cherry fruit concentrated at the core, this inviting Grenache combines grace and power. The flavors are complex and concentrated, with hints of green tea, cut tobacco, and a finishing streak of espresso and cocoa. Grenache US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Bunnell

description: A super-rich wine, almost over the top in its honeyed intensity. It is opulent, generous, packed with ripe yellow fruits, mango and pineapple. The wine is so rich that it is hard to find the acidity, but it is there in the orange marmalade flavor right at the end.
title: Château la Varière 2009 Les Melleresses  (Bonnezeaux)
description2: A super-rich wine, almost over the top in its honeyed intensity. It is opulent, generous, packed with ripe yellow fruits, mango and pineapple. The wine is so rich that it is hard to find the acidity, but it is there in the orange marmalade flavor right at the end. Chenin Blanc France Loire Valley Bonnezeaux Château la Varière

description: This wine from Château Lagrézette is powerful and dense in its own right. It has black, juicy, tar-like flavors with tannins concentrated into a dry, dark core. Blended with a small proportion of Merlot, there is just a touch of softness which will allow the wine to mature in the next 2–3 years.
title: Château Lagrézette 2010 Château Chevaliers Lagrézette Malbec (Cahors)
description2: This wine from Château Lagrézette is powerful and dense in its own right. It has black, juicy, tar-like flavors with tannins concentrated into a dry, dark core. Blended with a small proportion of Merlot, there is just a touch of softness which will allow the wine to mature in the next 2–3 years. Malbec France Southwest France Cahors Château Lagrézette

description: A dark, brooding wine, packed with firm tannins and solid plum-skin and licorice flavors. The wine is dense and complex—a powerful evocation of Malbec—allowing the juicy fruits to merge with the young structure that needs agng for at least 4–5 years.
title: Château Saint-Didier-Parnac 2011 Prieuré de Cénac Malbec (Cahors)
description2: A dark, brooding wine, packed with firm tannins and solid plum-skin and licorice flavors. The wine is dense and complex—a powerful evocation of Malbec—allowing the juicy fruits to merge with the young structure that needs agng for at least 4–5 years. Malbec France Southwest France Cahors Château Saint-Didier-Parnac

description: The top wine from Domaine de Cause, it's huge, very dense and concentrated. There is a sense of extraction, showcased by the licorice and dark chocolate flavors. This needs to calm down to give the rich fruits a chance to shine. Give this wine 6–7 years.
title: Domaine de Cause 2009 Notre Dame de Champs Malbec (Cahors)
description2: The top wine from Domaine de Cause, it's huge, very dense and concentrated. There is a sense of extraction, showcased by the licorice and dark chocolate flavors. This needs to calm down to give the rich fruits a chance to shine. Give this wine 6–7 years. Malbec France Southwest France Cahors Domaine de Cause

description: In this case, Vieilles Vignes (old vines) only means vines over 20 years. The wine is soft, rounded and full of red cherry fruitiness. Judicious wood aging has rounded the wine out while leaving all its fruit intact. It can be drunk now, but will be better from 2016.
title: Manuel Olivier 2012 Vieilles Vignes  (Bourgogne Hautes Côtes de Nuits)
address: Bourgogne Hautes Côtes de Nuits, Burgundy, France
description2: In this case, Vieilles Vignes (old vines) only means vines over 20 years. The wine is soft, rounded and full of red cherry fruitiness. Judicious wood aging has rounded the wine out while leaving all its fruit intact. It can be drunk now, but will be better from 2016. Pinot Noir France Burgundy Bourgogne Hautes Côtes de Nuits Manuel Olivier

description: Aromatically appealing, it features notes of allspice, herbs, cola and cherry. The palate is lighter in style with a scrape-y feel, not fully delivering on all that the aromas have to offer.
title: Windy Bay 2012 Pinot Noir (Oregon)
description2: Aromatically appealing, it features notes of allspice, herbs, cola and cherry. The palate is lighter in style with a scrape-y feel, not fully delivering on all that the aromas have to offer. Pinot Noir US Oregon Oregon Windy Bay

description: This light-colored wine has a spicy character that points up the tannins as well as the red berry fruits. It has a light feeling, with refreshing acidity that shows strongly at the end. It's ready to drink.
title: Vignerons de Buxy 2012 Buissonnier  (Mercurey)
description2: This light-colored wine has a spicy character that points up the tannins as well as the red berry fruits. It has a light feeling, with refreshing acidity that shows strongly at the end. It's ready to drink. Pinot Noir France Burgundy Mercurey Vignerons de Buxy

description: Yellow fruits and apple juice combine in this fresh, mineral-driven wine. It's tangy, tight with acidity while allowing room for pineapple and tropical flavors at the end. It's ready to drink but will be better in 2016.
designation: Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas Album
title: Wines & Winemakers 2013 Lua Cheia em Vinhas Velhas Album Antão Vaz (Alentejano)
description2: Yellow fruits and apple juice combine in this fresh, mineral-driven wine. It's tangy, tight with acidity while allowing room for pineapple and tropical flavors at the end. It's ready to drink but will be better in 2016. Antão Vaz Portugal Alentejano  Wines & Winemakers

description: A faint hint of pink shines on this sparkler named after the winery owners' dog. Aromas of fresh melon and slight peach lead to a faint cherry note upon sipping and creamy mouthfeel, followed by plum skin tartness and a yeasty, sour bitterness.
title: Clos La Chance 2010 Amber's Cuvee Sparkling (Santa Cruz Mountains)
description2: A faint hint of pink shines on this sparkler named after the winery owners' dog. Aromas of fresh melon and slight peach lead to a faint cherry note upon sipping and creamy mouthfeel, followed by plum skin tartness and a yeasty, sour bitterness. Sparkling Blend US California Santa Cruz Mountains Clos La Chance

description: Made principally from Touriga Nacional, this is a rich wine with attractive acidity and strawberry fruitiness. It is ripe, touched with caramel and finished with wild raspberry flavors.
title: Quinta de Covela 2013 Covela Rosé (Minho)
description2: Made principally from Touriga Nacional, this is a rich wine with attractive acidity and strawberry fruitiness. It is ripe, touched with caramel and finished with wild raspberry flavors. Rosé Portugal Minho  Quinta de Covela

description: Subdued aromas recall white flower and stone fruit. The muted palate reveals mature yellow apple skin, lemon zest and notes of nut butter alongside sharp bubbles. It has a tangy but fleeting finish.
title: Ricci Curbastro 2009 Extra Brut Sparkling (Franciacorta)
description2: Subdued aromas recall white flower and stone fruit. The muted palate reveals mature yellow apple skin, lemon zest and notes of nut butter alongside sharp bubbles. It has a tangy but fleeting finish. Sparkling Blend Italy Lombardy Franciacorta Ricci Curbastro

description: This is fresh, not quite dry and a fine apéritif wine. With its soft texture, apple fruits and light mousse, it's both fruity and crisp, with a rounded, fragrant aftertaste.
title: Ruhlmann NV Signature Brut Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
description2: This is fresh, not quite dry and a fine apéritif wine. With its soft texture, apple fruits and light mousse, it's both fruity and crisp, with a rounded, fragrant aftertaste. Sparkling Blend France Alsace Crémant d'Alsace Ruhlmann

description: Crisp and textured, this offers plenty of fresh apple and red fruit flavors. It's a light, bright wine that's poised and stylish, in a fine apéritif style.
title: Dopff & Irion NV Brut Rosé Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
description2: Crisp and textured, this offers plenty of fresh apple and red fruit flavors. It's a light, bright wine that's poised and stylish, in a fine apéritif style. Sparkling Blend France Alsace Crémant d'Alsace Dopff & Irion

description: Vibrantly fruity, it offers aromas of currant, raspberry, celery stalk and spice. The palate has tart cranberry flavors, finishing a bit short.
title: Foris 2012 Maple Ranch Estate Pinot Noir (Rogue Valley)
description2: Vibrantly fruity, it offers aromas of currant, raspberry, celery stalk and spice. The palate has tart cranberry flavors, finishing a bit short. Pinot Noir US Oregon Rogue Valley Foris

description: This toasty bottling shows some evident maturity in terms of fruit richness. It offers toasted walnut, espresso, vanilla and yellow apple-skin flavors alongside large, brisk bubbles and crisp acidity.
title: Il Mosnel 2010 Brut Satèn Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
description2: This toasty bottling shows some evident maturity in terms of fruit richness. It offers toasted walnut, espresso, vanilla and yellow apple-skin flavors alongside large, brisk bubbles and crisp acidity. Chardonnay Italy Lombardy Franciacorta Il Mosnel

description: Dust and pollen notes linger from nose to finish on this dry, full-bodied Riesling. Apple and pear flavors are a tad savory, but brightened by crisp lemon acidity. A refreshing and easy drinking wine.
title: Maximin Grünhäuser 2012 Herrenberg Alte Reben Trocken Riesling (Mosel)
description2: Dust and pollen notes linger from nose to finish on this dry, full-bodied Riesling. Apple and pear flavors are a tad savory, but brightened by crisp lemon acidity. A refreshing and easy drinking wine. Riesling Germany Mosel  Maximin Grünhäuser

description: Aromas of peach blossom, citrus and a yeasty note of fresh biscuits lead the nose on this 100% Chardonnay. The palate offers walnut husk, lemon zest and a confectionary note alongside sharp acidity.
title: Altemasi 2010 Brut Chardonnay (Trento)
description2: Aromas of peach blossom, citrus and a yeasty note of fresh biscuits lead the nose on this 100% Chardonnay. The palate offers walnut husk, lemon zest and a confectionary note alongside sharp acidity. Chardonnay Italy Northeastern Italy Trento Altemasi

description: Soft and supple, this has a heavy streak of spearmint and an herbal finish that also offers dark black cherry and ripe, leathery tannins.
title: Ancient Oak Cellars 2011 Siebert Ranch Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: Soft and supple, this has a heavy streak of spearmint and an herbal finish that also offers dark black cherry and ripe, leathery tannins. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley Ancient Oak Cellars

description: Reduced, stewy, lightly herbal aromas blend berry and tomato scents. The acidity on this five-grape blend is pointed and overriding. Flavors of herbal berry and currant are tangy but also stewy, while the finish is long and green in flavor.
title: Cellers Baronia del Montsant 2010 Englora Red (Montsant)
description2: Reduced, stewy, lightly herbal aromas blend berry and tomato scents. The acidity on this five-grape blend is pointed and overriding. Flavors of herbal berry and currant are tangy but also stewy, while the finish is long and green in flavor. Red Blend Spain Catalonia Montsant Cellers Baronia del Montsant

description: This is a fairly light, bright Pinot Noir with the marks of a ripe year and time spent in oak. It is crafted under the guidelines of a certified sustainable grape growing program. Medium-bodied and juicy, it's fairly priced and ready to enjoy now.
title: Benziger 2012 Appellation Series Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: This is a fairly light, bright Pinot Noir with the marks of a ripe year and time spent in oak. It is crafted under the guidelines of a certified sustainable grape growing program. Medium-bodied and juicy, it's fairly priced and ready to enjoy now. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast Benziger

description: Soft and ripe, this has strawberry fruit flavors, a soft texture and a warm, rich feel. There is just enough acidity to balance this really food-friendly rosé.
title: Herdade do Rocim 2013 Olho de Mocho Rosé (Alentejano)
description2: Soft and ripe, this has strawberry fruit flavors, a soft texture and a warm, rich feel. There is just enough acidity to balance this really food-friendly rosé. Rosé Portugal Alentejano  Herdade do Rocim

description: The pink hue is a little flat. That also applies to the palate, with the fruit showing some maturity and hinting at wood aging. It's a rounded style, full in the mouth, with ripe caramel flavors at the end. Drink now.
title: Poças NV Poças Pink  (Port)
description2: The pink hue is a little flat. That also applies to the palate, with the fruit showing some maturity and hinting at wood aging. It's a rounded style, full in the mouth, with ripe caramel flavors at the end. Drink now. Port Portugal Port  Poças

description: Light and bright, this has a crisp prickle on the tongue, along with canned grapefruit and tight apple-skin flavors. It is almost dry, which gives the wine a mineral texture that adds a bite. Drink now.
title: Quintas de Melgaço 2013 QM Blue White (Vinho Verde)
description2: Light and bright, this has a crisp prickle on the tongue, along with canned grapefruit and tight apple-skin flavors. It is almost dry, which gives the wine a mineral texture that adds a bite. Drink now. Portuguese White Portugal Vinho Verde  Quintas de Melgaço

description: A pretty, grapey wine with tones of pine and lemon underlying flavors of green plum and quince. It's flavorful, off-dry and refreshing; a good expression of Seyval Blanc.
title: Augusta Winery 2008 Seyval Blanc (Augusta)
description2: A pretty, grapey wine with tones of pine and lemon underlying flavors of green plum and quince. It's flavorful, off-dry and refreshing; a good expression of Seyval Blanc. Seyval Blanc US Missouri Augusta Augusta Winery

description: A little too dry and tannic, with earthy flavors of tobacco, sage, pepper and dried leather, which only partially relieve the modest blackberries and black currants. Way too astringent all the way through.
title: Bella 2007 Lily Hill Estate Syrah (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: A little too dry and tannic, with earthy flavors of tobacco, sage, pepper and dried leather, which only partially relieve the modest blackberries and black currants. Way too astringent all the way through. Syrah US California Dry Creek Valley Bella

description: Dusty apple aromas are less citrusy than ideal, and the palate is cidery and tangy. Finishes with heft, length and weight, which all seems a little overbearing given the wine's simplicity. Just good enough but doesn't fully click.
title: Carmen 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Curicó Valley)
description2: Dusty apple aromas are less citrusy than ideal, and the palate is cidery and tangy. Finishes with heft, length and weight, which all seems a little overbearing given the wine's simplicity. Just good enough but doesn't fully click. Sauvignon Blanc Chile Curicó Valley  Carmen

description: Foxy and jumpy smelling at first, with brambly raspberry aromas. The palate feels heavy and baked, with grabby tannins in support of herbal, mildly weedy berry fruit flavors. Finishes saucy, with a hint of tomato. Not pure and focused like the La Flor Malbec.
title: Pulenta Estate 2008 La Flor Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
description2: Foxy and jumpy smelling at first, with brambly raspberry aromas. The palate feels heavy and baked, with grabby tannins in support of herbal, mildly weedy berry fruit flavors. Finishes saucy, with a hint of tomato. Not pure and focused like the La Flor Malbec. Cabernet Sauvignon Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Pulenta Estate

description: In a piece of French wine shorthand, the new appellation of Saint-Bris takes in the old Sauvignon de Saint-Bris wines. The style, though, hasn't changed: an attractive, if rustic type, with crisp gooseberry and grapefruit flavors and a fresh burst of acidity. Screwcap.
title: Simonnet-Febvre 2007 Sauvignon de Saint-Bris  (Saint-Bris)
description2: In a piece of French wine shorthand, the new appellation of Saint-Bris takes in the old Sauvignon de Saint-Bris wines. The style, though, hasn't changed: an attractive, if rustic type, with crisp gooseberry and grapefruit flavors and a fresh burst of acidity. Screwcap. Sauvignon Blanc France Burgundy Saint-Bris Simonnet-Febvre

description: Dry and rough in texture, with berry, cherry, tobacco, herb and spice flavors wrapped into edgy, slightly green tannins. Turns sharp on the finish, and not likely to age.
title: Williamson Wines 2006 Clarissa Vin Rouge Red (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: Dry and rough in texture, with berry, cherry, tobacco, herb and spice flavors wrapped into edgy, slightly green tannins. Turns sharp on the finish, and not likely to age. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California Dry Creek Valley Williamson Wines

description: Dry, with thick tannins housing blackberry, herb and olive flavors. Drink now.
title: Mendocino Farms 2005 Heart Arrow Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendocino)
description2: Dry, with thick tannins housing blackberry, herb and olive flavors. Drink now. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Mendocino Mendocino Farms

description: Charming and perfumed, with notes of musk, white flowers and wild grapes on the nose and exotic spices in the mouth. This is not a concentrated wine, but there's enough acidity here to balance the slight sweetness and to make it a refreshing apéritif. Drink up.
title: Messina Hof 2009 Muscat Canelli (Texas)
description2: Charming and perfumed, with notes of musk, white flowers and wild grapes on the nose and exotic spices in the mouth. This is not a concentrated wine, but there's enough acidity here to balance the slight sweetness and to make it a refreshing apéritif. Drink up. Muscat Canelli US Texas Texas Messina Hof

description: Berry, pickle and bramble aromas are a little tough and crusted over, while the palate is snappy and fresh in feel, with flavors of herbal berry fruit and pepper. A mild hint of oak and resin dry up the finish.
title: Morandé 2008 Pionero Merlot (Rapel Valley)
description2: Berry, pickle and bramble aromas are a little tough and crusted over, while the palate is snappy and fresh in feel, with flavors of herbal berry fruit and pepper. A mild hint of oak and resin dry up the finish. Merlot Chile Rapel Valley  Morandé

description: The nose is honest and bright but not terribly expressive, with just a few delicate raspberry and cherry tones. In the mouth, bing cherry and damp earth notes takes over and continue on the medium finish. Try with a veal chop. Drink up.
title: La Chiripada 2007 Artist Series 1 Dolcetto (New Mexico)
description2: The nose is honest and bright but not terribly expressive, with just a few delicate raspberry and cherry tones. In the mouth, bing cherry and damp earth notes takes over and continue on the medium finish. Try with a veal chop. Drink up. Dolcetto US New Mexico New Mexico La Chiripada

description: A good, dry Chardonnay that gets the job done at a fair price. Shows peaches and cream flavors with a bit of sharpness and green herbs on the finish.
title: Howling Moon 2008 Chardonnay (Lodi)
description2: A good, dry Chardonnay that gets the job done at a fair price. Shows peaches and cream flavors with a bit of sharpness and green herbs on the finish. Chardonnay US California Lodi Howling Moon

description: A raw, rustic blend based on Sangiovese and Merlot, this wine is very dry and astringent in tannins. It's an old-fashioned wine that's technically without flaws.
title: La Storia 2006 Cuvee 32 Red (Alexander Valley)
description2: A raw, rustic blend based on Sangiovese and Merlot, this wine is very dry and astringent in tannins. It's an old-fashioned wine that's technically without flaws. Red Blend US California Alexander Valley La Storia

description: Basic apricot and peach aromas lead to melon, banana and pithy flavors. The palate is a little thick and mealy, while the finish has pretty good feel and length, but not much flavor. Slightly tropical and simple.
title: Luigi Bosca 2009 Finca la Linda Chardonnay (Luján de Cuyo)
address: Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza Province, Argentina
description2: Basic apricot and peach aromas lead to melon, banana and pithy flavors. The palate is a little thick and mealy, while the finish has pretty good feel and length, but not much flavor. Slightly tropical and simple. Chardonnay Argentina Mendoza Province Luján de Cuyo Luigi Bosca

description: Sharp, minty aromas mixed with stemmy red fruit set up a modest, middleweight palate of semisweet, generic red fruit flavors. Quick on the finish, with a spot of green flavor. Good enough but lacks the concentration and deeper aromas and flavors of Urban Malbec.
title: O. Fournier 2007 Urban Uco Tempranillo (Uco Valley)
description2: Sharp, minty aromas mixed with stemmy red fruit set up a modest, middleweight palate of semisweet, generic red fruit flavors. Quick on the finish, with a spot of green flavor. Good enough but lacks the concentration and deeper aromas and flavors of Urban Malbec. Tempranillo Argentina Mendoza Province Uco Valley O. Fournier

description: A luxurious mouthfeel and good concentration are this wine's chief attractions. Flavors are more earthy than fruity, with tones of compost and stewed prunes. Medium finish shows ripe but slightly drying tannins. Drink now.
title: Pahrump Valley Winery 2005 Nevada Ridge First Crush Zinfandel (Nevada)
description2: A luxurious mouthfeel and good concentration are this wine's chief attractions. Flavors are more earthy than fruity, with tones of compost and stewed prunes. Medium finish shows ripe but slightly drying tannins. Drink now. Zinfandel US Nevada Nevada Pahrump Valley Winery

description: Slightly sweet, with a honeyed edge to the rich pear, apple, peach and tropical fruit flavors. Just-in-time acidity fortunately provides balance.
title: Sobon Estate 2008 Viognier (Amador County)
description2: Slightly sweet, with a honeyed edge to the rich pear, apple, peach and tropical fruit flavors. Just-in-time acidity fortunately provides balance. Viognier US California Amador County Sobon Estate

description: Despite some black cherry richness, there's a green, minty, stalky note of unripeness in this blend of Grenache, Syrah and Mourvèdre that limits its appeal. Decanting doesn't help and neither will aging.
title: Terre Rouge 2007 Tete-a-Tete Red (Sierra Foothills)
description2: Despite some black cherry richness, there's a green, minty, stalky note of unripeness in this blend of Grenache, Syrah and Mourvèdre that limits its appeal. Decanting doesn't help and neither will aging. Rhône-style Red Blend US California Sierra Foothills Terre Rouge

description: There is potential in this wine that bodes well for the future of Sangiovese in Virginia. The nose is charming, with mocha, fall leaves and cherries that slide into a silky palate with woodsy touches. Juicy, raspberry-inflected finish. Try with steak. Drink now.
title: Three Fox 2007 Il Volpe Sangiovese (Virginia)
description2: There is potential in this wine that bodes well for the future of Sangiovese in Virginia. The nose is charming, with mocha, fall leaves and cherries that slide into a silky palate with woodsy touches. Juicy, raspberry-inflected finish. Try with steak. Drink now. Sangiovese US Virginia Virginia Three Fox

description: Clove and vanilla make for a serious, if not terribly refreshing, opening. There's nice grapefruit and pomelo fruit here and a medium, lemony finish that veers towards tart. Drink up.
title: Castello di Borghese 2006 Founder's Field Reserve Sauvignon Blanc (North Fork of Long Island)
address: North Fork of Long Island, New York, US
description2: Clove and vanilla make for a serious, if not terribly refreshing, opening. There's nice grapefruit and pomelo fruit here and a medium, lemony finish that veers towards tart. Drink up. Sauvignon Blanc US New York North Fork of Long Island Castello di Borghese

description: This is a simple, light take on Syrah, with a little bit of black pepper, a hint of underbrush, but none of the texture and detail of pricier Washington bottles. It's a light, pleasant red, fine for pizza night.
title: Chateau Ste. Michelle 2006 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This is a simple, light take on Syrah, with a little bit of black pepper, a hint of underbrush, but none of the texture and detail of pricier Washington bottles. It's a light, pleasant red, fine for pizza night. Syrah US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Chateau Ste. Michelle

description: Aromas of white grapefruit, celery and other prickly fruits lose steam with airing, while the green apple and lime flavors are solid and offer some sweetness. Wet in the mouth, which is what you want, but standard fare as a whole.
title: Doña Paula 2009 Los Cardos Sauvignon Blanc (Mendoza)
description2: Aromas of white grapefruit, celery and other prickly fruits lose steam with airing, while the green apple and lime flavors are solid and offer some sweetness. Wet in the mouth, which is what you want, but standard fare as a whole. Sauvignon Blanc Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Doña Paula

description: Acidity dominates this wine, giving it a tart, almost sour taste. Couple that with the sizable tannins, and you have an uncomfortable wine. Call it rustic, old world. The blackberry, currant, coffee and herb flavors are fine.
title: Easton 2007 Cooper Ranch Barbera (Shenandoah Valley (CA))
description2: Acidity dominates this wine, giving it a tart, almost sour taste. Couple that with the sizable tannins, and you have an uncomfortable wine. Call it rustic, old world. The blackberry, currant, coffee and herb flavors are fine. Barbera US California Shenandoah Valley (CA) Easton

description: Even grapier than the Cabernet Sauvignon, this forward, light, candied, confected wine has a hole in the middle. The tannins turn quite astringent, a marked contrast to the sweetness of the fruit.
title: Gilbert Cellars 2007 Cabernet Franc (Wahluke Slope)
description2: Even grapier than the Cabernet Sauvignon, this forward, light, candied, confected wine has a hole in the middle. The tannins turn quite astringent, a marked contrast to the sweetness of the fruit. Cabernet Franc US Washington Wahluke Slope Gilbert Cellars

description: Readily likeable, with a nose of summer fruit soup layered over notes of field greens. The texture is lazy, with moderate acidity and almost no tannin. Try with ribs in a sweet barbecue sauce. Drink now.
title: Glenora 2007 Mason Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
description2: Readily likeable, with a nose of summer fruit soup layered over notes of field greens. The texture is lazy, with moderate acidity and almost no tannin. Try with ribs in a sweet barbecue sauce. Drink now. Cabernet Sauvignon US New York Finger Lakes Glenora

description: Confected but pleasant aromas of cotton candy and sour apple drops dominate the nose, while the palate unfolds nicely with layers of lemon and red apple. Soft and lush, it picks up an apricot accent on the medium finish. Try with Thai food. Drink now.
title: Glenora 2008 Riesling (Finger Lakes)
description2: Confected but pleasant aromas of cotton candy and sour apple drops dominate the nose, while the palate unfolds nicely with layers of lemon and red apple. Soft and lush, it picks up an apricot accent on the medium finish. Try with Thai food. Drink now. Riesling US New York Finger Lakes Glenora

description: Lime and green melon aromas are a bit less than clean and pure, and the palate serves up a pile of jalapeño and bell pepper, with some lime in the background. Short on the finish, and kind of dilute.
title: Finca Sophenia 2009 Altosur Sauvignon Blanc (Tupungato)
description2: Lime and green melon aromas are a bit less than clean and pure, and the palate serves up a pile of jalapeño and bell pepper, with some lime in the background. Short on the finish, and kind of dilute. Sauvignon Blanc Argentina Mendoza Province Tupungato Finca Sophenia

description: This vineyard has proven it can ripen good Malbec, but here it seems as if something has gone sideways. There is a gluey scent underneath the blackberry fruit, and the wine seems chalky and disjointed in the mouth, with more of the band-aid flavors in the finish.
title: Gilbert Cellars 2007 Estate Malbec (Wahluke Slope)
description2: This vineyard has proven it can ripen good Malbec, but here it seems as if something has gone sideways. There is a gluey scent underneath the blackberry fruit, and the wine seems chalky and disjointed in the mouth, with more of the band-aid flavors in the finish. Malbec US Washington Wahluke Slope Gilbert Cellars

description: This wine is a bit hard and ungenerous but certainly not lacking in concentration or intensity. Cassis and cedar scents give way to dark, chocolaty flavors. There's not a lot of bright fruit or nuance, but it will ably partner simple grilled meats.
title: Woolundry Rd 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (South Australia)
description2: This wine is a bit hard and ungenerous but certainly not lacking in concentration or intensity. Cassis and cedar scents give way to dark, chocolaty flavors. There's not a lot of bright fruit or nuance, but it will ably partner simple grilled meats. Cabernet Sauvignon Australia South Australia South Australia Woolundry Rd

description: This is a pretty wine, and the initial flavors are soft and mature, suggesting a wine that's ready to drink now. In the mouth it falls away quickly with a slightly oxidized character that suggests an early fade is on the way. It's gentle and drinks well enough right now, with some barrel notes of caramel and coffee beefing up the finish.
title: Anam Cara 2005 Nicholas Estate Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
description2: This is a pretty wine, and the initial flavors are soft and mature, suggesting a wine that's ready to drink now. In the mouth it falls away quickly with a slightly oxidized character that suggests an early fade is on the way. It's gentle and drinks well enough right now, with some barrel notes of caramel and coffee beefing up the finish. Pinot Noir US Oregon Willamette Valley Anam Cara

description: An exotic bouquet suggests dried roses, brown sugar, cranberry and plum jam. There's a sweetness in the mouth that continues the impression of brown sugar, or maybe a streak of cola. It's an interesting bottle that could develop further or fall off a cliff; it turns a little funky in the finish. More than 12,000 cases were made.
title: Archery Summit 2004 Premier Cuvée Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
description2: An exotic bouquet suggests dried roses, brown sugar, cranberry and plum jam. There's a sweetness in the mouth that continues the impression of brown sugar, or maybe a streak of cola. It's an interesting bottle that could develop further or fall off a cliff; it turns a little funky in the finish. More than 12,000 cases were made. Pinot Noir US Oregon Dundee Hills Archery Summit

description: A solid entry into the everyday Cabernet sweepstakes. Shows ripe, juicy blackberry, cassis and spice flavors in a smooth, polished texture whose tannins cry out for steaks and chops.
title: Cartlidge & Browne 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
description2: A solid entry into the everyday Cabernet sweepstakes. Shows ripe, juicy blackberry, cassis and spice flavors in a smooth, polished texture whose tannins cry out for steaks and chops. Cabernet Sauvignon US California California Cartlidge & Browne

description: Features pleasant but slightly simple flavors of candied cherries and cedar, with a smooth mouthfeel and just a hint of tannin on the finish. Drink now. Imported by Walca International.
title: Ceravolo 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon (Adelaide Plains)
description2: Features pleasant but slightly simple flavors of candied cherries and cedar, with a smooth mouthfeel and just a hint of tannin on the finish. Drink now. Imported by Walca International. Cabernet Sauvignon Australia South Australia Adelaide Plains Ceravolo

description: Mildly smoky and toasty aromas lead to a lightly oaked palate that's largely defined by black cherry and some rich berry syrup. It's a full, colorful Syrah with a chunky mouthfeel and a satisfying but short finish. Drink now.
title: Doña Paula 2006 Los Cardos Syrah (Luján de Cuyo)
address: Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza Province, Argentina
description2: Mildly smoky and toasty aromas lead to a lightly oaked palate that's largely defined by black cherry and some rich berry syrup. It's a full, colorful Syrah with a chunky mouthfeel and a satisfying but short finish. Drink now. Syrah Argentina Mendoza Province Luján de Cuyo Doña Paula

description: Tasted in October, this still-young Merlot is tannic and jammy. It shows fresh primary fruit flavors of raspberries, cherries and blackberries that are a bit one-dimensional. Give it until mid-2008 to develop some bottle complexity.
title: Kenwood 2004 Reserve Merlot (Sonoma County)
description2: Tasted in October, this still-young Merlot is tannic and jammy. It shows fresh primary fruit flavors of raspberries, cherries and blackberries that are a bit one-dimensional. Give it until mid-2008 to develop some bottle complexity. Merlot US California Sonoma County Kenwood

description: There's a tobacco and tomato leaf character that gives this an almost floral aroma, but also simpler cassis and cherry fruit. Some herbal notes persist on the palate, but this medium-bodied wine avoids the vegetal side of things, finishing fresh and clean.
title: Leeuwin Estate 2003 Prelude Vineyards Cabernet Merlot (Margaret River)
description2: There's a tobacco and tomato leaf character that gives this an almost floral aroma, but also simpler cassis and cherry fruit. Some herbal notes persist on the palate, but this medium-bodied wine avoids the vegetal side of things, finishing fresh and clean. Cabernet Merlot Australia Western Australia Margaret River Leeuwin Estate

description: Nice and drily balanced, this is pretty tannic, with blackberry, cherry, leather, carob, coffee and peppery spice flavors that finish with an intriguing touch of tangerine rind. Drink now.
title: Parkers Estate 2005 Riverside Crossing Syrah (Sonoma County)
description2: Nice and drily balanced, this is pretty tannic, with blackberry, cherry, leather, carob, coffee and peppery spice flavors that finish with an intriguing touch of tangerine rind. Drink now. Syrah US California Sonoma County Parkers Estate

description: This is a perfectly fine example of Clare Valley Cabernet, one that emphasizes refinement and elegance over sheer power and intensity. Cassis, tobacco and a hint of vanilla account for the bulk of the aromatic and flavor interest, and it turns mouthwatering on the finish. Should hold well through 2015.
title: Pearson Vineyards 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon (Clare Valley)
description2: This is a perfectly fine example of Clare Valley Cabernet, one that emphasizes refinement and elegance over sheer power and intensity. Cassis, tobacco and a hint of vanilla account for the bulk of the aromatic and flavor interest, and it turns mouthwatering on the finish. Should hold well through 2015. Cabernet Sauvignon Australia South Australia Clare Valley Pearson Vineyards

description: A ripe, crisp, very fresh Chablis bursting with green fruits, with a light layer of caramel and green herbs. Delicious now.
title: Simonnet-Febvre 2006  Chablis
description2: A ripe, crisp, very fresh Chablis bursting with green fruits, with a light layer of caramel and green herbs. Delicious now. Chardonnay France Burgundy Chablis Simonnet-Febvre

description: In accordance to what 2003 dealt out, this wine is a bit stewy and broad. It shows cola, tree bark and baked fruit on the nose, and then sweet plum and chocolate on the finish. It's not a wine for deep contemplation; drink now to enjoy its robust plumpness.
title: Campos Góticos 2003 Crianza  (Ribera del Duero)
address: Ribera del Duero, Northern Spain, Spain
description2: In accordance to what 2003 dealt out, this wine is a bit stewy and broad. It shows cola, tree bark and baked fruit on the nose, and then sweet plum and chocolate on the finish. It's not a wine for deep contemplation; drink now to enjoy its robust plumpness. Tempranillo Spain Northern Spain Ribera del Duero Campos Góticos

description: Lots to like in this dry, fruity Chardonnay. It has flavors of tropical fruits, buttered toast and caramel, wrapped into a rich, creamy mouthfeel. But it's pretty acidic, if you're sensitive to prickliness in your wines.
title: Frostwatch 2005 Chardonnay (Bennett Valley)
description2: Lots to like in this dry, fruity Chardonnay. It has flavors of tropical fruits, buttered toast and caramel, wrapped into a rich, creamy mouthfeel. But it's pretty acidic, if you're sensitive to prickliness in your wines. Chardonnay US California Bennett Valley Frostwatch

description: This is a blend of Inzolia and Sauvignon from a producer located high up the steep mountains above Cefalù on Sicily's western flank with cool nighttime temperature and soothing breezes. Straightforward aromas include green herb, white stone and citrus.
title: Abbazia Santa Anastasia 2006 Sinestesìa White (Sicilia)
description2: This is a blend of Inzolia and Sauvignon from a producer located high up the steep mountains above Cefalù on Sicily's western flank with cool nighttime temperature and soothing breezes. Straightforward aromas include green herb, white stone and citrus. White Blend Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Abbazia Santa Anastasia

description: Better than most Argentinean Sauvignon Blancs, and made in a fuller-bodied style. The nose has weight and wax aromas, as well as melon, and the palate features ripe, almost pithy citrus. Dried apricot and a nick of passion fruit work the finish. Drink immediately.
title: Pascual Toso 2007 Maipu Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc (Mendoza)
description2: Better than most Argentinean Sauvignon Blancs, and made in a fuller-bodied style. The nose has weight and wax aromas, as well as melon, and the palate features ripe, almost pithy citrus. Dried apricot and a nick of passion fruit work the finish. Drink immediately. Sauvignon Blanc Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Pascual Toso

description: Shows some slightly green tomato-leaf and bell-pepper notes as well as hints of leather and hung game, but despite all that, there's also ripe cassis and chocolate flavors and a supple mouthfeel. Imported by MHW,Ltd.
title: Red Mud 2004 Cabernet Sauvignon (South Australia)
description2: Shows some slightly green tomato-leaf and bell-pepper notes as well as hints of leather and hung game, but despite all that, there's also ripe cassis and chocolate flavors and a supple mouthfeel. Imported by MHW,Ltd. Cabernet Sauvignon Australia South Australia South Australia Red Mud

description: From one of Sicily's most beautiful and promising vineyards, Baccante is a blend of Grillo and Chardonnay with bright clean acidity and fragrant yellow fruit. The only setback here is a matchstick aroma (not present in past years) that prevents this vintage from scoring higher.
title: Abbazia Santa Anastasia 2006 Baccante White (Sicilia)
description2: From one of Sicily's most beautiful and promising vineyards, Baccante is a blend of Grillo and Chardonnay with bright clean acidity and fragrant yellow fruit. The only setback here is a matchstick aroma (not present in past years) that prevents this vintage from scoring higher. White Blend Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Abbazia Santa Anastasia

description: A light entry holds flavors of strawberry and tomato leaf, then turns tannic. Chewy and earthy, with more than a hint of seed and stem, this wine comes from biodynamically farmed grapes that add some earthy nuances, but put too much emphasis on green tea, stemmy flavors.
title: Archery Summit 2004 Renegade Ridge Estate Pinot Noir (Dundee Hills)
description2: A light entry holds flavors of strawberry and tomato leaf, then turns tannic. Chewy and earthy, with more than a hint of seed and stem, this wine comes from biodynamically farmed grapes that add some earthy nuances, but put too much emphasis on green tea, stemmy flavors. Pinot Noir US Oregon Dundee Hills Archery Summit

description: Earthy, soft and dry, this Zin has tobacco, cherry, blackberry and spice flavors, with an edge of sweet leather and pine. It's a refreshingly simple country-style Zin that will be nice with barbecue.
title: Castoro Cellars 2005 Cobble Creek Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
description2: Earthy, soft and dry, this Zin has tobacco, cherry, blackberry and spice flavors, with an edge of sweet leather and pine. It's a refreshingly simple country-style Zin that will be nice with barbecue. Zinfandel US California Paso Robles Castoro Cellars

description: Tastes young, sharp in acids and jammy sweet right now, with upfront cherry, raspberry and blackberry flavors. But after all, it is a California Barbera, and these puppies age forever. Give it some time, but don't expect it ever to become sophisticated.
title: French Hill 2005 Grand Reserve Barbera (Sierra Foothills)
description2: Tastes young, sharp in acids and jammy sweet right now, with upfront cherry, raspberry and blackberry flavors. But after all, it is a California Barbera, and these puppies age forever. Give it some time, but don't expect it ever to become sophisticated. Barbera US California Sierra Foothills French Hill

description: There's some stewed fruit weighing down this Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon blend, but for the most part it has it going on. Coffee, oak and leather aromas set up a palate of raspberry, plum and chocolate. There's a fair amount of acid for an ‘03, and that lends legs to a wine that might otherwise seem tired.
region_1: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla
title: Vitis Terrarum 2003 Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
address: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla, Central Spain, Spain
description2: There's some stewed fruit weighing down this Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon blend, but for the most part it has it going on. Coffee, oak and leather aromas set up a palate of raspberry, plum and chocolate. There's a fair amount of acid for an ‘03, and that lends legs to a wine that might otherwise seem tired. Tempranillo-Cabernet Sauvignon Spain Central Spain Vino de la Tierra de Castilla Vitis Terrarum

description: Seems rather oak-dominated, boasting ample brown sugar, vanilla and dill scents backed my some briary, blackberry fruit. Fills out a bit with air, so decant an hour or so prior to serving. Drink now.
title: Vasse River 2004 Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot (Margaret River)
description2: Seems rather oak-dominated, boasting ample brown sugar, vanilla and dill scents backed my some briary, blackberry fruit. Fills out a bit with air, so decant an hour or so prior to serving. Drink now. Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot Australia Western Australia Margaret River Vasse River

description: Like a trip through an orchard, this Syrah, Grenache and Mourvèdre blend bursts with flavors of cherries, raspberries, blackberries, tangerines, kumquats, dates, golden mangoes, yellow currants, the list goes on and on. It's a little on the sweet side, while grippy tannins give the palate handrails to negotiate this fruity ride.
title: Kaleidos 2004 Morpheus Red (Paso Robles)
description2: Like a trip through an orchard, this Syrah, Grenache and Mourvèdre blend bursts with flavors of cherries, raspberries, blackberries, tangerines, kumquats, dates, golden mangoes, yellow currants, the list goes on and on. It's a little on the sweet side, while grippy tannins give the palate handrails to negotiate this fruity ride. Rhône-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Kaleidos

description: This is a pretty eastern U.S. Merlot, with its subtle, nuanced flavors of red berry, plum and currant and its approachable, soft tannins. Virginia is showing its talent for growing reds and this is a good example of what can be done with good vineyard management and winemaking.
title: Lovingston 2005 Josie's Knoll Merlot (Monticello)
description2: This is a pretty eastern U.S. Merlot, with its subtle, nuanced flavors of red berry, plum and currant and its approachable, soft tannins. Virginia is showing its talent for growing reds and this is a good example of what can be done with good vineyard management and winemaking. Merlot US Virginia Monticello Lovingston

description: With polished blackberry, cherry and oak flavors, this affordable Cab represents a good value. It's soft, dry and stylish, and easy to drink.
title: Sonoma Crest 2004 Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma County)
description2: With polished blackberry, cherry and oak flavors, this affordable Cab represents a good value. It's soft, dry and stylish, and easy to drink. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Sonoma County Sonoma Crest

description: This Cru Bourgeois estate has produced a structured wine that is still showing strong wood-aging flavors. Toasty as well as ripely fruity, it has firm tannins and good aging potential. The aftertaste is fruity and spicy. Drink from 2019.
title: Château le Pey 2014  Médoc
description2: This Cru Bourgeois estate has produced a structured wine that is still showing strong wood-aging flavors. Toasty as well as ripely fruity, it has firm tannins and good aging potential. The aftertaste is fruity and spicy. Drink from 2019. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Médoc Château le Pey

description: This vineyard is at one of the highest Castillon points. Big in tannins and also fruit, this is a dense wine. It has a dry core as well as rich blackberry fruits. Concentrated and full, the wine will be seriously worth drinking from 2019.
title: Château Montlandrie 2014  Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux
address: Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux, Bordeaux, France
description2: This vineyard is at one of the highest Castillon points. Big in tannins and also fruit, this is a dense wine. It has a dry core as well as rich blackberry fruits. Concentrated and full, the wine will be seriously worth drinking from 2019. Merlot France Bordeaux Castillon Côtes de Bordeaux Château Montlandrie

description: This Alliance Bourg co-op wine is packed with minty new-wood aromas, this has the potential to be a smooth, polished wine. The blend is 70% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Cabernet Franc. Firm tannins at this stage do not mask the ripe blackberry fruits. Give this wine until 2019 before drinking.
title: Closerie du Bailli 2014 Grande Réserve  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
address: Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux, Bordeaux, France
description2: This Alliance Bourg co-op wine is packed with minty new-wood aromas, this has the potential to be a smooth, polished wine. The blend is 70% Merlot, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Cabernet Franc. Firm tannins at this stage do not mask the ripe blackberry fruits. Give this wine until 2019 before drinking. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux Closerie du Bailli

description: Intense notes of ripe red and baked apples make a strong impression. The palate is rich with the same baked apple along with a touch of honey and gingerbread. The yeasty flavors of autolysis provide an ideal backdrop for this structured, grown-up and classy wine. The finish is totally dry and wonderfully long.
title: Domaine François Schmitt NV Blanc de Noirs Brut Pinot Noir (Alsace)
description2: Intense notes of ripe red and baked apples make a strong impression. The palate is rich with the same baked apple along with a touch of honey and gingerbread. The yeasty flavors of autolysis provide an ideal backdrop for this structured, grown-up and classy wine. The finish is totally dry and wonderfully long. Pinot Noir France Alsace Alsace Domaine François Schmitt

description: You've got to like oak to appreciate this wine, which is presently dominated by scents of vanilla, mocha and toasted coconut. It's full bodied and velvety in texture, with hints of black cherry lurking in the background.
title: Penley Estate 2012 Special Select Shiraz (Coonawarra)
description2: You've got to like oak to appreciate this wine, which is presently dominated by scents of vanilla, mocha and toasted coconut. It's full bodied and velvety in texture, with hints of black cherry lurking in the background. Shiraz Australia South Australia Coonawarra Penley Estate

description: Mouthfilling and round, this wine's savory notes of roasted meat, mocha and cracked pepper frame plummy fruit. Vanilla creeps in on the long, supple finish. Drink now through 2025.
title: Penley Estate 2013 Hyland Shiraz (Coonawarra)
description2: Mouthfilling and round, this wine's savory notes of roasted meat, mocha and cracked pepper frame plummy fruit. Vanilla creeps in on the long, supple finish. Drink now through 2025. Shiraz Australia South Australia Coonawarra Penley Estate

description: This thick, concentrated wine offers complex notions of sandalwood and soapstone, savory in pleasant ways. Clove accents the warmth of strawberry compote laced in rhubarb.
title: Miro 2014 Orsi Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: This thick, concentrated wine offers complex notions of sandalwood and soapstone, savory in pleasant ways. Clove accents the warmth of strawberry compote laced in rhubarb. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley Miro

description: An attractive, oaky perfume and melt-in-the-mouth fruit and dark-chocolate flavors make this full-bodied wine hard to resist. It has a luscious, mouth-coating texture, beautifully ripe blackberries and cherries, and a lingering finish.
title: Murrieta's Well 2013 The Spur Red (Livermore Valley)
description2: An attractive, oaky perfume and melt-in-the-mouth fruit and dark-chocolate flavors make this full-bodied wine hard to resist. It has a luscious, mouth-coating texture, beautifully ripe blackberries and cherries, and a lingering finish. Red Blend US California Livermore Valley Murrieta's Well

description: This big, dramatic wine has a dark color and bold aromas of wood smoke and black pepper. Flavors are concentrated but also dry and appetizing. Firm tannins add grip and seem to help the peppery, smoky accents linger on the finish. Best after 2020.
title: Obsidian Ridge 2012 Half Mile 2640' Red (Red Hills Lake County)
address: Red Hills Lake County, California, US
description2: This big, dramatic wine has a dark color and bold aromas of wood smoke and black pepper. Flavors are concentrated but also dry and appetizing. Firm tannins add grip and seem to help the peppery, smoky accents linger on the finish. Best after 2020. Red Blend US California Red Hills Lake County Obsidian Ridge

description: Although one of the cheaper Zins in the winery's line-up, it is showing the best right now, so drink up. Black cherry, licorice, smoked beef and a deep hibiscus note make for a very heady nose. There is a dense yet soft character to the well-structured palate, where strong flavors of blueberry, crushed slate, tobacco, leather and wild herbs make a tasty convergence.
title: Opolo 2014 Summit Creek Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
description2: Although one of the cheaper Zins in the winery's line-up, it is showing the best right now, so drink up. Black cherry, licorice, smoked beef and a deep hibiscus note make for a very heady nose. There is a dense yet soft character to the well-structured palate, where strong flavors of blueberry, crushed slate, tobacco, leather and wild herbs make a tasty convergence. Zinfandel US California Paso Robles Opolo

description: Superbly warm weather in 2015 gave an extra boost of sunshine to many of the Mosel's entry-level wines, and the RK is one of the best. Whiffs of freesia and tangerine peel waft from the glasss of this semidry Riesling. It's low in alcohol, yet so honeyed and ripe that flavors of grapefruit and peach seem to slick sumptuously on the palate. Zesty lime acidity freshens a lingering finish.
title: Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt 2015 RK Riesling (Mosel)
description2: Superbly warm weather in 2015 gave an extra boost of sunshine to many of the Mosel's entry-level wines, and the RK is one of the best. Whiffs of freesia and tangerine peel waft from the glasss of this semidry Riesling. It's low in alcohol, yet so honeyed and ripe that flavors of grapefruit and peach seem to slick sumptuously on the palate. Zesty lime acidity freshens a lingering finish. Riesling Germany Mosel  Reichsgraf von Kesselstatt

description: This sensational effort was fermented and briefly aged in neutral oak. The striking package sets it apart from all other Rex Hill wines, and the rich, complex flavors add to the impression that this is something truly special. Red berries, blood orange, a touch of Grand Marnier, impressive body and spicy highlights all combine in a darn near irresistible rosé with the power to be a four season wine.
title: Rex Hill 2015 Pinot Noir Rosé (Willamette Valley)
description2: This sensational effort was fermented and briefly aged in neutral oak. The striking package sets it apart from all other Rex Hill wines, and the rich, complex flavors add to the impression that this is something truly special. Red berries, blood orange, a touch of Grand Marnier, impressive body and spicy highlights all combine in a darn near irresistible rosé with the power to be a four season wine. Rosé US Oregon Willamette Valley Rex Hill

description: This rich, rewarding wine pleases in baked blueberry pie and a taste of raisin cake, its texture underlined in soft, integrated oak and a velvety density. Cinnamon, black pepper and toffee weave within the waves of ripeness.
title: Robert Biale 2014 Founding Farmers Zinfandel (Napa Valley)
description2: This rich, rewarding wine pleases in baked blueberry pie and a taste of raisin cake, its texture underlined in soft, integrated oak and a velvety density. Cinnamon, black pepper and toffee weave within the waves of ripeness. Zinfandel US California Napa Valley Robert Biale

description: The vineyard source for this tasty wine is farmed by a fifth-generation Japanese-American originally from California's Central Valley. Tightly wound in oak and tannin, it opens pleasantly to reveal a wealth of rose petals, earth and youthful ripe, dark cherry. With moderate acidity and body, it lingers on the palate.
title: Spell 2014 Umino Vineyard Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: The vineyard source for this tasty wine is farmed by a fifth-generation Japanese-American originally from California's Central Valley. Tightly wound in oak and tannin, it opens pleasantly to reveal a wealth of rose petals, earth and youthful ripe, dark cherry. With moderate acidity and body, it lingers on the palate. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley Spell

description: The nose is uncertain and hovers between musky botrytis and lactic tartness. The palate removes all doubt and shines with luscious, concentrated sweetness, referencing the pleasant bitterness of honeycomb and the spice of maple syrup. Pure lemon freshness illuminates everything. Drink now through 2025.
title: Gruber Röschitz 2015 Trockenbeerenauslese Chardonnay (Niederösterreich)
description2: The nose is uncertain and hovers between musky botrytis and lactic tartness. The palate removes all doubt and shines with luscious, concentrated sweetness, referencing the pleasant bitterness of honeycomb and the spice of maple syrup. Pure lemon freshness illuminates everything. Drink now through 2025. Chardonnay Austria Niederösterreich  Gruber Röschitz

description: A solid value, the 2013 Pillar Box offers oodles of blackberry and plum fruit, framed by vanilla and accented by mocha. It's creamy-velvety in texture, with a rich long finish. Drink now through 2025.
title: Henry's Drive Vignerons 2013 Pillar Box Shiraz (Padthaway)
description2: A solid value, the 2013 Pillar Box offers oodles of blackberry and plum fruit, framed by vanilla and accented by mocha. It's creamy-velvety in texture, with a rich long finish. Drink now through 2025. Shiraz Australia South Australia Padthaway Henry's Drive Vignerons

description: A fresh-baked bread aroma and flavors like butter and baking spices make this full-bodied wine very attractive. It has ample acidity to balance the rich texture, and a lingering finish that completes the classic profile.
title: Jayson 2013 Pahlmeyer Chardonnay (North Coast)
description2: A fresh-baked bread aroma and flavors like butter and baking spices make this full-bodied wine very attractive. It has ample acidity to balance the rich texture, and a lingering finish that completes the classic profile. Chardonnay US California North Coast Jayson

description: Deep and lush aromas of candied blueberry and black cherry meet with chocolate cake, light brown spices and a touch of beef jerky on the nose of this judiciously priced wine. Though a tad light on the palate at first, it has an energetic and spicy acidity that carries forth flavors of tobacco and black fruit.
title: Joseph Carr 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
description2: Deep and lush aromas of candied blueberry and black cherry meet with chocolate cake, light brown spices and a touch of beef jerky on the nose of this judiciously priced wine. Though a tad light on the palate at first, it has an energetic and spicy acidity that carries forth flavors of tobacco and black fruit. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Paso Robles Joseph Carr

description: Enticingly fragrant, this offers alluring scents of rose, perfumed berry, chopped mint, menthol and cake spice. The elegant palate delivers tart red cherry, aromatic herb and star anise alongside fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. A mineral note signals the close. Give this time to fully develop. Drink 2019–2032.
title: La Prevostura 2012  Lessona
description2: Enticingly fragrant, this offers alluring scents of rose, perfumed berry, chopped mint, menthol and cake spice. The elegant palate delivers tart red cherry, aromatic herb and star anise alongside fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. A mineral note signals the close. Give this time to fully develop. Drink 2019–2032. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Lessona La Prevostura

description: Although this is a nonvintage wine, it is a blend around 2012, hence the number in the name. Dominated by Pinot Noir, this ripe, full-bodied wine has a tangy texture boosted by acidity that contrasts with rich red apple and crisp pear flavors that give richness. Drink now.
title: Lallier NV R.012 Brut  (Champagne)
description2: Although this is a nonvintage wine, it is a blend around 2012, hence the number in the name. Dominated by Pinot Noir, this ripe, full-bodied wine has a tangy texture boosted by acidity that contrasts with rich red apple and crisp pear flavors that give richness. Drink now. Champagne Blend France Champagne Champagne Lallier

description: Aromas of orchard fruit, dried herb and toasted bread crust lead the nose. The creamy palate offers mature apple, white peach, nectarine and mineral alongside an elegant perlage that carries through to the bone-dry yet succulent finish.
designation: Secolo Novo Giovanni Biatta Metodo Classico
title: Le Marchesine 2007 Secolo Novo Giovanni Biatta Metodo Classico Chardonnay (Franciacorta)
description2: Aromas of orchard fruit, dried herb and toasted bread crust lead the nose. The creamy palate offers mature apple, white peach, nectarine and mineral alongside an elegant perlage that carries through to the bone-dry yet succulent finish. Chardonnay Italy Lombardy Franciacorta Le Marchesine

description: Notes of ripe yellow apple play enticingly on the nose. They expand to full force on the palate and fill the mouth with their mellow goodness, supported in this by rich notes of shortbread and wonderful lemon freshness. The bubbles are creamy and disperse the lovely flavors to great effect. This is classy and delicious.
title: Domaine Zinck NV Brut Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
description2: Notes of ripe yellow apple play enticingly on the nose. They expand to full force on the palate and fill the mouth with their mellow goodness, supported in this by rich notes of shortbread and wonderful lemon freshness. The bubbles are creamy and disperse the lovely flavors to great effect. This is classy and delicious. Sparkling Blend France Alsace Crémant d'Alsace Domaine Zinck

description: Whiffs of candlestick and honeycomb lend subtlety to zesty white-grapefruit and honeydew flavors in this dry Riesling. While rich, round and supple in mouthfeel, it's balanced squarely by acidity and a pleasant bite of lemon zest.
title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2015 Dry Mineral Riesling (Mosel)
description2: Whiffs of candlestick and honeycomb lend subtlety to zesty white-grapefruit and honeydew flavors in this dry Riesling. While rich, round and supple in mouthfeel, it's balanced squarely by acidity and a pleasant bite of lemon zest. Riesling Germany Mosel  Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler

description: This version of old-vines Carignan-Garnacha is heavily toasted to the point of smelling charred, with coffee and cured-beef notes. Big and blocky on the palate, reflecting a warm year, this tastes toasty, with flavors of wild herbs, baking spices, char and black fruits in the background. Licorice notes and a final blast of char control the finish. Drink through 2021.
title: Ferrer Bobet 2012 Vieilles Velles Red (Priorat)
description2: This version of old-vines Carignan-Garnacha is heavily toasted to the point of smelling charred, with coffee and cured-beef notes. Big and blocky on the palate, reflecting a warm year, this tastes toasty, with flavors of wild herbs, baking spices, char and black fruits in the background. Licorice notes and a final blast of char control the finish. Drink through 2021. Red Blend Spain Catalonia Priorat Ferrer Bobet

description: Dry, dusty, elegant peach and minerally notes open this excellent Albariño. The lightest bit of spritz gives edge and zest to a medium-full palate. Flavors of stone fruits, wild herbs, field greens and white pepper finish healthy, with a melony aftertaste.
title: Granbazán 2015 Etiqueta Ámbar Albariño (Rías Baixas)
description2: Dry, dusty, elegant peach and minerally notes open this excellent Albariño. The lightest bit of spritz gives edge and zest to a medium-full palate. Flavors of stone fruits, wild herbs, field greens and white pepper finish healthy, with a melony aftertaste. Albariño Spain Galicia Rías Baixas Granbazán

description: This fragrant blend of 70% Nebbiolo and 30% Vespolina opens with enticing scents of violet, rose, truffle and baking spice. The chewy, accessible palate delivers juicy black cherry, raspberry compote, white pepper and cinnamon while smooth supple tannins provide the framework. An almond note closes the finish. Drink through 2022.
title: Vallana 2007  Boca
description2: This fragrant blend of 70% Nebbiolo and 30% Vespolina opens with enticing scents of violet, rose, truffle and baking spice. The chewy, accessible palate delivers juicy black cherry, raspberry compote, white pepper and cinnamon while smooth supple tannins provide the framework. An almond note closes the finish. Drink through 2022. Red Blend Italy Piedmont Boca Vallana
