description: This single-vineyard Grüner is powerful, with concentrated white fruit flavors, floral aromas and great, crisp, fresh acidity. The fruit is ripe, hinting at creamy, with a soft green aftertaste. Screwcap.
title: Zull 2006 Aussere Bergen Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
description2: This single-vineyard Grüner is powerful, with concentrated white fruit flavors, floral aromas and great, crisp, fresh acidity. The fruit is ripe, hinting at creamy, with a soft green aftertaste. Screwcap. Grüner Veltliner Austria Niederösterreich  Zull

description: This is a welcome return for this value Merlot after the 2004 vintage was skipped. The smooth and chocolaty flavors that consumers love are there, but they have been pulled back, letting more of the cherry fruit and subtle accents of forest floor, fungus and earth show through. It's textural, complex and thoroughly enjoyable.
title: Helix by Reininger 2005 Merlot (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This is a welcome return for this value Merlot after the 2004 vintage was skipped. The smooth and chocolaty flavors that consumers love are there, but they have been pulled back, letting more of the cherry fruit and subtle accents of forest floor, fungus and earth show through. It's textural, complex and thoroughly enjoyable. Merlot US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Helix by Reininger

description: An intense, forward style of Malbec. The nose oozes a mixture of mint, black-fruit extract and shoe polish, while the saturated palate is racy and just rich enough; the flavors of blackberry and plum are lively with coffee and mocha accents on the finish. A bit acidic and racy, but that won't hurt it if served with food.
title: Trivento 2005 Golden Reserve Malbec (Mendoza)
description2: An intense, forward style of Malbec. The nose oozes a mixture of mint, black-fruit extract and shoe polish, while the saturated palate is racy and just rich enough; the flavors of blackberry and plum are lively with coffee and mocha accents on the finish. A bit acidic and racy, but that won't hurt it if served with food. Malbec Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Trivento

description: Too bad the vineyard owner is pulling out the Sauvignon Blanc, because this is a fresh, vibrant, juicy one, crisp in acidity and rich in citrus, figs, pears and melons. Just a touch of tart gooseberry shows up in the finish.
title: Breggo 2006 Ferrington Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Anderson Valley)
description2: Too bad the vineyard owner is pulling out the Sauvignon Blanc, because this is a fresh, vibrant, juicy one, crisp in acidity and rich in citrus, figs, pears and melons. Just a touch of tart gooseberry shows up in the finish. Sauvignon Blanc US California Anderson Valley Breggo

description: No surprise that Willi Bründlmayer is one of the few in Austria to have real success with Pinot Noir. This is soft, ripe, enveloping, with bitter cherry flavors rounded at the edges with sweet tannins and refreshing acidity.
title: Bründlmayer 2004 Pinot Noir Cécile Pinot Noir (Kamptal)
description2: No surprise that Willi Bründlmayer is one of the few in Austria to have real success with Pinot Noir. This is soft, ripe, enveloping, with bitter cherry flavors rounded at the edges with sweet tannins and refreshing acidity. Pinot Noir Austria Kamptal  Bründlmayer

description: Here's a Cab that needs food to round it off and polish its rough edges. Very dry and a bit angular in tannins, with a peppery bite and generous flavors of cherries and blackberries.
title: Schug 2004 Heritage Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Sonoma Valley)
description2: Here's a Cab that needs food to round it off and polish its rough edges. Very dry and a bit angular in tannins, with a peppery bite and generous flavors of cherries and blackberries. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Sonoma Valley Schug

description: This is a dark, sappy, saturated wine, and the power and grip of the fruit belies its claim of 12.9% alcohol. The Malbec is plenty ripe without being over-ripe, and the fruit retains a certain muscularity, along with a mélange of cherries, plums, rum-soaked raisins and coffee liqueur. Thoroughly delicious and captivating.
title: Tagaris 2006 Alice Vineyard Malbec (Wahluke Slope)
description2: This is a dark, sappy, saturated wine, and the power and grip of the fruit belies its claim of 12.9% alcohol. The Malbec is plenty ripe without being over-ripe, and the fruit retains a certain muscularity, along with a mélange of cherries, plums, rum-soaked raisins and coffee liqueur. Thoroughly delicious and captivating. Malbec US Washington Wahluke Slope Tagaris

description: Torres' Celeste debuted in 2003, and the '05 is the best vintage to date. The wine has penetrating berry and spice aromas and an accent of animal leather. The palate is healthy and polished, with plum, blackberry and herbal notes. Comes together well and should be good in the cellar through 2012.
title: Torres 2005 Celeste Crianza  (Ribera del Duero)
address: Ribera del Duero, Northern Spain, Spain
description2: Torres' Celeste debuted in 2003, and the '05 is the best vintage to date. The wine has penetrating berry and spice aromas and an accent of animal leather. The palate is healthy and polished, with plum, blackberry and herbal notes. Comes together well and should be good in the cellar through 2012. Tempranillo Spain Northern Spain Ribera del Duero Torres

description: A solid effort that delivers all the buttery, creamy and fruity flavors most consumers love. Clean and vibrant in mouthwatering acidity, it's rich in pineapple, orange and spicy pear flavors.
title: Beaulieu Vineyard 2010 Coastal Estates Chardonnay (California)
description2: A solid effort that delivers all the buttery, creamy and fruity flavors most consumers love. Clean and vibrant in mouthwatering acidity, it's rich in pineapple, orange and spicy pear flavors. Chardonnay US California California Beaulieu Vineyard

description: At only $12 per bottle, this is a solid value. The aromas are slightly dusty, like dried rose petal, while the flavors suggest mixed berries and dry earth, with a hint of black tea on the finish. Tannins are silky. Drink now.
title: Stoneburn 2009 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
description2: At only $12 per bottle, this is a solid value. The aromas are slightly dusty, like dried rose petal, while the flavors suggest mixed berries and dry earth, with a hint of black tea on the finish. Tannins are silky. Drink now. Pinot Noir New Zealand Marlborough  Stoneburn

description: Fresh and reasonably fruity on the nose, but it's also slightly gritty and tough. Shows medium weight and intensity in the mouth, with a medicinal red-berry flavor accented by spice and herb notes. It finishes dry and mildly oaky.
title: Trivento 2010 Reserve Malbec (Mendoza)
description2: Fresh and reasonably fruity on the nose, but it's also slightly gritty and tough. Shows medium weight and intensity in the mouth, with a medicinal red-berry flavor accented by spice and herb notes. It finishes dry and mildly oaky. Malbec Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Trivento

description: A blackened wine, with piercing, dense aromas of shoe polish, charred oak, dark spice and black fruit. It feels solid and juicy, with black-tasting flavors that focus on espresso and dark spice. The finish is a bit short on fruit.
title: Verum 2010 Malbec (Alto Valle del Río Negro)
address: Alto Valle del Río Negro, Other, Argentina
description2: A blackened wine, with piercing, dense aromas of shoe polish, charred oak, dark spice and black fruit. It feels solid and juicy, with black-tasting flavors that focus on espresso and dark spice. The finish is a bit short on fruit. Malbec Argentina Other Alto Valle del Río Negro Verum

description: This blend of 88% Cabernet Sauvignon and 12% Cabernet Franc is rustic smelling, with a rubbery, tannic mouthfeel and flavors of roasted plum and berry. Let this wine aerate to show its best.
title: Viña Alicia 2008 Morena Red (Luján de Cuyo)
address: Luján de Cuyo, Mendoza Province, Argentina
description2: This blend of 88% Cabernet Sauvignon and 12% Cabernet Franc is rustic smelling, with a rubbery, tannic mouthfeel and flavors of roasted plum and berry. Let this wine aerate to show its best. Cabernet Blend Argentina Mendoza Province Luján de Cuyo Viña Alicia

description: This has some light deposits at the bottom of the bottle, with a slightly cloudy appearance. Aromas of stone fruit, melon and citrus create a broad and thick aromatic front.
title: Ca' dei Zago 2010 Col Fondo  (Prosecco)
description2: This has some light deposits at the bottom of the bottle, with a slightly cloudy appearance. Aromas of stone fruit, melon and citrus create a broad and thick aromatic front. Glera Italy Veneto Prosecco Ca' dei Zago

description: There's a touch of burnt almond at the start, but this bright effort soon picks up speed thanks to delicate aromas of honey, cantaloupe and white peach. This is smooth and creamy on the finish.
title: Carpenè Malvolti NV Cuvée Brut  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
address: Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore, Veneto, Italy
description2: There's a touch of burnt almond at the start, but this bright effort soon picks up speed thanks to delicate aromas of honey, cantaloupe and white peach. This is smooth and creamy on the finish. Glera Italy Veneto Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore Carpenè Malvolti

description: This is fruity as a pastry, with flavors of nougat, blackberry and cherry jam, toasted almond and honey. Modern in style, the texture is soft, with melted tannins.
title: Galaxy 2008 Syrah-Merlot-Cabernet Sauvignon Red (Sonoma-Napa)
description2: This is fruity as a pastry, with flavors of nougat, blackberry and cherry jam, toasted almond and honey. Modern in style, the texture is soft, with melted tannins. Red Blend US California Sonoma-Napa Galaxy

description: Black in color, this wine has reduced aromas of blueberry, cumin and bitter chocolate. Thick and generous in the mouth, but also rugged, with sweet blackberry and bacon flavors and a lot of toasty-oak influence.
title: Gardel 2010 Vendimia Especial Malbec (Mendoza)
description2: Black in color, this wine has reduced aromas of blueberry, cumin and bitter chocolate. Thick and generous in the mouth, but also rugged, with sweet blackberry and bacon flavors and a lot of toasty-oak influence. Malbec Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Gardel

description: Packaged in a pocket-friendly 187-ml bottle, this is fragrant and simple, with tonic, creamy foam and bright aromas of peach, honeydew and jasmine.
title: Anna Spinato NV Mini  (Prosecco)
description2: Packaged in a pocket-friendly 187-ml bottle, this is fragrant and simple, with tonic, creamy foam and bright aromas of peach, honeydew and jasmine. Glera Italy Veneto Prosecco Anna Spinato

description: A genuine, honest sparkler, this has simple tones of almond paste and lemon soda. The mouthfeel is held steady by foamy cream and bright effervescence.
title: Bellenda 2011 Miraval Millesimato Extra Dry  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
address: Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore, Veneto, Italy
description2: A genuine, honest sparkler, this has simple tones of almond paste and lemon soda. The mouthfeel is held steady by foamy cream and bright effervescence. Glera Italy Veneto Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore Bellenda

description: This sparkler opens with tonic, almost steely perlage that tickles the nose. The bouquet is comprised of crushed stone and white peach, and there's a distant hint of honey at the close.
title: Bianca Vigna 2011 Millesimato Brut  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
address: Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore, Veneto, Italy
description2: This sparkler opens with tonic, almost steely perlage that tickles the nose. The bouquet is comprised of crushed stone and white peach, and there's a distant hint of honey at the close. Glera Italy Veneto Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore Bianca Vigna

description: Direct and immediate, this crisp effort shows pretty balance between its sweet fruit and zesty citrus elements. A perfect summer-sipping sparkling wine.
title: Carpenè Malvolti NV Extra Dry  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
address: Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore, Veneto, Italy
description2: Direct and immediate, this crisp effort shows pretty balance between its sweet fruit and zesty citrus elements. A perfect summer-sipping sparkling wine. Glera Italy Veneto Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore Carpenè Malvolti

description: At first this shows some earthy, volatile aromas. The mineral-driven palate has tart, slightly bitter fruit flavors, suggesting crabapple and wild berry.
title: Coelho 2010 Atração Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
description2: At first this shows some earthy, volatile aromas. The mineral-driven palate has tart, slightly bitter fruit flavors, suggesting crabapple and wild berry. Pinot Noir US Oregon Willamette Valley Coelho

description: Toasty, caramelized oak dominates the aroma and flavor of this Cabernet Sauvignon-based blend. It tastes soft and a little short of power.
title: Coho 2009 Headwaters Red (Napa Valley)
description2: Toasty, caramelized oak dominates the aroma and flavor of this Cabernet Sauvignon-based blend. It tastes soft and a little short of power. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California Napa Valley Coho

description: A nice, sophisticated Cabernet to drink now Dry and crisp in acidity, it has a solid framework of tannins, giving structure to the blackberry and currant flavors.
title: Cupcake 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Central Coast)
description2: A nice, sophisticated Cabernet to drink now Dry and crisp in acidity, it has a solid framework of tannins, giving structure to the blackberry and currant flavors. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Central Coast Cupcake

description: Spice and cream dominate this attractive wine. With its full flavors of spice and pear, there is a also a hint of flower. An attractive wine that is developing quickly.
title: Domaine Ostertag 2010 Vignoble d'Epfig Riesling (Alsace)
description2: Spice and cream dominate this attractive wine. With its full flavors of spice and pear, there is a also a hint of flower. An attractive wine that is developing quickly. Riesling France Alsace Alsace Domaine Ostertag

description: Orange and mandarin flavors mark this warm, full-bodied wine. It's forward and fruity, showing a sweeter character, with vanilla and spice tones. Drink soon.
title: Domaine Rieflé 2008 Steinert Grand Cru Riesling (Alsace)
description2: Orange and mandarin flavors mark this warm, full-bodied wine. It's forward and fruity, showing a sweeter character, with vanilla and spice tones. Drink soon. Riesling France Alsace Alsace Domaine Rieflé

description: Riper and fruitier than Donati's less expensive '08s, the Ezio is a Bordeaux-style blend based on Cabernet Sauvignon. This swaps elegance for a more full-bodied, robust style that comes across as heavy.
title: Donati 2008 Ezio Red (Paicines)
description2: Riper and fruitier than Donati's less expensive '08s, the Ezio is a Bordeaux-style blend based on Cabernet Sauvignon. This swaps elegance for a more full-bodied, robust style that comes across as heavy. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US California Paicines Donati

description: Solid on the bouquet, this has notes of dark fruit and smoke, with an almond-like sweetness. Big, bulky and bullish in the mouth, it has roasted, meaty flavors that include campfire smoke, flamed meat and black fruit. The finish tastes charred but feels healthy and lively.
title: Andeluna 2010 Malbec (Mendoza)
description2: Solid on the bouquet, this has notes of dark fruit and smoke, with an almond-like sweetness. Big, bulky and bullish in the mouth, it has roasted, meaty flavors that include campfire smoke, flamed meat and black fruit. The finish tastes charred but feels healthy and lively. Malbec Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Andeluna

description: This is one of several estates in this cru appellation where Georges Duboeuf makes and markets the wine. It is lightly wood aged to smooth out the ebullient fruits. Rich and with some firm tannins that will develop, it has concentration and a dense texture. Drink from 2018.
title: Georges Duboeuf 2015 Château de Juliénas  (Juliénas)
description2: This is one of several estates in this cru appellation where Georges Duboeuf makes and markets the wine. It is lightly wood aged to smooth out the ebullient fruits. Rich and with some firm tannins that will develop, it has concentration and a dense texture. Drink from 2018. Gamay France Beaujolais Juliénas Georges Duboeuf

description: This cru estate is owned by the Duboeuf family. The wine has some wood aging that adds to the rich texture while not detracting from the ripe juicy red-cherry fruit. With its tannins, the wine could age, so drink from late 2017.
title: Georges Duboeuf 2015 Château des Capitans  (Juliénas)
description2: This cru estate is owned by the Duboeuf family. The wine has some wood aging that adds to the rich texture while not detracting from the ripe juicy red-cherry fruit. With its tannins, the wine could age, so drink from late 2017. Gamay France Beaujolais Juliénas Georges Duboeuf

description: From the south-east facing Côte du Py, this is a powerfully structured wine. It is as full of tannins as of ripe red fruits. The wine with its dense character it likely to age well over several years. Drink from 2018.
designation: Domaine de Javernière Côte du Py
title: Georges Duboeuf 2015 Domaine de Javernière Côte du Py  (Morgon)
description2: From the south-east facing Côte du Py, this is a powerfully structured wine. It is as full of tannins as of ripe red fruits. The wine with its dense character it likely to age well over several years. Drink from 2018. Gamay France Beaujolais Morgon Georges Duboeuf

description: Owned by the Darroze family, the cru wine from this estate is produced by Georges Duboeuf. It is a dense wine with balancing rich black fruits. Its spicy cherry-fruit flavor and rich tannins give a wine that should age further. Drink from 2018.
title: Georges Duboeuf 2015 Domaine des Quatres Vents  (Fleurie)
description2: Owned by the Darroze family, the cru wine from this estate is produced by Georges Duboeuf. It is a dense wine with balancing rich black fruits. Its spicy cherry-fruit flavor and rich tannins give a wine that should age further. Drink from 2018. Gamay France Beaujolais Fleurie Georges Duboeuf

description: This is an estate-grown blend of 61% Malbec, 33% Cabernet Sauvignon, 3% Petit Verdot and 3% Syrah. It sizzles in a mix of huckleberry and blueberry, full-bodied and dusty in tannin. Its juicy and lifted by moderate acidity, with oaky accents of vanilla, nutmeg and clove.
title: Hess Collection 2013 19 Block Mountain Cuvée Red (Mount Veeder)
description2: This is an estate-grown blend of 61% Malbec, 33% Cabernet Sauvignon, 3% Petit Verdot and 3% Syrah. It sizzles in a mix of huckleberry and blueberry, full-bodied and dusty in tannin. Its juicy and lifted by moderate acidity, with oaky accents of vanilla, nutmeg and clove. Red Blend US California Mount Veeder Hess Collection

description: Made with 50% Merlot, 35% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Syrah and 5% Petit Verdot, this has subdued aromas suggesting underbrush, clove, dark-skinned berry and French oak. The smooth vibrant palate delivers red currant, unripe cherry, mocha and dried sage alongside fine-grained tannins. An orange zest note closes the finish.
title: Il Borro 2013 Red (Toscana)
description2: Made with 50% Merlot, 35% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Syrah and 5% Petit Verdot, this has subdued aromas suggesting underbrush, clove, dark-skinned berry and French oak. The smooth vibrant palate delivers red currant, unripe cherry, mocha and dried sage alongside fine-grained tannins. An orange zest note closes the finish. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Toscana Il Borro

description: First made during the Reagan-Gorbachev years, this blend of 74% Pinot Noir and 26% Chardonnay tastes of hazelnut torte and almond paste, offering richness interwoven with moderate acidity. On the lusherside of the sparkling spectrum, it offers a sweetness of peach, brown sugar and lemon meringue.
title: Iron Horse 2011 Russian Cuvée Sparkling (Green Valley)
description2: First made during the Reagan-Gorbachev years, this blend of 74% Pinot Noir and 26% Chardonnay tastes of hazelnut torte and almond paste, offering richness interwoven with moderate acidity. On the lusherside of the sparkling spectrum, it offers a sweetness of peach, brown sugar and lemon meringue. Sparkling Blend US California Green Valley Iron Horse

description: Mossy freshness and fragrance appear on the shy subdued nose. The wonderfully slender and sprightly palate is fresh and delicate. There is something subtle and lithe about this, which is very uplifting. The finish is refreshing and clean.
title: Lackner Tinnacher 2015 Sauvignon Blanc (Südsteiermark)
description2: Mossy freshness and fragrance appear on the shy subdued nose. The wonderfully slender and sprightly palate is fresh and delicate. There is something subtle and lithe about this, which is very uplifting. The finish is refreshing and clean. Sauvignon Blanc Austria Südsteiermark  Lackner Tinnacher

description: Cabernet Sauvignon makes up over 70% of this blend with the balance Merlot, Petit Verdot and Malbec. It shows aromas of dark cherries, licorice and brooding black fruit that at times seems slightly dried out. The palate shows elegantly styled dark-fruit flavors that linger on the finish.
title: Lauren Ashton Cellars 2013 Proprietor's Cuvée Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Cabernet Sauvignon makes up over 70% of this blend with the balance Merlot, Petit Verdot and Malbec. It shows aromas of dark cherries, licorice and brooding black fruit that at times seems slightly dried out. The palate shows elegantly styled dark-fruit flavors that linger on the finish. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Lauren Ashton Cellars

description: This is quite a dynamic and layered wine, especially for the bargain price, with deep and hearty blackberry, caramel, rust, lavender and potpourri on the nose. The berry-led palate is rustic and unrefined, with feral flavors, peppery spice and decent acidity.
title: Now Presenting... 2014 Red (Paso Robles)
description2: This is quite a dynamic and layered wine, especially for the bargain price, with deep and hearty blackberry, caramel, rust, lavender and potpourri on the nose. The berry-led palate is rustic and unrefined, with feral flavors, peppery spice and decent acidity. Rhône-style Red Blend US California Paso Robles Now Presenting...

description: Full bodied and definitely fruity without being sweet, this wine from Fulcrum comes straight at the taste buds with opulent black cherry and tart raspberry flavors on a vivid texture. Having spent 15 months in French oak before bottling, it tastes a bit dense and muted at this point, and should be best after 2018.
title: On Point 2014 Christina's Cuvée Pinot Noir (North Coast)
description2: Full bodied and definitely fruity without being sweet, this wine from Fulcrum comes straight at the taste buds with opulent black cherry and tart raspberry flavors on a vivid texture. Having spent 15 months in French oak before bottling, it tastes a bit dense and muted at this point, and should be best after 2018. Pinot Noir US California North Coast On Point

description: Ripe perfumed black fruits dominate this cru wine. They float above the firm tannins and concentrated acidity to offer a wine that will become rich and generous as it develops. A touch of pepper and spice adds to the layers of fruit. Drink from 2018
title: Pardon et Fils 2015 Les Mouilles  (Juliénas)
description2: Ripe perfumed black fruits dominate this cru wine. They float above the firm tannins and concentrated acidity to offer a wine that will become rich and generous as it develops. A touch of pepper and spice adds to the layers of fruit. Drink from 2018 Gamay France Beaujolais Juliénas Pardon et Fils

description: Spice and green pepper notes accentuate ripe luscious blackberry and cassis flavors in this classically inspired Cabernet Franc. Fine tannins and fresh cutting acidity lend vibe to the midpalate. Fleshy and ripe yet pleasantly herbaceous, it's ready to drink now but should hold well through 2022.
title: Paumanok 2014 Cabernet Franc (North Fork of Long Island)
address: North Fork of Long Island, New York, US
description2: Spice and green pepper notes accentuate ripe luscious blackberry and cassis flavors in this classically inspired Cabernet Franc. Fine tannins and fresh cutting acidity lend vibe to the midpalate. Fleshy and ripe yet pleasantly herbaceous, it's ready to drink now but should hold well through 2022. Cabernet Franc US New York North Fork of Long Island Paumanok

description: This wine seems broad across the palate, but not quite as deep as some Condrieus. The fruit is understated, resembling gently toasted marshmallow and maybe a touch of baked pineapple, rather than flamboyant apricot and spice. Plan on serving it with fish or chicken rather than something rich or extravagant.
title: Jean-Luc Colombo 2013 Amour de Dieu  (Condrieu)
description2: This wine seems broad across the palate, but not quite as deep as some Condrieus. The fruit is understated, resembling gently toasted marshmallow and maybe a touch of baked pineapple, rather than flamboyant apricot and spice. Plan on serving it with fish or chicken rather than something rich or extravagant. Viognier France Rhône Valley Condrieu Jean-Luc Colombo

description: This wine is big in tannin, extracted and full bodied, with dense blueberry and maple syrup at its core. For fans of a rich style, it will impress for  its ripe, dark fruit and sizable yet velvety mouthfeel.
title: Acacia 2013 Thornton Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: This wine is big in tannin, extracted and full bodied, with dense blueberry and maple syrup at its core. For fans of a rich style, it will impress for  its ripe, dark fruit and sizable yet velvety mouthfeel. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast Acacia

description: This blend of 60% Grenache, 30% Syrah and 10% Cinsault would be a crowd favorite if more than 700 cases were available in the U.S. The black cherry fruit is punched up by hints of herbs and cracked pepper, there's ample weight but great freshness and zest, and the finish is long and complex, showing off hints of licorice, pepper and dusty earth. Drink now–2020.
title: Alain Jaume et Fils 2014 Haut de Brun Red (Côtes du Rhône)
address: Côtes du Rhône, Rhône Valley, France
description2: This blend of 60% Grenache, 30% Syrah and 10% Cinsault would be a crowd favorite if more than 700 cases were available in the U.S. The black cherry fruit is punched up by hints of herbs and cracked pepper, there's ample weight but great freshness and zest, and the finish is long and complex, showing off hints of licorice, pepper and dusty earth. Drink now–2020. Rhône-style Red Blend France Rhône Valley Côtes du Rhône Alain Jaume et Fils

description: This smooth, lean red attractively delivers above its price point. Tart in clove and currant, it finishes with a whiplash of mocha.
title: Sean Minor 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: This smooth, lean red attractively delivers above its price point. Tart in clove and currant, it finishes with a whiplash of mocha. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Sean Minor

description: A slightly earthy nose of yellow plum and stone fruit leads to a fresh textured palate, which shows off mirabelles and lemons. There is a pleasant phenolic edge and a clean, long finish.
title: Steininger 2015 Grand Grü Reserve Grüner Veltliner (Kamptal)
description2: A slightly earthy nose of yellow plum and stone fruit leads to a fresh textured palate, which shows off mirabelles and lemons. There is a pleasant phenolic edge and a clean, long finish. Grüner Veltliner Austria Kamptal  Steininger

description: The dark red fruit is enveloped in the rounded, rich and chocolaty scent of oak. The palate shows a lighter side with delicate fruit of a red-cherry nature. Freshness sumptuous oak and red-cherry notes marry well. This is lovely now, but just a few more months in bottle will allow it to knit together more. Drink now through 2020.
title: Stift Klosterneuburg 2014 Ausstich St. Laurent (Thermenregion)
description2: The dark red fruit is enveloped in the rounded, rich and chocolaty scent of oak. The palate shows a lighter side with delicate fruit of a red-cherry nature. Freshness sumptuous oak and red-cherry notes marry well. This is lovely now, but just a few more months in bottle will allow it to knit together more. Drink now through 2020. St. Laurent Austria Thermenregion  Stift Klosterneuburg

description: A four-acre parcel of old vines is the source of this dense and rich wine. It has jammy red berry and cherry fruits that are lifted by the mineral texture and acidity. The wine is balanced although it does need to age. Drink from the end of 2017.
title: Terroirs et Talents 2015 Clos de la Brosse  (Saint-Amour)
description2: A four-acre parcel of old vines is the source of this dense and rich wine. It has jammy red berry and cherry fruits that are lifted by the mineral texture and acidity. The wine is balanced although it does need to age. Drink from the end of 2017. Gamay France Beaujolais Saint-Amour Terroirs et Talents

description: Cassis, bell pepper, toast, French oak and coconut lead the nose. The aromas carry over to the tightly wound palate along with raw red currant, powdered sage, licorice and a confectionery note. Close-grained tannins leave a rather astringent finish.
title: Tua Rita 2013 Redigaffi Merlot (Toscana)
description2: Cassis, bell pepper, toast, French oak and coconut lead the nose. The aromas carry over to the tightly wound palate along with raw red currant, powdered sage, licorice and a confectionery note. Close-grained tannins leave a rather astringent finish. Merlot Italy Tuscany Toscana Tua Rita

description: Very varietal aromas of sour cherry and cranberry lead to a fruit-filled flavorful palate. Light oak accents linger on the finish. It's a very pleasing example of the variety.
title: Vino La Monarcha 2014 Sangiovese (Wahluke Slope)
description2: Very varietal aromas of sour cherry and cranberry lead to a fruit-filled flavorful palate. Light oak accents linger on the finish. It's a very pleasing example of the variety. Sangiovese US Washington Wahluke Slope Vino La Monarcha

description: This is an aromatic wine, with scents of green melon candy, lime zest, white flowers and white peach. It drinks off dry, with stone-fruit flavors brightened by zippy acidity leading to a mouthwatering finish.
title: Vino La Monarcha 2015 Riesling (Ancient Lakes)
description2: This is an aromatic wine, with scents of green melon candy, lime zest, white flowers and white peach. It drinks off dry, with stone-fruit flavors brightened by zippy acidity leading to a mouthwatering finish. Riesling US Washington Ancient Lakes Vino La Monarcha

description: Concentrated flavors and a richly tannic texture make this dry wine more sophisticated and interesting than many other red blends. It combines cranberry, black cherry and cinnamon notes for a mouthfilling and harmonious impression.
title: Whiplash 2015 Red (California)
description2: Concentrated flavors and a richly tannic texture make this dry wine more sophisticated and interesting than many other red blends. It combines cranberry, black cherry and cinnamon notes for a mouthfilling and harmonious impression. Red Blend US California California Whiplash

description: With a perfumed nose of rose and toasted oak, this wine is thick in red fruit, dense oak and a welcome undercurrent of bright acidity that helps keep it fresh in the glass. Small amounts of Merlot, Petit Verdot, Cabernet Franc and Malbec are all within.
title: Bell 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: With a perfumed nose of rose and toasted oak, this wine is thick in red fruit, dense oak and a welcome undercurrent of bright acidity that helps keep it fresh in the glass. Small amounts of Merlot, Petit Verdot, Cabernet Franc and Malbec are all within. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Bell

description: Inviting aromas of dark-skinned fruit, blue flower, leather and a whiff of baking spice waft out of the glass. The firm juicy palate offers ripe wild cherry, licorice and hint of charcuterie while assertive, seasoned tannins provide support. Drink through 2021.
title: Cerbaia 2011  Brunello di Montalcino
description2: Inviting aromas of dark-skinned fruit, blue flower, leather and a whiff of baking spice waft out of the glass. The firm juicy palate offers ripe wild cherry, licorice and hint of charcuterie while assertive, seasoned tannins provide support. Drink through 2021. Sangiovese Italy Tuscany Brunello di Montalcino Cerbaia

description: Golden caramelized oak supports a fleshy, full-bodied sensation of pear and fig in this bold, rich wine. Resolved on the palate and possessed of moderate acidity, it finishes in a plume of nutmeg.
title: Gibbs 2014 Bacigalupi Vineyard Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Golden caramelized oak supports a fleshy, full-bodied sensation of pear and fig in this bold, rich wine. Resolved on the palate and possessed of moderate acidity, it finishes in a plume of nutmeg. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley Gibbs

description: Creamy, lush and somewhat robust, this dry sparkler offers a thick mousse and touch of richness in its mix of nutty bread dough, green apple, pear and lime.
title: Gloria Ferrer NV Sonoma Brut Sparkling (Sonoma County)
description2: Creamy, lush and somewhat robust, this dry sparkler offers a thick mousse and touch of richness in its mix of nutty bread dough, green apple, pear and lime. Sparkling Blend US California Sonoma County Gloria Ferrer

description: Scratchy plum and raspberry aromas are fresh and forward, while the mouthfeel follows suit; it's juicy, with narrowing acidity and brightness. Flavors of raspberry, plum and cherry end zesty and long, with crisp acidity maintaining focus. This is a blend of Carignan (Mazuelo), Garnacha and Syrah.
title: Bula 2010 Red (Montsant)
description2: Scratchy plum and raspberry aromas are fresh and forward, while the mouthfeel follows suit; it's juicy, with narrowing acidity and brightness. Flavors of raspberry, plum and cherry end zesty and long, with crisp acidity maintaining focus. This is a blend of Carignan (Mazuelo), Garnacha and Syrah. Red Blend Spain Catalonia Montsant Bula

description: Though not indicated on the label, once again the Morrison Lane vineyard—the oldest Syrah planting in Walla Walla—is the source of the fruit. The wine is peppery and tannic, with cherry fruit and dried herbal accents. There's a whiff of toast in the finish.
title: Bunchgrass 2009 Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: Though not indicated on the label, once again the Morrison Lane vineyard—the oldest Syrah planting in Walla Walla—is the source of the fruit. The wine is peppery and tannic, with cherry fruit and dried herbal accents. There's a whiff of toast in the finish. Syrah US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Bunchgrass

description: This straightforward, perfectly clean blend of Carignan, Syrah and Garnacha would function as a great everyday house red. It's lively and a little racy and grating on the palate, with standard, fresh berry flavors touched up by a sprinkle of chocolaty oak. A modest finish keeps the vibe positive.
title: Can Blau 2010 Blau Red (Montsant)
description2: This straightforward, perfectly clean blend of Carignan, Syrah and Garnacha would function as a great everyday house red. It's lively and a little racy and grating on the palate, with standard, fresh berry flavors touched up by a sprinkle of chocolaty oak. A modest finish keeps the vibe positive. Red Blend Spain Catalonia Montsant Can Blau

description: Sweet peach nectar and fragrant white flower open the nose of this lush Gewürztraminer. The wine feels slightly sweet and sticky on the palate with rich density and a waxy finish.
title: Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano 2011 Sanct Valentin Gewürztraminer (Alto Adige)
description2: Sweet peach nectar and fragrant white flower open the nose of this lush Gewürztraminer. The wine feels slightly sweet and sticky on the palate with rich density and a waxy finish. Gewürztraminer Italy Northeastern Italy Alto Adige Cantina Produttori San Michele Appiano

description: Sourced from dry farmed, organic vines planted in 1918, Carol Shelton's Monga is a mouthful of a wine, layered with cinnamon spice, blueberry, chocolate and oak, and still very concentrated and dry, with room to grow and mellow.
title: Carol Shelton 2009 Monga Zin, Lopez Vineyard Zinfandel (Cucamonga Valley)
description2: Sourced from dry farmed, organic vines planted in 1918, Carol Shelton's Monga is a mouthful of a wine, layered with cinnamon spice, blueberry, chocolate and oak, and still very concentrated and dry, with room to grow and mellow. Zinfandel US California Cucamonga Valley Carol Shelton

description: This is a big, modern, warm Garnacha with a lot of oak and vanilla on the bouquet as well as blackberry and cassis. It's jammy on the tongue, but there's enough acidity to keep the pulse up. Dark black cherry, berry and rubbery flavors are followed by end-notes of raisin, chocolate and vanilla.
title: Casa Rojo 2009 Fauno Organic Grapes Garnacha (Priorat)
description2: This is a big, modern, warm Garnacha with a lot of oak and vanilla on the bouquet as well as blackberry and cassis. It's jammy on the tongue, but there's enough acidity to keep the pulse up. Dark black cherry, berry and rubbery flavors are followed by end-notes of raisin, chocolate and vanilla. Garnacha Spain Catalonia Priorat Casa Rojo

description: A solid, ripe, juicy black fruited wine, delicious already with its fragrant fruits. It has structure that supports the attractive surface, giving shape to this lightly textured wine. Keep for 4–5 years, but also drink now.
title: Château de la Croix 2009  Médoc
description2: A solid, ripe, juicy black fruited wine, delicious already with its fragrant fruits. It has structure that supports the attractive surface, giving shape to this lightly textured wine. Keep for 4–5 years, but also drink now. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Médoc Château de la Croix

description: A delightfully clean and fruity wine, the epitome of Provence rosé. It has fresh acidity, crisp lemon and red currant fruit and just a light sprinkling of spice.
title: Château d'Esclans 2012 Whispering Angel Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description2: A delightfully clean and fruity wine, the epitome of Provence rosé. It has fresh acidity, crisp lemon and red currant fruit and just a light sprinkling of spice. Rosé France Provence Côtes de Provence Château d'Esclans

description: Polished and pretty, this Merlot delivers plenty of juicy cherry, red currant, mocha and toast flavors that are lovely to drink now. The wine is smooth and softly tannic—just what you want Merlot to be.
title: Chelsea Goldschmidt 2011 Merlot (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: Polished and pretty, this Merlot delivers plenty of juicy cherry, red currant, mocha and toast flavors that are lovely to drink now. The wine is smooth and softly tannic—just what you want Merlot to be. Merlot US California Dry Creek Valley Chelsea Goldschmidt

description: This wine is a little direct, but very tasty, showing rich, ripe cherry, red currant, cocoa and sweet oak flavors, wrapped into lovely tannins. A polished, pretty wine for drinking now.
title: Peju 2009 Merlot (Napa Valley)
description2: This wine is a little direct, but very tasty, showing rich, ripe cherry, red currant, cocoa and sweet oak flavors, wrapped into lovely tannins. A polished, pretty wine for drinking now. Merlot US California Napa Valley Peju

description: This dry, tannic wine is astringent now, in the way of a young Cabernet. It has a heart of ripe blackberries and currants, and finishes dry and clean. There's a rustic edge that  suggests drinking over the next 2–3 years.
title: Pope Valley Winery 2010 Eakle Ranch Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: This dry, tannic wine is astringent now, in the way of a young Cabernet. It has a heart of ripe blackberries and currants, and finishes dry and clean. There's a rustic edge that  suggests drinking over the next 2–3 years. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Pope Valley Winery

description: With damp earth and crusty leather aromas, this is a heavy wine with baked fruit, a syrupy mouthfeel and flavors of mocha, carob, leafy berry and earth. On the finish, it's full bodied and soft, with ripe black-fruit flavors that register as thick and a touch raisiny. Drink now.
title: Real Sitio de Ventosilla 2004 RSV 1601 El Duque de Lerma  (Ribera del Duero)
address: Ribera del Duero, Northern Spain, Spain
description2: With damp earth and crusty leather aromas, this is a heavy wine with baked fruit, a syrupy mouthfeel and flavors of mocha, carob, leafy berry and earth. On the finish, it's full bodied and soft, with ripe black-fruit flavors that register as thick and a touch raisiny. Drink now. Tempranillo Spain Northern Spain Ribera del Duero Real Sitio de Ventosilla

description: Masses of sweet blackberry jam give this Cabernet an easy deliciousness. The fruit and oak are balanced with fine tannins and a gentle scour of acidity. Not one for the cellar, but it will benefit from an hour or two in the decanter.
title: Stryker Sonoma 2010 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
description2: Masses of sweet blackberry jam give this Cabernet an easy deliciousness. The fruit and oak are balanced with fine tannins and a gentle scour of acidity. Not one for the cellar, but it will benefit from an hour or two in the decanter. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Alexander Valley Stryker Sonoma

description: This fine-honed Chardonnay hews to the Eyrie house style. It may seem austere at first, but the green and yellow fruit flavors are ripe, not vegetal, and the firm acidity makes it a fine food match. Give it plenty of time to breathe before serving.
title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2011 Estate Chardonnay (Dundee Hills)
description2: This fine-honed Chardonnay hews to the Eyrie house style. It may seem austere at first, but the green and yellow fruit flavors are ripe, not vegetal, and the firm acidity makes it a fine food match. Give it plenty of time to breathe before serving. Chardonnay US Oregon Dundee Hills The Eyrie Vineyards

description: This Rhône-style blend is fruity and delicious. It has raspberry, cherry, licorice, mocha and spice flavors, wrapped into easy tannins, brightened with a bite of lime acidity. Ready to enjoy now.
title: The Farm Winery 2009 Touchy-Feely G-S-M (Paso Robles)
description2: This Rhône-style blend is fruity and delicious. It has raspberry, cherry, licorice, mocha and spice flavors, wrapped into easy tannins, brightened with a bite of lime acidity. Ready to enjoy now. G-S-M US California Paso Robles The Farm Winery

description: Shows the dark color, thick tannins and deep, concentrated flavors you expect from Petite Sirah. It's a big gulp of blackberry jam, espresso, dark chocolate and crushed black pepper, and the finish is thoroughly dry. Lacks the acidic vibrancy needed for aging, but a fine wine to drink now.
title: Trueheart 2010 Truehart Vineyard Petite Sirah (Sonoma Valley)
description2: Shows the dark color, thick tannins and deep, concentrated flavors you expect from Petite Sirah. It's a big gulp of blackberry jam, espresso, dark chocolate and crushed black pepper, and the finish is thoroughly dry. Lacks the acidic vibrancy needed for aging, but a fine wine to drink now. Petite Sirah US California Sonoma Valley Trueheart

description: Ripe apple aromas make the nose nice, even though it's flattening with age. Likewise on the palate, which delivers pithy orange and dry melon flavors along with indications that it's just starting to fade. Notes of green herbs and scallion come up on the finish. Drink this mature white immediately.
title: Val do Sosego 2011 Albariño (Rías Baixas)
description2: Ripe apple aromas make the nose nice, even though it's flattening with age. Likewise on the palate, which delivers pithy orange and dry melon flavors along with indications that it's just starting to fade. Notes of green herbs and scallion come up on the finish. Drink this mature white immediately. Albariño Spain Galicia Rías Baixas Val do Sosego

description: A blend of grapes from several vineyards, this is named for a famous jazz tune. The blending both softens and expands the mid-palate, and seems to have boosted the aging curve. It's ready to drink, with strawberry fruit, a dusting of cocoa, a hint of wet cement, and a finish with cola and sassafras.
title: J. Christopher 2010 Nuages Pinot Noir (Chehalem Mountains)
description2: A blend of grapes from several vineyards, this is named for a famous jazz tune. The blending both softens and expands the mid-palate, and seems to have boosted the aging curve. It's ready to drink, with strawberry fruit, a dusting of cocoa, a hint of wet cement, and a finish with cola and sassafras. Pinot Noir US Oregon Chehalem Mountains J. Christopher

description: Frankly delicious, offering wave after wave of black cherry jam, red currant, licorice, mocha, vanilla and buttered cinnamon toast flavors, wrapped into soft, smooth tannins.
title: J. Lohr 2010 Gesture G-S-M (Paso Robles)
description2: Frankly delicious, offering wave after wave of black cherry jam, red currant, licorice, mocha, vanilla and buttered cinnamon toast flavors, wrapped into soft, smooth tannins. G-S-M US California Paso Robles J. Lohr

description: Rotgipfler is almost an exclusivity to Thermenregion. This bright, fruity wine is deliciously crisp with spice, pepper and pear flavors. It has a light lemon edge brought out by the refreshing acidity. Screwcap.
title: Johanneshof Reinisch 2012 Rotgipfler (Thermenregion)
description2: Rotgipfler is almost an exclusivity to Thermenregion. This bright, fruity wine is deliciously crisp with spice, pepper and pear flavors. It has a light lemon edge brought out by the refreshing acidity. Screwcap. Rotgipfler Austria Thermenregion  Johanneshof Reinisch

description: This is one of Lynmar's most expensive Chardonnays, of their six 2011s. It's also one of the most forward and oakiest. Your first impression is of sweet buttered toast, sprinkled with brown sugar and drizzled with melted butterscotch. Then the tropical fruits kick in, brightened with citrusy acids. It's an impressive feat, but the wine feels overworked, and lacks the sustaining interest of Lynmar's other bottlings.
title: Lynmar 2011 Monastery Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: This is one of Lynmar's most expensive Chardonnays, of their six 2011s. It's also one of the most forward and oakiest. Your first impression is of sweet buttered toast, sprinkled with brown sugar and drizzled with melted butterscotch. Then the tropical fruits kick in, brightened with citrusy acids. It's an impressive feat, but the wine feels overworked, and lacks the sustaining interest of Lynmar's other bottlings. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley Lynmar

description: This is a good value for a sophisticated Merlot from Napa Valley. It's not an ager, but it's delightful now for its dryness, smooth tannins and complex cherry and red currant flavors with hints of herbs and sweet peas.
title: Parcel 41 2011 Merlot (Napa Valley)
description2: This is a good value for a sophisticated Merlot from Napa Valley. It's not an ager, but it's delightful now for its dryness, smooth tannins and complex cherry and red currant flavors with hints of herbs and sweet peas. Merlot US California Napa Valley Parcel 41

description: A gentle wine, this has warm, fruity aromas, ripe red cherry and raspberry flavors, a soft texture and fine-grained tannins. Medium to full bodied and almost sweet in balance, it's easy to enjoy.
title: 401K 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
description2: A gentle wine, this has warm, fruity aromas, ripe red cherry and raspberry flavors, a soft texture and fine-grained tannins. Medium to full bodied and almost sweet in balance, it's easy to enjoy. Cabernet Sauvignon US California California 401K

description: A mix of Sauvignon Blanc (77%) and Sémillon, this wine comes from three separate vineyards in the Columbia Valley. It shows plenty of Sauvignon's herbal character while also displaying the ripeness of the vintage, with lightly spritzy tropical fruit and fig flavors that possess a fleshy feel.
title: Barnard Griffin 2014 Fumé Blanc Dry Sauvignon Blanc (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: A mix of Sauvignon Blanc (77%) and Sémillon, this wine comes from three separate vineyards in the Columbia Valley. It shows plenty of Sauvignon's herbal character while also displaying the ripeness of the vintage, with lightly spritzy tropical fruit and fig flavors that possess a fleshy feel. Sauvignon Blanc US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Barnard Griffin

description: This wine doesn't seem to have fully ripened, with green, reedy aromas along with notes of cranberry and cherry Jolly Rancher. The full-bodied palate delivers more but seems disconnected with tart, tangy cranberry flavors.
title: Cana's Feast 2013 Northridge Vineyard Primitivo (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: This wine doesn't seem to have fully ripened, with green, reedy aromas along with notes of cranberry and cherry Jolly Rancher. The full-bodied palate delivers more but seems disconnected with tart, tangy cranberry flavors. Primitivo US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Cana's Feast

description: Aromas of toast, oak, espresso and a whiff of smoke lead the nose. The palate offers oak extract, coconut, coffee and vanilla but there's not enough fruit richness to support the oak. It's already reached its ideal drinking window so enjoy sooner rather than later.
title: Cantine Leonardo Da Vinci 2010 Da Vinci Riserva  (Chianti)
description2: Aromas of toast, oak, espresso and a whiff of smoke lead the nose. The palate offers oak extract, coconut, coffee and vanilla but there's not enough fruit richness to support the oak. It's already reached its ideal drinking window so enjoy sooner rather than later. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Chianti Cantine Leonardo Da Vinci

description: A stamp of smoke and toasted oak mark the entry into this wine, followed by chewy tannins that wrap themselves around dark layers of chocolate and tobacco leaf, the structure at first impenetrable. The finish is relaxed and somewhat short.
title: Hill Family Estate 2012 Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: A stamp of smoke and toasted oak mark the entry into this wine, followed by chewy tannins that wrap themselves around dark layers of chocolate and tobacco leaf, the structure at first impenetrable. The finish is relaxed and somewhat short. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Hill Family Estate

description: This lightly colored wine blends Grenache (43%), Syrah (32%) and Mourvèdre. It brings aromas of red raspberries, currant and flowers. The palate is fresh and lighter in style, with the emphasis on fruit.
title: James Wyatt 2013 Untamed Cuvée Red (Yakima Valley)
description2: This lightly colored wine blends Grenache (43%), Syrah (32%) and Mourvèdre. It brings aromas of red raspberries, currant and flowers. The palate is fresh and lighter in style, with the emphasis on fruit. Red Blend US Washington Yakima Valley James Wyatt

description: There are flavors of peanuts as well as the more usual white fruits in this wine that is rounded and soft, with gentle acidity. The wine, fresh at the end, is ready to drink.
title: Liebart-Régnier NV Brut  (Champagne)
description2: There are flavors of peanuts as well as the more usual white fruits in this wine that is rounded and soft, with gentle acidity. The wine, fresh at the end, is ready to drink. Champagne Blend France Champagne Champagne Liebart-Régnier

description: This tradition-bucking blend of 61% Chenin Blanc, 31% Viognier and 8% Roussanne offers soft aromas of sweet apple blossoms and peach, with a hint of barrel smoke. The palate offers a similar blend of peaches, pears and apples, warmed up with some oak influence.
title: Vinum 2013 White Elephant White (California)
description2: This tradition-bucking blend of 61% Chenin Blanc, 31% Viognier and 8% Roussanne offers soft aromas of sweet apple blossoms and peach, with a hint of barrel smoke. The palate offers a similar blend of peaches, pears and apples, warmed up with some oak influence. White Blend US California California Vinum

description: Aromas of toast, milk chocolate and black-skinned fruit lead the way. The soft, low-acid palate doles out crushed plum, fleshy cherry and mocha alongside drying, angular tannins that create an abrupt finish.
title: Viticoltori Senesi Aretini 2009 Riserva  (Chianti)
description2: Aromas of toast, milk chocolate and black-skinned fruit lead the way. The soft, low-acid palate doles out crushed plum, fleshy cherry and mocha alongside drying, angular tannins that create an abrupt finish. Sangiovese Italy Tuscany Chianti Viticoltori Senesi Aretini

description: A strong oak influence dampens the varietal character in this full-bodied, spicy wine. It smells like cinnamon and cedar, tastes slightly sweet and smoky, is full bodied and rich in texture. Nice and smooth, it shows only mild varietal character.
title: Wise Villa 2013 Estate Grown Sangiovese (Placer County)
description2: A strong oak influence dampens the varietal character in this full-bodied, spicy wine. It smells like cinnamon and cedar, tastes slightly sweet and smoky, is full bodied and rich in texture. Nice and smooth, it shows only mild varietal character. Sangiovese US California Placer County Wise Villa

description: This is a substantial wine, concentrated in dark red berry color and flavor, from cherry to wild strawberry to more savory rhubarb compote. Muted on the nose, it has an underlying woody, herbal character that balances the vibrancy of the fruit.
title: MacPhail 2014 Rosé of Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: This is a substantial wine, concentrated in dark red berry color and flavor, from cherry to wild strawberry to more savory rhubarb compote. Muted on the nose, it has an underlying woody, herbal character that balances the vibrancy of the fruit. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast MacPhail

description: This blend of Sangiovese and 10% Merlot opens with aromas of forest floor, ripe blackberry, cedar and menthol. The warm, evolved palate offers dried black cherry, licorice, mint, ground pepper and a gamy note alongside assertive, almost gritty tannins that leave an astringent finish.
title: Mannucci Droandi 2009 Ceppeto Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
description2: This blend of Sangiovese and 10% Merlot opens with aromas of forest floor, ripe blackberry, cedar and menthol. The warm, evolved palate offers dried black cherry, licorice, mint, ground pepper and a gamy note alongside assertive, almost gritty tannins that leave an astringent finish. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Chianti Classico Mannucci Droandi

description: Flavors of berry, vanilla and tar form around thick, rich tannins, giving this wine a puckering quality that may benefit from opening before enjoying. The finish is sturdy and robust in leathery black pepper.
title: Rosenblum 2012 Winemaker Selection Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
description2: Flavors of berry, vanilla and tar form around thick, rich tannins, giving this wine a puckering quality that may benefit from opening before enjoying. The finish is sturdy and robust in leathery black pepper. Zinfandel US California Sonoma County Rosenblum

description: Here's a bright, informal red that offers sour cherry, red berry and a light note of cooking spice. Lively acidity and soft, rather fleeting tannins give it an easy-drinking quality.
title: Travignoli 2013  Chianti Rufina
description2: Here's a bright, informal red that offers sour cherry, red berry and a light note of cooking spice. Lively acidity and soft, rather fleeting tannins give it an easy-drinking quality. Sangiovese Italy Tuscany Chianti Rufina Travignoli

description: This 100% Merlot offers a lot of heat around its otherwise approachable lift of soft, smooth tannins and reasonable oak. Sage, cedar and tobacco provide a weedy aspect to the wine, offset by plenty of ripe blackberry and cherry.
title: Hanaiali'i 2013 Merlot (Napa Valley)
description2: This 100% Merlot offers a lot of heat around its otherwise approachable lift of soft, smooth tannins and reasonable oak. Sage, cedar and tobacco provide a weedy aspect to the wine, offset by plenty of ripe blackberry and cherry. Merlot US California Napa Valley Hanaiali'i

description: Grown in the southern section of the valley in the foothills of the Blue Mountains, this rare varietal bottling from this appellation shows aromas of cranberry, raspberry and citrus, along with some hints of oxidation. It's tart and full in feel, not seeming entirely varietally correct.
title: Lagana 2013 Breezy Slope Vineyard Pinot Noir (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: Grown in the southern section of the valley in the foothills of the Blue Mountains, this rare varietal bottling from this appellation shows aromas of cranberry, raspberry and citrus, along with some hints of oxidation. It's tart and full in feel, not seeming entirely varietally correct. Pinot Noir US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Lagana

description: This is an aromatically brooding wine with notes of herbs, pepper and brown spices. It drinks quite sweet with a lightly chalky feel.
title: Lagana 2013 Minnick Hills Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: This is an aromatically brooding wine with notes of herbs, pepper and brown spices. It drinks quite sweet with a lightly chalky feel. Syrah US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Lagana

description: This is box wine taken seriously, even featuring a picture of winemaker Denise Wordenon. Fresh-squeezed blueberry fruit mixes with black rocks, milk chocolate and cedar on the nose, followed by an easy-to-quaff juiciness on the lightly bodied palate. It's not very complex, but perfect for summer barbecues or car camping.
title: Loft 2013 Merlot (Monterey)
description2: This is box wine taken seriously, even featuring a picture of winemaker Denise Wordenon. Fresh-squeezed blueberry fruit mixes with black rocks, milk chocolate and cedar on the nose, followed by an easy-to-quaff juiciness on the lightly bodied palate. It's not very complex, but perfect for summer barbecues or car camping. Merlot US California Monterey Loft

description: Rough, animal-like aromas wrestle with piercing, fairly hot plum and berry scents. Rubbery, blackened, peppery plum and raspberry flavors finish oaky, mildly bitter and tannic.
title: Matsu 2013 El Picaro  (Toro)
description2: Rough, animal-like aromas wrestle with piercing, fairly hot plum and berry scents. Rubbery, blackened, peppery plum and raspberry flavors finish oaky, mildly bitter and tannic. Tinta de Toro Spain Northern Spain Toro Matsu

description: The nose here is not quite as clean-cut as it could be, while the palate shows a little more focus. Crisp and zesty, if a little short.
title: Nadler 2014 Grüner Veltliner (Carnuntum)
description2: The nose here is not quite as clean-cut as it could be, while the palate shows a little more focus. Crisp and zesty, if a little short. Grüner Veltliner Austria Carnuntum  Nadler

description: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc, this offers aromas of raisinated cherries, herbs, bittersweet chocolate and a whiff of barnyard. Medicinal flavors are backed by chalky tannins.
title: :Nota Bene 2011 Ciel du Cheval Red (Red Mountain)
description2: A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc, this offers aromas of raisinated cherries, herbs, bittersweet chocolate and a whiff of barnyard. Medicinal flavors are backed by chalky tannins. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US Washington Red Mountain :Nota Bene

description: At this scale (170,000 cases imported), the quality is remarkable. Leafy notes accent pink grapefruit aromas and flavors, coming together in a harmonious, easy-drinking finish.
title: Oyster Bay 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Marlborough)
description2: At this scale (170,000 cases imported), the quality is remarkable. Leafy notes accent pink grapefruit aromas and flavors, coming together in a harmonious, easy-drinking finish. Sauvignon Blanc New Zealand Marlborough  Oyster Bay

description: Well-crafted and fruity, this has a fresh character that allows room for red berry flavors. It's a ripe wine, keeping freshness while bringing in a warmer, caramel character.
title: Quai de la Lune 2014 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description2: Well-crafted and fruity, this has a fresh character that allows room for red berry flavors. It's a ripe wine, keeping freshness while bringing in a warmer, caramel character. Rosé France Bordeaux Bordeaux Rosé Quai de la Lune

description: Made with Sangiovese and a small percentage of Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with aromas of coconut, toast and oak-driven spice. The evolved palate offers coconut, clove and ground black pepper but the fruit richness has almost dried up entirely, leaving an astringent finish.
title: Cennatoio 2011 O'Leandro Riserva  (Chianti Classico)
description2: Made with Sangiovese and a small percentage of Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with aromas of coconut, toast and oak-driven spice. The evolved palate offers coconut, clove and ground black pepper but the fruit richness has almost dried up entirely, leaving an astringent finish. Red Blend Italy Tuscany Chianti Classico Cennatoio

description: Intense with acidity and young fruitiness, this wine needs some time. The potential of the white and citrus fruit is there, with an herbaceous character that needs to soften. Drink from late 2015.
title: Château Buisson-Redon 2014  Bordeaux Blanc
description2: Intense with acidity and young fruitiness, this wine needs some time. The potential of the white and citrus fruit is there, with an herbaceous character that needs to soften. Drink from late 2015. Bordeaux-style White Blend France Bordeaux Bordeaux Blanc Château Buisson-Redon

description: This wine made from Muscat Canelli grapes is slightly spritzy and sweet, pungent in apricot fuzz and grass, a mélange of tropical goodness from there on out. Mango, kiwi and pineapple fill the medium-weight waves of viscous texture, concluding in a vanilla-tinged, light, fresh finish.
title: St. Supéry 2014 Estate Grown Moscato (Napa Valley)
description2: This wine made from Muscat Canelli grapes is slightly spritzy and sweet, pungent in apricot fuzz and grass, a mélange of tropical goodness from there on out. Mango, kiwi and pineapple fill the medium-weight waves of viscous texture, concluding in a vanilla-tinged, light, fresh finish. Moscato US California Napa Valley St. Supéry

description: This is a traditional style—emphasizing earthy tannins and spicy fruit and is rough around the edges—but is a wine that would relish being partnered with sausages, salamis and hard cheeses. There is plenty of weight, the acidity coming from minerality and wood.
title: Clos de Gamot 2002 Cuvée des Vignes Centenaires Malbec (Cahors)
description2: This is a traditional style—emphasizing earthy tannins and spicy fruit and is rough around the edges—but is a wine that would relish being partnered with sausages, salamis and hard cheeses. There is plenty of weight, the acidity coming from minerality and wood. Malbec France Southwest France Cahors Clos de Gamot

description: Not many wines come from Bucelas today, as its vineyards get eaten up by the northern Lisbon suburbs. This Arinto-based wine suggests there should be some more of this ultra-crisp white, which bears a passing resemblance to a Vinho Verde in its super-fresh apple and grapefruit flavors.
title: Companhia das Quintas 2007 Prova Régia Arinto (Bucelas)
description2: Not many wines come from Bucelas today, as its vineyards get eaten up by the northern Lisbon suburbs. This Arinto-based wine suggests there should be some more of this ultra-crisp white, which bears a passing resemblance to a Vinho Verde in its super-fresh apple and grapefruit flavors. Arinto Portugal Bucelas  Companhia das Quintas

description: Pretty mineral notes recall chalk and dusty ash and provide depth and dimension to this fresh and fragrant white wine. There's not much fruit, but the wine pulls its own thanks to those mineral nuances and its crisp acidity.
title: Cusumano 2007 Cubìa Insolia (Sicilia)
description2: Pretty mineral notes recall chalk and dusty ash and provide depth and dimension to this fresh and fragrant white wine. There's not much fruit, but the wine pulls its own thanks to those mineral nuances and its crisp acidity. Insolia Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Cusumano

description: An attractive salmon pink-colored wine, very fresh, with bright red currant acidity, fleshed out with some caramel, raspberry and a dash of red apple skins texture.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2007 Casa do Lago Rosé Touriga Nacional (Estremadura)
description2: An attractive salmon pink-colored wine, very fresh, with bright red currant acidity, fleshed out with some caramel, raspberry and a dash of red apple skins texture. Touriga Nacional Portugal Estremadura  DFJ Vinhos

description: Molasses, smoked bacon, beef jerky and loads of clove and exotic spice come to mind. Lamùri is a pure expression of Nero d'Avola that also offers plum, prune and blackberry. Despite the mature fruit flavors, the wine has good acidity and crispness.
title: Tasca d'Almerita 2006 Lamùri Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
description2: Molasses, smoked bacon, beef jerky and loads of clove and exotic spice come to mind. Lamùri is a pure expression of Nero d'Avola that also offers plum, prune and blackberry. Despite the mature fruit flavors, the wine has good acidity and crispness. Nero d'Avola Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Tasca d'Almerita

description: This is a mineral-driven wine from the blackened slopes of Mount Etna with delicate shadings of pear, peach, jasmine and honeysuckle. The overall impression is one of elegance—thanks to the jasmine notes in particular. It's a very special wine. A Marc de Grazia selection, various American importers.
title: Tenuta delle Terre Nere 2007  Etna
description2: This is a mineral-driven wine from the blackened slopes of Mount Etna with delicate shadings of pear, peach, jasmine and honeysuckle. The overall impression is one of elegance—thanks to the jasmine notes in particular. It's a very special wine. A Marc de Grazia selection, various American importers. White Blend Italy Sicily & Sardinia Etna Tenuta delle Terre Nere

description: With the wonderfully crisp acidity and bright, laser-pure fruit Edna Valley is known for, this Syrah, Grenache and Viognier blush offers a wealth of tasty raspberry, cherry, citrus fruit and spice flavors. Dry and clean, it shows California rosé near its best.
title: Tolosa 2007 Edna Ranch Rosé (Edna Valley)
description2: With the wonderfully crisp acidity and bright, laser-pure fruit Edna Valley is known for, this Syrah, Grenache and Viognier blush offers a wealth of tasty raspberry, cherry, citrus fruit and spice flavors. Dry and clean, it shows California rosé near its best. Rosé US California Edna Valley Tolosa

description: This blend is mainly Shiraz (50%) and Grenache (28%), which accounts for the wine's ample, plummy fruit flavors. Accents of grilled meat and slightly briary overtones add complexity, and the wine finishes dry and savory. Drink now-2012.
title: Turkey Flat 2005 The Turk Shiraz-Grenache-Cabernet-Mourvèdre Red (Barossa Valley)
description2: This blend is mainly Shiraz (50%) and Grenache (28%), which accounts for the wine's ample, plummy fruit flavors. Accents of grilled meat and slightly briary overtones add complexity, and the wine finishes dry and savory. Drink now-2012. Red Blend Australia South Australia Barossa Valley Turkey Flat

description: Portugal's popular brand is a lively, fresh, spice- and dried fruit-flavored wine. There are flavors of pound cake and nutmeg surrounding a core of solid, firm tannins. Great with food, this is not for aging.
title: J. Portugal Ramos 2007 Marquês de Borba Red (Alentejo)
description2: Portugal's popular brand is a lively, fresh, spice- and dried fruit-flavored wine. There are flavors of pound cake and nutmeg surrounding a core of solid, firm tannins. Great with food, this is not for aging. Portuguese Red Portugal Alentejo  J. Portugal Ramos

description: Sturdy and hard in tannins, brisk in acids, this Pinot will benefit from a year or so in bottle. It's extremely dry, with earthy, balsam and mushroom-inspired flavors of blackberries, black cherries and cola.
title: J Vineyards & Winery 2006 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: Sturdy and hard in tannins, brisk in acids, this Pinot will benefit from a year or so in bottle. It's extremely dry, with earthy, balsam and mushroom-inspired flavors of blackberries, black cherries and cola. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley J Vineyards & Winery

description: Light in color and texture, with a silky, airy mouthfeel, this Pinot has elegant flavors of cherries, anise, vanilla, Asian spices and smoky wood. It's a polished wine for drinking now.
title: J. Wilkes 2006 Bien Nacido Vineyard Hillside Pinot Noir (Santa Barbara County)
description2: Light in color and texture, with a silky, airy mouthfeel, this Pinot has elegant flavors of cherries, anise, vanilla, Asian spices and smoky wood. It's a polished wine for drinking now. Pinot Noir US California Santa Barbara County J. Wilkes

description: “Cocina” means “the kitchen” in Spanish, and this blend of Malbec, Bonarda and Syrah is definitely a kitchen-sink type of wine. It's stout, a bit reduced and tinny at first, but with air it turns into a nice, simple chunkster with plump baked-fruit flavors and a soft but structured chocolaty finish. Drink now.
title: La Posta 2006 Cocina Blend Red (Mendoza)
description2: “Cocina” means “the kitchen” in Spanish, and this blend of Malbec, Bonarda and Syrah is definitely a kitchen-sink type of wine. It's stout, a bit reduced and tinny at first, but with air it turns into a nice, simple chunkster with plump baked-fruit flavors and a soft but structured chocolaty finish. Drink now. Red Blend Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza La Posta

description: Here's an easy-going Salice Salentino (90% Negroamaro and 10% Malvasia Nera) with spice, cherry and cola notes that are weaved nicely together. There's harmony and elegance here and the wine leaves a spicy imprint on the close.
title: Leone de Castris 2005 Maiana Rosso Red (Salice Salentino)
description2: Here's an easy-going Salice Salentino (90% Negroamaro and 10% Malvasia Nera) with spice, cherry and cola notes that are weaved nicely together. There's harmony and elegance here and the wine leaves a spicy imprint on the close. Red Blend Italy Southern Italy Salice Salentino Leone de Castris

description: Rubbery and smoky at first, with leather and berry fruit running secondary to the wine's more reduced qualities. But if given ten minutes to unwind, it shows wide black-fruit flavors, creaminess and finally some barrel-based resin. Gets better the more you work with it, but will always register as “oaky.”
title: Melipal 2006 Reserve Malbec (Mendoza)
description2: Rubbery and smoky at first, with leather and berry fruit running secondary to the wine's more reduced qualities. But if given ten minutes to unwind, it shows wide black-fruit flavors, creaminess and finally some barrel-based resin. Gets better the more you work with it, but will always register as “oaky.” Malbec Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Melipal

description: This 2005 Syrah from Morrison Lane seems a bit lackluster compared with previous efforts. This is smoky and tight, a tannic wine with flavors of lead pencil, green tea and earth. But the fruit is quite light, tart, and does not seem to sync up with the heaviness of the tannins.
title: Morrison Lane 2005 Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: This 2005 Syrah from Morrison Lane seems a bit lackluster compared with previous efforts. This is smoky and tight, a tannic wine with flavors of lead pencil, green tea and earth. But the fruit is quite light, tart, and does not seem to sync up with the heaviness of the tannins. Syrah US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Morrison Lane

description: Picked late and fermented on native yeast, this Viognier brings some snap and spice to its scents and flavors. The lime and quinine quality recalls a good gin and tonic; it definitely leans to the herbal rather than the tropical side of Viognier, but is crisp and refreshing.
title: Morrison Lane 2006 Viognier (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: Picked late and fermented on native yeast, this Viognier brings some snap and spice to its scents and flavors. The lime and quinine quality recalls a good gin and tonic; it definitely leans to the herbal rather than the tropical side of Viognier, but is crisp and refreshing. Viognier US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Morrison Lane

description: Fazio makes the best of hot climate growing conditions and presents a well-composed Nero d'Avola that is enhanced by aromas of red apple, cassis, pomegranate and black cherry. There's good intensity here and some sweetness, although the mouthfeel is in no way heavy or thick.
title: Fazio 2005 Torre dei Venti Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
description2: Fazio makes the best of hot climate growing conditions and presents a well-composed Nero d'Avola that is enhanced by aromas of red apple, cassis, pomegranate and black cherry. There's good intensity here and some sweetness, although the mouthfeel is in no way heavy or thick. Nero d'Avola Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Fazio

description: Smoky, cedary notes nicely complement the blueberry fruit in this McLaren Vale Shiraz. It's pretty full on the palate, with a slightly syrupy texture that extends the flavors through a mouthwatering finish. Drink now-2012.
title: Gemtree 2006 Uncut Shiraz (McLaren Vale)
description2: Smoky, cedary notes nicely complement the blueberry fruit in this McLaren Vale Shiraz. It's pretty full on the palate, with a slightly syrupy texture that extends the flavors through a mouthwatering finish. Drink now-2012. Shiraz Australia South Australia McLaren Vale Gemtree

description: This is 100% Syrah from an excellent vineyard. It's chewy and even a bit salty in the mouth, with a mix of bell pepper and black pepper over streaks of berry and cassis. Most of the flavor is front-loaded, and the wine fades away into an earthy, fairly tannic finish.
title: Adamant Cellars 2006 Spofford Station Vineyard Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: This is 100% Syrah from an excellent vineyard. It's chewy and even a bit salty in the mouth, with a mix of bell pepper and black pepper over streaks of berry and cassis. Most of the flavor is front-loaded, and the wine fades away into an earthy, fairly tannic finish. Syrah US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Adamant Cellars

description: The bouquet here is very floral and intense: you'll get jasmine, honeysuckle, sweet apple, mango and other exotic fruits. The wine tastes clean, sweet and dense and has fragrant flavors that accompany you glass after glass.
title: Alberto Longo 2007 Le Fossette Falanghina (Puglia)
description2: The bouquet here is very floral and intense: you'll get jasmine, honeysuckle, sweet apple, mango and other exotic fruits. The wine tastes clean, sweet and dense and has fragrant flavors that accompany you glass after glass. Falanghina Italy Southern Italy Puglia Alberto Longo

description: Another super Sauvignon Blanc that shows how well Lake County does with this variety. It's all about the citrus, fig and spicy melon flavors and the juicy acidity, which makes the wine so fresh and clean. Made from the Musqué clone.
title: X 2006 ES Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc (Lake County)
description2: Another super Sauvignon Blanc that shows how well Lake County does with this variety. It's all about the citrus, fig and spicy melon flavors and the juicy acidity, which makes the wine so fresh and clean. Made from the Musqué clone. Sauvignon Blanc US California Lake County X

description: Enormous in jammy apricot, peach, pineapple, Asian spice and sweet charred oak vanillins, this Burgundy-inspired Chard is a little sweet. But it provides enough acidity for balanced structure.
title: Godwin 2005 Floral Clone Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Enormous in jammy apricot, peach, pineapple, Asian spice and sweet charred oak vanillins, this Burgundy-inspired Chard is a little sweet. But it provides enough acidity for balanced structure. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley Godwin

description: A fresh, intriguing wine whose balance and depth suggest midterm aging. Golden in color, it's succulent in the flavors of peaches, pineapples, limes, almond biscotti and butterscotch, with fine acidity and a rich, honeyed finish. Give it until sometime in 2008 and for another couple of years.
title: Hagafen 2006 Ripken Vineyard Roussanne (Lodi)
description2: A fresh, intriguing wine whose balance and depth suggest midterm aging. Golden in color, it's succulent in the flavors of peaches, pineapples, limes, almond biscotti and butterscotch, with fine acidity and a rich, honeyed finish. Give it until sometime in 2008 and for another couple of years. Roussanne US California Lodi Hagafen

description: The second wine from Malhadinha Nova is lively and fruity, packed with red fruits, sweet strawberry flavors and easy, ripe texture. Drink now.
title: Herdade da Malhadinha Nova 2006 Monte da Peceguina Red (Alentejano)
description2: The second wine from Malhadinha Nova is lively and fruity, packed with red fruits, sweet strawberry flavors and easy, ripe texture. Drink now. Portuguese Red Portugal Alentejano  Herdade da Malhadinha Nova

description: With the '05, Bucklin is getting a handle on this old-vine field blend of two dozen varieties, which seems to do best in cooler years. It's a rustic-chic wine, with a brawny muscularity tamed by extreme dryness, and even though the alcohol is 15.6%, it doesn't feel too hot.
title: Bucklin 2005 Old Hill Ranch Zinfandel (Sonoma Valley)
description2: With the '05, Bucklin is getting a handle on this old-vine field blend of two dozen varieties, which seems to do best in cooler years. It's a rustic-chic wine, with a brawny muscularity tamed by extreme dryness, and even though the alcohol is 15.6%, it doesn't feel too hot. Zinfandel US California Sonoma Valley Bucklin

description: Soft and fruity, this Bordeaux blend has a splash of Syrah. It's dry and grippy in tannins, and there's a dried herb edge to the blackberry fruit. Finishes polished and elegant, but the softness suggests early drinking.
title: Corley 2004 Proprietary Red Wine Red (Oak Knoll District)
description2: Soft and fruity, this Bordeaux blend has a splash of Syrah. It's dry and grippy in tannins, and there's a dried herb edge to the blackberry fruit. Finishes polished and elegant, but the softness suggests early drinking. Cabernet Blend US California Oak Knoll District Corley
