description: An unexpected combination perhaps, but it works to give a fresh, flavorful wine, with soft tannins, juicy fruit and flavors of red cherries and vanilla. Not complex, and ready to drink now.
title: DFJ Vinhos 2004 Tinta Roriz and Merlot Red (Estremadura)
description2: An unexpected combination perhaps, but it works to give a fresh, flavorful wine, with soft tannins, juicy fruit and flavors of red cherries and vanilla. Not complex, and ready to drink now. Red Blend Portugal Estremadura  DFJ Vinhos

description: If all you're after is size, then sign on the dotted line. This blend is a monster that weighs in at 15.5%, so be ready for intensely sweet flavors of grape essence and licorice. To this judge, the wine has a lot of gumption but isn't what I'd want to drink glass after glass, day after day. It's lumbering, heavy but oh so sweet and dessert-like.
title: El Nido 2003 Clio Monastrell-Cabernet Sauvignon Red (Jumilla)
description2: If all you're after is size, then sign on the dotted line. This blend is a monster that weighs in at 15.5%, so be ready for intensely sweet flavors of grape essence and licorice. To this judge, the wine has a lot of gumption but isn't what I'd want to drink glass after glass, day after day. It's lumbering, heavy but oh so sweet and dessert-like. Red Blend Spain Levante Jumilla El Nido

description: The wines of Backsberg have a distinctive, artistic quality to them that makes them ideal for collectors and drinkers who seek wines with style. This Pinotage has those qualities, with its layers of cinnamon and deep berry on the nose and smooth, integrated berry and smoke flavors. This is a real Pinotage so expect the rubbery smoke that goes along with it—but it's also elegant, offering structure and complexity with a gentle touch.
title: Backsberg 2005 Pinotage (Coastal Region)
description2: The wines of Backsberg have a distinctive, artistic quality to them that makes them ideal for collectors and drinkers who seek wines with style. This Pinotage has those qualities, with its layers of cinnamon and deep berry on the nose and smooth, integrated berry and smoke flavors. This is a real Pinotage so expect the rubbery smoke that goes along with it—but it's also elegant, offering structure and complexity with a gentle touch. Pinotage South Africa Coastal Region  Backsberg

description: The grapes were grown on the Central Coast, mostly in Arroyo Grande, and the wine is characterized by vibrant acidity. There is an intense taste of raspberries, more usually found in a red variety like Grenache than a white wine, but Grenache Blanc consitutes nearly half the blend, along with Roussanne.
title: Bonny Doon 2005 Le Cigar Blanc White (California)
description2: The grapes were grown on the Central Coast, mostly in Arroyo Grande, and the wine is characterized by vibrant acidity. There is an intense taste of raspberries, more usually found in a red variety like Grenache than a white wine, but Grenache Blanc consitutes nearly half the blend, along with Roussanne. White Blend US California California Bonny Doon

description: This one takes on an orange tint, and the aromas are akin to chocolate, spice cake and even some baked beans. The palate is quite crisp and healthy, with berry fruit, citrus and length. A good wine with a racy, cleansing feel. It's not spectacular but it ranks highly among similar competitors.
title: Codorníu NV Brut Rosé Pinot Noir (Cava)
description2: This one takes on an orange tint, and the aromas are akin to chocolate, spice cake and even some baked beans. The palate is quite crisp and healthy, with berry fruit, citrus and length. A good wine with a racy, cleansing feel. It's not spectacular but it ranks highly among similar competitors. Pinot Noir Spain Catalonia Cava Codorníu

description: Thanks to its buoyant aromas of field flower, green apple, pear and dried sage leaf, you could definitely describe this as a multidimensional wine with noticeable elegance. There are musky, sweet fruit flavors on the finish.
title: Conte Collalto NV Extra Dry  (Prosecco di Conegliano e Valdobbiadene)
address: Prosecco di Conegliano e Valdobbiadene, Veneto, Italy
description2: Thanks to its buoyant aromas of field flower, green apple, pear and dried sage leaf, you could definitely describe this as a multidimensional wine with noticeable elegance. There are musky, sweet fruit flavors on the finish. Prosecco Italy Veneto Prosecco di Conegliano e Valdobbiadene Conte Collalto

description: Schug's regular Pinot, as opposed to their Heritage Reserve, is a dependably village-style expression of easy-drinking, cool-climate Pinot Noir. The '06, like previous vintages, shows a silky, delicate texture framing cherry, raspberry and cola flavors, with a smoky vanilla edge of oak.
title: Schug 2006 Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: Schug's regular Pinot, as opposed to their Heritage Reserve, is a dependably village-style expression of easy-drinking, cool-climate Pinot Noir. The '06, like previous vintages, shows a silky, delicate texture framing cherry, raspberry and cola flavors, with a smoky vanilla edge of oak. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast Schug

description: A first bottle was obviously off. A second was better, although still lacking the complexity you want at this price. It was a young Cab, dry and tannic, with a core of cassis and cherries. A few years in the cellar should soften it.
title: St. Clement 2004 Star Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon (Rutherford)
description2: A first bottle was obviously off. A second was better, although still lacking the complexity you want at this price. It was a young Cab, dry and tannic, with a core of cassis and cherries. A few years in the cellar should soften it. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Rutherford St. Clement

description: On a par with recent vintages, this four-year old Cab is soft and pleasant, with ripe cherry, blackberry, raspberry and herb flavors that are well oaked. The tannins are crunchy, but the wine isn't an ager. Best now through 2009.
title: Arbios 2003 Cabernet Sauvignon (Alexander Valley)
description2: On a par with recent vintages, this four-year old Cab is soft and pleasant, with ripe cherry, blackberry, raspberry and herb flavors that are well oaked. The tannins are crunchy, but the wine isn't an ager. Best now through 2009. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Alexander Valley Arbios

description: This is a dry Prosecco, meaning it is slightly sweeter than a brut or extra dry. Traditionally, Prosecco has this level of sugar, making it a very true rendition of what the wine is intended to taste like: Fresh peach, basil, pineapple, yellow apple and even an understated touch of banana come into play.
title: Adami NV Vigneto Giardino Dry  (Prosecco di Valdobbiadene)
description2: This is a dry Prosecco, meaning it is slightly sweeter than a brut or extra dry. Traditionally, Prosecco has this level of sugar, making it a very true rendition of what the wine is intended to taste like: Fresh peach, basil, pineapple, yellow apple and even an understated touch of banana come into play. Prosecco Italy Veneto Prosecco di Valdobbiadene Adami

description: The idea here is to present a more structured and sophisticated Brut with emphasis on the nutty tones and mature peach. The wine succeeds in this regard but the whole point of Prosecco is to be light and fun; this ultimately lacks those sharp, well-defined fruit tones you might expect.
title: Bortolomiol 2005 Brut Millesimato Motus Vitae  (Prosecco di Valdobbiadene)
description2: The idea here is to present a more structured and sophisticated Brut with emphasis on the nutty tones and mature peach. The wine succeeds in this regard but the whole point of Prosecco is to be light and fun; this ultimately lacks those sharp, well-defined fruit tones you might expect. Prosecco Italy Veneto Prosecco di Valdobbiadene Bortolomiol

description: Here is a lighter, paler shade of Prosecco with opulent and cheerful soapy and herbal qualities (thanks to 10% Pinot Bianco) backed by lemon candy and polished mineral. Yellow apple and chalk are immediately recognizable. The mouthfeel is creamy and foamy with fresh crispness that is noticeable but not exaggerated.
title: Bortolotti NV Brut  (Prosecco di Valdobbiadene)
description2: Here is a lighter, paler shade of Prosecco with opulent and cheerful soapy and herbal qualities (thanks to 10% Pinot Bianco) backed by lemon candy and polished mineral. Yellow apple and chalk are immediately recognizable. The mouthfeel is creamy and foamy with fresh crispness that is noticeable but not exaggerated. Prosecco Italy Veneto Prosecco di Valdobbiadene Bortolotti

description: There's a sweetmeat, salty leatheriness to this Pinot, like beef jerky. Give it a year or so to mellow out and let the smoky oak integrate with the ripe cherry, cola and raspberry flavors. Decant for an hour or two if you pop it open now.
title: Castle 2005 Sangiacomo Vineyards Pinot Noir (Carneros)
description2: There's a sweetmeat, salty leatheriness to this Pinot, like beef jerky. Give it a year or so to mellow out and let the smoky oak integrate with the ripe cherry, cola and raspberry flavors. Decant for an hour or two if you pop it open now. Pinot Noir US California Carneros Castle

description: Ginger ale and Sprite are the first things that come to mind when you give it a sniff. The palate shows ripe and sweet orange, tangerine and pink grapefruit, while the back end is lean and citrusy but far short of complex. Good in a standard way.
title: Codorníu NV Reserva Raventós Brut Sparkling (Cava)
description2: Ginger ale and Sprite are the first things that come to mind when you give it a sniff. The palate shows ripe and sweet orange, tangerine and pink grapefruit, while the back end is lean and citrusy but far short of complex. Good in a standard way. Sparkling Blend Spain Catalonia Cava Codorníu

description: A bit heavy handed, with lots of tannins and acidity, and the jammy cherry-berry fruit is in your face. It's made in a big, bold style that will appeal to fruit-forward fans.
title: Ortman Family 2008 Turner Vineyard Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
description2: A bit heavy handed, with lots of tannins and acidity, and the jammy cherry-berry fruit is in your face. It's made in a big, bold style that will appeal to fruit-forward fans. Pinot Noir US California Sta. Rita Hills Ortman Family

description: Year after year, the Yasmin line from Recanati proves itself to be a fantastic value, and the 2009s are no exception. This 60% Merlot-40% Cabernet Sauvignon blend is fruit-driven but appropriately spiced with a lovely mocha-infused finish. The silky texture offers approachable, dusty tannins integrated throughout the medium-weight mouth.
title: Recanati 2009 Yasmin Kosher Red Red (Galilee)
description2: Year after year, the Yasmin line from Recanati proves itself to be a fantastic value, and the 2009s are no exception. This 60% Merlot-40% Cabernet Sauvignon blend is fruit-driven but appropriately spiced with a lovely mocha-infused finish. The silky texture offers approachable, dusty tannins integrated throughout the medium-weight mouth. Bordeaux-style Red Blend Israel Galilee  Recanati

description: Lola is a 50-50 Cabernet Sauvignon/Syrah blend, smooth and supple, with a mix of purple berries, black cherry, cassis and smoke. The tannins finish a little green, and the Cab/Syrah combo seems to nullify the clear, varietal expression of either grape, but overall this is a well-crafted wine that could stand nicely alongside a hanger steak.
title: Two Vintners 2007 Lola Red Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Lola is a 50-50 Cabernet Sauvignon/Syrah blend, smooth and supple, with a mix of purple berries, black cherry, cassis and smoke. The tannins finish a little green, and the Cab/Syrah combo seems to nullify the clear, varietal expression of either grape, but overall this is a well-crafted wine that could stand nicely alongside a hanger steak. Red Blend US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Two Vintners

description: Teeters on the verge of complexity, with dry, spicy flavors of raspberries and cherries. Good Carneros acidity makes for a brisk mouthfeel. Should develop for a year or three in the bottle.
title: X 2009 Truchard Vineyard Pinot Noir (Carneros)
description2: Teeters on the verge of complexity, with dry, spicy flavors of raspberries and cherries. Good Carneros acidity makes for a brisk mouthfeel. Should develop for a year or three in the bottle. Pinot Noir US California Carneros X

description: Minerally, dry and clean white wine made from 60% Xarello and 40% Chardonnay. The nose is peachy, while the palate is spritzy and bouncy, with short, slightly creamy apple, melon and papaya flavors that are true to Xarello. Finishes smooth but a little flat.
title: Albet I Noya 2009 Petit Albet White (Penedès)
description2: Minerally, dry and clean white wine made from 60% Xarello and 40% Chardonnay. The nose is peachy, while the palate is spritzy and bouncy, with short, slightly creamy apple, melon and papaya flavors that are true to Xarello. Finishes smooth but a little flat. White Blend Spain Catalonia Penedès Albet I Noya

description: Avignonesi takes a traditionalists' approach to most of its wines, including this ruby-colored Rosso di Montepulciano. Slightly muddled aromas of cherry and dried raspberry mingle with tobacco, leather and spice.
title: Avignonesi 2008  Rosso di Montepulciano
description2: Avignonesi takes a traditionalists' approach to most of its wines, including this ruby-colored Rosso di Montepulciano. Slightly muddled aromas of cherry and dried raspberry mingle with tobacco, leather and spice. Prugnolo Gentile Italy Tuscany Rosso di Montepulciano Avignonesi

description: Here's a fresh and lively unoaked Chard that's perfect for lighter fare like tabouleh salad or grilled chicken. Green apple and citrus mingle with a hint of lemon custard on the nose, while the medium-weight mouth offers more green plum and white nectarine flavors. Flavorful and refreshing; drink now.
title: Binyamina 2009 Reserve Unoaked Kosher Chardonnay (Judean Hills)
description2: Here's a fresh and lively unoaked Chard that's perfect for lighter fare like tabouleh salad or grilled chicken. Green apple and citrus mingle with a hint of lemon custard on the nose, while the medium-weight mouth offers more green plum and white nectarine flavors. Flavorful and refreshing; drink now. Chardonnay Israel Judean Hills  Binyamina

description: A plump, nicely concentrated Sauvignon Blanc, the 2009 Mount Beautiful doesn't have the most intense aromatics, but is holding on to its weighty melon and fig flavors and lingering citrus finish. Drink up.
title: Mt. Beautiful 2009 Sauvignon Blanc (Canterbury)
description2: A plump, nicely concentrated Sauvignon Blanc, the 2009 Mount Beautiful doesn't have the most intense aromatics, but is holding on to its weighty melon and fig flavors and lingering citrus finish. Drink up. Sauvignon Blanc New Zealand Canterbury  Mt. Beautiful

description: At first taste, the tannins dominate. Then fresher fruit shows through. The wine is firmly dry, the texture linear, the fruit showing some black currant character.
title: Château Ramafort 2008  Médoc
description2: At first taste, the tannins dominate. Then fresher fruit shows through. The wine is firmly dry, the texture linear, the fruit showing some black currant character. Bordeaux-style Red Blend France Bordeaux Médoc Château Ramafort

description: Slightly more concentrated than other Marlborough Pinots in this price range, the 2008 Mana displays modest cherry fruit and an array of savory elements, including game, brine and peppery spice. It's a bit rough around the edges, yet in a charming sort of way. Drink now–2012.
title: Mana 2008 Pinot Noir (Marlborough)
description2: Slightly more concentrated than other Marlborough Pinots in this price range, the 2008 Mana displays modest cherry fruit and an array of savory elements, including game, brine and peppery spice. It's a bit rough around the edges, yet in a charming sort of way. Drink now–2012. Pinot Noir New Zealand Marlborough  Mana

description: Acidity marks this fresh, young Pinot Noir. It's as if the raspberry and cherry wine has been enlivened with a splash or three of lime juice. This primary fruit tartness may be because the wine was bottled and rushed to market too early. Don't drink it now. Give it a year or two to integrate.
title: Drew 2009 Morning Dew Vineyard Pinot Noir (Anderson Valley)
description2: Acidity marks this fresh, young Pinot Noir. It's as if the raspberry and cherry wine has been enlivened with a splash or three of lime juice. This primary fruit tartness may be because the wine was bottled and rushed to market too early. Don't drink it now. Give it a year or two to integrate. Pinot Noir US California Anderson Valley Drew

description: Made from an unknown blend of grapes, this nonvintage red is good, dry and versatile. It has juicy flavors of blackberries and pepper, with some extra layers of depth that make it a good value for a restaurant by-the-glass wine.
title: Greater Purpose NV White Label Red (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: Made from an unknown blend of grapes, this nonvintage red is good, dry and versatile. It has juicy flavors of blackberries and pepper, with some extra layers of depth that make it a good value for a restaurant by-the-glass wine. Red Blend US California Dry Creek Valley Greater Purpose

description: This is a classic interpretation of Chianti Classico with bright aromas of small berry fruit, raspberry and blue flower. But there's also a modern touch as well that comes off aromatically as spice and new leather.
title: Rocca delle Macìe 2007  Chianti Classico
description2: This is a classic interpretation of Chianti Classico with bright aromas of small berry fruit, raspberry and blue flower. But there's also a modern touch as well that comes off aromatically as spice and new leather. Sangiovese Italy Tuscany Chianti Classico Rocca delle Macìe

description: This wine is missing great depth of flavor. It has bright acidity and hints of peach fruit flavors, but remains dull.
title: Joseph Drouhin 2012  Pouilly-Fuissé
description2: This wine is missing great depth of flavor. It has bright acidity and hints of peach fruit flavors, but remains dull. Chardonnay France Burgundy Pouilly-Fuissé Joseph Drouhin

description: There's pineapple and sharp dill on the nose of this wine from a Gilroy-based producer. Once sipped, apple cider and a tinge of petrol flavors emerge.
title: Vino Vargas 2013 Olé Chardonnay (Central Coast)
description2: There's pineapple and sharp dill on the nose of this wine from a Gilroy-based producer. Once sipped, apple cider and a tinge of petrol flavors emerge. Chardonnay US California Central Coast Vino Vargas

description: This is a generous, rounded and very perfumed wine. Candy and bubble gum flavors give sweetness that contrasts with the acidity.
title: Demessey 2012 Château de Messey Les Crets  (Mâcon-Chardonnay)
description2: This is a generous, rounded and very perfumed wine. Candy and bubble gum flavors give sweetness that contrasts with the acidity. Chardonnay France Burgundy Mâcon-Chardonnay Demessey

description: Faithful to its label, this zero-degree residual-sugar Riesling is stark, steely and intensely dry. Bracing lemon acidity and tart green-apple flavors lend a tight, unyielding feel to the palate, but it's a refreshing accompaniment to creamy pasta or chicken dishes. Drink now.
title: Four Degrees of Riesling 2012 0 Degree Dry Riesling (Seneca Lake)
description2: Faithful to its label, this zero-degree residual-sugar Riesling is stark, steely and intensely dry. Bracing lemon acidity and tart green-apple flavors lend a tight, unyielding feel to the palate, but it's a refreshing accompaniment to creamy pasta or chicken dishes. Drink now. Riesling US New York Seneca Lake Four Degrees of Riesling

description: The wine is tight, green and herbal. It has some fruitiness, but that is suppressed by general underripeness. The tannins are hard at the end.
title: Joseph Drouhin 2011  Chorey-lès-Beaune
description2: The wine is tight, green and herbal. It has some fruitiness, but that is suppressed by general underripeness. The tannins are hard at the end. Pinot Noir France Burgundy Chorey-lès-Beaune Joseph Drouhin

description: Dusty mineral and earth tones lend a savory feel to delicate cherry and red-plum flavors in this pale pink rosé. Bright, fresh raspberry-lemonade acidity bristles on the palate.
title: Knapp 2013 Dry Rosé (Finger Lakes)
description2: Dusty mineral and earth tones lend a savory feel to delicate cherry and red-plum flavors in this pale pink rosé. Bright, fresh raspberry-lemonade acidity bristles on the palate. Rosé US New York Finger Lakes Knapp

description: Funky aromas of farmyard, tire rubber and fetid flowers waft from the glass of this Nero d'Avola. The muddled palate offers stewed prune, overripe black plum and oaky vanilla alongside bitter, green sensations of old sage. Panebianco, Vinity.
title: Armosa 2008 Curma Nero d'Avola (Sicilia)
description2: Funky aromas of farmyard, tire rubber and fetid flowers waft from the glass of this Nero d'Avola. The muddled palate offers stewed prune, overripe black plum and oaky vanilla alongside bitter, green sensations of old sage. Panebianco, Vinity. Nero d'Avola Italy Sicily & Sardinia Sicilia Armosa

description: Aromas of pressed apple and pear are savory and earthy on this brisk, medium-bodied Grüner Veltliner. There's a dusty minerality that lingers through the midpalate, but the finish is bright and lemony.
title: Fulkerson 2012 William Vigne Grüner Veltliner (Seneca Lake)
description2: Aromas of pressed apple and pear are savory and earthy on this brisk, medium-bodied Grüner Veltliner. There's a dusty minerality that lingers through the midpalate, but the finish is bright and lemony. Grüner Veltliner US New York Seneca Lake Fulkerson

description: Pleasant and fruity to sip, soft in texture, light- to medium bodied, it has a rich yellow-gold color, butter-candy aromas, ripe apple flavors and a slightly sweet finish.
title: Stomping Ground 2012 Chardonnay (California)
description2: Pleasant and fruity to sip, soft in texture, light- to medium bodied, it has a rich yellow-gold color, butter-candy aromas, ripe apple flavors and a slightly sweet finish. Chardonnay US California California Stomping Ground

description: This blend of 70% Grenache and 30% Syrah is a chunky, slightly rustic style of Côtes-du-Rhône. It starts off with tar and herb aromas, then turns plummy and chocolaty on the palate. Drink now–2017.
title: L. Tramier & Fils 2012 Linteau Red (Côtes du Rhône)
address: Côtes du Rhône, Rhône Valley, France
description2: This blend of 70% Grenache and 30% Syrah is a chunky, slightly rustic style of Côtes-du-Rhône. It starts off with tar and herb aromas, then turns plummy and chocolaty on the palate. Drink now–2017. Rhône-style Red Blend France Rhône Valley Côtes du Rhône L. Tramier & Fils

description: Peach and apple aromas are fruity but not precise or minerally. This has peachy acidity but a wide, unfocused palate. Flavors of peach and nectarine are tasty but lack the crispness that Albariño is known for.
title: Lo Nuevo 2012 Covello Albariño (Rías Baixas)
description2: Peach and apple aromas are fruity but not precise or minerally. This has peachy acidity but a wide, unfocused palate. Flavors of peach and nectarine are tasty but lack the crispness that Albariño is known for. Albariño Spain Galicia Rías Baixas Lo Nuevo

description: This tight wine has red fruit acidity without the richness. With its green edge, it's likely to remain full of acidity even as it matures.
title: Pierre André 2011  Ladoix
description2: This tight wine has red fruit acidity without the richness. With its green edge, it's likely to remain full of acidity even as it matures. Pinot Noir France Burgundy Ladoix Pierre André

description: Made of Kinali Yapincak, a grape native to Turkey, this deep-straw colored wine does not give up much on the nose beyond a touch of apricot and just-washed cotton sheets. It does not seem wholly integrated on the palate, with chewy tannins overpowering flavors of melon, toast and white flower.
title: Suvla 2012 Kinali Yapincak (Thrace)
description2: Made of Kinali Yapincak, a grape native to Turkey, this deep-straw colored wine does not give up much on the nose beyond a touch of apricot and just-washed cotton sheets. It does not seem wholly integrated on the palate, with chewy tannins overpowering flavors of melon, toast and white flower. Kinali Yapincak Turkey Thrace  Suvla

description: Pressed apple notes are touched with butter and creamed corn on this savory-style Chardonnay. It's rich and full on the palate with a satisfying silkiness that's brightened with lemony acidity.
title: Swedish Hill 2012 Reserve Chardonnay (Finger Lakes)
description2: Pressed apple notes are touched with butter and creamed corn on this savory-style Chardonnay. It's rich and full on the palate with a satisfying silkiness that's brightened with lemony acidity. Chardonnay US New York Finger Lakes Swedish Hill

description: A firm wine that is mainly tannin without a great fruit element. It is dry, tight and hard-edged.
title: Demessey 2011 Les Hâtes  (Santenay)
description2: A firm wine that is mainly tannin without a great fruit element. It is dry, tight and hard-edged. Pinot Noir France Burgundy Santenay Demessey

description: Tropical in character, this wine has soft acidity and an attractive texture. With ripe mango flavor, it's full in the mouth and ready to drink.
title: Jean-Marie Challand 2012 Vieilles Vignes  (Viré-Clessé)
description2: Tropical in character, this wine has soft acidity and an attractive texture. With ripe mango flavor, it's full in the mouth and ready to drink. Chardonnay France Burgundy Viré-Clessé Jean-Marie Challand

description: Complicated, at times confusingly dank aromas of mushrooms, hops, dill and other wet herbs emerge from this bottling. Those atypical varietal characters find their way onto the palate as well, with olive and stewed mushrooms leading the way.
title: Fazeli Cellars 2009 Khayyam Cabernet Sauvignon (Temecula Valley)
description2: Complicated, at times confusingly dank aromas of mushrooms, hops, dill and other wet herbs emerge from this bottling. Those atypical varietal characters find their way onto the palate as well, with olive and stewed mushrooms leading the way. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Temecula Valley Fazeli Cellars

description: Lush and tropical with rich, ripe streaks of pineapple and mango, this medium-sweet Riesling is unabashedly forward and fruity, but hints of earth and dust on the midpalate lend a dark tone. Light on its feet, with a lemony finish.
title: Four Degrees of Riesling 2012 2nd Degree Medium Sweet Riesling (Finger Lakes)
description2: Lush and tropical with rich, ripe streaks of pineapple and mango, this medium-sweet Riesling is unabashedly forward and fruity, but hints of earth and dust on the midpalate lend a dark tone. Light on its feet, with a lemony finish. Riesling US New York Finger Lakes Four Degrees of Riesling

description: Tight, acidic and very crisp, it's propelled forward by lemon zest and grapefruit flavors. It is bright, fruity and light in texture.
title: Pierre André 2012  Saint-Véran
description2: Tight, acidic and very crisp, it's propelled forward by lemon zest and grapefruit flavors. It is bright, fruity and light in texture. Chardonnay France Burgundy Saint-Véran Pierre André

description: This soft, open wine has a light fruit character with attractive acidity and a crisp aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Jean-Marie Challand 2012 Les Tilles  (Mâcon-Villages)
description2: This soft, open wine has a light fruit character with attractive acidity and a crisp aftertaste. Drink now. Chardonnay France Burgundy Mâcon-Villages Jean-Marie Challand

description: While pulpy and ripe on the nose with aromas of blackberry and cherry compote, this Cabernet Franc runs towards the savory side on the palate. Bold in body and alcohol, it's rich with red fruit, but has a musty, earthen tone that persists through the finish.
title: King's Garden Vineyards 2010 Cabernet Franc (Finger Lakes)
description2: While pulpy and ripe on the nose with aromas of blackberry and cherry compote, this Cabernet Franc runs towards the savory side on the palate. Bold in body and alcohol, it's rich with red fruit, but has a musty, earthen tone that persists through the finish. Cabernet Franc US New York Finger Lakes King's Garden Vineyards

description: Dusty in tannins and planky in wood, this chewy red blends Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Merlot and Malbec into a mouthful of black olive, black currant and leather.
title: Laird 2011 Jillian's Blend Red (Napa Valley)
description2: Dusty in tannins and planky in wood, this chewy red blends Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, Merlot and Malbec into a mouthful of black olive, black currant and leather. Red Blend US California Napa Valley Laird

description: Scents of fresh red cherries and bramble wood entice on the nose of this aromatic, spice-toned Cabernet Sauvignon. The palate, while crisp with cranberry acidity, is a bit subdued with subtle red-fruit flavor and a finish that wraps up short and tight.
title: McGregor 2010 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Finger Lakes)
description2: Scents of fresh red cherries and bramble wood entice on the nose of this aromatic, spice-toned Cabernet Sauvignon. The palate, while crisp with cranberry acidity, is a bit subdued with subtle red-fruit flavor and a finish that wraps up short and tight. Cabernet Sauvignon US New York Finger Lakes McGregor

description: Gritty, intense, oaky and powerful from start to finish, this displays black-fruit aromas, hints of asphalt and an intense mouthfeel with a tight grip. A common duo of black-fruit and oaky flavors finishes with vanilla notes and a hint of coconut. Drink this structured, fully tannic RDD through 2028.
title: Protos 2011 Reserva  (Ribera del Duero)
address: Ribera del Duero, Northern Spain, Spain
description2: Gritty, intense, oaky and powerful from start to finish, this displays black-fruit aromas, hints of asphalt and an intense mouthfeel with a tight grip. A common duo of black-fruit and oaky flavors finishes with vanilla notes and a hint of coconut. Drink this structured, fully tannic RDD through 2028. Tempranillo Spain Northern Spain Ribera del Duero Protos

description: Electric lemon-lime acidity reverberates throughout this light-bodied Riesling. The palate is fruity, pulsing with sweet, fresh peach, apricot and tangerine flavors. The finish lingers on a delicately lacy sweetness.
title: Schloss Vollrads 2015 Spätlese Riesling (Rheingau)
description2: Electric lemon-lime acidity reverberates throughout this light-bodied Riesling. The palate is fruity, pulsing with sweet, fresh peach, apricot and tangerine flavors. The finish lingers on a delicately lacy sweetness. Riesling Germany Rheingau  Schloss Vollrads

description: This hails from a 1,000–1,400-foot elevation site above the valley floor called Oakville Ranch that contributes beautiful power in its firm, integrated tannin and oak. Balanced, the wine exudes lovely notes of boysenberry tart, blackberry and cedar, with a dusting of clove.
title: Sojourn 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Oakville)
description2: This hails from a 1,000–1,400-foot elevation site above the valley floor called Oakville Ranch that contributes beautiful power in its firm, integrated tannin and oak. Balanced, the wine exudes lovely notes of boysenberry tart, blackberry and cedar, with a dusting of clove. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Oakville Sojourn

description: This is a rich, peppery and generously tannic and full-bodied expression of the grape, both powerful and brimming in grace. Soft and mellow on the midpalate, it builds up ripeness and texture toward the finish, ending with a satisfying bite of graham cracker and chocolate.
title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2013 Cask 23 Estate Cabernet Sauvignon (Napa Valley)
description2: This is a rich, peppery and generously tannic and full-bodied expression of the grape, both powerful and brimming in grace. Soft and mellow on the midpalate, it builds up ripeness and texture toward the finish, ending with a satisfying bite of graham cracker and chocolate. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Napa Valley Stag's Leap Wine Cellars

description: Lean, tight and austere, this textbook Eden Valley Riesling should develop well over the next 5–8 years, reaching maturity around 2022. Scents of petrichor and tangerine ease into tart lemon-lime notes on the palate, ending tart and mouthpuckering.
title: Thorn Clarke 2014 Eden Trail Riesling (Eden Valley)
description2: Lean, tight and austere, this textbook Eden Valley Riesling should develop well over the next 5–8 years, reaching maturity around 2022. Scents of petrichor and tangerine ease into tart lemon-lime notes on the palate, ending tart and mouthpuckering. Riesling Australia South Australia Eden Valley Thorn Clarke

description: This full-bodied wine has a big impact on the palate due to smoky, meaty flavors, very firm tannins and an overall huge personality. It starts with aromas of charcoal and charred oak, goes to ripe, rich but not sweet fruit flavors, and finishes with all that grip as well as lingering smoky nuances.
title: Aratás 2011 Shake Ridge Ranch Petite Sirah (Amador County)
description2: This full-bodied wine has a big impact on the palate due to smoky, meaty flavors, very firm tannins and an overall huge personality. It starts with aromas of charcoal and charred oak, goes to ripe, rich but not sweet fruit flavors, and finishes with all that grip as well as lingering smoky nuances. Petite Sirah US California Amador County Aratás

description: This wine has fine tannins, ripe berry fruits and well-integrated acidity. Rich and juicy, it offers blackberry flavors and a crisp aftertaste. Drink this wine, part of a range of wines from across Portugal, from 2018.
title: Santos & Seixo 2013 Santos da Casa Grande Reserva Red (Douro)
description2: This wine has fine tannins, ripe berry fruits and well-integrated acidity. Rich and juicy, it offers blackberry flavors and a crisp aftertaste. Drink this wine, part of a range of wines from across Portugal, from 2018. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Santos & Seixo

description: Subtle, well-balanced and rich in texture, this full-bodied wine sneaks up on the taste buds, starting with mild Bosc pear and toasted-almond aromas, then pouring richer pear, honey and hazelnut flavors onto the palate. A slight reserve in the flavors is more than offset by a quiet complexity and lingering finish.
title: Spicy Vines 2014 Joie de Vivre Chardonnay (Mendocino Ridge)
description2: Subtle, well-balanced and rich in texture, this full-bodied wine sneaks up on the taste buds, starting with mild Bosc pear and toasted-almond aromas, then pouring richer pear, honey and hazelnut flavors onto the palate. A slight reserve in the flavors is more than offset by a quiet complexity and lingering finish. Chardonnay US California Mendocino Ridge Spicy Vines

description: Super-concentrated and intense, this starts with a very deep color and aromas like espresso and smoked meat. Flavors suggest black cherry and cranberry shaded with spices. An earthy, savory thread runs through all the dark fruit and spices, lingering on the finish.
title: Terra d'Oro 2014 Teroldego (Amador County)
description2: Super-concentrated and intense, this starts with a very deep color and aromas like espresso and smoked meat. Flavors suggest black cherry and cranberry shaded with spices. An earthy, savory thread runs through all the dark fruit and spices, lingering on the finish. Teroldego US California Amador County Terra d'Oro

description: Planted in 1965, these are the oldest examples of this variety in the country. Jason Lett showcases this special fruit in this natural wine with no sulfites added and no cold stabilization. Light gold in color, the crisp apple flavors are forward, the balance is spot on and the finish polished. Drink now through 2020.
title: The Eyrie Vineyards 2015 Original Vines Pinot Gris (Dundee Hills)
description2: Planted in 1965, these are the oldest examples of this variety in the country. Jason Lett showcases this special fruit in this natural wine with no sulfites added and no cold stabilization. Light gold in color, the crisp apple flavors are forward, the balance is spot on and the finish polished. Drink now through 2020. Pinot Gris US Oregon Dundee Hills The Eyrie Vineyards

description: In this inaugural release, winemaker James MacPhail travels to the far reaches of Annapolis to source grapes from the true wilderness, the site next door to Goldrock Ridge Vineyard. Made in a full-bodied style, this wine is intriguing in dried herb, black pepper and forest floor, with a healthy, lengthy seasoning of savory black tea.
title: Tongue Dancer 2014 Putnam Vineyard Pinot de Ville Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: In this inaugural release, winemaker James MacPhail travels to the far reaches of Annapolis to source grapes from the true wilderness, the site next door to Goldrock Ridge Vineyard. Made in a full-bodied style, this wine is intriguing in dried herb, black pepper and forest floor, with a healthy, lengthy seasoning of savory black tea. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast Tongue Dancer

description: This bone-dry and floral wine will taste great with simple appetizers like toasted nuts or fresh cheeses. It is very well concentrated and has medium to full body. An opulent texture helps carry the floral, appley, grapefruity flavors into the finish.
title: Uvaggio 2015 Secco Moscato (Lodi)
description2: This bone-dry and floral wine will taste great with simple appetizers like toasted nuts or fresh cheeses. It is very well concentrated and has medium to full body. An opulent texture helps carry the floral, appley, grapefruity flavors into the finish. Moscato US California Lodi Uvaggio

description: A slightly bitter tobacco note frames black-cherry fruit. The tannins need more time to smooth out, and that bitter streak is a bit worrisome. But that said, this powerful deep compact wine may explode with flavor if you have the patience to cellar it. Drink after 2020.
title: WillaKenzie Estate 2014 Triple Black Slopes Pinot Noir
description2: A slightly bitter tobacco note frames black-cherry fruit. The tannins need more time to smooth out, and that bitter streak is a bit worrisome. But that said, this powerful deep compact wine may explode with flavor if you have the patience to cellar it. Drink after 2020. Pinot Noir US Oregon Willamette Valley WillaKenzie Estate

description: This thoroughly delightful wine puts a polished sheen on this grape, that is so often lost in the shuffle between Pinot Gris and Chardonnay. Here the clean and fresh flavors of grapefruit, white peach and melon mingle gracefully, with palate-pleasing texture and zippy acidity.
title: WillaKenzie Estate 2015 Estate Grown Pinot Blanc
description2: This thoroughly delightful wine puts a polished sheen on this grape, that is so often lost in the shuffle between Pinot Gris and Chardonnay. Here the clean and fresh flavors of grapefruit, white peach and melon mingle gracefully, with palate-pleasing texture and zippy acidity. Pinot Blanc US Oregon Willamette Valley WillaKenzie Estate

description: With a pronounced sensibility of caramelized apple and toasted brioche, this wine opens with a memorable lushness and richness that finds its balance in stony minerality. The highlights of flavor lean into golden pear compote and lemon zest, with a delicate seasoning of ginger.
title: William Harrison 2014 Sangiacomo Family Vineyards Chardonnay (Carneros)
description2: With a pronounced sensibility of caramelized apple and toasted brioche, this wine opens with a memorable lushness and richness that finds its balance in stony minerality. The highlights of flavor lean into golden pear compote and lemon zest, with a delicate seasoning of ginger. Chardonnay US California Carneros William Harrison

description: This is a beautifully perfumed wine, ripe with black fruits and generous with its tannins and acidity. It comes from a one-acre parcel called Le Vivier which has 70-year-old vines. It is concentrated, dense and with aging potential. Drink from 2018.
title: Yohan Lardy 2015 Le Vivier  (Fleurie)
description2: This is a beautifully perfumed wine, ripe with black fruits and generous with its tannins and acidity. It comes from a one-acre parcel called Le Vivier which has 70-year-old vines. It is concentrated, dense and with aging potential. Drink from 2018. Gamay France Beaujolais Fleurie Yohan Lardy

description: Coming from one of the state's most esteemed Syrah vineyards, this wine wins over fans by its brains rather than its brawn. High-toned aromas of dried herbs mix with notes of raspberry, blue fruit and iron. The flavors are fresh and layered, bringing a sense of vibrancy and deliciousness.
title: Avennia 2014 Arnaut Boushey Vineyard Syrah (Yakima Valley)
description2: Coming from one of the state's most esteemed Syrah vineyards, this wine wins over fans by its brains rather than its brawn. High-toned aromas of dried herbs mix with notes of raspberry, blue fruit and iron. The flavors are fresh and layered, bringing a sense of vibrancy and deliciousness. Syrah US Washington Yakima Valley Avennia

description: From century-old vines, this wine is potent and focused, with powerful, ripe fruit flavors and a texture that feels polished and precise. The aromas favor black cherry and black pepper, the flavors are fresh and mouth-filling, and the wine has firm acidity and tannins that make the texture appetizing.
title: Bella 2013 Big River Ranch Vineyard Series Zinfandel (Alexander Valley)
description2: From century-old vines, this wine is potent and focused, with powerful, ripe fruit flavors and a texture that feels polished and precise. The aromas favor black cherry and black pepper, the flavors are fresh and mouth-filling, and the wine has firm acidity and tannins that make the texture appetizing. Zinfandel US California Alexander Valley Bella

description: The winery's flagship wine, Cabernet Sauvignon makes up just over half, with the balance Merlot, Petit Verdot, Malbec and Cabernet Franc. Despite its age, it starts tight as a drum, with light aromas of spice, dark cherry, coffee and dried flowers. It's full flavored, with a dazzling richness to the textured fruit and barrel notes. Best after 2021.
title: Brian Carter Cellars 2012 Solesce Red (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: The winery's flagship wine, Cabernet Sauvignon makes up just over half, with the balance Merlot, Petit Verdot, Malbec and Cabernet Franc. Despite its age, it starts tight as a drum, with light aromas of spice, dark cherry, coffee and dried flowers. It's full flavored, with a dazzling richness to the textured fruit and barrel notes. Best after 2021. Bordeaux-style Red Blend US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Brian Carter Cellars

description: A blend from two vineyards, this wine is rich and full bodied, with fine tannins and a dark concentration. With its perfumed character and tight structure, it is impressive, full of black fruits with a strong mineral streak. Drink this still-young wine from 2019.
title: Bulas 2010 Grande Reserva Red (Douro)
description2: A blend from two vineyards, this wine is rich and full bodied, with fine tannins and a dark concentration. With its perfumed character and tight structure, it is impressive, full of black fruits with a strong mineral streak. Drink this still-young wine from 2019. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Bulas

description: Though labeled as a Syrah, this drinks more like a GSM, with 11% Mourvèdre, 5% Grenache and 2% Viognier contributing prominently to the blend. Aromas of cocoa, orange peel, coffee grounds, raspberry and dark fruit are followed by full-bodied fruit and barrel flavors.
title: Cadaretta 2013 Syrah (Columbia Valley (WA))
description2: Though labeled as a Syrah, this drinks more like a GSM, with 11% Mourvèdre, 5% Grenache and 2% Viognier contributing prominently to the blend. Aromas of cocoa, orange peel, coffee grounds, raspberry and dark fruit are followed by full-bodied fruit and barrel flavors. Syrah US Washington Columbia Valley (WA) Cadaretta

description: A pretty light gold hue, this wine shines brightly from the first sniff to the last sip. It's clean and dense, with notes of bee pollen and lemon oil, flavors of apple and pear, and a touch of vanilla cookie.
title: Raptor Ridge 2015 Pinot Gris (Willamette Valley)
description2: A pretty light gold hue, this wine shines brightly from the first sniff to the last sip. It's clean and dense, with notes of bee pollen and lemon oil, flavors of apple and pear, and a touch of vanilla cookie. Pinot Gris US Oregon Willamette Valley Raptor Ridge

description: Dusty minerals, pollen and spice notes lend complexity to this honey-toned auslese. The palate is decadently sweet, glazed in caramelized sugar and heaving with ripe cantaloupe and peach flavors. A bite of lemon-lime acidity offsets all the opulence, lending edge to a long, lingering finish.
title: Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler 2015 Bernkasteler Badstube Auslese Riesling (Mosel)
description2: Dusty minerals, pollen and spice notes lend complexity to this honey-toned auslese. The palate is decadently sweet, glazed in caramelized sugar and heaving with ripe cantaloupe and peach flavors. A bite of lemon-lime acidity offsets all the opulence, lending edge to a long, lingering finish. Riesling Germany Mosel  Dr. Heidemanns-Bergweiler

description: Layers of exotic spice and crushed earth permeate through this dry Riesling paying just homage to it's red-clay origins in Ürziger Würzgarten, the spice garden of the Mosel. It's exquisitely light bodied, a revitalizing crush of cutting white grapefruit and lime flavors. The finish is marked by a meandering spray of spice and honey. Drinks well now but should improve through at least 2030.
designation: Ürziger Würzgarten GG Réserve Alte Reben Erste Lage Dry
title: Dr. Loosen 2012 Ürziger Würzgarten GG Réserve Alte Reben Erste Lage Dry Riesling (Mosel)
description2: Layers of exotic spice and crushed earth permeate through this dry Riesling paying just homage to it's red-clay origins in Ürziger Würzgarten, the spice garden of the Mosel. It's exquisitely light bodied, a revitalizing crush of cutting white grapefruit and lime flavors. The finish is marked by a meandering spray of spice and honey. Drinks well now but should improve through at least 2030. Riesling Germany Mosel  Dr. Loosen

description: Big and bold in character, this full-bodied and abundantly tannic wine looks black to the rim and smells like pencil shavings, leather and wood smoke. The flavors are dry but enticing, with dark chocolate, charred beef and black cherry. It needs until at least 2022 to peak.
title: Meyer Family Cellars 2012 Petite Sirah (Yorkville Highlands)
description2: Big and bold in character, this full-bodied and abundantly tannic wine looks black to the rim and smells like pencil shavings, leather and wood smoke. The flavors are dry but enticing, with dark chocolate, charred beef and black cherry. It needs until at least 2022 to peak. Petite Sirah US California Yorkville Highlands Meyer Family Cellars

description: From a different block of the same vineyard as the “Whale label” Memorista, this is drinking much better at the moment. It's smooth and supple—a pretty wine with honeyed minerality around fruit flavors of citrus and peaches.
title: Ovum 2015 Memorista Tradition Riesling (Eola-Amity Hills)
description2: From a different block of the same vineyard as the “Whale label” Memorista, this is drinking much better at the moment. It's smooth and supple—a pretty wine with honeyed minerality around fruit flavors of citrus and peaches. Riesling US Oregon Eola-Amity Hills Ovum

description: The aromas jump up, with mesmerizing notes of fresh herbs, green olive, violets, orange peel, smoked meat and huckleberry. The palate shows a light but pillowy texture alongside flavors that carry on the finish. It's all about subtlety.
title: Proper 2014 Estate Syrah (Walla Walla Valley (WA))
description2: The aromas jump up, with mesmerizing notes of fresh herbs, green olive, violets, orange peel, smoked meat and huckleberry. The palate shows a light but pillowy texture alongside flavors that carry on the finish. It's all about subtlety. Syrah US Washington Walla Walla Valley (WA) Proper

description: Produced in the Douro Superior region in the far east of the Douro Valley, this wine is dense with tarry tannins and black fruits. Wood aging and the concentration of old vines make it impressive. Drink now until 2022.
title: Quinta da Zaralhôa 2008 Reserva Red (Douro)
description2: Produced in the Douro Superior region in the far east of the Douro Valley, this wine is dense with tarry tannins and black fruits. Wood aging and the concentration of old vines make it impressive. Drink now until 2022. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Quinta da Zaralhôa

description: The Reserve version of this brand, this young wine is ripe and firm, with great potential. The Duas Quintas (two estates) are Ervamoira and Bons Ares, both in the Douro Superior. With attractive smoky flavors and ripe red-berry fruits it will become a rich wine. Drink from 2020.
title: Ramos-Pinto 2014 Duas Quintas Reserva Red (Douro)
description2: The Reserve version of this brand, this young wine is ripe and firm, with great potential. The Duas Quintas (two estates) are Ervamoira and Bons Ares, both in the Douro Superior. With attractive smoky flavors and ripe red-berry fruits it will become a rich wine. Drink from 2020. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Ramos-Pinto

description: Lemon pith and ripe peach aromas are clouded under a distinctly medicinal tone of baby aspirin. While there is nice roundness to the palate and balanced acidity to boot, the flavors are mild showings of orchard fruit and lemon curd.
title: Wyncroft 2013 Wren Song Riesling (Lake Michigan Shore)
description2: Lemon pith and ripe peach aromas are clouded under a distinctly medicinal tone of baby aspirin. While there is nice roundness to the palate and balanced acidity to boot, the flavors are mild showings of orchard fruit and lemon curd. Riesling US Michigan Lake Michigan Shore Wyncroft

description: Lightly floral aromas are dilute while hinting at quince jelly. There's not a lot of vitality to the palate, while tangerine and nectarine flavors are watery. Pithy citrus notes carry the finish before it putters out.
title: Vicente Gandia 2014 Hoya de Cadenas Organic Verdejo (Spain)
description2: Lightly floral aromas are dilute while hinting at quince jelly. There's not a lot of vitality to the palate, while tangerine and nectarine flavors are watery. Pithy citrus notes carry the finish before it putters out. Verdejo Spain Spain Other Spain Vicente Gandia

description: Bland aromas suggest applesauce. This varietal Xarello feels plump but flat. Candied, generic white-fruit flavors are nonspecific, while this offers up citrus notes and pyrazines on the finish.
title: Albet I Noya 2014 XA Xarel-lo (Penedès)
description2: Bland aromas suggest applesauce. This varietal Xarello feels plump but flat. Candied, generic white-fruit flavors are nonspecific, while this offers up citrus notes and pyrazines on the finish. Xarel-lo Spain Catalonia Penedès Albet I Noya

description: From the producer's Old Vineyard Block, and blended with 20% Petite Sirah and 5% Syrah, this wine has a rustic barnyardy quality. It offers a tightness of dried herb around broad, sweet tannins, strawberry jam and chocolate.
title: Gustafson Family 2012 Mountain Cuvée Estate Zinfandel (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: From the producer's Old Vineyard Block, and blended with 20% Petite Sirah and 5% Syrah, this wine has a rustic barnyardy quality. It offers a tightness of dried herb around broad, sweet tannins, strawberry jam and chocolate. Zinfandel US California Dry Creek Valley Gustafson Family

description: Meant to provide value, this wine also offers big oak, smoke and a bittersweet taste of black-tea tannins. Shy in fruit, this has a slightly reduced effect on the finish.
title: JAQK Cellars 2013 High Roller Pinot Noir (Sonoma Coast)
description2: Meant to provide value, this wine also offers big oak, smoke and a bittersweet taste of black-tea tannins. Shy in fruit, this has a slightly reduced effect on the finish. Pinot Noir US California Sonoma Coast JAQK Cellars

description: Apple skin and guava rise out from a more buttery aroma that leads to oak on the palate. Light bodied, the wine finishes tart in lemon and lime.
title: Gracianna 2014 Suzanne's Blend Chardonnay (Russian River Valley)
description2: Apple skin and guava rise out from a more buttery aroma that leads to oak on the palate. Light bodied, the wine finishes tart in lemon and lime. Chardonnay US California Russian River Valley Gracianna

description: Leafy, green aromas suggest eucalyptus and a briar patch. A lean palate offers aroma-matching flavors of green herbs along with plum, cherry and clay notes. This is oaky and resiny tasting on the finish, and hot as well.
title: Angulo Innocenti 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (La Consulta)
description2: Leafy, green aromas suggest eucalyptus and a briar patch. A lean palate offers aroma-matching flavors of green herbs along with plum, cherry and clay notes. This is oaky and resiny tasting on the finish, and hot as well. Cabernet Sauvignon Argentina Mendoza Province La Consulta Angulo Innocenti

description: This is on the light side, with simple flavors and a juicy, soft texture that shows very little tannin. Aromas and flavors recall cherries and strawberries.
title: Cable Car 2013 Cabernet Sauvignon (Lodi)
description2: This is on the light side, with simple flavors and a juicy, soft texture that shows very little tannin. Aromas and flavors recall cherries and strawberries. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Lodi Cable Car

description: Pruney and somewhat reduced, this thick offering of chocolate and blackberry jam needs food to mellow it out, preferably meat covered thickly in sauce.
title: Michael-Scott 2013 Zinfandel (Napa County-Sonoma County)
description2: Pruney and somewhat reduced, this thick offering of chocolate and blackberry jam needs food to mellow it out, preferably meat covered thickly in sauce. Zinfandel US California Napa County-Sonoma County Michael-Scott

description: Wiry, briary currant and herbal aromas announce a hard but juicy wine with buttery oak, salty red fruit flavors and a loud herbal angle. This is both briny tasting and a touch weedy on the finish.
title: Luis Segundo Correas 2013 Valle Las Acequias Cabernet Sauvignon (Mendoza)
description2: Wiry, briary currant and herbal aromas announce a hard but juicy wine with buttery oak, salty red fruit flavors and a loud herbal angle. This is both briny tasting and a touch weedy on the finish. Cabernet Sauvignon Argentina Mendoza Province Mendoza Luis Segundo Correas

description: This is a rich, full wine that has red fruits and soft tannins. With balanced acidity, only a hint of tannins, it is ready to drink.
title: Parras Vinhos 2014 Montaria Tinto Red (Alentejano)
description2: This is a rich, full wine that has red fruits and soft tannins. With balanced acidity, only a hint of tannins, it is ready to drink. Portuguese Red Portugal Alentejano  Parras Vinhos

description: This is a gentle, ripe wine that has pineapple and peach flavors and fresh fruitiness. It is smooth with balanced acidity and a zesty aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2014 Quartilho Branco White (Tejo)
description2: This is a gentle, ripe wine that has pineapple and peach flavors and fresh fruitiness. It is smooth with balanced acidity and a zesty aftertaste. Drink now. Portuguese White Portugal Tejo  Quinta do Casal Branco

description: A young, fresh blend of Arinto and Fernão Pires, the wine is fruity, light and with a crisp, bright aftertaste. Drink now.
title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2015 White (Tejo)
description2: A young, fresh blend of Arinto and Fernão Pires, the wine is fruity, light and with a crisp, bright aftertaste. Drink now. Portuguese White Portugal Tejo  Quinta do Casal Monteiro

description: Somewhat disjointed flavors mix subtle red fruits with cracker, licorice and coffee. So far the components have not smoothed out. It's a flavor jumble.
title: Schmidt 2012 Pinot Noir (Applegate Valley)
description2: Somewhat disjointed flavors mix subtle red fruits with cracker, licorice and coffee. So far the components have not smoothed out. It's a flavor jumble. Pinot Noir US Oregon Applegate Valley Schmidt

description: Faint notes of yuzu rise over underripe peach in this unoaked Chardonnay. The light-bodied palate shows a mild concentration of lemon leading to a short but clean finish.
title: Three Fires 2013 Unoaked Chardonnay (Lake Michigan Shore)
description2: Faint notes of yuzu rise over underripe peach in this unoaked Chardonnay. The light-bodied palate shows a mild concentration of lemon leading to a short but clean finish. Chardonnay US Michigan Lake Michigan Shore Three Fires

description: Muddled aromas of tangerine, grapefruit and papaya seem a bit soapy in character. The palate feels a bit underripe, showing milky florals upfront and unconcentrated citrus on the back.
title: Verterra 2014 Dry Gewurztraminer (Leelanau Peninsula)
description2: Muddled aromas of tangerine, grapefruit and papaya seem a bit soapy in character. The palate feels a bit underripe, showing milky florals upfront and unconcentrated citrus on the back. Gewürztraminer US Michigan Leelanau Peninsula Verterra

description: The wine is fresh with red berry flavors and a stalky tannic core. It's lightly perfumed, light in texture and ready to drink.
title: Wine with Spirit 2013 Bastardo! Black Edition Tinto Red (Tejo)
description2: The wine is fresh with red berry flavors and a stalky tannic core. It's lightly perfumed, light in texture and ready to drink. Portuguese Red Portugal Tejo  Wine with Spirit

description: There is an attractive, light prickle on the tongue of this fresh, crisp and fruity wine. It is dry, tensely tangy with a green, zesty character. Drink now.
title: Wine with Spirit 2014 Seafood & Co White (Vinho Verde)
description2: There is an attractive, light prickle on the tongue of this fresh, crisp and fruity wine. It is dry, tensely tangy with a green, zesty character. Drink now. Portuguese White Portugal Vinho Verde  Wine with Spirit

description: Oily aromas of orange peel are inoffensive. A shearing palate offers little textural pleasure or complexity. Flavors of lemon and blood orange finish with a sour note of underripe pineapple.
region_1: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla
title: Finca Salazar 2014 Sauvignon Blanc (Vino de la Tierra de Castilla)
address: Vino de la Tierra de Castilla, Central Spain, Spain
description2: Oily aromas of orange peel are inoffensive. A shearing palate offers little textural pleasure or complexity. Flavors of lemon and blood orange finish with a sour note of underripe pineapple. Sauvignon Blanc Spain Central Spain Vino de la Tierra de Castilla Finca Salazar

description: This somewhat indistinctive wine has a wealth of minty aroma on the nose, a characteristic that doesn't shake off on the palate, the body full and a touch hot.
title: Buena Vista 2013 Private Reserve Zinfandel (Sonoma County)
description2: This somewhat indistinctive wine has a wealth of minty aroma on the nose, a characteristic that doesn't shake off on the palate, the body full and a touch hot. Zinfandel US California Sonoma County Buena Vista

description: Yeasty aromas are devoid of fruit, commitment and minerality, and instead smell oddly floral and unconvincing. A waxy, wan palate and oaky flavors of clove finish with resiny, pushy spice notes. This tastes overly oaky and resiny, like the winery's Rioja white called La Capellanía but without the goods.
title: Pazo de Barrantes 2012 La Comtesse Albariño (Rías Baixas)
description2: Yeasty aromas are devoid of fruit, commitment and minerality, and instead smell oddly floral and unconvincing. A waxy, wan palate and oaky flavors of clove finish with resiny, pushy spice notes. This tastes overly oaky and resiny, like the winery's Rioja white called La Capellanía but without the goods. Albariño Spain Galicia Rías Baixas Pazo de Barrantes

description: The wine is fruity, although with a yeasty character that leaves a bready taste. It has acidity, ripe yellow fruits and the fruitiness may come to dominate although that is not certain.
title: Cooperativa Reguengos de Monsaraz 2014 Monsaraz Branco White (Alentejo)
description2: The wine is fruity, although with a yeasty character that leaves a bready taste. It has acidity, ripe yellow fruits and the fruitiness may come to dominate although that is not certain. Portuguese White Portugal Alentejo  Cooperativa Reguengos de Monsaraz

description: There's something mushroomy and feral about this wine, which finishes with sour cherry.
title: Armanino Family Cellars 2013 The Pintail Pinot Noir (Napa Valley)
description2: There's something mushroomy and feral about this wine, which finishes with sour cherry. Pinot Noir US California Napa Valley Armanino Family Cellars

description: A blend of Moscatel and Arinto, this is light and thin with only the vaguest hint of citrus fruit acidity. It should be drunk now.
title: Parras Vinhos 2014 Castelo do Sulco Colheita White (Lisboa)
description2: A blend of Moscatel and Arinto, this is light and thin with only the vaguest hint of citrus fruit acidity. It should be drunk now. Portuguese White Portugal Lisboa  Parras Vinhos

description: The nose isn't very expressive but you can detect whiffs of adhesive bandage, medicinal herb, apple skin and mineral that carry over to the diluted, rather bitter palate. Brisk acidity underscores the wine's lean character.
title: Lechthaler 2014 Drago Pinot Grigio (Trentino)
description2: The nose isn't very expressive but you can detect whiffs of adhesive bandage, medicinal herb, apple skin and mineral that carry over to the diluted, rather bitter palate. Brisk acidity underscores the wine's lean character. Pinot Grigio Italy Northeastern Italy Trentino Lechthaler

description: While very flavorful, this wine is more of a dessert drink than a lunch or dinner wine. It smells sweet and earthy, feels unctous and tastes sweet, especially on the finish.
title: Coast 2013 Chardonnay (California)
description2: While very flavorful, this wine is more of a dessert drink than a lunch or dinner wine. It smells sweet and earthy, feels unctous and tastes sweet, especially on the finish. Chardonnay US California California Coast

description: Candied raspberry aromas and a racy, acidic, crisp feel tell you what's coming: pie-cherry tartness and then a sizzle-and-pop finish that's fresh but astringent.
title: Pagos del Rey 2014 Altos de Tamaron  (Ribera del Duero)
address: Ribera del Duero, Northern Spain, Spain
description2: Candied raspberry aromas and a racy, acidic, crisp feel tell you what's coming: pie-cherry tartness and then a sizzle-and-pop finish that's fresh but astringent. Tempranillo Spain Northern Spain Ribera del Duero Pagos del Rey

description: Balsamic aromas and strong pruney flavors combine for a heavy-handed taste in this full-bodied wine. It seems to be well-aged already, so drink it soon if you like this style.
title: Pat Paulsen Vineyards 2013 England-Shaw Vienyard Syrah (Solano County)
description2: Balsamic aromas and strong pruney flavors combine for a heavy-handed taste in this full-bodied wine. It seems to be well-aged already, so drink it soon if you like this style. Syrah US California Solano County Pat Paulsen Vineyards

description: Earthy and stemmy in dark black fruit, this wine contains 2% Syrah from Dunnigan Hills, though it's unclear how that contributes. Thin on the palate, it has a medicinal, minty flourish on the finish.
title: Mossback 2013 Pinot Noir (Russian River Valley)
description2: Earthy and stemmy in dark black fruit, this wine contains 2% Syrah from Dunnigan Hills, though it's unclear how that contributes. Thin on the palate, it has a medicinal, minty flourish on the finish. Pinot Noir US California Russian River Valley Mossback

description: Aromas of blueberries, beef roast and fudge give way to a light, straightforward palate of purple fruit. It's a clean wine, but not very complex.
title: Peachy Canyon 2012 Especial Zinfandel (Paso Robles)
description2: Aromas of blueberries, beef roast and fudge give way to a light, straightforward palate of purple fruit. It's a clean wine, but not very complex. Zinfandel US California Paso Robles Peachy Canyon

description: Rustic aromas are followed by rough-edged fruitiness in this young wine. It has ripe berry fruits as well as some firm tannins in the background. It is not yet integrated and needs to develop much more. Drink from 2018.
title: Quinta de Porrais 2012 Porrais Red (Douro)
description2: Rustic aromas are followed by rough-edged fruitiness in this young wine. It has ripe berry fruits as well as some firm tannins in the background. It is not yet integrated and needs to develop much more. Drink from 2018. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Quinta de Porrais

description: Chunky, slightly jammy plum and blackberry aromas are good but basic. In the mouth, this shows tartaric grit and bite along with lean fruit. Flavors of red plum and raspberry finish zesty but with hardly any complexity.
title: Tricky Rabbit 2012 Reserva Cabernet Franc-Carmenère (Maule Valley)
description2: Chunky, slightly jammy plum and blackberry aromas are good but basic. In the mouth, this shows tartaric grit and bite along with lean fruit. Flavors of red plum and raspberry finish zesty but with hardly any complexity. Cabernet Franc-Carmenère Chile Maule Valley  Tricky Rabbit

description: This wine also contains 25% Zinfandel and is wildly savage in herb, baked plum jam, tobacco and a strong arm of oak. Midpalate, it takes on more savory peppercorn and herb over fruit, finishing mildly.
title: Bradford Mountain 2012 Grist Vineyard Syrah (Dry Creek Valley)
description2: This wine also contains 25% Zinfandel and is wildly savage in herb, baked plum jam, tobacco and a strong arm of oak. Midpalate, it takes on more savory peppercorn and herb over fruit, finishing mildly. Syrah US California Dry Creek Valley Bradford Mountain

description: There's a slightly reductive quality on the nose of this wine, with rubber, tar, dill and hot lava rock notes. The palate shows roast beef char, sour cherry fruits and asphalt.
title: Consilience 2012 Petite Sirah (Santa Barbara County)
description2: There's a slightly reductive quality on the nose of this wine, with rubber, tar, dill and hot lava rock notes. The palate shows roast beef char, sour cherry fruits and asphalt. Petite Sirah US California Santa Barbara County Consilience

description: In this blend of Shiraz and Trincadeira, both grapes contribute red fruits, soft tannins and fresh-faced acidity. With no complications—just bright, juicy fruit—the wine is ready to drink.
title: Falua 2013 Tagus Creek Tinto Red (Alentejano)
description2: In this blend of Shiraz and Trincadeira, both grapes contribute red fruits, soft tannins and fresh-faced acidity. With no complications—just bright, juicy fruit—the wine is ready to drink. Portuguese Red Portugal Alentejano  Falua

description: Both mineral and herbaceous, this is a crisp, taut and textured wine. It shows a tangy character, lemon zest and bright acidity. It's still too young, so drink from the end of 2015.
title: Quinta da Rede 2013 Rede Branco White (Douro)
description2: Both mineral and herbaceous, this is a crisp, taut and textured wine. It shows a tangy character, lemon zest and bright acidity. It's still too young, so drink from the end of 2015. Portuguese White Portugal Douro  Quinta da Rede

description: Similar to the winery's regular Pinot Noir, this is moving quickly along the aging curve. Hints of strawberry fruit are cloaked in barrel flavors of mocha and cracker. Drink soon.
title: Reustle 2013 Winemaker's Reserve Pinot Noir (Umpqua Valley)
description2: Similar to the winery's regular Pinot Noir, this is moving quickly along the aging curve. Hints of strawberry fruit are cloaked in barrel flavors of mocha and cracker. Drink soon. Pinot Noir US Oregon Umpqua Valley Reustle

description: Red plum compote is at the center of this wine, a 100% varietal, with hearty bursts of herb and green pepper, as well as savory spice. From the cooler Coombsville appellation, it is soft, round and on the paler, thinner side of Napa's ripeness spectrum, more restrained.
title: Silverado 2011 Estate Grown Mt. George Vineyard Merlot (Napa Valley)
description2: Red plum compote is at the center of this wine, a 100% varietal, with hearty bursts of herb and green pepper, as well as savory spice. From the cooler Coombsville appellation, it is soft, round and on the paler, thinner side of Napa's ripeness spectrum, more restrained. Merlot US California Napa Valley Silverado

description: The inaugural vintage of this wine, named for a water goddess, this offers herb, grass, lemon and peach around a medium body influenced by some oak. As it develops in the glass, tropical fruit unfurls in a refreshing spritz before settling down to a tart finish.
title: Stag's Leap Wine Cellars 2013 Aveta Sauvignon Blanc (Napa Valley)
description2: The inaugural vintage of this wine, named for a water goddess, this offers herb, grass, lemon and peach around a medium body influenced by some oak. As it develops in the glass, tropical fruit unfurls in a refreshing spritz before settling down to a tart finish. Sauvignon Blanc US California Napa Valley Stag's Leap Wine Cellars

description: The wine is still young with its crisp red fruits and tense tannins. It is a structured wine, firm with a dry core and still developing its fruitiness. It will need to age a while yet, so drink from 2018.
title: Yohan Lardy 2015 Les Michelons  (Moulin-à-Vent)
description2: The wine is still young with its crisp red fruits and tense tannins. It is a structured wine, firm with a dry core and still developing its fruitiness. It will need to age a while yet, so drink from 2018. Gamay France Beaujolais Moulin-à-Vent Yohan Lardy

description: The aromas are light, with notes of freshly cut apple and spice. It drinks dry with elegantly styled fruit flavors that linger on the finish. It shows a very pretty styling.
title: Analemma 2014 Atavus Vineyard Gewürztraminer (Columbia Gorge (WA))
description2: The aromas are light, with notes of freshly cut apple and spice. It drinks dry with elegantly styled fruit flavors that linger on the finish. It shows a very pretty styling. Gewürztraminer US Washington Columbia Gorge (WA) Analemma

description: Light strawberry fruit with tart acidity carries a wine of modest proportions. It's drinking well, and might be a good choice for a simple salmon preparation, as it would not overwhelm the fish. The finishing tannins have a definite herbal flavor.
title: Argyle 2014 Nuthouse Pinot Noir (Eola-Amity Hills)
description2: Light strawberry fruit with tart acidity carries a wine of modest proportions. It's drinking well, and might be a good choice for a simple salmon preparation, as it would not overwhelm the fish. The finishing tannins have a definite herbal flavor. Pinot Noir US Oregon Eola-Amity Hills Argyle

description: Jammy plum and berry aromas come with dessert herb scents. A juicy palate doesn't offer much structure, but this Monastrell-Syrah blend tastes good courtesy of plum, blackberry and toasty flavors. The ripe warm finish is generous.
title: Chopo 2014 Monastrell-Syrah (Jumilla)
description2: Jammy plum and berry aromas come with dessert herb scents. A juicy palate doesn't offer much structure, but this Monastrell-Syrah blend tastes good courtesy of plum, blackberry and toasty flavors. The ripe warm finish is generous. Monastrell-Syrah Spain Levante Jumilla Chopo

description: Smooth and polished, this medium-bodied wine has attractive fruit and cinnamon aromas, generous dark-fruit flavors, and light touches of baking spices.
title: Meyer Family Cellars 2013 Syrah (Yorkville Highlands)
description2: Smooth and polished, this medium-bodied wine has attractive fruit and cinnamon aromas, generous dark-fruit flavors, and light touches of baking spices. Syrah US California Yorkville Highlands Meyer Family Cellars

description: Aromas of vanilla and cocoa mix with red fruit. The fruit flavors are full and palate coating but the oak seems a little too intense at times.
title: Milbrandt 2012 Vineyard Series Clifton Vineyards Grenache (Wahluke Slope)
description2: Aromas of vanilla and cocoa mix with red fruit. The fruit flavors are full and palate coating but the oak seems a little too intense at times. Grenache US Washington Wahluke Slope Milbrandt

description: Hibiscus and strawberry scents make an appealing invitation on the nose of this bottling, and then light cola and pepper spice up the ante. This would be a great red for warmer weather, served with a slight chill that would still allow the flavors of sandalwood, red cherry and marjoram to emerge.
title: MooBuzz 2015 G-S-M (Central Coast)
description2: Hibiscus and strawberry scents make an appealing invitation on the nose of this bottling, and then light cola and pepper spice up the ante. This would be a great red for warmer weather, served with a slight chill that would still allow the flavors of sandalwood, red cherry and marjoram to emerge. G-S-M US California Central Coast MooBuzz

description: Though a reserve bottling, this shows a very fresh and sprightly side of the grape rather than its dense face. Squeezed blackberries, just-picked thyme and a touch of burnt caramel show on the nose, while the palate offers Concord grape, boysenberry and iced-coffee flavors.
title: Opolo 2012 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (Paso Robles)
description2: Though a reserve bottling, this shows a very fresh and sprightly side of the grape rather than its dense face. Squeezed blackberries, just-picked thyme and a touch of burnt caramel show on the nose, while the palate offers Concord grape, boysenberry and iced-coffee flavors. Cabernet Sauvignon US California Paso Robles Opolo

description: Candied black cherry and fresh boysenberry aromas meet with darker touches of soy, teriyaki and burnt caramel on the nose of this bottling. The palate is mineral-driven, with light tar, asphalt and peppercorn flavors leading into dusty elderberry fruit.
title: Proulx 2014 The Wah Syrah (Paso Robles)
description2: Candied black cherry and fresh boysenberry aromas meet with darker touches of soy, teriyaki and burnt caramel on the nose of this bottling. The palate is mineral-driven, with light tar, asphalt and peppercorn flavors leading into dusty elderberry fruit. Syrah US California Paso Robles Proulx

description: The second wine of Vale Meão, this is rich and fruity. It has enough structure to allow it to develop while also having plenty of red-berry fruits and soft tannins. Give this wine until 2019.
title: Quinta do Vale Meão 2014 Meandro do Vale Meão Red (Douro)
description2: The second wine of Vale Meão, this is rich and fruity. It has enough structure to allow it to develop while also having plenty of red-berry fruits and soft tannins. Give this wine until 2019. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Quinta do Vale Meão

description: Red-berry fruits and soft tannins give a wine with some juicy acidity and spice. The firm aftertaste shows that it is still needs time. Drink from 2018.
title: Quinta Dona Matilde 2013 Dona Matilde Reserva Red (Douro)
description2: Red-berry fruits and soft tannins give a wine with some juicy acidity and spice. The firm aftertaste shows that it is still needs time. Drink from 2018. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Quinta Dona Matilde

description: Spice from wood aging is the initial character of this wine. Then the fruit comes through more strongly to give the wine richness and structure. Drink from 2018.
title: Quinta dos Poços 2013 Reserva Red (Douro)
description2: Spice from wood aging is the initial character of this wine. Then the fruit comes through more strongly to give the wine richness and structure. Drink from 2018. Portuguese Red Portugal Douro  Quinta dos Poços

description: Aromatics of rose and mint give this wine prettiness on the nose before getting into darker, richer components on the palate. Medium in build, it retains a sizable tannin presence in its youth, complemented by dark cherry and a char on the oak.
title: Robert Mondavi 2014 Reserve Pinot Noir (Carneros)
description2: Aromatics of rose and mint give this wine prettiness on the nose before getting into darker, richer components on the palate. Medium in build, it retains a sizable tannin presence in its youth, complemented by dark cherry and a char on the oak. Pinot Noir US California Carneros Robert Mondavi

description: A mix of clones and vineyard sources, this is a bit rough and tumble, as the name might suggest. Hard cherry candy carries a touch of rubber, and some rugged tannins. That said, it's got plenty of punch and power.
title: Roco 2014 Gravel Road Pinot Noir (Willamette Valley)
description2: A mix of clones and vineyard sources, this is a bit rough and tumble, as the name might suggest. Hard cherry candy carries a touch of rubber, and some rugged tannins. That said, it's got plenty of punch and power. Pinot Noir US Oregon Willamette Valley Roco

description: Earthy nose of dried underbrush, truffle and scorched soil give way to cranberry and sour cherry flavors. Dried herb and dark spice add some depth while tightly packed astringent tannins leave a mouth-puckering finish. It's rather straightforward but let the tannins relax for another few years then drink.
title: Tenuta Duecorti 2012 Castelletto  (Barolo)
description2: Earthy nose of dried underbrush, truffle and scorched soil give way to cranberry and sour cherry flavors. Dried herb and dark spice add some depth while tightly packed astringent tannins leave a mouth-puckering finish. It's rather straightforward but let the tannins relax for another few years then drink. Nebbiolo Italy Piedmont Barolo Tenuta Duecorti
